Standard: 我晓得我奶是哪样跟她家里人失散的了。
Chinese: 我晓得我奶是哪样跟她家里人失散的了。
TraditionalChinese: 我曉得我奶是哪樣跟她家裏人失散的了。
English: I know how my Grandma got separated from her family.

Standard: 她那天忽然清醒了一段时间，跟我说了。
Chinese: 她那天忽然清醒了一段时间，跟我说了。
TraditionalChinese: 她那天忽然清醒了一段時間，跟我說了。
English: One day she was suddenly full of clarity， and told me.
How?

Standard: 本来那天她答应带她弟飞宝，去看白鹭的。
Chinese: 本来那天她答应带她弟飞宝，去看白鹭的。
TraditionalChinese: 本來那天她答應帶她弟飛寶，去看白鷺的。
English: Originally she told her little brother Feibao， they would go see egrets.

Standard: 结果一大早就有人来，把飞宝买走当童工了。
Chinese: 结果一大早就有人来，把飞宝买走当童工了。
TraditionalChinese: 結果一大早就有人來，把飛寶買走當童工了。
English: But early morning someone came and bought Feibao as a child worker.

Standard: 飞宝是坐船走的，她想偷偷追上去救他回来。
Chinese: 飞宝是坐船走的，她想偷偷追上去救他回来。
TraditionalChinese: 飛寶是坐船走的，她想偷偷追上去救他回來。
English: Feibao left on a boat， she was sneaking out to go save him.

Standard: 但是她上错船了，去到很远的地方。
Chinese: 但是她上错船了，去到很远的地方。
TraditionalChinese: 但是她上錯船了，去到很遠的地方。
English: But she got on the wrong boat， and went somewhere far away.
Couldn't find her way back.
And like that， seventy years.
Sigh， how sad.

Standard: 我就说为什么每次路过大桥，她都要停下来。
Chinese: 我就说为什么每次路过大桥，她都要停下来。
TraditionalChinese: 我就說為什麼每次路過大橋，她都要停下來。
English: So I was just thinking how come everytime we cross the big bridge， she has to stop.

Standard: 她就静静地站在那里，一直流眼泪。
Chinese: 她就静静地站在那里，一直流眼泪。
TraditionalChinese: 她就靜靜地站在那裏，一直流眼淚。
English: She would just stand there quietly， tears falling down.

Standard: 原来是看见江边的白鹭她就想起她的家人。
Chinese: 原来是看见江边的白鹭她就想起她的家人。
TraditionalChinese: 原來是看見江邊的白鷺她就想起她的家人。
English: It was because the Egrets made her homesick.

Standard: 等过完端午，我跟你去那边找找吧。
Chinese: 等过完端午，我跟你去那边找找吧。
TraditionalChinese: 等過完端午，我跟你去那邊找找吧。
English: After Duanwu， let's go look over there.
See if we can find something about her family.
I was just thinking that too.

Standard: 不讲找到人，好歹找到那个地方吧。
Chinese: 不讲找到人，好歹找到那个地方吧。
TraditionalChinese: 不講找到人，好歹找到那個地方吧。
English: Not even asking to find people， at least just the place.
Falling leaves return to the roots， right?

Standard: 不过，她那天跟我讲完以后，整个人变精神了。
Chinese: 不过，她那天跟我讲完以后，整个人变精神了。
TraditionalChinese: 不過，她那天跟我講完以後，整個人變精神了。
English: But， after she told me that story， she was different.
It's like she finally was able to let something out.

Standard: 可能她知道自己的记性越来越差。
Chinese: 可能她知道自己的记性越来越差。
TraditionalChinese: 可能她知道自己的記性越來越差。
English: Maybe because she knows her memory is fading.

Standard: 以后什么都会不记得，包括这件事。
Chinese: 以后什么都会不记得，包括这件事。
TraditionalChinese: 以後什麼都會不記得，包括這件事。
English: In the future she won't remember anything， including this.

Standard: 讲给我听，那我就帮她记住了。
Chinese: 讲给我听，那我就帮她记住了。
TraditionalChinese: 講給我聽，那我就幫她記住了。
English: After telling me， that means I help her remember.

Standard: 村口有棵树，树旁边是一间大宅。
Chinese: 村口有棵树，树旁边是一间大宅。
TraditionalChinese: 村口有棵樹，樹旁邊是一間大宅。
English: There's a tree at the town entrance， next to the tree is a big house.

Standard: 街道的路是石板铺的，村口有桑树和鱼塘。
Chinese: 街道的路是石板铺的，村口有桑树和鱼塘。
TraditionalChinese: 街道的路是石板鋪的，村口有桑樹和魚塘。
English: The streets are paved with stone， there's also a fish pond and mulberry tree.

Standard: 这就是我奶记忆中她村子的模样。
Chinese: 这就是我奶记忆中她村子的模样。
TraditionalChinese: 這就是我奶記憶中她村子的模樣。
English: That's the village in my Grandma's memory.

Standard: 我奶越来越像娃仔了，爱讲俏皮话。
Chinese: 我奶越来越像娃仔了，爱讲俏皮话。
TraditionalChinese: 我奶越來越像娃仔了，愛講俏皮話。
English: Grandma's more and more like a kid， she's being more of a wisecrack.

Standard: 我觉得她有时候是故意装傻。
Chinese: 我觉得她有时候是故意装傻。
TraditionalChinese: 我覺得她有時候是故意裝傻。
English: Sometimes I feel like she's pretending like she doesn't understand.

Standard: 如果那样，也是好事，证明她人开心点了。
Chinese: 如果那样，也是好事，证明她人开心点了。
TraditionalChinese: 如果那樣，也是好事，證明她人開心點了。
English: If that's so， that's good too， means she's happier.

Standard: 离开家乡和亲人越久，思念的情绪就越深。
Chinese: 离开家乡和亲人越久，思念的情绪就越深。
TraditionalChinese: 離開家鄉和親人越久，思念的情緒就越深。
English: The longer you're away from  home and family， the harder it is.
Yeah? I don't know.
I've never left Zhibin.

Standard: 跟我最亲的那几个人，也没有和我分开过。
Chinese: 跟我最亲的那几个人，也没有和我分开过。
TraditionalChinese: 跟我最親的那幾個人，也沒有和我分開過。
English: The peopel closest to me， we've never been apart.

Standard: 我开始知道照相有什么意义了。
Chinese: 我开始知道照相有什么意义了。
TraditionalChinese: 我開始知道照相有什麼意義了。
English: I'm learning more about what pictures mean.

Standard: 它可以记住一些会消失的东西。
Chinese: 它可以记住一些会消失的东西。
TraditionalChinese: 它可以記住一些會消失的東西。
English: It can remember things that will disappear.

Standard: 而且记住的那些时刻，我还可以选比较好的。
Chinese: 而且记住的那些时刻，我还可以选比较好的。
TraditionalChinese: 而且記住的那些時刻，我還可以選比較好的。
English: And I can pick the better times to remember.

Standard: 看到我奶现在的样子，有时候也觉得蛮好的。
Chinese: 看到我奶现在的样子，有时候也觉得蛮好的。
TraditionalChinese: 看到我奶現在的樣子，有時候也覺得蠻好的。
English: Seeing Grandma now， I think it's pretty good.

Standard: 什么她都慢慢忘记了，连悲伤也会慢慢消失。
Chinese: 什么她都慢慢忘记了，连悲伤也会慢慢消失。
TraditionalChinese: 什麼她都慢慢忘記了，連悲傷也會慢慢消失。
English: She'll forget everything slowly， even sadness.
Xiaojie.
Uncle Tan.
Reading?

Standard: 嗯，一个叫茴逸的作家写的散文集。
Chinese: 嗯，一个叫茴逸的作家写的散文集。
TraditionalChinese: 嗯，一個叫茴逸的作家寫的散文集。
English: Yes， a collection of essays from Huiyi.

Standard: 她是北方人，写的东西很多我都没见过。
Chinese: 她是北方人，写的东西很多我都没见过。
TraditionalChinese: 她是北方人，寫的東西很多我都沒見過。
English: He's a Northener， lots of things he writes about I've never seen.

Standard: 我觉得还挺有意思的，最近都靠它消磨时光。
Chinese: 我觉得还挺有意思的，最近都靠它消磨时光。
TraditionalChinese: 我覺得還挺有意思的，最近都靠它消磨時光。
English: I think it's interesting， so I use it to pass the time.
“In order to save money

Standard: 冬天去姥姥家不舍得坐五毛钱的公交车。
Chinese: 冬天去姥姥家不舍得坐五毛钱的公交车。
TraditionalChinese: 冬天去姥姥家不舍得坐五毛錢的公車。
English: Mom didn't want to spend the 5 cents for the bus to get her to Grandma's house in the Winter.
Walking there takes half an hour，

Standard: 妈妈就带着我从家门口开始滚雪球，
Chinese: 妈妈就带着我从家门口开始滚雪球，
TraditionalChinese: 媽媽就帶著我從家門口開始滾雪球，
English: So Mom had me start rolling a snowball when we left the house，

Standard: 一直滚到姥姥家，雪球就变大了。
Chinese: 一直滚到姥姥家，雪球就变大了。
TraditionalChinese: 一直滾到姥姥家，雪球就變大了。
English: We rolled it all the way to Grandma's house， so the snowball got big.

Standard: 然后我们再在姥姥家把雪球变成雪人。
Chinese: 然后我们再在姥姥家把雪球变成雪人。
TraditionalChinese: 然後我們再在姥姥家把雪球變成雪人。
English: Then we made it into a snowman.

Standard: 具体的情景，我已经不记得了。
Chinese: 具体的情景，我已经不记得了。
TraditionalChinese: 具體的情景，我已經不記得了。
English: What the scene looked like I don't remember.

Standard: 印象里唯独有滚雪球的片段。”
Chinese: 印象里唯独有滚雪球的片段。”
TraditionalChinese: 印象裏唯獨有滾雪球的片段。”
English: I only remember rolling the snowball”

Standard: “每当街头卖爆米花的老爷爷出现时，
Chinese: “每当街头卖爆米花的老爷爷出现时，
TraditionalChinese: “每當街頭賣爆米花的老爺爺出現時，
English: “Whenever the Grandpa that sells popcorn shows up，

Standard: 身后总是跟着我们这群孩子。
Chinese: 身后总是跟着我们这群孩子。
TraditionalChinese: 身後總是跟著我們這群孩子。
English: we kids are always following him.

Standard: 其实大家并不是去买爆米花，
Chinese: 其实大家并不是去买爆米花，
TraditionalChinese: 其實大家並不是去買爆米花，
English: Not becuase we wanted to buy popcorn，

Standard: 而是为了看爆米花爆出时的情景。
Chinese: 而是为了看爆米花爆出时的情景。
TraditionalChinese: 而是為了看爆米花爆出時的情景。
English: we wanted to watch as the popcorn was popped.

Standard: 他牵着马，马背上驮着老式爆米花机。
Chinese: 他牵着马，马背上驮着老式爆米花机。
TraditionalChinese: 他牽著馬，馬背上馱著老式爆米花機。
English: He would lead his horse， the horse would have the old popcorn machine.

Standard: 到了他固定呆的位置，架起火就开始爆米花。
Chinese: 到了他固定呆的位置，架起火就开始爆米花。
TraditionalChinese: 到了他固定呆的位置，架起火就開始爆米花。
English: He'd get to his spot， setup shop and start making popocorn.

Standard: 随着嘭的一声，爆米花就爆好了。
Chinese: 随着嘭的一声，爆米花就爆好了。
TraditionalChinese: 隨著嘭的一聲，爆米花就爆好了。
English: And “Boom” the popcorn is popped.

Standard: 更多的人也因此知道是他来了，
Chinese: 更多的人也因此知道是他来了，
TraditionalChinese: 更多的人也因此知道是他來了，
English: With that sound， more people would know he is here.

Standard: 纷纷回家拿点米，来换爆米花吃。
Chinese: 纷纷回家拿点米，来换爆米花吃。
TraditionalChinese: 紛紛回家拿點米，來換爆米花吃。
English: Everyone would go home and get some rice to barter for popcorn.

Standard: 真是一幅自然又幸福的画面。”
Chinese: 真是一幅自然又幸福的画面。”
TraditionalChinese: 真是一幅自然又幸福的畫面。”
English: A very happy scene.”

Standard: “那时候上学路上是蔚蓝色天空，
Chinese: “那时候上学路上是蔚蓝色天空，
TraditionalChinese: “那時候上學路上是蔚藍色天空，
English: “The sky was a bright blue color that day to school，

Standard: 如茵草地里夹杂着泛白的石头。
Chinese: 如茵草地里夹杂着泛白的石头。
TraditionalChinese: 如茵草地裏夾雜著泛白的石頭。
English: There were white pebbles in the grass.
When I was going to kindergarten，

Standard: 要走过一段铺着煤渣的大马路。
Chinese: 要走过一段铺着煤渣的大马路。
TraditionalChinese: 要走過一段鋪著煤渣的大馬路。
English: we had to cross a big road covered with cinder.

Standard: 运煤车走过后留下一团团黑气，
Chinese: 运煤车走过后留下一团团黑气，
TraditionalChinese: 運煤車走過後留下一團團黑氣，
English: The coal trucks would always leave a giant black cloud，

Standard: 一起的小孩总会无意义地尖叫，
Chinese: 一起的小孩总会无意义地尖叫，
TraditionalChinese: 一起的小孩總會無意義地尖叫，
English: And the kids would always scream unintentionally，

Standard: 然后兴冲冲把几块石头扔向离去的车的背影。
Chinese: 然后兴冲冲把几块石头扔向离去的车的背影。
TraditionalChinese: 然後興沖沖把幾塊石頭扔向離去的車的背影。
English: Then we would excitedly throw rocks a the leaving car.

Standard: 我们一起在上学途中的山坡爬上爬下，
Chinese: 我们一起在上学途中的山坡爬上爬下，
TraditionalChinese: 我們一起在上學途中的山坡爬上爬下，
English: We would climb everywhere on the hill to school，
And before getting to the classroom，

Standard: 把自己弄成一只灰头土脸的脏猫。
Chinese: 把自己弄成一只灰头土脸的脏猫。
TraditionalChinese: 把自己弄成一只灰頭土臉的髒貓。
English: we would look like dirty cats.

Standard: 这并非无忧无虑的孩子的单纯放纵，
Chinese: 这并非无忧无虑的孩子的单纯放纵，
TraditionalChinese: 這並非無憂無慮的孩子的單純放縱，
English: This wasn't just carefree kids letting loose，

Standard: 富有心机的我们是有的放矢——
Chinese: 富有心机的我们是有的放矢——
TraditionalChinese: 富有心機的我們是有的放矢——
English: We had a plan and a goal to accomplish with it-

Standard: 记忆中有张模糊的面容总会放下手上的团扇，
Chinese: 记忆中有张模糊的面容总会放下手上的团扇，
TraditionalChinese: 記憶中有張模糊的面容總會放下手上的團扇，
English: A vague figure would always put down their round fan，

Standard: 用湿毛巾一点一点温柔地擦拭我们的脸庞。
Chinese: 用湿毛巾一点一点温柔地擦拭我们的脸庞。
TraditionalChinese: 用濕毛巾一點一點溫柔地擦拭我們的臉龐。
English: and wipe our faces gently with a wet towel.

Standard: 那样，我们又能少上很久的课。”
Chinese: 那样，我们又能少上很久的课。”
TraditionalChinese: 那樣，我們又能少上很久的課。”
English: That way， we would have less class time.”
“Mom always loved to joke and tease，

Standard: 讲述当初究竟是如何被爸爸‘欺骗”了。
Chinese: 讲述当初究竟是如何被爸爸‘欺骗”了。
TraditionalChinese: 講述當初究竟是如何被爸爸‘欺騙”了。
English: And retell how Dad got “Tricked”.
But really it went like this-

Standard: 爸爸为了在见相亲对象的时候，
Chinese: 爸爸为了在见相亲对象的时候，
TraditionalChinese: 爸爸為了在見相親對象的時候，
English: When Dad was going on arranged dates，
he would dress up nicely，

Standard: 特地借了爷爷单位的一身制服，
Chinese: 特地借了爷爷单位的一身制服，
TraditionalChinese: 特地借了爺爺單位的一身制服，
English: and he'd borrow a uniform from my Grandpa，

Standard: 结果被妈妈误以为是警察职业，
Chinese: 结果被妈妈误以为是警察职业，
TraditionalChinese: 結果被媽媽誤以為是員警職業，
English: But mom would mistake him for a cop，

Standard: 妈妈对家里人声称就非这个人不嫁了。
Chinese: 妈妈对家里人声称就非这个人不嫁了。
TraditionalChinese: 媽媽對家裏人聲稱就非這個人不嫁了。
English: So mom told her family she has to marry him.

Standard: 后来结了婚才知道原来是搞了大乌龙。
Chinese: 后来结了婚才知道原来是搞了大乌龙。
TraditionalChinese: 後來結了婚才知道原來是搞了大烏龍。
English: But only after they married was it a big misunderstanding，

Standard: 那套并不是公安制服，而是电业局工作服。”
Chinese: 那套并不是公安制服，而是电业局工作服。”
TraditionalChinese: 那套並不是公安制服，而是電業局工作服。”
English: It wasn't a police officer uniform， but the uniform for the electricity department.”
“Every morning in grade school，

Standard: 妈妈都会给我扎左右一边一个紧紧的麻花辫，
Chinese: 妈妈都会给我扎左右一边一个紧紧的麻花辫，
TraditionalChinese: 媽媽都會給我紮左右一邊一個緊緊的麻花辮，
English: Mom would always give me pig tails，

Standard: 当我回到学校，头皮一整天都是紧绷的。”
Chinese: 当我回到学校，头皮一整天都是紧绷的。”
TraditionalChinese: 當我回到學校，頭皮一整天都是緊繃的。”
English: and when I go to school my scalp would be so tight.”

Standard: “有一次，我们跑到即将收成的小麦地里玩，
Chinese: “有一次，我们跑到即将收成的小麦地里玩，
TraditionalChinese: “有一次，我們跑到即將收成的小麥地裏玩，
English: “One time， we ran to the wheat fields to play， they were almost ready for harvesting，

Standard: 把那些庄稼毁坏到了无可救药的地步，
Chinese: 把那些庄稼毁坏到了无可救药的地步，
TraditionalChinese: 把那些莊稼毀壞到了無可救藥的地步，
English: And we ruined those fields to where they couldn't be salvaged，

Standard: 最后被主人发现了，不让我们离开。
Chinese: 最后被主人发现了，不让我们离开。
TraditionalChinese: 最後被主人發現了，不讓我們離開。
English: The owner found out， and wouldn't let us leavel.
Until they told the adults，

Standard: 父母来赔了钱，才能领我们走。
Chinese: 父母来赔了钱，才能领我们走。
TraditionalChinese: 父母來賠了錢，才能領我們走。
English: Parents had to pay money in order to take us home.
The way my dad looked，

Standard: 如今想来我都心有余悸。
Chinese: 如今想来我都心有余悸。
TraditionalChinese: 如今想來我都心有餘悸。
English: even today when I think about it， it scares me.

Standard: 要知道，那可是犯个错都不敢回家的岁数。”
Chinese: 要知道，那可是犯个错都不敢回家的岁数。”
TraditionalChinese: 要知道，那可是犯個錯都不敢回家的歲數。”
English: You have to know， that was a time where you didn't dare go home if you made a mistake.”
“I like the countryside，

Standard: 或者说，喜欢爷爷奶奶在的乡下。
Chinese: 或者说，喜欢爷爷奶奶在的乡下。
TraditionalChinese: 或者說，喜歡爺爺奶奶在的鄉下。
English: Or， I like the countryside where Grandma and Grandpa are.
Find a nice flat courtyard，

Standard: 打陀螺，跳格子，可以玩一天。
Chinese: 打陀螺，跳格子，可以玩一天。
TraditionalChinese: 打陀螺，跳格子，可以玩一天。
English: Spin your top， Play hopscotch， you can play all day.

Standard: 还有滚铁环，过家家，也是必不可少。
Chinese: 还有滚铁环，过家家，也是必不可少。
TraditionalChinese: 還有滾鐵環，過家家，也是必不可少。
English: Can't forget rolling rings and playing house.
When letting the cows graze，

Standard: 去偷人家地里的玉米，在山里烤着吃。
Chinese: 去偷人家地里的玉米，在山里烤着吃。
TraditionalChinese: 去偷人家地裏的玉米，在山裏烤著吃。
English: You could steal the neighbor's corn and grill it up in the mountains to eat.

Standard: 路过山上的老坟时，总会被村里小孩吓到。
Chinese: 路过山上的老坟时，总会被村里小孩吓到。
TraditionalChinese: 路過山上的老墳時，總會被村裏小孩嚇到。
English: Passing through the graveyard up there， you'd get scared by the kids.

Standard: 一群女孩子，凑在一堆看男娃子打架。
Chinese: 一群女孩子，凑在一堆看男娃子打架。
TraditionalChinese: 一群女孩子，湊在一堆看男娃子打架。
English: A bunch of girls， watching a bunch of boys fighting.

Standard: 还有永远不变的，清晨各家各户的炊烟。
Chinese: 还有永远不变的，清晨各家各户的炊烟。
TraditionalChinese: 還有永遠不變的，清晨各家各戶的炊煙。
English: And something that never changes， every house's chimney smoke.
It's not strong， and smells great.”

Standard: 这本书里还有很多有趣的段落。
Chinese: 这本书里还有很多有趣的段落。
TraditionalChinese: 這本書裏還有很多有趣的段落。
English: This book still has so many more parts.
I'm going to take my time enjoying it.
Hao Bo?
Bro' Nan.
Isn't this your office?
Why are you standing outside?
Sigh...
It's a long story.
Did you get punished?
Wouldn't say punish...

Standard: 领导说局里人手不足，需要重新调整劳动力。
Chinese: 领导说局里人手不足，需要重新调整劳动力。
TraditionalChinese: 領導說局裏人手不足，需要重新調整勞動力。
English: Boss said there aren't enough people working so we all have to adjust.
So now I have to deliver the mail.
But I don't see you delivering Mail?

Standard: 可是我送信送的太慢，又被调回来了。
Chinese: 可是我送信送的太慢，又被调回来了。
TraditionalChinese: 可是我送信送的太慢，又被調回來了。
English: Because I was too slow so I got moved back.

Standard: 现在领导让我全天站在这个窗口前。
Chinese: 现在领导让我全天站在这个窗口前。
TraditionalChinese: 現在領導讓我全天站在這個窗口前。
English: Now I just stand in front of this window.

Standard: 给办事群众介绍各种业务怎么办理。
Chinese: 给办事群众介绍各种业务怎么办理。
TraditionalChinese: 給辦事群眾介紹各種業務怎麼辦理。
English: And tell people where to go to get their things done.
...You must have done something wrong.
What did I do wrong?
How would I know??

Standard: 领导对我的评价不错，说我工作都完成得好。
Chinese: 领导对我的评价不错，说我工作都完成得好。
TraditionalChinese: 領導對我的評價不錯，說我工作都完成得好。
English: I've gotten good reviews from my boss， they eve said I do a good job.

Standard: 那为什么又说我需要再锻炼一段时间呢？
Chinese: 那为什么又说我需要再锻炼一段时间呢？
TraditionalChinese: 那為什麼又說我需要再鍛煉一段時間呢？
English: Then why say I need some more experience?

Standard: 我去送信的时候，领导让我把地图背熟。
Chinese: 我去送信的时候，领导让我把地图背熟。
TraditionalChinese: 我去送信的時候，領導讓我把地圖背熟。
English: When I went to deliver mail， they made me memorize the map.

Standard: 他说，我不仅要搞清楚生活中的环境和道路。
Chinese: 他说，我不仅要搞清楚生活中的环境和道路。
TraditionalChinese: 他說，我不僅要搞清楚生活中的環境和道路。
English: They said， I not only have to know the roads and the area，

Standard: 还要弄明白，工作中的处境和形势。
Chinese: 还要弄明白，工作中的处境和形势。
TraditionalChinese: 還要弄明白，工作中的處境和形勢。
English: But I also have to understand what the situation is at work.
What does that mean?

Standard: 他们说我适应得太慢，没有根据实际做调整。
Chinese: 他们说我适应得太慢，没有根据实际做调整。
TraditionalChinese: 他們說我適應得太慢，沒有根據實際做調整。
English: They said I was adjusting too slow and not really working based on the reality of the situation.
But I think I'm adjusting fine.

Standard: 原本负责送信的小伍，私拆信件被举报了。
Chinese: 原本负责送信的小伍，私拆信件被举报了。
TraditionalChinese: 原本負責送信的小伍，私拆信件被舉報了。
English: Xiao Wu who was originally responsible for delivering mail， got reported for opening private letters.
I hear they could be convicted.

Standard: 领导问过我，咱们部门最重要的是什么。
Chinese: 领导问过我，咱们部门最重要的是什么。
TraditionalChinese: 領導問過我，咱們部門最重要的是什麼。
English: Boss asked me， what's the most important thing for our department.

Standard: 我说业绩，他说不对；我说奉献，还是不对。
Chinese: 我说业绩，他说不对；我说奉献，还是不对。
TraditionalChinese: 我說業績，他說不對；我說奉獻，還是不對。
English: I said， performance， they said wrong; I said dedication， they said wrong.
They said， unity is the most important.
Told me I didn't learn enough.

Standard: 没有掌握正确的方法和态度。
Chinese: 没有掌握正确的方法和态度。
TraditionalChinese: 沒有掌握正確的方法和態度。
English: I didn't get the correct method or attitude.
Didn't fit in.
I also want to be more familiar with everyone else.

Standard: 但是他们好像都不喜欢搭理我。
Chinese: 但是他们好像都不喜欢搭理我。
TraditionalChinese: 但是他們好像都不喜歡搭理我。
English: But they usually just ignore moe.
I do everything by the book.

Standard: 为什么他们还说我没有规矩呢？
Chinese: 为什么他们还说我没有规矩呢？
TraditionalChinese: 為什麼他們還說我沒有規矩呢？
English: How come they still say I'm not following the rules?
Uncle Zheng.
Ah Nan.
How long has it been since you bought a book?
I don't like reading books.

Standard: 读史使人明智，读诗使人灵秀。
Chinese: 读史使人明智，读诗使人灵秀。
TraditionalChinese: 讀史使人明智，讀詩使人靈秀。
English: Reading history helps with wisdom， reading poetry helps with elegance.

Standard: 你什么都不读，会变成庸人的。
Chinese: 你什么都不读，会变成庸人的。
TraditionalChinese: 你什麼都不讀，會變成庸人的。
English: If you don't read anything， you'll just be mediocre.
I am mediocre.
Let me tell you a story.

Standard: 你先讲个大概，我看看我听过没有。
Chinese: 你先讲个大概，我看看我听过没有。
TraditionalChinese: 你先講個大概，我看看我聽過沒有。
English: Just give me a summary， let me see if I've heard it before.

Standard: 你经常重复讲的，听过我就不听了。
Chinese: 你经常重复讲的，听过我就不听了。
TraditionalChinese: 你經常重複講的，聽過我就不聽了。
English: You always repeat your stories， if I heard it before， I don't want to hear it again.

Standard: 人最大的劣根性，就是喜欢窝里斗。
Chinese: 人最大的劣根性，就是喜欢窝里斗。
TraditionalChinese: 人最大的劣根性，就是喜歡窩裏鬥。
English: A person's greatest weakness is infighting.
Oh， got it.
I heard this before.

Standard: 你在生产队的故事嘛，不用再讲了。
Chinese: 你在生产队的故事嘛，不用再讲了。
TraditionalChinese: 你在生產隊的故事嘛，不用再講了。
English: It's the story of when you were on the production team， you don't need to retell it.
Wait!

Standard: 同样的道理，还有另外一个故事！
Chinese: 同样的道理，还有另外一个故事！
TraditionalChinese: 同樣的道理，還有另外一個故事！
English: There's another story with the same moral!
...Fine go ahead.

Standard: 那天有两个娃仔，来我们店买漫画。
Chinese: 那天有两个娃仔，来我们店买漫画。
TraditionalChinese: 那天有兩個娃仔，來我們店買漫畫。
English: That day， there were two kids who wanted to buy some manhua.

Standard: 买了两本《八凤珠》，两本《机器狗》。
Chinese: 买了两本《八凤珠》，两本《机器狗》。
TraditionalChinese: 買了兩本《八鳳珠》，兩本《機器狗》。
English: Bought two copies of “Eight Phoenix Pearls”， two of “Robot Dog”
Hm， I haven't heard this before.
Go on.

Standard: 他们刚走出去没多远，就碰见另外三个学生。
Chinese: 他们刚走出去没多远，就碰见另外三个学生。
TraditionalChinese: 他們剛走出去沒多遠，就碰見另外三個學生。
English: They walked a short distance before running into three other students.

Standard: 估计是初中生，或者是六年级的。
Chinese: 估计是初中生，或者是六年级的。
TraditionalChinese: 估計是初中生，或者是六年級的。
English: I'm guessing they were middle school， maybe sixth grade.

Standard: 他们的钱就挨这三个人抢走啦。
Chinese: 他们的钱就挨这三个人抢走啦。
TraditionalChinese: 他們的錢就挨這三個人搶走啦。
English: Their money was taken by those three.

Standard: 一个挨抢了几块，另外一个挨抢了几十块。
Chinese: 一个挨抢了几块，另外一个挨抢了几十块。
TraditionalChinese: 一個挨搶了幾塊，另外一個挨搶了幾十塊。
English: One had a few bucks stolen， and the other had a few dozen stolen.
After robbing them， the thieves even chased and beat them.
And you didn't go help them?
I did!
Those three ran off immediately!
Kids these days are terrible， you know.
The problem was the next day.

Standard: 学校来找我们，你晓得为什么咩？
Chinese: 学校来找我们，你晓得为什么咩？
TraditionalChinese: 學校來找我們，你曉得為什麼咩？
English: The school came by， do you know why?
Why?

Standard: 挨抢的其中一个的妈，觉得是另一个设计的。
Chinese: 挨抢的其中一个的妈，觉得是另一个设计的。
TraditionalChinese: 挨搶的其中一個的媽，覺得是另一個設計的。
English: One of the victims' moms thought the other kid had planned it all.
Planned it with those other three to rob her kid.

Standard: 她找到了学校，又找了另外那个的家长。
Chinese: 她找到了学校，又找了另外那个的家长。
TraditionalChinese: 她找到了學校，又找了另外那個的家長。
English: She went to school， found the other's parents.
She was determined to ruin that boy.

Standard: 好在学校来问我，我就给那个娃仔作证。
Chinese: 好在学校来问我，我就给那个娃仔作证。
TraditionalChinese: 好在學校來問我，我就給那個娃仔作證。
English: Fortunately， the school came to ask me
I testified that the other kid was also a victim.

Standard: 你讲，这件事情是不是很荒谬？
Chinese: 你讲，这件事情是不是很荒谬？
TraditionalChinese: 你講，這件事情是不是很荒謬？
English: Isn't that ridiculous?
Human nature is ugly， isn't it?
It is.
Infighting isn't worth it.

Standard: 你要多读书，才能读懂人性。
Chinese: 你要多读书，才能读懂人性。
TraditionalChinese: 你要多讀書，才能讀懂人性。
English: You have to read more， so you can understand people more.
I have no time.
I can learn through work.
Hmph.

Standard: 子曰：学而不思则罔，思而不学则殆。
Chinese: 子曰：学而不思则罔，思而不学则殆。
TraditionalChinese: 子曰：學而不思則罔，思而不學則殆。
English: Confucius says: To learn without thinking is confusing， to think without learning is dangerous.
You can't be like this.
You don't have to buy.
Just come in and browse， I'll get you a seat.
Don't stand outside.
No thanks， I have things to do.

Standard: 我看了快二十年的书，摘抄了五十本笔记。
Chinese: 我看了快二十年的书，摘抄了五十本笔记。
TraditionalChinese: 我看了快二十年的書，摘抄了五十本筆記。
English: I've read for almost twenty years， I have fifty notebooks of notes.
Three bookshelves full at home.

Standard: 你读书，可以先专门读某个类别。
Chinese: 你读书，可以先专门读某个类别。
TraditionalChinese: 你讀書，可以先專門讀某個類別。
English: When you read， you can focus on a genre first.
Or you can just read all kinds of books.

Standard: 只要读进脑里了，都是有益的。
Chinese: 只要读进脑里了，都是有益的。
TraditionalChinese: 只要讀進腦裏了，都是有益的。
English: As long as you read it and take it to your heart， it'll be good.

Standard: 你不是专门搞学术的，读点通识类的就得了。
Chinese: 你不是专门搞学术的，读点通识类的就得了。
TraditionalChinese: 你不是專門搞學術的，讀點通識類的就得了。
English: You're not doing science or anything， so just general knowledge is good.
Biography， history， social studies.
My notes have it all marked.

Standard: 文学啊，文化啊，历史和政治啊。
Chinese: 文学啊，文化啊，历史和政治啊。
TraditionalChinese: 文學啊，文化啊，歷史和政治啊。
English: Literature， Culture， History， Government， all that.

Standard: 有的是摘抄，有的是心得体会。
Chinese: 有的是摘抄，有的是心得体会。
TraditionalChinese: 有的是摘抄，有的是心得體會。
English: Some excerpts， some of my own thoughts.
I even have newspaper clippings.
I started from the Eighties.

Standard: 每年都订十来种报纸，读完就剪。
Chinese: 每年都订十来种报纸，读完就剪。
TraditionalChinese: 每年都訂十來種報紙，讀完就剪。
English: Every year， I order dozens of newspapers. When I'm done reading， I clip them.

Standard: 报纸是时代的记录仪，是历史的收集者。
Chinese: 报纸是时代的记录仪，是历史的收集者。
TraditionalChinese: 報紙是時代的記錄儀，是歷史的收集者。
English: Newspapers are a record of time， a collector of histories.

Standard: 你要知道某个时候发生过什么，看报最直观。
Chinese: 你要知道某个时候发生过什么，看报最直观。
TraditionalChinese: 你要知道某個時候發生過什麼，看報最直觀。
English: If you want to know what happened where and when， reading a newspaper is the most direct.

Standard: 人上了年纪容易忘事，记不清就翻翻笔记。
Chinese: 人上了年纪容易忘事，记不清就翻翻笔记。
TraditionalChinese: 人上了年紀容易忘事，記不清就翻翻筆記。
English: It's easy to forget things when you get older. I just flip through notes when I don't remember.

Standard: 这样不仅能帮助记忆，连心情也豁然开朗。
Chinese: 这样不仅能帮助记忆，连心情也豁然开朗。
TraditionalChinese: 這樣不僅能幫助記憶，連心情也豁然開朗。
English: This not only helps with memory， but also makes me happier.
What's the meaning of the name of my bookstore?
Tangdi is “Brothers”

Standard: 喜欢阅读的人，就是跟我志同道合的。
Chinese: 喜欢阅读的人，就是跟我志同道合的。
TraditionalChinese: 喜歡閱讀的人，就是跟我志同道合的。
English: The ones who like to read， are the people who share the same interests as me.
So， my brothers.
Sorry， everyone.

Standard: 是我喊你们来帮忙的，结果我自己参加不了。
Chinese: 是我喊你们来帮忙的，结果我自己参加不了。
TraditionalChinese: 是我喊你們來幫忙的，結果我自己參加不了。
English: I asked you all to come help， but I can't join in myself.
Don't say that.

Standard: 你照顾好荔荔就得了，划龙舟我们替你出力。
Chinese: 你照顾好荔荔就得了，划龙舟我们替你出力。
TraditionalChinese: 你照顧好荔荔就得了，劃龍舟我們替你出力。
English: Just take care of Lili， we'll take care of the Dragon Boat.

Standard: 对啊，你有你的挑战，我们有我们的比赛。
Chinese: 对啊，你有你的挑战，我们有我们的比赛。
TraditionalChinese: 對啊，你有你的挑戰，我們有我們的比賽。
English: Yeah， you have your challenges， we have our race.

Standard: 各有各的任务，两边都要胜利！
Chinese: 各有各的任务，两边都要胜利！
TraditionalChinese: 各有各的任務，兩邊都要勝利！
English: Everyone has their own mission， both sides have to win!
Lili will definitely be okay!

Standard: 问题是原来我们也有赢的打算咯？
Chinese: 问题是原来我们也有赢的打算咯？
TraditionalChinese: 問題是原來我們也有贏的打算咯？
English: The problem is we also planned to win then?
Hahahahaha.

Standard: 问题是原来我们也有赢的打算咯？
Chinese: 问题是原来我们也有赢的打算咯？
TraditionalChinese: 問題是原來我們也有贏的打算咯？
English: The problem is we also planned to win then?
I don't want to be last.
Cousin， I'll do my best.
We will place for Zhibin!

Standard: 不给凤表姐做的龙、龙头丢脸。
Chinese: 不给凤表姐做的龙、龙头丢脸。
TraditionalChinese: 不給鳳表姐做的龍、龍頭丟臉。
English: We won't bring shame to Cousin Feng's Dragon and Dragon Head!
Then we go for the champion， win the flag!
The flag is second place!
First place wins a roast pig!
Roast pig is good.

Standard: 我们割两斤放在冰箱，等你们回来吃。
Chinese: 我们割两斤放在冰箱，等你们回来吃。
TraditionalChinese: 我們割兩斤放在冰箱，等你們回來吃。
English: We'll cut off two kilos and put it in the fridge， save it for you when you come back..
That's big talk， saving it for them?

Standard: 总共才四十斤，还不够你们这帮人送酒。
Chinese: 总共才四十斤，还不够你们这帮人送酒。
TraditionalChinese: 總共才四十斤，還不夠你們這幫人送酒。
English: There's only fourty kilos， not even enough for you people to drink with.
Hahahahaha.
No problem!

Standard: 到时候我单独烧一只给你们家！
Chinese: 到时候我单独烧一只给你们家！
TraditionalChinese: 到時候我單獨燒一只給你們家！
English: When the time comes， I'll cook one just for you!
Ah Nan， be careful.

Standard: 红萍老板的地炉还没有投产的。
Chinese: 红萍老板的地炉还没有投产的。
TraditionalChinese: 紅萍老闆的地爐還沒有投產的。
English: Boss Hongping's oven hasn't even started to work yet.
Not sure if it will meet the mark.
We can test it first!
See if it's any good.
I can't with you all!
If you want to eat， pay a deposit!
Hahahahaha.

Standard: 这几天一直下雨，水位太高。
Chinese: 这几天一直下雨，水位太高。
TraditionalChinese: 這幾天一直下雨，水位太高。
English: It keeps raining these days， the water levels are too high.

Standard: 考虑到安全问题，没有安排队伍训练。
Chinese: 考虑到安全问题，没有安排队伍训练。
TraditionalChinese: 考慮到安全問題，沒有安排隊伍訓練。
English: It's too dangerous to get everyone to train together.

Standard: 等天气好了，我会监督他们的，你放心。
Chinese: 等天气好了，我会监督他们的，你放心。
TraditionalChinese: 等天氣好了，我會監督他們的，你放心。
English: When the weather is better， I'll supervise， don't worry.
Haha， supervise what?

Standard: 大家愿意来就已经很给面子了。
Chinese: 大家愿意来就已经很给面子了。
TraditionalChinese: 大家願意來就已經很給面子了。
English: You're all giving me lots of face by simply showing up.

Standard: 就是为了过节高兴嘛，做做样子，走个过场。
Chinese: 就是为了过节高兴嘛，做做样子，走个过场。
TraditionalChinese: 就是為了過節高興嘛，做做樣子，走個過場。
English: It's just for everyone to be happy during the holiday， we'll just put up a dog and pony show.
Really， don't need to worry about winning or losing.
I can only do this much.
Can't really help you.
Don't worry.
It's not a big deal.
People get sick.

Standard: 病了就去治，就是这么简单。
Chinese: 病了就去治，就是这么简单。
TraditionalChinese: 病了就去治，就是這麼簡單。
English: When you get sick， you get treated， that easy.

Standard: 弟啊，你跟小凤，都是我看着长大的。
Chinese: 弟啊，你跟小凤，都是我看着长大的。
TraditionalChinese: 弟啊，你跟小鳳，都是我看著長大的。
English: Brother， I watched you and Xiao Feng grow up.
You two have different personalities.

Standard: 小凤脾气好，性格好，但是有点多愁善感。
Chinese: 小凤脾气好，性格好，但是有点多愁善感。
TraditionalChinese: 小鳳脾氣好，性格好，但是有點多愁善感。
English: Xiao Feng always had a good temper， easy to get along with， but sentimental.

Standard: 你火气大，没有耐心，好在心宽，能吃苦。
Chinese: 你火气大，没有耐心，好在心宽，能吃苦。
TraditionalChinese: 你火氣大，沒有耐心，好在心寬，能吃苦。
English: You get upset easily， are impatient， but you have a kind heart and work hard.

Standard: 哈哈，这样算表扬还是批评。
Chinese: 哈哈，这样算表扬还是批评。
TraditionalChinese: 哈哈，這樣算表揚還是批評。
English: Haha， does this count as praise or criticism?

Standard: 我想讲的是，你扛了这么多年，已经尽力了。
Chinese: 我想讲的是，你扛了这么多年，已经尽力了。
TraditionalChinese: 我想講的是，你扛了這麼多年，已經盡力了。
English: What I'm saying is， you've carried it for all these years， you've done your best.

Standard: 不管这次结果怎么样，你做得够好了。
Chinese: 不管这次结果怎么样，你做得够好了。
TraditionalChinese: 不管這次結果怎麼樣，你做得夠好了。
English: No matter what， you've done well.
Don't carry too many things.
No， not enough.
I didn't do anything.

Standard: 我做人家老公，做人家老头，一点用都没有。
Chinese: 我做人家老公，做人家老头，一点用都没有。
TraditionalChinese: 我做人家老公，做人家老頭，一點用都沒有。
English: As husband， as father， I'm useless.
{wvo}The woman didn't make it after we got her out of the water.{w=3}

Standard: {wvo}男的倒是不算太严重，已经醒了。{w=3}
Chinese: {wvo}男的倒是不算太严重，已经醒了。{w=3}
TraditionalChinese: {wvo}男的倒是不算太嚴重，已經醒了。{w=3}
English: {wvo}The man isn't too injured， already conscious.{w=3}
{wvo}What? Swimming accident?{w=3}
{wvo}No{w=3}

Standard: {wvo}那个村有条吊桥，本来是走人和单车的。{w=3}
Chinese: {wvo}那个村有条吊桥，本来是走人和单车的。{w=3}
TraditionalChinese: {wvo}那個村有條吊橋，本來是走人和單車的。{w=3}
English: {wvo}That village has a suspension bridge， for walking and bicycles.{w=3}

Standard: {wvo}这帮司机图方便，整天偷偷开汽车过去。{w=3}
Chinese: {wvo}这帮司机图方便，整天偷偷开汽车过去。{w=3}
TraditionalChinese: {wvo}這幫司機圖方便，整天偷偷開汽車過去。{w=3}
English: {wvo}These drivers wanted a shortcut， drove their cars over it.{w=3}

Standard: {wvo}都知道早晚会出问题，想不到这么快。{w=3}
Chinese: {wvo}都知道早晚会出问题，想不到这么快。{w=3}
TraditionalChinese: {wvo}都知道早晚會出問題，想不到這麼快。{w=3}
English: {wvo}Everyone knew there would be a problem， just didn't expect it to be so soon.{w=3}

Standard: {wvo}这两公婆也是背时了，刚好在上面。{w=3}
Chinese: {wvo}这两公婆也是背时了，刚好在上面。{w=3}
TraditionalChinese: {wvo}這兩公婆也是背時了，剛好在上面。{w=3}
English: {wvo}These two were unlucky， were on the bridge at that time.{w=3}

Standard: {wvo}桥直接从中间断一截，跑都跑不急。{w=3}
Chinese: {wvo}桥直接从中间断一截，跑都跑不急。{w=3}
TraditionalChinese: {wvo}橋直接從中間斷一截，跑都跑不急。{w=3}
English: {wvo}The bridge broke from the middle， no where to run.{w=3}
{wvo}Driver?{w=3}
{wvo}DOA{w=3}
{wvo}Couldn't get out of the car.{w=3}
{wvo}Harmed themselves and others.{w=3}
{wvo}Right?!{w=3}
{wvo}Such a big car dropped into the water.{w=3}

Standard: {wvo}那个女的肯定是挨漩涡卷进去了。{w=3}
Chinese: {wvo}那个女的肯定是挨漩涡卷进去了。{w=3}
TraditionalChinese: {wvo}那個女的肯定是挨漩渦捲進去了。{w=3}
English: {wvo}The woman must have been pulled into the vortex.{w=3}
{wvo}When we found her……{w=3}
{wvo}Sigh， let's not talk about it anymore.{w=3}
{wvo}The man is good at swimming.{w=3}

Standard: {wvo}有人看见他跌下去还在水底找他老婆。{w=3}
Chinese: {wvo}有人看见他跌下去还在水底找他老婆。{w=3}
TraditionalChinese: {wvo}有人看見他跌下去還在水底找他老婆。{w=3}
English: {wvo}Witness says he went back to look for his wife.{w=3}
{wvo}He looked for a very long time.{w=3}
{wvo}Drowned because he ran out of breath.{w=3}
{wvo}Sigh， such a pity.{w=3}
{wvo} Contact the family?{w=3}
Where'd you park the car?
At the village entrance.

Standard: 来的时候你不就在那里下的车吗？
Chinese: 来的时候你不就在那里下的车吗？
TraditionalChinese: 來的時候你不就在那裏下的車嗎？
English: Didn't you get off the car there?
Road's too narrow， can't fit.
Then what? You're all wet.
You don't even have an umbrella.
How could I know that it would rain?
Forget it， hurry up.
Go back and take a shower.

Standard: 你说你非得跑到山旮旯来干嘛？
Chinese: 你说你非得跑到山旮旯来干嘛？
TraditionalChinese: 你說你非得跑到山旮旯來幹嘛？
English: Speaking of， why do you have to come to the middle of nowhere?

Standard: 他们有什么要求，你照着做不就好了？
Chinese: 他们有什么要求，你照着做不就好了？
TraditionalChinese: 他們有什麼要求，你照著做不就好了？
English: Just do whatever they want， right?
That doesn't work.

Standard: 雕刻人家祠堂的陈设，多大的一件事啊！
Chinese: 雕刻人家祠堂的陈设，多大的一件事啊！
TraditionalChinese: 雕刻人家祠堂的陳設，多大的一件事啊！
English: Carving someone's ancestral hall， it's a big deal!

Standard: 不光要好看，还得体现出这里的历史和传统。
Chinese: 不光要好看，还得体现出这里的历史和传统。
TraditionalChinese: 不光要好看，還得體現出這裏的歷史和傳統。
English: Not only does it have to look good， it has to bring out the history and tradition of the place.

Standard: 实地考察，收集意见，才能做出合适的东西。
Chinese: 实地考察，收集意见，才能做出合适的东西。
TraditionalChinese: 實地考察，收集意見，才能做出合適的東西。
English: I have to go reserach personally， talk to people， that way I can make something fitting.

Standard: 结账的时候，多收点，当辛苦费。
Chinese: 结账的时候，多收点，当辛苦费。
TraditionalChinese: 結賬的時候，多收點，當辛苦費。
English: When you bill them， bill extra for all this hard work.
Hahaha， no!
We already settled on a price!
Plus， I don't think it's hard work.
I feel like it's hard work.
My back hurts from the driving.
Hmph.
Next time I'll take the bus， then.
Let's go let's go， it's cold.
...What is that car doing?
It can come up here?
...Back! Get back!
Hurry! Run back!
It was Summer， when Ah Feng left.
It was raining the days before and after.

Standard: 唯独出殡的那天，太阳大得睁不开眼睛。
Chinese: 唯独出殡的那天，太阳大得睁不开眼睛。
TraditionalChinese: 唯獨出殯的那天，太陽大得睜不開眼睛。
English: Except on the day of her funeral， the sun was so bright I couldn't open my eyes.
Brother Ah Xi told me...

Standard: 他做了这么多年白事，没见过这么热的天。
Chinese: 他做了这么多年白事，没见过这么热的天。
TraditionalChinese: 他做了這麼多年白事，沒見過這麼熱的天。
English: In all his years of doing funerals， he's never seen such a hot day.
Like everyone was dreaming.
I feel like I was also dreaming.

Standard: 我什么印象都没有了，就记得那些蝉在叫。
Chinese: 我什么印象都没有了，就记得那些蝉在叫。
TraditionalChinese: 我什麼印象都沒有了，就記得那些蟬在叫。
English: I don't remember anything， other than the cicadas.
Noisy as hell.
But， it was real.
Not a dream.
I'm afraid I can't hold on to either.

Standard: 阿凤是这样，荔荔也是这样。
Chinese: 阿凤是这样，荔荔也是这样。
TraditionalChinese: 阿鳳是這樣，荔荔也是這樣。
English: Ah Feng， Lili.

Standard: 几年前，我刚开始钓鱼的时候。
Chinese: 几年前，我刚开始钓鱼的时候。
TraditionalChinese: 幾年前，我剛開始釣魚的時候。
English: A few years ago， when I first started fishing.
I saw a kid， who was thinking about suicide.
Just standing there， ready to jump.

Standard: 我就劝他咧呗，还给烟他抽。
Chinese: 我就劝他咧呗，还给烟他抽。
TraditionalChinese: 我就勸他咧唄，還給煙他抽。
English: So I went to talk to him， gave him a smoke.

Standard: 原因是失恋之类的吧，他跟家人感情也不好。
Chinese: 原因是失恋之类的吧，他跟家人感情也不好。
TraditionalChinese: 原因是失戀之類的吧，他跟家人感情也不好。
English: I think it was because they had their heartbroken， and their relationship was good with their family.
At that time， I thought I succeeded.

Standard: 他还笑眯眯的，跟我讲谢谢，讲对不起。
Chinese: 他还笑眯眯的，跟我讲谢谢，讲对不起。
TraditionalChinese: 他還笑眯眯的，跟我講謝謝，講對不起。
English: They smiled， told me thanks， and apologized.
Then we became friends， I guess.

Standard: 久不久就去河边烧烤，一起喝点酒。
Chinese: 久不久就去河边烧烤，一起喝点酒。
TraditionalChinese: 久不久就去河邊燒烤，一起喝點酒。
English: Every so often we'd go to the riverside and grill， drink a bit.

Standard: 上个月，我正在钓鱼，公安来找我。
Chinese: 上个月，我正在钓鱼，公安来找我。
TraditionalChinese: 上個月，我正在釣魚，公安來找我。
English: Last month， I was fishing， the police came.
They still died， drank poison.
You know what I'm saying?
Some things you can't control.

Standard: 该做的你都做了，哪样就那样吧。
Chinese: 该做的你都做了，哪样就那样吧。
TraditionalChinese: 該做的你都做了，哪樣就那樣吧。
English: Do what you gotta do， that's that.
That's what I think.

Standard: 荔荔的命硬，绝对不会跨不过这一关。
Chinese: 荔荔的命硬，绝对不会跨不过这一关。
TraditionalChinese: 荔荔的命硬，絕對不會跨不過這一關。
English: Lili is tough， she'll definitely make it through.
Oh， right.

Standard: 你帮我找找门路，卖了这台车。
Chinese: 你帮我找找门路，卖了这台车。
TraditionalChinese: 你幫我找找門路，賣了這臺車。
English: Help me find someone to buy this car.
I'm afraid I don't have enough to pay for the surgery.
Why you selling it for?
How much， I'll lend you.
No.

Standard: 我自己有办法，为什么要借你的钱？
Chinese: 我自己有办法，为什么要借你的钱？
TraditionalChinese: 我自己有辦法，為什麼要借你的錢？
English: I have my own ways. Why would I borrow your money?
You're ridiculous.
What kind of way is sellin' your car?
What do you eat with after you sell it?
You feel like Lili can't be treated?
You don't' wanna live either?
Then I'll pay you back as soon as possible.
Talk about it later.
I don't like owing people money.
You don't owe me， I owe you.

Standard: 小时候我们去矿区旁边的山上砍柴。
Chinese: 小时候我们去矿区旁边的山上砍柴。
TraditionalChinese: 小時候我們去礦區旁邊的山上砍柴。
English: When we were younger we would go to the mountains near the mines to get firewood.

Standard: 我想走捷径，踩空了，差点摔下去。
Chinese: 我想走捷径，踩空了，差点摔下去。
TraditionalChinese: 我想走捷徑，踩空了，差點摔下去。
English: I wanted to take a shortcut， slipped， and almost fell off.

Standard: 是你扑倒在地上，捉住我的手，拉我上来。
Chinese: 是你扑倒在地上，捉住我的手，拉我上来。
TraditionalChinese: 是你撲倒在地上，捉住我的手，拉我上來。
English: You dove forward and grabbed my hand， pulled me up.

Standard: 你全身挨石头刮烂了，回家你爸还要打你。
Chinese: 你全身挨石头刮烂了，回家你爸还要打你。
TraditionalChinese: 你全身挨石頭刮爛了，回家你爸還要打你。
English: You got really torn up by the rocks， then you got home and ya Dad beat you.
How much do you think I owe you?

Standard: 不过你还是坐火车吧，去广东。
Chinese: 不过你还是坐火车吧，去广东。
TraditionalChinese: 不過你還是坐火車吧，去廣東。
English: But， take the train to Guangdong
You can't drive like this.

Standard: 车子给我用，我找个人租出去，搞点外快。
Chinese: 车子给我用，我找个人租出去，搞点外快。
TraditionalChinese: 車子給我用，我找個人租出去，搞點外快。
English: Let me use the car， I'll find someone to rent it to， make some money.
Sure.

Standard: 如果后面我还不起钱，这台车就当抵押给你。
Chinese: 如果后面我还不起钱，这台车就当抵押给你。
TraditionalChinese: 如果後面我還不起錢，這臺車就當抵押給你。
English: Later if I really can't pay you back， just take the car as collateral.

Standard: 我发现你这个人真是蛮兜狠的。
Chinese: 我发现你这个人真是蛮兜狠的。
TraditionalChinese: 我發現你這個人真是蠻兜狠的。
English: I find you really annoying.
Bah whatever， you can't tell good from bad.
Gimme a smoke.

Standard: 不给，你又不会抽烟，浪费。
Chinese: 不给，你又不会抽烟，浪费。
TraditionalChinese: 不給，你又不會抽煙，浪費。
English: No， you don't even smoke， it's a waste.

Standard: 老子的烟贵呢，你以为是块把钱的彩蛾？
Chinese: 老子的烟贵呢，你以为是块把钱的彩蛾？
TraditionalChinese: 老子的煙貴呢，你以為是塊把錢的彩蛾？
English: My smokes' expensive， you think it's cheap brand?
Didn't you use smoke the cheap brands before?
I was poor then， no choice.

Standard: 不然我为什么这么努力赚钱？
Chinese: 不然我为什么这么努力赚钱？
TraditionalChinese: 不然我為什麼這麼努力賺錢？
English: Why else would I work so hard to make money?
Give me a smoke.
No.
How are you gonna get to the train station.
Lao Si is giving us a ride.
Bring an umbrella.

Standard: 一天到夜都下雨，天气预报讲广东也是。
Chinese: 一天到夜都下雨，天气预报讲广东也是。
TraditionalChinese: 一天到夜都下雨，天氣預報講廣東也是。
English: Raining all day， forecast says Guangdong too.
Yeah I got it.

Standard: 我记得荔荔是不是有件小雨衣？
Chinese: 我记得荔荔是不是有件小雨衣？
TraditionalChinese: 我記得荔荔是不是有件小雨衣？
English: Doesn't Lili have that little raincoat?
Better than an umbrella.
Got it too.
Water bottle? ID?
Got it， got it， got it all.

Standard: 不如我再多装一盒饭？配点萝卜干炒猪肉。
Chinese: 不如我再多装一盒饭？配点萝卜干炒猪肉。
TraditionalChinese: 不如我再多裝一盒飯？配點蘿蔔幹炒豬肉。
English: Maybe another thing of rice? Add some pickled radish and pork.

Standard: 但是没有保温饭盒了，哪样办？
Chinese: 但是没有保温饭盒了，哪样办？
TraditionalChinese: 但是沒有保溫飯盒了，哪樣辦？
English: Don't have another thermos， what should we do?
Maybe go borrow one from the neighbors?
No need.

Standard: 带一顿中午饭就得啦，剩下几餐我在车上买。
Chinese: 带一顿中午饭就得啦，剩下几餐我在车上买。
TraditionalChinese: 帶一頓中午飯就得啦，剩下幾餐我在車上買。
English: Just need one meal， the rest we'll buy on the way.
If you can bring it just bring it， why buy?
Sigh， you're not listening.

Standard: 就当他带够一个月的，有什么用？
Chinese: 就当他带够一个月的，有什么用？
TraditionalChinese: 就當他帶夠一個月的，有什麼用？
English: Even if he brought a month's worth， what good is it?

Standard: 这么热的天，他们一顿吃不完，半路都臭了。
Chinese: 这么热的天，他们一顿吃不完，半路都臭了。
TraditionalChinese: 這麼熱的天，他們一頓吃不完，半路都臭了。
English: It's so hot， if they can't finish it， it'll go bad on the way.
I'm afraid Lili isn't used to it.

Standard: 火车的东西很难吃的！你又不是没尝过！
Chinese: 火车的东西很难吃的！你又不是没尝过！
TraditionalChinese: 火車的東西很難吃的！你又不是沒嘗過！
English: Food on the train isn't good! You've had it!
There's sweet potatoes and instant noodles.

Standard: 停站的时候，我再看看那帮人卖点什么。
Chinese: 停站的时候，我再看看那帮人卖点什么。
TraditionalChinese: 停站的時候，我再看看那幫人賣點什麼。
English: When we stop we'll see what they're selling.
Too bad I didn't have time to make Zongzi.
Dear.

Standard: 他们是去广东，不是去取西经。
Chinese: 他们是去广东，不是去取西经。
TraditionalChinese: 他們是去廣東，不是去取西經。
English: They're going to Guangdong， not a Journey to the West.

Standard: 随便应付一下，等下车就好了。
Chinese: 随便应付一下，等下车就好了。
TraditionalChinese: 隨便應付一下，等下車就好了。
English: Just have something， they'll be fine after they get off the train.
Oh， speaking of Journey to the West.

Standard: 我今天去红兰寺烧香，给荔荔求了一根绳子。
Chinese: 我今天去红兰寺烧香，给荔荔求了一根绳子。
TraditionalChinese: 我今天去紅蘭寺燒香，給荔荔求了一根繩子。
English: I went to Honglan temple to pray， and I got a string for Lili.
I tied it on your luggage.
I saw.

Standard: 接下来我天天都要去，连续烧四十九天的香。
Chinese: 接下来我天天都要去，连续烧四十九天的香。
TraditionalChinese: 接下來我天天都要去，連續燒四十九天的香。
English: Next I'm going everyday， for fourty nine days.
Don't get scammed.
Don't worry， I'm not giving money.
Just devotion.
Son.

Standard: 去到广东以后，给荔荔买几件漂亮的衣服。
Chinese: 去到广东以后，给荔荔买几件漂亮的衣服。
TraditionalChinese: 去到廣東以後，給荔荔買幾件漂亮的衣服。
English: When you get to Guangdong， buy Lili some pretty clothes.

Standard: 她想吃什么都买给她，懂咩？
Chinese: 她想吃什么都买给她，懂咩？
TraditionalChinese: 她想吃什麼都買給她，懂咩？
English: Whatever she wants to eat， buy it， got it?
Yeah.
You also take care of yourself， yeah?

Standard: 莫要一直绷得紧紧的，这样子身体会垮掉。
Chinese: 莫要一直绷得紧紧的，这样子身体会垮掉。
TraditionalChinese: 莫要一直繃得緊緊的，這樣子身體會垮掉。
English: Always stressed， your body will fall apart.
Yeah yeah.
Why do you keep looking around?
I want to look through both windows.

Standard: 这边近一点，是田地；那边远一点，是山峰。
Chinese: 这边近一点，是田地；那边远一点，是山峰。
TraditionalChinese: 這邊近一點，是田地；那邊遠一點，是山峰。
English: On this side a bit closer to us， is farmland. On that side a bit further out is the mountains.

Standard: 我想回去告诉毓滢她们路上都见到了什么。
Chinese: 我想回去告诉毓滢她们路上都见到了什么。
TraditionalChinese: 我想回去告訴毓瀅她們路上都見到了什麼。
English: I want to tell Yuying and them what I saw on the way.
Can you see?
Do you want to sit on the table?
No， I'm fine here.

Standard: 阿爸，我记得广东那边的山跟我们这边不同。
Chinese: 阿爸，我记得广东那边的山跟我们这边不同。
TraditionalChinese: 阿爸，我記得廣東那邊的山跟我們這邊不同。
English: Daddy， I remember the mountains in Guangdong are different from here.
Every place is different.
The further apart they are， the more different they are.
Dad.
I'll get better， right?
...Of course.
Don't ask silly questions.
I'm suddenly scared.
I have lots of things I want to see still.

Standard: 我怕我的病不好，以后都看不到了。
Chinese: 我怕我的病不好，以后都看不到了。
TraditionalChinese: 我怕我的病不好，以後都看不到了。
English: I'm afraid if I dont' get better， I won't see it all.

Standard: 不要想这么多，等到了广东带你吃好吃的。
Chinese: 不要想这么多，等到了广东带你吃好吃的。
TraditionalChinese: 不要想這麼多，等到了廣東帶你吃好吃的。
English: Don't think about that much， when we get to Guangdong I'll get you yummy food.
Claypot rice is yummy!
And that other thing is yummy!

Standard: 那种一个盘子里有几个格子的，装着几样菜。
Chinese: 那种一个盘子里有几个格子的，装着几样菜。
TraditionalChinese: 那種一個盤子裏有幾個格子的，裝著幾樣菜。
English: That plate with boxes with all sorts of things.
Oh， that's fast food.

Standard: 你还记得广东话是哪样讲的咩？
Chinese: 你还记得广东话是哪样讲的咩？
TraditionalChinese: 你還記得廣東話是哪樣講的咩？
English: Do you remember how to say it for Cantonese?
Where are we going to eat?
Ngo dei haak pin tao ze fan
Pin dou， not pin tao.
Ngo dei hooi pin dou sek fan
Ngo dei hai pin dou ze faan.
Hm， good enough.
Uh...
Now i'm a bit hungry.
Daddy.
How long until we get there?
We haven't even gotten to Guangdong province yet.
Probably not until tomorrow Noon.
Oh， so far.
Dad...
Why are we stopped...
I don't know either.
Been stopped for a while.
There's no breeze， it's so hot...
Why do you look so pale?
Are you not comfortable?
Throat...hurts a little...
I think you have a fever.
Comrade， where are you headed?
Guangdong.

Standard: 你要去成周市转汽车，是吗？
Chinese: 你要去成周市转汽车，是吗？
TraditionalChinese: 你要去成周市轉汽車，是嗎？
English: You are going to Chengzhou then going by bus， right?
Yes.
So the situation is this.
We are about to get to Chengzhou station.

Standard: 但是因为昨天发大水，半个成周都受到波及。
Chinese: 但是因为昨天发大水，半个成周都受到波及。
TraditionalChinese: 但是因為昨天發大水，半個成周都受到波及。
English: But because of the torrential rain yesterday， half of Chengzhou is affected.

Standard: 进入市区的道路全部被洪水淹没了。
Chinese: 进入市区的道路全部被洪水淹没了。
TraditionalChinese: 進入市區的道路全部被洪水淹沒了。
English: All the roads there are flooded.

Standard: 要去汽车站的话，只能等待洪水消退。
Chinese: 要去汽车站的话，只能等待洪水消退。
TraditionalChinese: 要去汽車站的話，只能等待洪水消退。
English: To get to the bus station， you'll have to wait for the water to recede.
...How did it flood so suddenly?
There was just too much rain these past few days.
Changing to bus isn't the most important thing.

Standard: 我孩子发烧了，我本来准备带她去医院的。
Chinese: 我孩子发烧了，我本来准备带她去医院的。
TraditionalChinese: 我孩子發燒了，我本來準備帶她去醫院的。
English: My kid is running a fever， I was going to take her to the hospital.
Aiyah! This is unfortunate!
The hospital is in the city too， right?
Yes.
Can you help me?

Standard: 不去医院不行，她烧得太厉害了。
Chinese: 不去医院不行，她烧得太厉害了。
TraditionalChinese: 不去醫院不行，她燒得太厲害了。
English: I have to get to the hospital， she's burning up.
Okay， don't worry.

Standard: 我现在马上联系成周站的人，让他们想想办法。
Chinese: 我现在马上联系成周站的人，让他们想想办法。
TraditionalChinese: 我現在馬上聯繫成周站的人，讓他們想想辦法。
English: I'll contact the people at the station and see if they can come up with something.

Standard: 穿过这片被淹的地方，才到得了市区。
Chinese: 穿过这片被淹的地方，才到得了市区。
TraditionalChinese: 穿過這片被淹的地方，才到得了市區。
English: We have to get through this flooded section to get to the city.

Standard: 方圆几公里全部是水，你怎么过去？
Chinese: 方圆几公里全部是水，你怎么过去？
TraditionalChinese: 方圓幾公里全部是水，你怎麼過去？
English: It's all flooded for a few kilometers， how are you getting over there?

Standard: 在车站就跟你说过了，没有办法的。
Chinese: 在车站就跟你说过了，没有办法的。
TraditionalChinese: 在車站就跟你說過了，沒有辦法的。
English: I told you at the station， there's no way.
You didn't believe me， and had to come.
Go back.
Maybe the water will be gone by tomorrow morning.
Coming? I'm leaving， stay if you want.
What's that?
What?
That， floating on the water.
Oh that? Bath tub.

Standard: 发大水了，附近的小孩拿来玩的，当小船划。
Chinese: 发大水了，附近的小孩拿来玩的，当小船划。
TraditionalChinese: 發大水了，附近的小孩拿來玩的，當小船劃。
English: It flooded so kids nearby brought it out to play with， they use it like a little row boat.
What do they row with? Where's the oar?

Standard: 你旁边那个，看见吗？那根竹竿。
Chinese: 你旁边那个，看见吗？那根竹竿。
TraditionalChinese: 你旁邊那個，看見嗎？那根竹竿。
English: Over there， see it? That long bamboo pole.
I'll give it back to them tomorrow.
...What do you mean?
You're going to row yourself over?
Yeah.
...For real?
Where's the hospital?
...Are you being serious?
Which way to the city?
Straight ahead of us.
The hospital hasn't been flooded?
The news didn't say it was.
Okay.
...You've made up your mind huh?
...Not my problem anymore.
You be careful.
(Been rowing for a long time and we're still not there?)
(Where is the city?)
(Did I go the wrong way?)
(Don't know.)

Standard: （我好像也在发烧，还有点鼻子塞。）
Chinese: （我好像也在发烧，还有点鼻子塞。）
TraditionalChinese: （我好像也在發燒，還有點鼻子塞。）
English: (I think I'm running a fever too， and a bit of a runny nose.)

Standard: （是感冒了吗？原来是我传染地主妹的？）
Chinese: （是感冒了吗？原来是我传染地主妹的？）
TraditionalChinese: （是感冒了嗎？原來是我傳染地主妹的？）
English: (Did I catch a cold? Did I give it to my kid?)
(No more energy.)
(This bamboo isn't really easy to use either.)

Standard: （我是不是，不应该冒这个险的？）
Chinese: （我是不是，不应该冒这个险的？）
TraditionalChinese: （我是不是，不應該冒這個險的？）
English: (Should I not have...taken this risk?)
(No.)
(I can't think on it anymore.)

Standard: 你还记得我们第一次带地主妹去广东看病吗？
Chinese: 你还记得我们第一次带地主妹去广东看病吗？
TraditionalChinese: 你還記得我們第一次帶地主妹去廣東看病嗎？
English: Do you remember the first time we brought her to Guangdong for the doctor?

Standard: 回来的时候坐的是长途客车，没有卧铺的。
Chinese: 回来的时候坐的是长途客车，没有卧铺的。
TraditionalChinese: 回來的時候坐的是長途客車，沒有臥鋪的。
English: When we came back we sat on long haul bus， no place to lie down.

Standard: 地主妹坐你旁边，伏在你腿上睡着了。
Chinese: 地主妹坐你旁边，伏在你腿上睡着了。
TraditionalChinese: 地主妹坐你旁邊，伏在你腿上睡著了。
English: She sat next to you and fell asleep in your lap.

Standard: 你用你的裙子包着她，怕她着凉。
Chinese: 你用你的裙子包着她，怕她着凉。
TraditionalChinese: 你用你的裙子包著她，怕她著涼。
English: You used your skirt as a blanket for her， afraid she'd catch a cold.

Standard: 第二次，我们是坐火车去的。
Chinese: 第二次，我们是坐火车去的。
TraditionalChinese: 第二次，我們是坐火車去的。
English: The second time， we took the train.
Kids her age the were so noisy.

Standard: 中途到站，地主妹大声问人家乘务员。
Chinese: 中途到站，地主妹大声问人家乘务员。
TraditionalChinese: 中途到站，地主妹大聲問人家乘務員。
English: When we were on the way she'd ask the conductor loudly，
“Auntie! Why are some people getting on，
and some people getting of?”

Standard: 一个车厢的人都在笑，哈哈。
Chinese: 一个车厢的人都在笑，哈哈。
TraditionalChinese: 一個車廂的人都在笑，哈哈。
English: Everyone laughed， haha.

Standard: 我们想攒钱给她治病，不舍得住招待所。
Chinese: 我们想攒钱给她治病，不舍得住招待所。
TraditionalChinese: 我們想攢錢給她治病，不舍得住招待所。
English: We wanted to save money for her medical bills， and didn't want to stay in the guest house.

Standard: 晚上就在车站的候车室睡地板。
Chinese: 晚上就在车站的候车室睡地板。
TraditionalChinese: 晚上就在車站的候車室睡地板。
English: So at night we'd sleep on the floor in the stations' waiting room.

Standard: 车站那帮工作人员嫌太寒碜，不想让我们睡。
Chinese: 车站那帮工作人员嫌太寒碜，不想让我们睡。
TraditionalChinese: 車站那幫工作人員嫌太寒磣，不想讓我們睡。
English: The station people thought it looked bad，didn't want us to sleep.

Standard: 一整夜往地板上洒水，说是搞清洁。
Chinese: 一整夜往地板上洒水，说是搞清洁。
TraditionalChinese: 一整夜往地板上灑水，說是搞清潔。
English: So they spent all night spraing the floor with water， saying it was for cleaning.

Standard: 后来住了一次招待所，想起都怕。
Chinese: 后来住了一次招待所，想起都怕。
TraditionalChinese: 後來住了一次招待所，想起都怕。
English: Then we finally went to stay the guest house， I still get nightmares.

Standard: 那些床铺上全是跳蚤，你都挨咬哭了。
Chinese: 那些床铺上全是跳蚤，你都挨咬哭了。
TraditionalChinese: 那些床鋪上全是跳蚤，你都挨咬哭了。
English: Fleas and bedbugs everywhere， you got bit to the point where you cried.
Then halfway through crying， you started to laugh.

Standard: 因为我挨咬完，过敏，嘴巴肿起来一块。
Chinese: 因为我挨咬完，过敏，嘴巴肿起来一块。
TraditionalChinese: 因為我挨咬完，過敏，嘴巴腫起來一塊。
English: Because turns out I was allergic， my lips swelled up.

Standard: 你说我是尖嘴鸡，笑得停不下来。
Chinese: 你说我是尖嘴鸡，笑得停不下来。
TraditionalChinese: 你說我是尖嘴雞，笑得停不下來。
English: You said I looked like a chicken， and couldn't stop laughing.

Standard: 以前什么困难都不怕，多辛苦都无所谓。
Chinese: 以前什么困难都不怕，多辛苦都无所谓。
TraditionalChinese: 以前什麼困難都不怕，多辛苦都無所謂。
English: Before， no matter how difficult things were I was never afraid， nor did it matter how hard things got.

Standard: 只要这个娃仔能开心，所有的东西都想给她。
Chinese: 只要这个娃仔能开心，所有的东西都想给她。
TraditionalChinese: 只要這個娃仔能開心，所有的東西都想給她。
English: As long as the kid's happen， I want to give her everything.

Standard: 从来没有像现在这样，这么累。
Chinese: 从来没有像现在这样，这么累。
TraditionalChinese: 從來沒有像現在這樣，這麼累。
English: But it's never been like this， so tiring.

Standard: 不是因为病了，也不是因为洪水。
Chinese: 不是因为病了，也不是因为洪水。
TraditionalChinese: 不是因為病了，也不是因為洪水。
English: Not because of the illness， or the flooding.

Standard: 就算这是一片海，我游也能游过去。
Chinese: 就算这是一片海，我游也能游过去。
TraditionalChinese: 就算這是一片海，我遊也能遊過去。
English: Even if it's the ocean， I can swim across it.

Standard: 我是怕她上了手术台，就下不来了。
Chinese: 我是怕她上了手术台，就下不来了。
TraditionalChinese: 我是怕她上了手術臺，就下不來了。
English: I'm afraid once she gets on the operating table， she won't make it off.

Standard: 如果最后都留不住她，往前走还有什么意义？
Chinese: 如果最后都留不住她，往前走还有什么意义？
TraditionalChinese: 如果最後都留不住她，往前走還有什麼意義？
English: If I couldn't keep her in the end， what's the point of moving forward?
You won't answer me， huh?

Standard: 应该坚持，还是放弃，你都不会和我讲。
Chinese: 应该坚持，还是放弃，你都不会和我讲。
TraditionalChinese: 應該堅持，還是放棄，你都不會和我講。
English: Should I stay strong， or give up， you won't tell me.
You're always like this.

Standard: 总是说，自己的事情，自己决定。
Chinese: 总是说，自己的事情，自己决定。
TraditionalChinese: 總是說，自己的事情，自己決定。
English: You always said， decide your own things.

Standard: 你在那边怎么样，过得好咩？
Chinese: 你在那边怎么样，过得好咩？
TraditionalChinese: 你在那邊怎麼樣，過得好咩？
English: How are things going there for you， are you doing okay?
Is it hot or cold?
Windy? Do you have enough clothes?

Standard: 我又想起地主妹刚几个月大的时候。
Chinese: 我又想起地主妹刚几个月大的时候。
TraditionalChinese: 我又想起地主妹剛幾個月大的時候。
English: I remember when she was a few months old.

Standard: 她个子长得快，穿不下之前的衣服。
Chinese: 她个子长得快，穿不下之前的衣服。
TraditionalChinese: 她個子長得快，穿不下之前的衣服。
English: She was growing so fast， couldn't fit the clothes from before.

Standard: 那时刚好是夏天，你就把那些衣服袖子剪了。
Chinese: 那时刚好是夏天，你就把那些衣服袖子剪了。
TraditionalChinese: 那時剛好是夏天，你就把那些衣服袖子剪了。
English: And it was summer， so you just cut off the sleeves.

Standard: 长袖变短袖，宽窄刚好合适……
Chinese: 长袖变短袖，宽窄刚好合适……
TraditionalChinese: 長袖變短袖，寬窄剛好合適……
English: Long sleeves turned into short sleeves， the rest fit just fine.

Standard: 吃的咧？你有没有好好吃饭？
Chinese: 吃的咧？你有没有好好吃饭？
TraditionalChinese: 吃的咧？你有沒有好好吃飯？
English: What about food? Are you remembering to eat?

Standard: 好久没吃过你煮的啤酒焖鱼了。
Chinese: 好久没吃过你煮的啤酒焖鱼了。
TraditionalChinese: 好久沒吃過你煮的啤酒燜魚了。
English: I haven't had your beer steamed fish in a while.
No one makes it like you.

Standard: 哦，我最近煮菜的水平提高了点。
Chinese: 哦，我最近煮菜的水平提高了点。
TraditionalChinese: 哦，我最近煮菜的水準提高了點。
English: Oh， lately I've gotten better at cooking.

Standard: 虽然还是跟你差很远，起码地主妹愿意吃……
Chinese: 虽然还是跟你差很远，起码地主妹愿意吃……
TraditionalChinese: 雖然還是跟你差很遠，起碼地主妹願意吃……
English: Even though it's still very far from wher you were， at least she's willing to eat...
How is it over there?
Is there a sun? Moon?

Standard: 会不会像电视演那样，有彩虹？
Chinese: 会不会像电视演那样，有彩虹？
TraditionalChinese: 會不會像電視演那樣，有彩虹？
English: Is it like movies， with rainbows?

Standard: 今年过年我又开车路过湖北。
Chinese: 今年过年我又开车路过湖北。
TraditionalChinese: 今年過年我又開車路過湖北。
English: I drove past Hubei again this year.
The snow there is really beautiful.

Standard: 连汉江边的田地，都是银色的。
Chinese: 连汉江边的田地，都是银色的。
TraditionalChinese: 連漢江邊的田地，都是銀色的。
English: Even Hanjiang's fields， are silver.
Do you remember?

Standard: 那年大年三十晚我连夜出发，也是去的湖北。
Chinese: 那年大年三十晚我连夜出发，也是去的湖北。
TraditionalChinese: 那年大年三十晚我連夜出發，也是去的湖北。
English: The thirtieth of the first month of the new year， I also went to Hubei.

Standard: 你偷偷在我车上放了两个鸡蛋，和一张纸条。
Chinese: 你偷偷在我车上放了两个鸡蛋，和一张纸条。
TraditionalChinese: 你偷偷在我車上放了兩個雞蛋，和一張紙條。
English: You put two eggs in the car， and a note.
On the note you said-
“Dearest Nan， Happy new year!”
I really want to go see the snow with you.
Go a bit further， to Heilongjiang.

Standard: 地主妹也成天讲，她想堆雪人……
Chinese: 地主妹也成天讲，她想堆雪人……
TraditionalChinese: 地主妹也成天講，她想堆雪人……
English: She talks aobut it everyday， she wants to build a snowman...

Standard: 你平时有点什么事做？有东西玩咩？
Chinese: 你平时有点什么事做？有东西玩咩？
TraditionalChinese: 你平時有點什麼事做？有東西玩咩？
English: Do do you have things to do? Anything fun?

Standard: 会碰见你外公吗？你有朋友咩？
Chinese: 会碰见你外公吗？你有朋友咩？
TraditionalChinese: 會碰見你外公嗎？你有朋友咩？
English: Have you seen your dad? friends?
You're not alone， right?
She's most worried...
You answered me， yeah?
You don't want me to stay here.

Standard: 讲再多，我们还是放心不下地主妹。
Chinese: 讲再多，我们还是放心不下地主妹。
TraditionalChinese: 講再多，我們還是放心不下地主妹。
English: No matter how much we talk， we still worry about her.
Yeah.

Standard: 如果是以前，你肯定会讲：
Chinese: 如果是以前，你肯定会讲：
TraditionalChinese: 如果是以前，你肯定會講：
English: If it was in the past， you'd definitely say:

Standard: “记得你刚学车那时，师傅讲过什么咩？”
Chinese: “记得你刚学车那时，师傅讲过什么咩？”
TraditionalChinese: “記得你剛學車那時，師傅講過什麼咩？”
English: “Do you remember when you were learning how to drive， what your teacher taught you?”
Of course I remember.
Once you take a job，

Standard: 就算路再难走，也一定要走到目的地。
Chinese: 就算路再难走，也一定要走到目的地。
TraditionalChinese: 就算路再難走，也一定要走到目的地。

Alright， I'm heading out.
Can you come back with me?
I really miss you.
Every moment.
I know.
You're at your stop， I'm not there yet.
Wait for me then.
Goodbye.
Kid.
How are you feeling?
Kid!
Daddy......

Chinese: {wvo}今年端午游龙的情况大致就是这样{w=3}

Chinese: {wvo}可以说是一个非常了不起的成绩了{w=3}

Chinese: {wvo}这个活动都有了自己的意义{w=3}

Chinese: {wvo}所以，虽然没有贡献什么力量{w=3}

Chinese: {wvo}我也厚着脸皮过去合照了一张{w=3}

Standard: {wvo}我把家里的老照片带到了学校{w=3}
Chinese: {wvo}我把家里的老照片带到了学校{w=3}

English: {wvo}I brought the old pictures to school{w=3}
{wvo}And scanned each one into the computer{w=3}

{wvo}我I suddenly realized something{w=3}
{wvo}Compared to when I was a child{w=3}

{wvo}Even Dad is older.{w=3}

{wvo}“One blink and years have gone by”{w=3}

Standard: {wvo}“回想起来，已经是很多年前的事啦。”{w=3}
Chinese: {wvo}“回想起来，已经是很多年前的事啦。”{w=3}
TraditionalChinese: {wvo}“回想起來，已經是很多年前的事啦。”{w=3}

Standard: {wvo}这些话，过去的我是无法理解的{w=3}
Chinese: {wvo}这些话，过去的我是无法理解的{w=3}
TraditionalChinese: {wvo}這些話，過去的我是無法理解的{w=3}

{wvo}That time can slow down{w=3}

{wvo}“Don't worry， Dad”{w=3}
{wvo}“I'll iron for you from now on”{w=3}
{wvo}But， in the end， I couldn't say it{w=3}
{wvo}What I can do， compared to what he did{w=3}
{wvo}Is nothing{w=3}
{wvo}But， Mom， I get it{w=3}

Standard: {wvo}这是每个人长大的必经之路{w=3}
Chinese: {wvo}这是每个人长大的必经之路{w=3}

Chinese: {wvo}竭尽全力冲过了茫茫的洪水{w=3}
TraditionalChinese: {wvo}竭盡全力沖過了茫茫的洪水{w=3}

{wvo}Mommy， do you know{w=3}

Fu Yaying!
Miss Fu!
Hello hello!
Long time no see!
You put on makeup?

Standard: 晚上有约会，去县城看电影。
Chinese: 晚上有约会，去县城看电影。
TraditionalChinese: 晚上有約會，去縣城看電影。
English: I have a date tonight， going to watch a movie!
So fancy.
Li Ying your hair is so long now.
Hehe， I spent a long time growing it.
I tried to find you yesterday
But your cell phone was off.
Yeah， I took out the simcard.

Standard: 我用的是学校发的卡，在这边打要收漫游费。
Chinese: 我用的是学校发的卡，在这边打要收漫游费。
TraditionalChinese: 我用的是學校發的卡，在這邊打要收漫遊費。
English: I'm using the card from school， I have to pay roaming if I use it here.
I can't use the group chat either.
How do we contact you these days?

Standard: 你打我大快讯呗，还是高中那个号码。
Chinese: 你打我大快讯呗，还是高中那个号码。
TraditionalChinese: 你打我大快訊唄，還是高中那個號碼。
English: Just call my old phone， the one from high school.
You didn't cancel it?
Why would I?

Standard: 它跟家里的固定电话是绑定的。
Chinese: 它跟家里的固定电话是绑定的。
TraditionalChinese: 它跟家裏的固定電話是綁定的。
English: It's tied to the home phone.
I don't have to pay for it， worth it.
The signal is so bad.
You hear like one word out of three.

Standard: 刚才跟她说了大半天，事情都没说清楚。
Chinese: 刚才跟她说了大半天，事情都没说清楚。
TraditionalChinese: 剛才跟她說了大半天，事情都沒說清楚。
English: You try to explain something and it gets worse.

Standard: 哈哈哈，或者聊天软件喊我呀。
Chinese: 哈哈哈，或者聊天软件喊我呀。
TraditionalChinese: 哈哈哈，或者聊天軟體喊我呀。
English: Hahaha， or just use the messaging software.
My computer is always on.
I also like to leave my computer own.
There's two suns now.
I'm about to have three.
You steal my veggies all day!
Didn't you steal mine too?!
Ah Old Huang is here.
Sorry.
I was studying so hard I forgot the time.
I bow to you.

Standard: 你都考上重点大学了，还要这么努力咯？
Chinese: 你都考上重点大学了，还要这么努力咯？
TraditionalChinese: 你都考上重點大學了，還要這麼努力咯？
English: You already got into a big name college， why are you still working so hard.
My major isn't popular.

Standard: 趁现在多学几种技能，多考几本证书。
Chinese: 趁现在多学几种技能，多考几本证书。
TraditionalChinese: 趁現在多學幾種技能，多考幾本證書。
English: So I want to learn some more skills and get some more certificates.
So when I look for a job I can broaden my scope.
What are you studying again?
Library Management.
I told you to retake a year and you ignored me.

Standard: 复读就算了，压力大，我也没有十足的信心。
Chinese: 复读就算了，压力大，我也没有十足的信心。
TraditionalChinese: 複讀就算了，壓力大，我也沒有十足的信心。
English: Forget retaking a year， it's too stressful. Plus I'm not confident.
Besides， my school is pretty good.
Oh right! It's Gaokao time!

Standard: 不知道我表妹怎么样，考得好不好。
Chinese: 不知道我表妹怎么样，考得好不好。
TraditionalChinese: 不知道我表妹怎麼樣，考得好不好。
English: I wonder how my cousin is doing， if  she's doing well.
I hear the essays are hard.
Math is hard too.
Yeah I bet it's tough.

Standard: 她成绩就跟我差不多，上本科线都很勉强。
Chinese: 她成绩就跟我差不多，上本科线都很勉强。
TraditionalChinese: 她成績就跟我差不多，上本科線都很勉強。
English: Her grades are like mine， it'll be a struggle to get to undergrad.

Standard: 喂，你们这帮大学生，讲点别的吧。
Chinese: 喂，你们这帮大学生，讲点别的吧。
TraditionalChinese: 喂，你們這幫大學生，講點別的吧。
English: Hey， you college students， let's talk about something else.

Standard: 我连高考都没有参加，不想聊这种的。
Chinese: 我连高考都没有参加，不想聊这种的。
TraditionalChinese: 我連高考都沒有參加，不想聊這種的。
English: I didn't even join Gaokao， I don't want to talk about it.
Then what do you want to talk about?
Any girl classmates you wannan introduce me to?
Yeah， Li Ying.
No way， I'm not good enough.
As long as you know.
Hahahahaha.
Are we going to find Zhuoli?
Yeah.
Why else are we at her doorstep?
Why didn't we just call?
You forget?

Standard: 以前我们每次来这里，都是敲她房间窗口的。
Chinese: 以前我们每次来这里，都是敲她房间窗口的。
TraditionalChinese: 以前我們每次來這裏，都是敲她房間窗口的。
English: Everytime in the past when we came here， we'd knock on her window.

Standard: 小时候不够高，熊小龙还要我们举他上去呢。
Chinese: 小时候不够高，熊小龙还要我们举他上去呢。
TraditionalChinese: 小時候不夠高，熊小龍還要我們舉他上去呢。
English: We weren't talk， Xiong Xiaolong had to get us to lift him up.
Oh， right!
Old Huang， I'm a bit heavy now.
Counting on you.
Get out.
Hahahahaha.
You sure she's back?
Maybe they stayed at school?
Didn't you see our group chat?
She got here yesterday.

Standard: 咦，那两个不是茁荔的阿公阿奶吗？
Chinese: 咦，那两个不是茁荔的阿公阿奶吗？
TraditionalChinese: 咦，那兩個不是茁荔的阿公阿奶嗎？
English: Ah， aren't those Zhuoli's grandparents?
Hello Grandma Grandpa.
Oh， you are...?

Standard: 不就是荔荔的同学嘛，那几个娃仔。
Chinese: 不就是荔荔的同学嘛，那几个娃仔。
TraditionalChinese: 不就是荔荔的同學嘛，那幾個娃仔。
English: Hey， aren't these Lili's classmates， those kids.
Yes! you remember us!
You haven't changed.
Hahahahaha.

Standard: 阿公阿奶，我们端午节放假。
Chinese: 阿公阿奶，我们端午节放假。
TraditionalChinese: 阿公阿奶，我們端午節放假。
English: Grandma Grandpa， we're on holiday for Duanwu.
We want to invite Zhuoli to watch the Dragon Boat race.
Zhuoli?
She left with her dad early.
You're just now going?
By the time you get there the race will be over.
Doesn't it start at 10?

Standard: 今年参赛队伍多，提前一个半小时。
Chinese: 今年参赛队伍多，提前一个半小时。
TraditionalChinese: 今年參賽隊伍多，提前一個半小時。
English: Lots of teams this year， so they moved the start time by an hour and a half.
No way.
What do you mean no way?

Standard: 来我们家，我开电脑给你们看网上的通知。
Chinese: 来我们家，我开电脑给你们看网上的通知。
TraditionalChinese: 來我們家，我開電腦給你們看網上的通知。
English: Come in， I'll turn on the computer to show you the notice online.
What do you want to eat?
My produce is the best.

Standard: 我天天在这里摆，来得多你就懂啦。
Chinese: 我天天在这里摆，来得多你就懂啦。
TraditionalChinese: 我天天在這裏擺，來得多你就懂啦。
English: I'm here everyday， you'll know if you come often.

Standard: 买就买，莫要乱摸我的菜哦。
Chinese: 买就买，莫要乱摸我的菜哦。
TraditionalChinese: 買就買，莫要亂摸我的菜哦。
English: Buy if you want to buy， dont touch everything.
Don't just ask for a cheap price.
You have to tell me how much you want first.

Standard: 葱花也要钱的，莫指望我会白送。
Chinese: 葱花也要钱的，莫指望我会白送。
TraditionalChinese: 蔥花也要錢的，莫指望我會白送。
English: Even green onions is money， don't expect me to give it away.

Standard: 我宁愿丢掉都不让你们占便宜。
Chinese: 我宁愿丢掉都不让你们占便宜。
TraditionalChinese: 我寧願丟掉都不讓你們佔便宜。
English: I'd rather throw them away than get taken advantage of.

Standard: 你是新来的吗？文化站的工作人员。
Chinese: 你是新来的吗？文化站的工作人员。
TraditionalChinese: 你是新來的嗎？文化站的工作人員。
English: Are you new here? Working at the cultural station?
Oh， I'm not.
I'm a reporter， from another place.
Reporter? What happened?
Is something big happening in Zhibin?
No no， don't get me wrong!

Standard: 记者不一定是有大事才来的！
Chinese: 记者不一定是有大事才来的！
TraditionalChinese: 記者不一定是有大事才來的！
English: Reporters can come even if there's no big news.

Standard: 而且我是文教类记者，时事民生不是我专业。
Chinese: 而且我是文教类记者，时事民生不是我专业。
TraditionalChinese: 而且我是文教類記者，時事民生不是我專業。
English: Plus I'm more about cultural news， societal news isn't my specialty.

Standard: 我在做一个专题策划，关于传统文化传承的。
Chinese: 我在做一个专题策划，关于传统文化传承的。
TraditionalChinese: 我在做一個專題策劃，關於傳統文化傳承的。
English: I'm doing a special column about traditional arts and passing them down.

Standard: 内容涵盖整个龙水县，芷滨只是其中一站。
Chinese: 内容涵盖整个龙水县，芷滨只是其中一站。
TraditionalChinese: 內容涵蓋整個龍水縣，芷濱只是其中一站。
English: This covers all of Shuilong County， Zhibin is just a stop along the way.

Standard: 我见你待在这里，以为是刘主任的同事。
Chinese: 我见你待在这里，以为是刘主任的同事。
TraditionalChinese: 我見你待在這裏，以為是劉主任的同事。
English: I just saw you standing here and thought you were Director Liu's coworker.

Standard: 没有，我只是来借用个座位办公。
Chinese: 没有，我只是来借用个座位办公。
TraditionalChinese: 沒有，我只是來借用個座位辦公。
English: No， I'm just borrowing this spot to do some work.

Standard: 因为杂志社的领导认识刘主任，打了招呼。
Chinese: 因为杂志社的领导认识刘主任，打了招呼。
TraditionalChinese: 因為雜誌社的領導認識劉主任，打了招呼。
English: Because the magazine's director knows Director Liu so they came to say hi.

Standard: 所以这段时间我常驻在这里，顺便查些资料。
Chinese: 所以这段时间我常驻在这里，顺便查些资料。
TraditionalChinese: 所以這段時間我常駐在這裏，順便查些資料。
English: So that's why I'm here， plus I'm doing some research as well.
Why do you smell like booze?
I...had a bit to drink just now.
Ah， educated people are more unrestrained.
Yeah， I got dumped.
I feel awful.
Do you see that toy pillow?

Standard: 那是我女朋友——前任女朋友送给我。
Chinese: 那是我女朋友——前任女朋友送给我。
TraditionalChinese: 那是我女朋友——前任女朋友送給我。
English: That was from my girlfriend...ex girlfriend.

Standard: 我连出远门都要带着，不然我夜不能寐。
Chinese: 我连出远门都要带着，不然我夜不能寐。
TraditionalChinese: 我連出遠門都要帶著，不然我夜不能寐。
English: When I go traveling I have to take it with me， or I can't sleep.
Sigh， forget it， I don't wanna talk about it anymore.
To shameful.

Standard: 有山能登高望远，有水能冲刷思绪……
Chinese: 有山能登高望远，有水能冲刷思绪……
TraditionalChinese: 有山能登高望遠，有水能沖刷思緒……
English: I can climb the mountains to see further， I can watch the river to wash away my emotions...

Standard: 满足这两条，就是适合散心的好地方。
Chinese: 满足这两条，就是适合散心的好地方。
TraditionalChinese: 滿足這兩條，就是適合散心的好地方。
English: There's both here， great for relaxing.

Standard: 不、不对，适合采风，我是说采风！
Chinese: 不、不对，适合采风，我是说采风！
TraditionalChinese: 不、不對，適合采風，我是說采風！
English: No， wait， good for collecting folk songs， collecting folk songs!

Standard: 我不是来公费度假的，回去要按时交稿。
Chinese: 我不是来公费度假的，回去要按时交稿。
TraditionalChinese: 我不是來公費度假的，回去要按時交稿。
English: I'm not using company money for vacation， I have to turn in my articles on time.
Hope I can get something out.

Standard: 我知道白天不该喝酒，会影响工作状态。
Chinese: 我知道白天不该喝酒，会影响工作状态。
TraditionalChinese: 我知道白天不該喝酒，會影響工作狀態。
English: I know I shouldn't day drink， it affects my job performance.
But if I don't drink I feel awful.

Standard: 哎，算了，明天还是改喝汽水吧。
Chinese: 哎，算了，明天还是改喝汽水吧。
TraditionalChinese: 哎，算了，明天還是改喝汽水吧。
English: Sigh， whatever， I'll drink soda tomorrow.
Try to drink my worries away， my worries become more worrisome.

Standard: 不可以越来越颓废的，这样违背了我的初衷。
Chinese: 不可以越来越颓废的，这样违背了我的初衷。
TraditionalChinese: 不可以越來越頹廢的，這樣違背了我的初衷。
English: I can't become dispirited， it betrays my original intention.

Standard: 今天也是个好天气啊，无论晴雨都是。
Chinese: 今天也是个好天气啊，无论晴雨都是。
TraditionalChinese: 今天也是個好天氣啊，無論晴雨都是。
English: Today is a good day， rain or shine!
I want to be super optimistic.
I want to be super optimistic!
Life is a journey， I too am one of the travelers...

Standard: 这句词的境界，有几人能有呢？
Chinese: 这句词的境界，有几人能有呢？
TraditionalChinese: 這句詞的境界，有幾人能有呢？
English: How many can reach the level of this line of poetry?

Standard: 人是很难接受离别的，嘴上豁达，心里计较。
Chinese: 人是很难接受离别的，嘴上豁达，心里计较。
TraditionalChinese: 人是很難接受離別的，嘴上豁達，心裏計較。
English: It's hard for people to accept separation， even though they may talk like it's easy， deep in their heart it's difficult.

Standard: 我本想借这趟采风出来放空脑袋，换换心情。
Chinese: 我本想借这趟采风出来放空脑袋，换换心情。
TraditionalChinese: 我本想借這趟采風出來放空腦袋，換換心情。
English: I originally wanted to go collect folk songs to try to change my mood.

Standard: 结果看到这里的山水，反而更伤感了。
Chinese: 结果看到这里的山水，反而更伤感了。
TraditionalChinese: 結果看到這裏的山水，反而更傷感了。
English: But after seeing the scenery here， I'm more depressed.

Standard: 身边人常说，我年纪也不小了咋还那么幼稚。
Chinese: 身边人常说，我年纪也不小了咋还那么幼稚。
TraditionalChinese: 身邊人常說，我年紀也不小了咋還那麼幼稚。
English: People next to me would often tell me that I'm childish for my age.
How did that line go again?
The deeper in love， the more lonley you are.

Standard: 很多时候我心里明白，但是情非得已。
Chinese: 很多时候我心里明白，但是情非得已。
TraditionalChinese: 很多時候我心裏明白，但是情非得已。
English: Lots of times I know， I can't help myself.

Standard: 我愿意相信人间有情，但事实往往冷酷无情。
Chinese: 我愿意相信人间有情，但事实往往冷酷无情。
TraditionalChinese: 我願意相信人間有情，但事實往往冷酷無情。
English: I believe there are lots of passionate people， but oftentimes reality is cruel.

Standard: 我只能安慰自己，总有一天伤疤会好的。
Chinese: 我只能安慰自己，总有一天伤疤会好的。
TraditionalChinese: 我只能安慰自己，總有一天傷疤會好的。
English: I can only tell myself， one day this scar will heal.

Standard: 我要先打通销售渠道，然后再扩大生产规模。
Chinese: 我要先打通销售渠道，然后再扩大生产规模。
TraditionalChinese: 我要先打通銷售管道，然後再擴大生產規模。
English: I'm going to develop my sales pipeline， then expand my production.

Standard: 等流动资金充足以后，就可以考虑品牌化了。
Chinese: 等流动资金充足以后，就可以考虑品牌化了。
TraditionalChinese: 等流動資金充足以後，就可以考慮品牌化了。
English: Once I get enough funding， I can start to think about branding.

Standard: 我们人是少了点，但都是老手，效率不错。
Chinese: 我们人是少了点，但都是老手，效率不错。
TraditionalChinese: 我們人是少了點，但都是老手，效率不錯。
English: We don't have as many people， but we're all experienced and quite efficient.

Standard: 制衣竞争太大了，所以我才选做包包。
Chinese: 制衣竞争太大了，所以我才选做包包。
TraditionalChinese: 制衣競爭太大了，所以我才選做包包。
English: Making clothes is too competitive， that's why I'm making bags.

Standard: 我不会卖去大城市的，这样太蠢了。
Chinese: 我不会卖去大城市的，这样太蠢了。
TraditionalChinese: 我不會賣去大城市的，這樣太蠢了。
English: I won't go try to sell it in big cities， that's not the smart move.

Standard: 本来就是廉价品，我瞄准的是乡村市场。
Chinese: 本来就是廉价品，我瞄准的是乡村市场。
TraditionalChinese: 本來就是廉價品，我瞄準的是鄉村市場。
English: It's already a cheaper product， I'm aiming for rural markets.

Standard: 我也不会卖给批发商，这样差价他们都吃了。
Chinese: 我也不会卖给批发商，这样差价他们都吃了。
TraditionalChinese: 我也不會賣給批發商，這樣差價他們都吃了。
English: I also won't sell to wholesalers， otherwise they'll take all my margin.

Standard: 我要直接供货给商店，给他们更便宜的进价。
Chinese: 我要直接供货给商店，给他们更便宜的进价。
TraditionalChinese: 我要直接供貨給商店，給他們更便宜的進價。
English: I'm going to sell directly to stores and let them buy it for cheap.
This is my cat， called Ah Fu.

Standard: 因为它是只黑猫，长得像蝙蝠。
Chinese: 因为它是只黑猫，长得像蝙蝠。
TraditionalChinese: 因為它是只黑貓，長得像蝙蝠。
English: Because they are a black cat and look like a bat.
Ah Fu has been with me for many years.

Standard: 它很听话，可以坐稳在我肩膀上。
Chinese: 它很听话，可以坐稳在我肩膀上。
TraditionalChinese: 它很聽話，可以坐穩在我肩膀上。
English: They are very good and like to sit on m y shoulder.

Standard: 就像是从我身上长出来的一样。
Chinese: 就像是从我身上长出来的一样。
TraditionalChinese: 就像是從我身上長出來的一樣。
English: As if they are a part of me.

Standard: 我也把它当做我身体的一部分，非常珍惜。
Chinese: 我也把它当做我身体的一部分，非常珍惜。
TraditionalChinese: 我也把它當做我身體的一部分，非常珍惜。
English: I also treat them like a part of me， and value them.

Standard: 我是从垃圾桶里把阿福捡回来的。
Chinese: 我是从垃圾桶里把阿福捡回来的。
TraditionalChinese: 我是從垃圾桶裏把阿福撿回來的。
English: I rescued Ah Fu from the trash.

Standard: 它应该是被养它的主人丢在了那里。
Chinese: 它应该是被养它的主人丢在了那里。
TraditionalChinese: 它應該是被養它的主人丟在了那裏。
English: They must have been abandoned by their previous owner.

Standard: 碰见我的时候，它浑身的肉都是烂的。
Chinese: 碰见我的时候，它浑身的肉都是烂的。
TraditionalChinese: 碰見我的時候，它渾身的肉都是爛的。
English: When they saw me， they had bugs all over.

Standard: 那时还是冬天，它冷得一直发抖。
Chinese: 那时还是冬天，它冷得一直发抖。
TraditionalChinese: 那時還是冬天，它冷得一直發抖。
English: It was cold and they were shivering.

Standard: 我拿它回家帮它驱虫，每天帮它涂药。
Chinese: 我拿它回家帮它驱虫，每天帮它涂药。
TraditionalChinese: 我拿它回家幫它驅蟲，每天幫它塗藥。
English: I brought them home to clean and give medicine.

Standard: 搞得我都挨咬了，过了几个月才和它一起好。
Chinese: 搞得我都挨咬了，过了几个月才和它一起好。
TraditionalChinese: 搞得我都挨咬了，過了幾個月才和它一起好。
English: I got bit so many times， it took months before they warmed up to me.

Standard: 可能是因为被遗弃过，阿福特别粘我。
Chinese: 可能是因为被遗弃过，阿福特别粘我。
TraditionalChinese: 可能是因為被遺棄過，阿福特別粘我。
English: Maybe because they were abandoned before， Ah Fu is really clingy to me.

Standard: 小时候喜欢嘬我的手，就跟吸奶嘴一样。
Chinese: 小时候喜欢嘬我的手，就跟吸奶嘴一样。
TraditionalChinese: 小時候喜歡嘬我的手，就跟吸奶嘴一樣。
English: When they were a kitten they loved to nibble on my hand like a bottle.

Standard: 一嘬就嘬一两个钟头，嘬到它自己睡着。
Chinese: 一嘬就嘬一两个钟头，嘬到它自己睡着。
TraditionalChinese: 一嘬就嘬一兩個鐘頭，嘬到它自己睡著。
English: Once they got started it would go on for hours， then they'd fall asleep.

Standard: 害我连游戏都打不成，当时我挺烦它的。
Chinese: 害我连游戏都打不成，当时我挺烦它的。
TraditionalChinese: 害我連遊戲都打不成，當時我挺煩它的。
English: Made it so hard to play games， at the time I was so annoyed.

Standard: 现在长大了，没有这种习惯了，又有点怀念。
Chinese: 现在长大了，没有这种习惯了，又有点怀念。
TraditionalChinese: 現在長大了，沒有這種習慣了，又有點懷念。
English: Now they're older， they don't have that habit anymore and i kind of miss it.
Ah Fu has had a hard life.
I'm with them， they're with me.
Since our lives crossed， then we'll share it together.

Standard: 你干嘛一直在这儿呀？有事吗？
Chinese: 你干嘛一直在这儿呀？有事吗？
TraditionalChinese: 你幹嘛一直在這兒呀？有事嗎？
English: Why are you still here? Can I help you?
...No， nothing.

Standard: 你这个人还挺闲，不用上班的吗？
Chinese: 你这个人还挺闲，不用上班的吗？
TraditionalChinese: 你這個人還挺閑，不用上班的嗎？
English: You have a lot of time， no work today?
I'm on break today.
Heh， bad luck.
What do you want to buy? One moment.
Let me finish organizing this.

Standard: 货架上没有的不要问，摆得高的也不要问。
Chinese: 货架上没有的不要问，摆得高的也不要问。
TraditionalChinese: 貨架上沒有的不要問，擺得高的也不要問。
English: Don't ask a bout something that's not on the rack， don't ask about the stuff at the top.

Standard: 我不想进货仓里面找，也不想爬梯子帮你拿。
Chinese: 我不想进货仓里面找，也不想爬梯子帮你拿。
TraditionalChinese: 我不想進貨倉裏面找，也不想爬梯子幫你拿。
English: I don't want to go look in storage for you and I don't want to get a step ladder to get it for you.
If you have problems you can report me.
How much money I get paid is how hard I work.

Standard: 现在的待遇比过去差远了。
Chinese: 现在的待遇比过去差远了。
TraditionalChinese: 現在的待遇比過去差遠了。
English: Pay now is bad compared to the past.

Standard: 傻子才会为了这点工资努力工作。
Chinese: 傻子才会为了这点工资努力工作。
TraditionalChinese: 傻子才會為了這點工資努力工作。
English: Only a dummy would work hard for this little bit of pay.

Standard: 准时下班，到点就走，多一秒都不行。
Chinese: 准时下班，到点就走，多一秒都不行。
TraditionalChinese: 準時下班，到點就走，多一秒都不行。
English: Leave work on time， once time is up I'm gone， no working for an extra second.
There's no overtime anyways.
Not my problem， not going to deal with it.

Standard: 老板觉得你能干，那就会让你多干。
Chinese: 老板觉得你能干，那就会让你多干。
TraditionalChinese: 老闆覺得你能幹，那就會讓你多幹。
English: If the boss thinks you are capabile， then they make you work more.

Standard: 啥好处没有，净给自己找罪受。
Chinese: 啥好处没有，净给自己找罪受。
TraditionalChinese: 啥好處沒有，淨給自己找罪受。
English: Get nothing out of it， just more punishment.
Sense of responsibility? Ha.

Standard: 赚多少都是老板的钱，又不会分一些给你。
Chinese: 赚多少都是老板的钱，又不会分一些给你。
TraditionalChinese: 賺多少都是老闆的錢，又不會分一些給你。
English: All the money is the bosses' money， they won't give you a penny.
You worry about how other people make money?
Ah Nan.
Question for you.
Yeah， what's up?

Standard: 汽车补胎，跟单车补胎是不是差不多？
Chinese: 汽车补胎，跟单车补胎是不是差不多？
TraditionalChinese: 汽車補胎，跟單車補胎是不是差不多？
English: Fixing a car tire， is that about the same as fixing a bike tire?
Like the tire on your truck.
How to say it?

Standard: 原理是差不多，具体的做法不太一样。
Chinese: 原理是差不多，具体的做法不太一样。
TraditionalChinese: 原理是差不多，具體的做法不太一樣。
English: The idea is the same， but execution is different.
How so?

Standard: 单车就只用补内胎嘛，外胎没大问题不会动。
Chinese: 单车就只用补内胎嘛，外胎没大问题不会动。
TraditionalChinese: 單車就只用補內胎嘛，外胎沒大問題不會動。
English: The bike， you just fix the inner tube usually， don't gotta mess with the outer as much.

Standard: 货车的外胎如果伤了，也要好好处理。
Chinese: 货车的外胎如果伤了，也要好好处理。
TraditionalChinese: 貨車的外胎如果傷了，也要好好處理。
English: On a cargo truck， if the outer tube is damaged you gotta fix that too.
Or you're gonna damage the inner tube.

Standard: 所以货车补胎，内外都要观察，都要搞干净。
Chinese: 所以货车补胎，内外都要观察，都要搞干净。
TraditionalChinese: 所以貨車補胎，內外都要觀察，都要搞乾淨。
English: So when you patch a tire on a cargo truck， you gotta check everything， make sure it's clean.
You fix it yourself?

Standard: 我见司机佬好多都懂得自己修车。
Chinese: 我见司机佬好多都懂得自己修车。
TraditionalChinese: 我見司機佬好多都懂得自己修車。
English: I see lots of drivers know how to fix cars.

Standard: 修车是修车，轮胎一般很少会自己搞的。
Chinese: 修车是修车，轮胎一般很少会自己搞的。
TraditionalChinese: 修車是修車，輪胎一般很少會自己搞的。
English: Fixing a car is fixing a car， but changing a tire， most people can do themselves.

Standard: 随车工具不够店里全，拆装轮胎太着力。
Chinese: 随车工具不够店里全，拆装轮胎太着力。
TraditionalChinese: 隨車工具不夠店裏全，拆裝輪胎太著力。
English: You don't have as many tools in the truck， it's exhausting to take off a tire.
So you go to a tire shop to take it off?
Yeah.
Then what? How do you fix it?

Standard: 既然已经漏气了，先把内胎挖出来。
Chinese: 既然已经漏气了，先把内胎挖出来。
TraditionalChinese: 既然已經漏氣了，先把內胎挖出來。
English: Since it's already leaking， you take the inner tube out first.

Standard: 除非是气门嘴的问题，否则内胎百分百穿了。
Chinese: 除非是气门嘴的问题，否则内胎百分百穿了。
TraditionalChinese: 除非是氣門嘴的問題，否則內胎百分百穿了。
English: Unless it's the valve， then the inner tire is done.
Listen closely， look carefully.

Standard: 你不是有个脸盆，用来泡轮胎的吗？
Chinese: 你不是有个脸盆，用来泡轮胎的吗？
TraditionalChinese: 你不是有個臉盆，用來泡輪胎的嗎？
English: Don't you have some sort of small tub for tires?

Standard: 补胎店也差不多，有个大水池或者大油桶。
Chinese: 补胎店也差不多，有个大水池或者大油桶。
TraditionalChinese: 補胎店也差不多，有個大水池或者大油桶。
English: The tire shops are about the same， they just have a bigger sized one.

Standard: 泡进去看哪里漏，或者涂点肥皂水在表面。
Chinese: 泡进去看哪里漏，或者涂点肥皂水在表面。
TraditionalChinese: 泡進去看哪里漏，或者塗點肥皂水在表面。
English: Throw the tire in there， see where it's leaking， or add some soapy water on it.
Once you find it， you can mark it.

Standard: 粗鲁一点的，直接就把螺丝刀捅在上面。
Chinese: 粗鲁一点的，直接就把螺丝刀捅在上面。
TraditionalChinese: 粗魯一點的，直接就把螺絲刀捅在上面。
English: If you really want to be direct， just stab it with a screwdriver.

Standard: 反正就是标记好位置，哪里漏就补哪里。
Chinese: 反正就是标记好位置，哪里漏就补哪里。
TraditionalChinese: 反正就是標記好位置，哪里漏就補哪里。
English: Anyways， just mark it， then fix where it's leaking

Standard: 然后再检查外胎，找到钉子或者磨损的地方。
Chinese: 然后再检查外胎，找到钉子或者磨损的地方。
TraditionalChinese: 然後再檢查外胎，找到釘子或者磨損的地方。
English: Then check the outer tube， find where the damage is.
Fix and clean it.

Standard: 现在货车大部分用的是帆布外胎。
Chinese: 现在货车大部分用的是帆布外胎。
TraditionalChinese: 現在貨車大部分用的是帆布外胎。
English: Most tires now are canvas tires.

Standard: 如果鼓包，那就是帆布断了，不能修只能换。
Chinese: 如果鼓包，那就是帆布断了，不能修只能换。
TraditionalChinese: 如果鼓包，那就是帆布斷了，不能修只能換。
English: If you got a bubble， then the canvas is broken， you can't fix it， gotta replace it.
Oh...
So many things， I can't remember it all.
What? You need to fix a spare tire?
I thought because it was just a tire.

Standard: 要是我也能干，可以多赚点钱。
Chinese: 要是我也能干，可以多赚点钱。
TraditionalChinese: 要是我也能幹，可以多賺點錢。
English: If I can do it too， I can make some money.

Standard: 听你一讲，这么复杂，算了算了。
Chinese: 听你一讲，这么复杂，算了算了。
TraditionalChinese: 聽你一講，這麼複雜，算了算了。
English: But hearing you talk about it， it's so complicated， forget it.
Hahahahaha.
Where's Shandong?
Past Henan.
Where's Henan.
North of Hubei.
Then Hubei...

Standard: 你干脆先告诉我，有哪里是你晓得的。
Chinese: 你干脆先告诉我，有哪里是你晓得的。
TraditionalChinese: 你乾脆先告訴我，有哪里是你曉得的。
English: Just tell me what places you do know.

Standard: 不然全国这么多地方，我要哪样跟你讲？
Chinese: 不然全国这么多地方，我要哪样跟你讲？
TraditionalChinese: 不然全國這麼多地方，我要哪樣跟你講？
English: Otherwise， the country is so big， how am I supposed to tell you?
Hahaha， forget it.
When I'm free， I'll check out a map.

Standard: 是我有个侄子，在山东当兵。
Chinese: 是我有个侄子，在山东当兵。
TraditionalChinese: 是我有個侄子，在山東當兵。
English: I have a nephew， he's in the military in Shandong.
He says the food is good.
Yeah， Lu cuisine.

Standard: 中国的四大菜系之一，北方菜的代表。
Chinese: 中国的四大菜系之一，北方菜的代表。
TraditionalChinese: 中國的四大菜系之一，北方菜的代表。
English: One of the big four， represents the north.
Never had it， I want to try.
Next time I go up， I'll take you with me.
You gotta drive half of it though.
Haha， you think I know how to drive?

Standard: 阿南你这么得空，跟我讲讲中国地理呗。
Chinese: 阿南你这么得空，跟我讲讲中国地理呗。
TraditionalChinese: 阿南你這麼得空，跟我講講中國地理唄。
English: Ah Nan， since you're so free， tell me about China's geography.
...I have things to do， see ya.

Standard: 坐落于芷滨镇状元湾的状元公园，即将竣工。
Chinese: 坐落于芷滨镇状元湾的状元公园，即将竣工。
TraditionalChinese: 坐落於芷濱鎮狀元灣的狀元公園，即將竣工。
English: The Zhuangyuan Park sitting at Zhibin's Zhuangyuan Bay is about to be finished.

Standard: 你去看过咩？其实就是从大水车那里进去。
Chinese: 你去看过咩？其实就是从大水车那里进去。
TraditionalChinese: 你去看過咩？其實就是從大水車那裏進去。
English: You wanna go check it out? It's right over where the water wheel is.

Standard: 得空带荔荔去走走啊，沾点灵气。
Chinese: 得空带荔荔去走走啊，沾点灵气。
TraditionalChinese: 得空帶荔荔去走走啊，沾點靈氣。
English: If you have time， take Lili there， get some of the energy.

Standard: 古时候那个人，解元、会元、状元，三及第。
Chinese: 古时候那个人，解元、会元、状元，三及第。
TraditionalChinese: 古時候那個人，解元、會元、狀元，三及第。
English: In ancient times， that person tested all the way up to Zhuangyuan.
Hopefully Lili also gets a Zhuangyuan.

Standard: 从卖花圈那个店后面，可以望见矿区的山。
Chinese: 从卖花圈那个店后面，可以望见矿区的山。
TraditionalChinese: 從賣花圈那個店後面，可以望見礦區的山。
English: From behind the flowerstore， you can see the mines up in the mountain.

Standard: 现在很荒凉了，野草都比老房子高。
Chinese: 现在很荒凉了，野草都比老房子高。
TraditionalChinese: 現在很荒涼了，野草都比老房子高。
English: Now it's pretty much abandoned， the grass is taller than the houses.
I don't understand geography.

Standard: 我就听人家和我讲过，地方不同，农时不同。
Chinese: 我就听人家和我讲过，地方不同，农时不同。
TraditionalChinese: 我就聽人家和我講過，地方不同，農時不同。
English: I hear people tell me， different places have different farming times.

Standard: 像那首诗写的——农家少闲月，五月人倍忙。
Chinese: 像那首诗写的——农家少闲月，五月人倍忙。
TraditionalChinese: 像那首詩寫的——農家少閑月，五月人倍忙。
English: Like that poem- farmer's don't have free months， doubly busy in May.

Standard: 有的省份，老历五月就开始双抢了。
Chinese: 有的省份，老历五月就开始双抢了。
TraditionalChinese: 有的省份，老曆五月就開始雙搶了。
English: Some places， in the fifth month of the old calendar， they gotta rush to harvest and plant.

Standard: 我们这边的，起码要等过了初伏啦。
Chinese: 我们这边的，起码要等过了初伏啦。
TraditionalChinese: 我們這邊的，起碼要等過了初伏啦。
English: Here? We wait until after Summer Solstice.

Standard: 你那个好兄弟，老四，做得吃的哦。
Chinese: 你那个好兄弟，老四，做得吃的哦。
TraditionalChinese: 你那個好兄弟，老四，做得吃的哦。
English: Oh yeah your buddy， Lao Si， made some food.

Standard: 我们隔壁那条街的仓库都挨他租下来了。
Chinese: 我们隔壁那条街的仓库都挨他租下来了。
TraditionalChinese: 我們隔壁那條街的倉庫都挨他租下來了。
English: They even rented that storage space next street over.
He's real good at business.
Doing good with the old well too.
Water's clean and refreshing.

Standard: 几百年从来没有干过，到现在都是活水。
Chinese: 几百年从来没有干过，到现在都是活水。
TraditionalChinese: 幾百年從來沒有幹過，到現在都是活水。
English: Never been dry， always had live water.

Standard: 不像小桥头那条溪流，已经不能喝了。
Chinese: 不像小桥头那条溪流，已经不能喝了。
TraditionalChinese: 不像小橋頭那條溪流，已經不能喝了。
English: Not like that stream next to the bridge， you can't drink from there anymore.

Standard: 上游建了好几间工厂，用来漱口你都想吐。
Chinese: 上游建了好几间工厂，用来漱口你都想吐。
TraditionalChinese: 上游建了好幾間工廠，用來漱口你都想吐。
English: They built so many factories upstream， even using it to rinse your mouth makes you want to puke.

Standard: 我就是嫌水井边那几个老奶，太吵了。
Chinese: 我就是嫌水井边那几个老奶，太吵了。
TraditionalChinese: 我就是嫌水井邊那幾個老奶，太吵了。
English: I just find the old ladies next to the well too gossipy.
So I don't get water there often.

Standard: 那天我去到小学那边，看他们下棋。
Chinese: 那天我去到小学那边，看他们下棋。
TraditionalChinese: 那天我去到小學那邊，看他們下棋。
English: That day I went to the school， found them playing some Chinese Chess.

Standard: 我才发现修了条新路，可以直接到卫生院。
Chinese: 我才发现修了条新路，可以直接到卫生院。
TraditionalChinese: 我才發現修了條新路，可以直接到衛生院。
English: I found a new road， goes straight to the santiation department.

Standard: 去供销社也近了好多，蛮方便的。
Chinese: 去供销社也近了好多，蛮方便的。
TraditionalChinese: 去供銷社也近了好多，蠻方便的。
English: A shorter way to get to the co op too， pretty convenient.

Standard: 所以讲发展终究是会给大家带来好处。
Chinese: 所以讲发展终究是会给大家带来好处。
TraditionalChinese: 所以講發展終究是會給大家帶來好處。
English: Development eventually brings good to everyone.
