Even though there will be some destruction.

Standard: 那个幼儿园，都不晓得搞点什么鬼。
Chinese: 那个幼儿园，都不晓得搞点什么鬼。
TraditionalChinese: 那個幼稚園，都不曉得搞點什麼鬼。
English: That kindergarten， who knows what's up.
Been under repairs for a year.

Standard: 好在你家荔荔毕业了，不然书都没得读。
Chinese: 好在你家荔荔毕业了，不然书都没得读。
TraditionalChinese: 好在你家荔荔畢業了，不然書都沒得讀。
English: Luckily， your Lili already graduated from kindergarten， otherwise there's nowhere to go.

Standard: 鱼塘旁边那个牛，人家讲它很灵性的哦。
Chinese: 鱼塘旁边那个牛，人家讲它很灵性的哦。
TraditionalChinese: 魚塘旁邊那個牛，人家講它很靈性的哦。
English: That cow next to the fish pond， people say it understands humans.

Standard: 听得懂人话，你讲什么它会应你。
Chinese: 听得懂人话，你讲什么它会应你。
TraditionalChinese: 聽得懂人話，你講什麼它會應你。
English: Whatever you say， it will respond to you.
You believe it?

Standard: 我有个堂弟住在篮球场后面，那些楼房里。
Chinese: 我有个堂弟住在篮球场后面，那些楼房里。
TraditionalChinese: 我有個堂弟住在籃球場後面，那些樓房裏。
English: I got a cousin who lives in those buildings behind the basketball courts.

Standard: 他讲，篮球场路边那个铁皮房，可以租。
Chinese: 他讲，篮球场路边那个铁皮房，可以租。
TraditionalChinese: 他講，籃球場路邊那個鐵皮房，可以租。
English: He says that tin building can be rented.

Standard: 所以我之前有考虑过，在那里开个店修单车。
Chinese: 所以我之前有考虑过，在那里开个店修单车。
TraditionalChinese: 所以我之前有考慮過，在那裏開個店修單車。
English: I thought about renting one to open a bike fixing shop.

Standard: 后来去一问，嘿，那个老奶一口气租了十年。
Chinese: 后来去一问，嘿，那个老奶一口气租了十年。
TraditionalChinese: 後來去一問，嘿，那個老奶一口氣租了十年。
English: Then when I asked， ha， someone rented it out for ten years.

Standard: 那算啦，我就租了现在这间房子。
Chinese: 那算啦，我就租了现在这间房子。
TraditionalChinese: 那算啦，我就租了現在這間房子。
English: So I said forget it， and got this one.

Standard: 也好，你家就在隔壁，找你老头聊天方便。
Chinese: 也好，你家就在隔壁，找你老头聊天方便。
TraditionalChinese: 也好，你家就在隔壁，找你老頭聊天方便。
English: Worked out， your house is next door， makes it easy to go chat with your old man.

Standard: 旁边这家住木板房的，脾气古怪得很咧！
Chinese: 旁边这家住木板房的，脾气古怪得很咧！
TraditionalChinese: 旁邊這家住木板房的，脾氣古怪得很咧！
English: The one who stayed in this wood house here， real strange.

Standard: 过年过节见面都不跟你打招呼的！
Chinese: 过年过节见面都不跟你打招呼的！
TraditionalChinese: 過年過節見面都不跟你打招呼的！
English: Doesn't even say hi over New Year's or the holidays!

Standard: 但是上回，我跟你老头收养了这只猫。
Chinese: 但是上回，我跟你老头收养了这只猫。
TraditionalChinese: 但是上回，我跟你老頭收養了這只貓。
English: But last time， me and your old man took in this cat.

Standard: 想盖个小房子，问他要木板，他也愿意给。
Chinese: 想盖个小房子，问他要木板，他也愿意给。
TraditionalChinese: 想蓋個小房子，問他要木板，他也願意給。
English: We wanted to build a small house for it， asked him for some wood， he gave some.
And it was good quality.

Standard: 听讲他以前是专业生产手工木门的。
Chinese: 听讲他以前是专业生产手工木门的。
TraditionalChinese: 聽講他以前是專業生產手工木門的。
English: I heard that he was a professional carpenter in the past.

Standard: 估计年纪上来了，没有心思做了。
Chinese: 估计年纪上来了，没有心思做了。
TraditionalChinese: 估計年紀上來了，沒有心思做了。
English: I guess age caught up and then they quit.
Auntie Yang.
Ah Nan， what can I do you for?
Nothing， just coming to say hi.
Have some herbal tea?
Why's there herbal tea?
I made it.
You make everything.

Standard: 一个小卖部，茶叶蛋、艾馍，连盒饭都有卖。
Chinese: 一个小卖部，茶叶蛋、艾馍，连盒饭都有卖。
TraditionalChinese: 一個小賣部，茶葉蛋、艾饃，連盒飯都有賣。
English: You have everything in your shop， tea eggs， steamed mugwort buns， even rice boxes.
If I like it then I make it.
If someone wants to buy， I'll sell it.
What kind of herbal tea?
I don't know， someone taught me.
Not from here anyways.

Standard: 龙水县就只有苦丁茶和山楂茶。
Chinese: 龙水县就只有苦丁茶和山楂茶。
TraditionalChinese: 龍水縣就只有苦丁茶和山楂茶。
English: Longshui County only has Hawthorn Tea and Kuding Tea.

Standard: 我有个堂姐就在东部县卖凉茶。
Chinese: 我有个堂姐就在东部县卖凉茶。
TraditionalChinese: 我有個堂姐就在東部縣賣涼茶。
English: I got a cousin that sells Herbal Tea in the East part of the county.
Does pretty good.
Not about money.
Of course with you it's not  about money.

Standard: 你开这个小卖部，就是为了好玩。
Chinese: 你开这个小卖部，就是为了好玩。
TraditionalChinese: 你開這個小賣部，就是為了好玩。
English: You run this shop for fun.
Just so you can feed the kids.
Heh， we only live a few decades.
As long as you're happy.

Standard: 弟啊，吃雪条咩？还是喝汽水？
Chinese: 弟啊，吃雪条咩？还是喝汽水？
TraditionalChinese: 弟啊，吃雪條咩？還是喝汽水？
English: Want an icicle? Soda?
On the house.
No， no.

Standard: 我这里都是下午才开始人多起来。
Chinese: 我这里都是下午才开始人多起来。
TraditionalChinese: 我這裏都是下午才開始人多起來。
English: It's only busy in the afternoon here.
Kids get out of school.

Standard: 早上会有人来买早餐，也就几个吧。
Chinese: 早上会有人来买早餐，也就几个吧。
TraditionalChinese: 早上會有人來買早餐，也就幾個吧。
English: Only a few people who come by for breakfast.
Lunch time， even less.
So many different kinds of kids.

Standard: 一种是很有钱的，一买就买一畚箕零食。
Chinese: 一种是很有钱的，一买就买一畚箕零食。
TraditionalChinese: 一種是很有錢的，一買就買一畚箕零食。
English: One's got lots of money， will buy a whole lot of snacks.

Standard: 后面跟着一唪唥同学，他会请他们吃。
Chinese: 后面跟着一唪唥同学，他会请他们吃。
TraditionalChinese: 後面跟著一唪唥同學，他會請他們吃。
English: A bunch of classmates behind him， he'll share.
Or he'll just buy for them.

Standard: 有钱但是不多的娃仔，目标就很明确啦。
Chinese: 有钱但是不多的娃仔，目标就很明确啦。
TraditionalChinese: 有錢但是不多的娃仔，目標就很明確啦。
English: The ones with money they have their goal in sight.
They leave after they buy.
And another kind， one without lots of money.
Takes all day to think about what they want.
Usually those kids I just give it to them.
Plenty of people at night too.
Ones who come out for a walk， enjoy the breeze.
Buy a drink or a beer.
They'll sit here and chat for hours.

Standard: 这个店开了这么多年，镇上个个人我都认得。
Chinese: 这个店开了这么多年，镇上个个人我都认得。
TraditionalChinese: 這個店開了這麼多年，鎮上個個人我都認得。
English: I've run this shop for so many years， I know weveryone.

Standard: 住在哪里，有几个人，平时吃点什么。
Chinese: 住在哪里，有几个人，平时吃点什么。
TraditionalChinese: 住在哪里，有幾個人，平時吃點什麼。
English: Where they live， how many， what they like to get.
I know.

Standard: 还有人是特意过来跟我聊天的哦。
Chinese: 还有人是特意过来跟我聊天的哦。
TraditionalChinese: 還有人是特意過來跟我聊天的哦。
English: And some people come to just chat.

Standard: 骂家婆的，骂媳妇的，骂仔的，抱怨邻居的。
Chinese: 骂家婆的，骂媳妇的，骂仔的，抱怨邻居的。
TraditionalChinese: 罵家婆的，罵媳婦的，罵仔的，抱怨鄰居的。
English: Complain about in laws， their spouse， kids， neighbors.
It annoys me.
You just want to slack!
I told you to copy it so you copy it!

Standard: 这么简单的题都不会，不抄哪记得住！？
Chinese: 这么简单的题都不会，不抄哪记得住！？
TraditionalChinese: 這麼簡單的題都不會，不抄哪記得住！？
English: You can't even solve this simple problem， how do remember if you don't copy it?!
I didn't do anything wrong.
Don't argue!

Standard: 你分明是随便乱写的，就没有这个词。
Chinese: 你分明是随便乱写的，就没有这个词。
TraditionalChinese: 你分明是隨便亂寫的，就沒有這個詞。
English: You made it up， there's no such word.
There is! I saw it in a book!
...I told you not to read so many storybooks.

Standard: 里面的东西都是假的，骗娃仔的。
Chinese: 里面的东西都是假的，骗娃仔的。
TraditionalChinese: 裏面的東西都是假的，騙娃仔的。
English: It's all fake， just to trick you.
I didn't see it in a storybook!
You mean you know more than me?
No...
Or am I treating you wrong?
Really.
Now you're feeling wronged.
Ms. Zhang.
Mr. Qin， you've come at the right time!
Your kid got this wrong.

Standard: 作业不好好做，错了又不认罚。
Chinese: 作业不好好做，错了又不认罚。
TraditionalChinese: 作業不好好做，錯了又不認罰。
English: Doesn't do homework right， then doesn't accept punishment when they do it wrong.
I didn't do it wrong!
See， look.
When you try to correct her， she gets upset.

Standard: 你把她领回家吧，学校教育不了这种娃仔！
Chinese: 你把她领回家吧，学校教育不了这种娃仔！
TraditionalChinese: 你把她領回家吧，學校教育不了這種娃仔！
English: Take her home， we can't teach these kids.
......What did she do?

Standard: 语文作业，有一题是用“牛”字组词。
Chinese: 语文作业，有一题是用“牛”字组词。
TraditionalChinese: 語文作業，有一題是用“牛”字組詞。
English: Language class， the problem is to use something with “cow”.
So cow head， cow milk， water buffalo are all fine.
Easy right?  Couldn't do it.

Standard: 我让她把“牛”的词语各抄二十次。
Chinese: 我让她把“牛”的词语各抄二十次。
TraditionalChinese: 我讓她把“牛”的詞語各抄二十次。
English: I told her to write some of these common words to do with cow twenty times.
She talks back.
I wrote bullfrog!
Why is it wrong?
Can you tell me what a bullfrog is?
I've never heard of it.
Bullfrog?

Standard: 水牛都算词组，那牛蛙应该也得吧。
Chinese: 水牛都算词组，那牛蛙应该也得吧。
TraditionalChinese: 水牛都算片語，那牛蛙應該也得吧。
English: If water buffalo counts， then a bullfrog should too.
.....That's a thing?

Standard: 有啊，就是一种蛙，比田鸡大好多。
Chinese: 有啊，就是一种蛙，比田鸡大好多。
TraditionalChinese: 有啊，就是一種蛙，比田雞大好多。
English: Yeah， it's a type of frog， much bigger kind.
About this big.
Croaks like a cow.
“Moooooo”- like that.
......Really?
Really!

Standard: 我在湖南广东都见过，蛮好吃的。
Chinese: 我在湖南广东都见过，蛮好吃的。
TraditionalChinese: 我在湖南廣東都見過，蠻好吃的。
English: I see them in Hunan and Guangdong， pretty tasty.

Standard: 老师，要不下次带两只回来给你尝尝？
Chinese: 老师，要不下次带两只回来给你尝尝？
TraditionalChinese: 老師，要不下次帶兩只回來給你嘗嘗？
English: Teacher， how about next time I bring back some for you to try.
No...no thanks.
Ah don't be polite.
No no...really no thanks.

Standard: 你语文作业终于得一回满分啦。
Chinese: 你语文作业终于得一回满分啦。
TraditionalChinese: 你語文作業終於得一回滿分啦。
English: Finally got full marks this time in your language homework.
As a reward， you get some snacks.
Yay!
What do you want? Go pick.
Only one thing.

Standard: 免得等下肚子胀胀的，又吃不下饭。
Chinese: 免得等下肚子胀胀的，又吃不下饭。
TraditionalChinese: 免得等下肚子脹脹的，又吃不下飯。
English: Otherwise you'll fill up and can't eat dinner.
Okay.
Wahhh sob-
Ah， Li Ying?
Didn't you go home?
Wahhhh---
Li Ying...
Your classmate?
Yeah.
What's wrong? Why are you crying?
I lost my key-
Key?
Didn't I just give it to you?
No-
What key?
I have a row of keys here.
See it?
Yeah.
It's from all the neighbors.

Standard: 他们下班晚嘛，怕娃仔没得进门。
Chinese: 他们下班晚嘛，怕娃仔没得进门。
TraditionalChinese: 他們下班晚嘛，怕娃仔沒得進門。
English: They get off work late， they're worried their kids can't go home.

Standard: 早上就把钥匙挂这里，等娃仔放学来拿。
Chinese: 早上就把钥匙挂这里，等娃仔放学来拿。
TraditionalChinese: 早上就把鑰匙掛這裏，等娃仔放學來拿。
English: So they leave their keys here， so the kids can come take it after schools' out.

Standard: 她那条我刚给过她了，跟这条差不多。
Chinese: 她那条我刚给过她了，跟这条差不多。
TraditionalChinese: 她那條我剛給過她了，跟這條差不多。
English: I gave her her key， looks like this one.
A bit wider， and brighter.
So they lost it.

Standard: 你去过什么地方，回头找了没有？
Chinese: 你去过什么地方，回头找了没有？
TraditionalChinese: 你去過什麼地方，回頭找了沒有？
English: Where have you been， did you trace your steps?
I looked， looked for a long time-
Can't find it-
Wahhh-
Daddy.

Standard: 她这么伤心，我们帮帮她好不好？
Chinese: 她这么伤心，我们帮帮她好不好？
TraditionalChinese: 她這麼傷心，我們幫幫她好不好？
English: She's so sad， can we help her please?

Standard: 桃子奶奶给了钥匙你，之后你去了哪里？
Chinese: 桃子奶奶给了钥匙你，之后你去了哪里？
TraditionalChinese: 桃子奶奶給了鑰匙你，之後你去了哪里？
English: Where'd you go after Granny Taozi gave you the key?
Sob-
I went-
Uh- I went to-
I went under the bridge， wanted to get snails.
How many did you get?
None.
Then where did you go?
I went to the bakery to buy bread.
I walked along the rail.
Did you have the key then?
I don't know.......

Standard: 我走到果园，那个奶奶认识我，问我去哪里。
Chinese: 我走到果园，那个奶奶认识我，问我去哪里。
TraditionalChinese: 我走到果園，那個奶奶認識我，問我去哪里。
English: Then I went to the orchard， the granny there recognized me， asked where I was going.
I said I was going hom.
Then I reached into my pocket-
The key was gone- Wahh-
Ah， probably dropped it somewhere along the way.

Standard: 只能把走过的路全部检查一遍咯。
Chinese: 只能把走过的路全部检查一遍咯。
TraditionalChinese: 只能把走過的路全部檢查一遍咯。
English: Only thing to do is to retrace and look everywhere.

Standard: 没有挨别人捡走的话，应该还在的。
Chinese: 没有挨别人捡走的话，应该还在的。
TraditionalChinese: 沒有挨別人撿走的話，應該還在的。
English: If no one else picked it up it should still be there.

Standard: 你刚才可能太慌张了，东西又小，没看仔细。
Chinese: 你刚才可能太慌张了，东西又小，没看仔细。
TraditionalChinese: 你剛才可能太慌張了，東西又小，沒看仔細。
English: Maybe you were panicked and it's a small thing so you missed it.
I'll go look for it.
{wvo}Picked up a really long screw{w=3}
Is this from your store?
Nah， a customer tossed it.

Standard: 他拿这个型号来对照，没找到就不要了。
Chinese: 他拿这个型号来对照，没找到就不要了。
TraditionalChinese: 他拿這個型號來對照，沒找到就不要了。
English: He brought this in to match， couldn't find it then tossed it.
{wvo}Picked up a pretty fish hook{w=3}
(Did Ye Laosi leave this here?)
(Not bad craftsmanship， too bad it's broken.)
{wvo}Picked up a metal ring{w=3}
(What is this?)
(Looks like it's for bearings.)
{wvo}Picked up a key{w=3}
(Found it)
(It was under a tire.)
Li Ying， is it this one?
Yes!
Thank you uncle!
Hang on to it， don't lose it again.
I'm gonna grab it， never let go!
Go home， it's getting dark.
Yeah!

Standard: 覃茁荔，你们家是住在老街口吗？
Chinese: 覃茁荔，你们家是住在老街口吗？
TraditionalChinese: 覃茁荔，你們家是住在老街口嗎？
English: Qin Zhuoli， is your house the one at the corner of the old street?
Yeah， next to the salon.
I'll come find you tomorrow to play!
Really?
Really， tomorrow is Saturday.
Okay!

Standard: 那拜拜啦！叔叔拜拜！桃子奶奶拜拜！
Chinese: 那拜拜啦！叔叔拜拜！桃子奶奶拜拜！
TraditionalChinese: 那拜拜啦！叔叔拜拜！桃子奶奶拜拜！
English: Okay， bye! Bye uncle! By Granny Taozi!
Bye!
Bye.
Bye.

Standard: 我就说阿爸很厉害的，一定找到她的钥匙。
Chinese: 我就说阿爸很厉害的，一定找到她的钥匙。
TraditionalChinese: 我就說阿爸很厲害的，一定找到她的鑰匙。
English: I was just saying Dad is the best， you could definitely find the key.

Standard: 上回我的玩具不见了，你也能找到。
Chinese: 上回我的玩具不见了，你也能找到。
TraditionalChinese: 上回我的玩具不見了，你也能找到。
English: Last time I lost my toy you also found it.
Didn't even finish their soda.
I finished mine!
She gave me an other half of hers!
She doesn't like it?
She got too scared， couldn't f  inish.

Standard: 她说如果找不到钥匙，她都不敢回家了。
Chinese: 她说如果找不到钥匙，她都不敢回家了。
TraditionalChinese: 她說如果找不到鑰匙，她都不敢回家了。
English: She said if she couldn't find the key， she didn't dare go home.
That important?
She's afraid of being scolded.

Standard: 她妈妈好恶的，讲话又大声。
Chinese: 她妈妈好恶的，讲话又大声。
TraditionalChinese: 她媽媽好惡的，講話又大聲。
English: Her mom is mean， and loud.
I even saw her beat Li Ying
Hahaha， that is a bit scary.
But having a mom to watch over you is good.

Standard: 如果妈妈现在在家里，她怎么骂我都没关系。
Chinese: 如果妈妈现在在家里，她怎么骂我都没关系。
TraditionalChinese: 如果媽媽現在在家裏，她怎麼罵我都沒關係。
English: If Mom was at home， she can scold me however she wants.
Your mom's not mean.

Standard: 她从来没骂过你，也没打过你。
Chinese: 她从来没骂过你，也没打过你。
TraditionalChinese: 她從來沒罵過你，也沒打過你。
English: She never scolded you， or hit you.
Yeah， Mommy is the best...
Daddy is the best too.
Let's go ho me， watch Tv.

Standard: 今晚夜《丞相牛罗锅》大结局。
Chinese: 今晚夜《丞相牛罗锅》大结局。
TraditionalChinese: 今晚夜《丞相牛羅鍋》大結局。
English: Tonight is the finale of “Chancellor Niu Luoguo”
Oh yeah!

Standard: 李颖，再说一遍你去过哪里。
Chinese: 李颖，再说一遍你去过哪里。
TraditionalChinese: 李穎，再說一遍你去過哪里。
English: Li Ying， can you repeat where you went?
Dad!

Standard: 你怎么问了这么多次都记不住呀！
Chinese: 你怎么问了这么多次都记不住呀！
TraditionalChinese: 你怎麼問了這麼多次都記不住呀！
English: How come you can't remember after asking so many times!

Standard: 她去了桥底，又从桥底去糕点厂。
Chinese: 她去了桥底，又从桥底去糕点厂。
TraditionalChinese: 她去了橋底，又從橋底去糕點廠。
English: She went under the bridge， then to the bakery.
Then after that to the orchard!
...What do you mean I can't remember?

Standard: 我只是怕听错，问清楚一点。
Chinese: 我只是怕听错，问清楚一点。
TraditionalChinese: 我只是怕聽錯，問清楚一點。
English: I was just afraid I misheard， so I wanted to be clear.

Standard: 李颖，再说一遍你去过哪里。
Chinese: 李颖，再说一遍你去过哪里。
TraditionalChinese: 李穎，再說一遍你去過哪里。
English: Li Ying， can you repeat where you went?

Standard: 我在小卖部拿了钥匙，就去了桥底河边。
Chinese: 我在小卖部拿了钥匙，就去了桥底河边。
TraditionalChinese: 我在小賣部拿了鑰匙，就去了橋底河邊。
English: I got the key from the stand， then I went under the bridge next to the river.

Standard: 去完桥底再穿过铁路，去糕点厂。
Chinese: 去完桥底再穿过铁路，去糕点厂。
TraditionalChinese: 去完橋底再穿過鐵路，去糕點廠。
English: After that I went along the rail to the bakery.
Then I went to the orchard.
Okay， got it.
The new book of “Mighty Heroine”!

Standard: 今天早上去县城送货，路过新华书店。
Chinese: 今天早上去县城送货，路过新华书店。
TraditionalChinese: 今天早上去縣城送貨，路過新華書店。
English: I went to the county to deliver something and passed by Xinhua Bookstore.

Standard: 进去逛了一会儿，发现有这本就买了。
Chinese: 进去逛了一会儿，发现有这本就买了。
TraditionalChinese: 進去逛了一會兒，發現有這本就買了。
English: Went in for a bit， found this and got it.
It's so pretty!

Standard: 我见旧的那几本都快被你翻烂了。
Chinese: 我见旧的那几本都快被你翻烂了。
TraditionalChinese: 我見舊的那幾本都快被你翻爛了。
English: I see all your old ones are pretty worn.
Mom bought those...
I know.
I meant that you should take care of them.

Standard: 后面的我接着买，咱们集齐一整套。
Chinese: 后面的我接着买，咱们集齐一整套。
TraditionalChinese: 後面的我接著買，咱們集齊一整套。
English: I'll buy the ones in the future， let's collect the whole thing.
Wow， okay!
Then I want sleeves for them!
Kid.

Standard: 大人说的话不一定都是对的，包括老师也是。
Chinese: 大人说的话不一定都是对的，包括老师也是。
TraditionalChinese: 大人說的話不一定都是對的，包括老師也是。
English: Adults aren't always right， that includes teachers.

Standard: 不是说因为她是老师，就什么都听她的。
Chinese: 不是说因为她是老师，就什么都听她的。
TraditionalChinese: 不是說因為她是老師，就什麼都聽她的。
English: Don't just listen to them because they are teachers.

Standard: 真做错了要承认错误，接受意见。
Chinese: 真做错了要承认错误，接受意见。
TraditionalChinese: 真做錯了要承認錯誤，接受意見。
English: If you really made a mistake you need to admit it and accept the correction.

Standard: 没做错就绝对不能认，一定要反驳。
Chinese: 没做错就绝对不能认，一定要反驳。
TraditionalChinese: 沒做錯就絕對不能認，一定要反駁。
English: If you didn't do any wrong， then don't agree， and you have to stand up for yourself.

Standard: 别人要是不听，不跟你讲道理，你就告诉我。
Chinese: 别人要是不听，不跟你讲道理，你就告诉我。
TraditionalChinese: 別人要是不聽，不跟你講道理，你就告訴我。
English: If they don't want to listen to reason， you tell me.
I'll go find them.
Got it?
Got it!

Standard: 话说回来，你是在哪里看到牛蛙这个词？
Chinese: 话说回来，你是在哪里看到牛蛙这个词？
TraditionalChinese: 話說回來，你是在哪里看到牛蛙這個詞？
English: Speaking of， where'd you find the word “bullfrog”?
Teacher Chen lent me a book.
“One Million Whys”
What a title.
What's it about?
About nature.

Standard: 你觉得自然比语文数学好玩，是咩？
Chinese: 你觉得自然比语文数学好玩，是咩？
TraditionalChinese: 你覺得自然比語文數學好玩，是咩？
English: You like nature more than language and math， yeah?
Yeah!
Then you can be a scientist when you grow up.
Hahaha， I can't.
Why not?
My grades are bad.

Standard: 要很聪明的人才可以当科学家。
Chinese: 要很聪明的人才可以当科学家。
TraditionalChinese: 要很聰明的人才可以當科學家。
English: Only smart people can be scientists.

Standard: 聪明的人又不是天生就什么都会。
Chinese: 聪明的人又不是天生就什么都会。
TraditionalChinese: 聰明的人又不是天生就什麼都會。
English: Smart people don't know everything.
They learn bit by bit.

Standard: 你才二年级，想进步还有的是时间。
Chinese: 你才二年级，想进步还有的是时间。
TraditionalChinese: 你才二年級，想進步還有的是時間。
English: You're only second grade， plenty of time to get better.
Dad.

Standard: 我看图画书，你不会不高兴吗？
Chinese: 我看图画书，你不会不高兴吗？
TraditionalChinese: 我看圖畫書，你不會不高興嗎？
English: I like reading storybooks， does that make you unhappy?
Nope.
As long as it doesn't affect your learning.

Standard: 你上次说完我就没带去学校了！
Chinese: 你上次说完我就没带去学校了！
TraditionalChinese: 你上次說完我就沒帶去學校了！
English: After you talked to me I don't bring them to school anymore!
I pay attention in class!
Good.
It's normal for kids to read storybooks.
Oh!
So they are playing this part!
What?

Standard: 他们喜欢演威风女侠跟坏蛋打架。
Chinese: 他们喜欢演威风女侠跟坏蛋打架。
TraditionalChinese: 他們喜歡演威風女俠跟壞蛋打架。
English: They like to play the Mighty Heroine fighting bad guys.

Standard: 有时候我都不知道他们演的是哪一段。
Chinese: 有时候我都不知道他们演的是哪一段。
TraditionalChinese: 有時候我都不知道他們演的是哪一段。
English: Sometimes I don't know what they are playing.
Oh， so it's from the book.
Mighty Heroine fights the Scissor Monster.
Them? Your classmates?

Standard: 嗯，选一个人演女侠，其他人演坏蛋。
Chinese: 嗯，选一个人演女侠，其他人演坏蛋。
TraditionalChinese: 嗯，選一個人演女俠，其他人演壞蛋。
English: Yeah， one person gets to play Heroine， the others are bad guys.
Then we just act out fighting.
Haha， fun.
Then are you the Heroine or the bad guy?
I don't play.
Why not?

Standard: 演那个要很多力气的，我一下子就觉得累。
Chinese: 演那个要很多力气的，我一下子就觉得累。
TraditionalChinese: 演那個要很多力氣的，我一下子就覺得累。
English: It takes so much energy to play， I feel tired too fast.

Standard: 他们知道我身体不好，也不会喊上我。
Chinese: 他们知道我身体不好，也不会喊上我。
TraditionalChinese: 他們知道我身體不好，也不會喊上我。
English: They know I'm not healthy， so they don't invite me.
...Does no one play with you at school?

Standard: 有啊，有几个同学经常跟我说话的。
Chinese: 有啊，有几个同学经常跟我说话的。
TraditionalChinese: 有啊，有幾個同學經常跟我說話的。
English: There are， some classmates come chat with me often.

Standard: 我们一起吃零食，一起做作业。
Chinese: 我们一起吃零食，一起做作业。
TraditionalChinese: 我們一起吃零食，一起做作業。
English: We have snacks together and do assignments together.

Standard: 不过我不能玩木头人，不能丢沙包。
Chinese: 不过我不能玩木头人，不能丢沙包。
TraditionalChinese: 不過我不能玩木頭人，不能丟沙包。
English: But I can't play red light green light， can't play cornhole.
I can't play Mighty Heroine.
I see....
Then I'll play with you!
Hahaha.
You've never read Mighty Heroine!
Just lend me the books?
But I can't fight....
I can't run or jump.

Standard: 不用的，你把书给我，闭上眼睛。
Chinese: 不用的，你把书给我，闭上眼睛。
TraditionalChinese: 不用的，你把書給我，閉上眼睛。
English: No need， give me the book and close your eyes.
Why?
Just do what I say.
Okay.
Okay， we're starting!
I am...Scissor Monster!

Standard: 我要去做坏事，正好在路上碰见了威风女侠。
Chinese: 我要去做坏事，正好在路上碰见了威风女侠。
TraditionalChinese: 我要去做壞事，正好在路上碰見了威風女俠。
English: I'm going to do bad things， but I ran into Mighty Heroine.

Standard: 我先下手为强，在背后偷袭了她。
Chinese: 我先下手为强，在背后偷袭了她。
TraditionalChinese: 我先下手為強，在背後偷襲了她。
English: I ambushed her， and attacked from behind.
Hahaha.
Daddy why are you pinching my face?

Standard: 严肃点！我是剪刀怪！不是你阿爸！
Chinese: 严肃点！我是剪刀怪！不是你阿爸！
TraditionalChinese: 嚴肅點！我是剪刀怪！不是你阿爸！
English: Be serious! I am Scissor Monster， not your father!

Standard: 我们是敌人，马上就要打起来了！
Chinese: 我们是敌人，马上就要打起来了！
TraditionalChinese: 我們是敵人，馬上就要打起來了！
English: We are enemies， we are about to fight!
Got it?

Standard: 哈哈哈哈，搞清楚了！哈哈哈哈！
Chinese: 哈哈哈哈，搞清楚了！哈哈哈哈！
TraditionalChinese: 哈哈哈哈，搞清楚了！哈哈哈哈！
English: Hahaha， got it! Hahaha!

Standard: 威风女侠遭遇了剪刀怪。
Chinese: 威风女侠遭遇了剪刀怪。
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠遭遇了剪刀怪。
English: Mighty Heroine encountered Scissor Monster!

Standard: 剪刀怪：你今天真不走运！居然碰上我了！
Chinese: 剪刀怪：你今天真不走运！居然碰上我了！
TraditionalChinese: 剪刀怪：你今天真不走運！居然碰上我了！
English: Scissor Monster:  You're unlucky today! You ran into me!
Scissor Monster: Ha! Mighty Heroine!

Standard: 剪刀怪：口桀口合口合口合——
Chinese: 剪刀怪：口桀口合口合口合——
TraditionalChinese: 剪刀怪：口桀口合口合口合——
English: Scissor Monster: Snip snip snap snap-
Mighty Heroine: Ah! It's you!

Standard: 威风女侠：头上长螺丝的剪刀怪！
Chinese: 威风女侠：头上长螺丝的剪刀怪！
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠：頭上長螺絲的剪刀怪！
English: Mighty Heroine: The Scissor Monster with screw for hair!

Standard: 剪刀怪：住嘴！不许说我的头！
Chinese: 剪刀怪：住嘴！不许说我的头！
TraditionalChinese: 剪刀怪：住嘴！不許說我的頭！
English: Scissor Monster: Shush! Don't make fun of my hair!

Standard: 剪刀怪：你乖乖投降，今天就饶你一命！
Chinese: 剪刀怪：你乖乖投降，今天就饶你一命！
TraditionalChinese: 剪刀怪：你乖乖投降，今天就饒你一命！
English: Scissor Monster: If you surrender， I'll let you live!

Standard: 威风女侠：要投降的是你！
Chinese: 威风女侠：要投降的是你！
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠：要投降的是你！
English: Mighty Heroine: The one who should surrender is you!

Standard: 威风女侠：不然我就不客气啦！
Chinese: 威风女侠：不然我就不客气啦！
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠：不然我就不客氣啦！
English: Mighty Heroine: If you don't， I won't go easy on you!

Standard: 剪刀怪：哼！敬酒不吃吃罚酒！
Chinese: 剪刀怪：哼！敬酒不吃吃罚酒！
TraditionalChinese: 剪刀怪：哼！敬酒不吃吃罰酒！
English: Scissor Monster: Hmph! You want to do th is the hard way? fine!
What move do you want to use?
Scissor Monster Uses
Pew Pew Laser Beam!
Pew!
Scissor Monster Uses
Bang Bang Sound Wave!
Bang， Bang bang bang!
Scissor Monster Uses
Snip Snip Scissors!
Snip， snip!

Standard: 威风女侠被击中了，吃了个大亏！
Chinese: 威风女侠被击中了，吃了个大亏！
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠被擊中了，吃了個大虧！
English: Mighty Heroine has been struck， it's super effective!

Standard: 威风女侠使用了叮铃铛啷。
Chinese: 威风女侠使用了叮铃铛啷。
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠使用了叮鈴鐺啷。
English: Mighty Heroine uses Ding Ling Dang Lang!
Scissor Monster is unaffected.

Standard: 威风女侠：阿爸，什么是不痛不痒？
Chinese: 威风女侠：阿爸，什么是不痛不痒？
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠：阿爸，什麼是不痛不癢？
English: Mighty Heroine: Daddy， what's “unaffected”?

Standard: 剪刀怪：就是没有受伤啊。
Chinese: 剪刀怪：就是没有受伤啊。
TraditionalChinese: 剪刀怪：就是沒有受傷啊。
English: Scissor Monster: That means I didn't get hurt.

Standard: 威风女侠：不行！叮铃铛啷很厉害的！
Chinese: 威风女侠：不行！叮铃铛啷很厉害的！
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠：不行！叮鈴鐺啷很厲害的！
English: Mighty Heroine: No! Ding Ling Dang Lang is powerful!

Standard: 威风女侠：不能没有受伤。
Chinese: 威风女侠：不能没有受伤。
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠：不能沒有受傷。
English: Mighty Heroine: You have to get hurt.
Scissor Monster: okay okay.

Standard: 剪刀怪突然觉得疼得不行。
Chinese: 剪刀怪突然觉得疼得不行。
TraditionalChinese: 剪刀怪突然覺得疼得不行。
English: Scissor Monster is in extreme pain.

Standard: 剪刀怪：叮铃铛啷，什么古灵精怪的名字。
Chinese: 剪刀怪：叮铃铛啷，什么古灵精怪的名字。
TraditionalChinese: 剪刀怪：叮鈴鐺啷，什麼古靈精怪的名字。
English: Scissor Monster: Ding Ling Dang Lang， what kind of strange name.

Standard: 威风女侠：是用钱砸人的招式呀！
Chinese: 威风女侠：是用钱砸人的招式呀！
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠：是用錢砸人的招式呀！
English: Mighty Heroine: It's a move where you throw money!

Standard: 威风女侠：金币扔出去的声音，就是叮铃铛啷的。
Chinese: 威风女侠：金币扔出去的声音，就是叮铃铛啷的。
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠：金幣扔出去的聲音，就是叮鈴鐺啷的。
English: Mighty Heroine: The sound money makes when you throw it， Ding Ling Dang Lang.

Standard: 威风女侠：威风女侠说，钱越多，打人越疼。
Chinese: 威风女侠：威风女侠说，钱越多，打人越疼。
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠：威風女俠說，錢越多，打人越疼。
English: Mighty Heroine: Mighty Heroine says， the more money you throw the more damage it does.

Standard: 剪刀怪：用钱打人……自己不更心疼吗？
Chinese: 剪刀怪：用钱打人……自己不更心疼吗？
TraditionalChinese: 剪刀怪：用錢打人……自己不更心疼嗎？
English: Scissor Monster: Hitting people with money...doesn't it hurt heart?

Standard: 威风女侠巧妙地化解了攻击，毫发无伤。
Chinese: 威风女侠巧妙地化解了攻击，毫发无伤。
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠巧妙地化解了攻擊，毫髮無傷。
English: Mighty Heroine dodges the attack and takes no damage.

Standard: 剪刀怪：你做了什么就把我攻击化解了？
Chinese: 剪刀怪：你做了什么就把我攻击化解了？
TraditionalChinese: 剪刀怪：你做了什麼就把我攻擊化解了？
English: Scissor Monster: What did you do to not take damage?

Standard: 威风女侠：威风女侠动作很快的！
Chinese: 威风女侠：威风女侠动作很快的！
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠：威風女俠動作很快的！
English: Mighty Heroine: Mighty Heroine is fast!

Standard: 威风女侠：躲开了你也看不到！
Chinese: 威风女侠：躲开了你也看不到！
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠：躲開了你也看不到！
English: Mighty Heroine: You can't even see if I dodged.
Scissor Monster: Okay， your turn.

Standard: 威风女侠使用了红红火火。
Chinese: 威风女侠使用了红红火火。
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠使用了紅紅火火。
English: Mighty Heroine uses red burny.
It's super effective against Scissor Monster.

Standard: 剪刀怪：我不怕火，没啥影响。
Chinese: 剪刀怪：我不怕火，没啥影响。
TraditionalChinese: 剪刀怪：我不怕火，沒啥影響。
English: Scissor Monster: I'm not afraid of fire， it doesn't affect me.
It's not very effective against Scissor Monster.
Mighty Heroine: Not fair!

Standard: 威风女侠：你都不按书里的来！
Chinese: 威风女侠：你都不按书里的来！
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠：你都不按書裏的來！
English: Mighty Heroine: You don't play by the book!

Standard: 剪刀怪：我本来就是坏人，为什么要公平？
Chinese: 剪刀怪：我本来就是坏人，为什么要公平？
TraditionalChinese: 剪刀怪：我本來就是壞人，為什麼要公平？
English: Scissor Monster: I'm a bad guy， why should it be fair?

Standard: 剪刀怪受了伤，接下来很难发挥实力了。
Chinese: 剪刀怪受了伤，接下来很难发挥实力了。
TraditionalChinese: 剪刀怪受了傷，接下來很難發揮實力了。
English: Scissor Monster is hurt， it's hard to fight to their full potential.

Standard: 剪刀怪：为什么我出的招，反而自己会受伤？
Chinese: 剪刀怪：为什么我出的招，反而自己会受伤？
TraditionalChinese: 剪刀怪：為什麼我出的招，反而自己會受傷？
English: Scissor Monster: How come when I attack， I hurt myself?

Standard: 威风女侠：因为我反弹了呀。
Chinese: 威风女侠：因为我反弹了呀。
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠：因為我反彈了呀。
English: Mighty Heroine: Because I reflect it.
Scissor Monster: There's such a move?

Standard: 剪刀怪：我没看到书里有写啊？
Chinese: 剪刀怪：我没看到书里有写啊？
TraditionalChinese: 剪刀怪：我沒看到書裏有寫啊？
English: Scissor Monster: I didn't see it in the book.

Standard: 威风女侠：这是女侠的秘密武器。
Chinese: 威风女侠：这是女侠的秘密武器。
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠：這是女俠的秘密武器。
English: Mighty Heroine: It's the Heroine's secret weapon.

Standard: 威风女侠：不会写出来的！
Chinese: 威风女侠：不会写出来的！
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠：不會寫出來的！
English: Mighty Heroine: They won't write it out.

Standard: 剪刀怪：那你为什么会知道！？
Chinese: 剪刀怪：那你为什么会知道！？
TraditionalChinese: 剪刀怪：那你為什麼會知道！？
English: Scissor Monster: Then how do you know?!

Standard: 威风女侠：我不管，我就是有这招！
Chinese: 威风女侠：我不管，我就是有这招！
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠：我不管，我就是有這招！
English: Mighty Heroine: I don't care， I have this movie!

Standard: 威风女侠使用了福星高照。
Chinese: 威风女侠使用了福星高照。
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠使用了福星高照。
English: Mighty Heroine uses Lucky Star.

Standard: 耀眼的星光下，一切邪恶无所遁形！
Chinese: 耀眼的星光下，一切邪恶无所遁形！
TraditionalChinese: 耀眼的星光下，一切邪惡無所遁形！
English: A shiny star shines down， revealing all evil!

Standard: 再怎么挣扎，也逃掉不了被消灭的命运。
Chinese: 再怎么挣扎，也逃掉不了被消灭的命运。
TraditionalChinese: 再怎麼掙扎，也逃掉不了被消滅的命運。
English: No matter how hard you struggle， you cannot escape the fate of being destroyed.
Scissor Monster was defeated!

Standard: 剪刀怪：你这个女侠太狡猾了。
Chinese: 剪刀怪：你这个女侠太狡猾了。
TraditionalChinese: 剪刀怪：你這個女俠太狡猾了。
English: Scissor Monster: You are too sneaky， Heroine.
Scissor Monster: Who can defeat you?

Standard: 威风女侠：不是这样说的！
Chinese: 威风女侠：不是这样说的！
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠：不是這樣說的！
English: Mighty Heroine: That's not how it goes!

Standard: 威风女侠：你要读书里的句子！
Chinese: 威风女侠：你要读书里的句子！
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠：你要讀書裏的句子！
English: Mighty Heroine: You have to follow what the book says!

Standard: 威风女侠：坏蛋输的时候会说很长一段话的！
Chinese: 威风女侠：坏蛋输的时候会说很长一段话的！
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠：壞蛋輸的時候會說很長一段話的！
English: Mighty Heroine: When the bad guys lose they have a whole thing to say!
Scissor Monster: ...

Standard: 剪刀怪：不！我不会输的！我是最强的！
Chinese: 剪刀怪：不！我不会输的！我是最强的！
TraditionalChinese: 剪刀怪：不！我不會輸的！我是最強的！
English: Scissor Monster: No! I can't lose! I am the strongest!

Standard: 剪刀怪：可恶的……威，威……风女侠。
Chinese: 剪刀怪：可恶的……威，威……风女侠。
TraditionalChinese: 剪刀怪：可惡的……威，威……風女俠。
English: Scissor Monster: So detestable...Migh...Mighty Heroine.

Standard: 剪刀怪：呜啊————嘣，哔哩嘣啷。
Chinese: 剪刀怪：呜啊————嘣，哔哩嘣啷。
TraditionalChinese: 剪刀怪：嗚啊————嘣，嗶哩嘣啷。
English: Scissor Monster: Gahh- Rahhh- Bang， kachong crash.

Standard: 威风女侠：呵呵呵，哈哈哈哈哈哈。
Chinese: 威风女侠：呵呵呵，哈哈哈哈哈哈。
TraditionalChinese: 威風女俠：呵呵呵，哈哈哈哈哈哈。
English: Mighty Heroine: Hehehe， hahahahahaha.

Standard: 又一次，威风女侠维护了宇宙的和平。
Chinese: 又一次，威风女侠维护了宇宙的和平。
TraditionalChinese: 又一次，威風女俠維護了宇宙的和平。
English: Once again， the Mighty Heroine saves the universe.
Fun?
Fun! Amazing!

Standard: 闭上眼睛，我好像真的变成了威风女侠！
Chinese: 闭上眼睛，我好像真的变成了威风女侠！
TraditionalChinese: 閉上眼睛，我好像真的變成了威風女俠！
English: When I close my eyes， it's like I turn into the Mighty Heroine!
Like I'm really beating bad guys!

Standard: 所谓演戏不就是把自己当成你演的那个人嘛？
Chinese: 所谓演戏不就是把自己当成你演的那个人嘛？
TraditionalChinese: 所謂演戲不就是把自己當成你演的那個人嘛？
English: Isn't that's what acting is about? You pretend like you're that person?

Standard: 只要你想象自己是她，你就有那种感觉。
Chinese: 只要你想象自己是她，你就有那种感觉。
TraditionalChinese: 只要你想像自己是她，你就有那種感覺。
English: As long as you imagine yourself as her， you can have that feeling.

Standard: 体力不行也没影响的，又不是真的打架。
Chinese: 体力不行也没影响的，又不是真的打架。
TraditionalChinese: 體力不行也沒影響的，又不是真的打架。
English: It's okay if you don't have lots of energy， it's not real fighting.
Great!
I can be a heroine too!

Standard: 我们小时候没有肉吃，也是靠想象啊。
Chinese: 我们小时候没有肉吃，也是靠想象啊。
TraditionalChinese: 我們小時候沒有肉吃，也是靠想像啊。
English: When we didn't have meat， we also imagined.

Standard: 天天吃红薯，你不想象一下怎么吃得下去。
Chinese: 天天吃红薯，你不想象一下怎么吃得下去。
TraditionalChinese: 天天吃紅薯，你不想像一下怎麼吃得下去。
English: Eating sweet potatoes everyday， if you can't imagine how can you do it?
Hahahaha.

Standard: 以后我得空就跟你玩，好不好？
Chinese: 以后我得空就跟你玩，好不好？
TraditionalChinese: 以後我得空就跟你玩，好不好？
English: In the future when I'm free I'll play with you， okay?
Yup!

Standard: 下回不准这么赖皮啊！你都是乱来的！
Chinese: 下回不准这么赖皮啊！你都是乱来的！
TraditionalChinese: 下回不准這麼賴皮啊！你都是亂來的！
English: Can't cheat next time! You make too many things up!
Hehehehe.

Standard: 篮球场这条街很空旷，一眼能看完。
Chinese: 篮球场这条街很空旷，一眼能看完。
TraditionalChinese: 籃球場這條街很空曠，一眼能看完。
English: This street next to the Basketball Courts is pretty open， you can see everything with a glance.

Standard: 她的钥匙应该不会掉在这里。
Chinese: 她的钥匙应该不会掉在这里。
TraditionalChinese: 她的鑰匙應該不會掉在這裏。
English: Her key probably isn't here.

Standard: 之前陪地主妹看过一个动画片，叫《机器狗》。
Chinese: 之前陪地主妹看过一个动画片，叫《机器狗》。
TraditionalChinese: 之前陪地主妹看過一個動畫片，叫《機器狗》。
English: Ah not long ago I went with the kid to watch a cartoon movie， “Robot Dog”.
They had a gadget that was a door.

Standard: 自己想好去哪里，打开门就是那个地方。
Chinese: 自己想好去哪里，打开门就是那个地方。
TraditionalChinese: 自己想好去哪里，打開門就是那個地方。
English: Once you thnk of where you want to go， you open the door and there you are.

Standard: 真有那玩意儿就好了，多方便啊。
Chinese: 真有那玩意儿就好了，多方便啊。
TraditionalChinese: 真有那玩意兒就好了，多方便啊。
English: It'd be so nice if that was real， how convenient.

Standard: 最好是能用来开车送货，绝对发大财。
Chinese: 最好是能用来开车送货，绝对发大财。
TraditionalChinese: 最好是能用來開車送貨，絕對發大財。
English: If you can use it to make deliveries， you'd make a lot of money.

Standard: 算了，别做梦了，一步一步自己走吧。
Chinese: 算了，别做梦了，一步一步自己走吧。
TraditionalChinese: 算了，別做夢了，一步一步自己走吧。
English: Bah， no time to daydream， better do it myself one step at a time.

Standard: 看地图看半天，还不如走起来。
Chinese: 看地图看半天，还不如走起来。
TraditionalChinese: 看地圖看半天，還不如走起來。
English: Instead of staring at the map， better to just start walking.

Standard: 芷滨发展得不错，该有的都有了。
Chinese: 芷滨发展得不错，该有的都有了。
TraditionalChinese: 芷濱發展得不錯，該有的都有了。
English: Zhibin's development is coming along， we have everything we're supposed to have.

Standard: 有些路好久没走过了，有的人也很久没来往。
Chinese: 有些路好久没走过了，有的人也很久没来往。
TraditionalChinese: 有些路好久沒走過了，有的人也很久沒來往。
English: Haven't walked down some streets， and haven't said hi to lots of people.

Standard: 闲逛一下也问题不大，可别忘了要做的事情。
Chinese: 闲逛一下也问题不大，可别忘了要做的事情。
TraditionalChinese: 閒逛一下也問題不大，可別忘了要做的事情。
English: Shouldn't be a big problem to wander around a bit， but still， gotta remember what I gotta do.
Daddy.
Am I holding my pencil correctly?

Standard: 张老师说我不会拿笔，写的字很难看。
Chinese: 张老师说我不会拿笔，写的字很难看。
TraditionalChinese: 張老師說我不會拿筆，寫的字很難看。
English: Teacher Zhang says I don't know how to hold a pencil， my writing is ugly.
Teacher Chen also makes me practice.
I don't understand.
My writing is bad too.

Standard: 从小你公就骂我，说我写的字是像狗爪。
Chinese: 从小你公就骂我，说我写的字是像狗爪。
TraditionalChinese: 從小你公就罵我，說我寫的字是像狗爪。
English: When I was a kid your grandpa would scold me and tell me that my writing was like a dog clawing at the ground.
Hahahahaha.
What should I do...
Ask the teachers for help， keep practicing.
Good handwriting comes from practice.
Qin Zhuoli.
Qin Zhuoli.
Qin Zhuoli.
Do you hear that?
Yeah.
Someone is calling your name?
I think...
Is someone at the door?
I'll go look.
Qin Zhuoli!
Do you see anyone?
I see Qin Zhuoli!
And someone else!
Is it her dad?
I think so.
Do ya'll see him?
Tell him to open the door!
Qin Zhuoli! Open the door!
Come play with us!
Hehehe， Uncle， open up， open up!
Xiong Xiaolong， stop moving around!
Old Huang， steady!
You're shaking!
You're too heavy!
I can't anymore!

Standard: 叔叔你好，我是茁荔的同学。
Chinese: 叔叔你好，我是茁荔的同学。
TraditionalChinese: 叔叔你好，我是茁荔的同學。
English: Hello Uncle， we're Zhuoli's classmates.
I'm Fu Yuying.
Hello.
Uncle!
Hi Li Ying.
I'm Xiong Xiaolong.

Standard: 这个是黄乐飘，我们都叫他老黄。
Chinese: 这个是黄乐飘，我们都叫他老黄。
TraditionalChinese: 這個是黃樂飄，我們都叫他老黃。
English: This is Huang Lepiao， we all call him Old Huang.
I'm not Old Huang!
Hahahahaha.
Hi everyone.

Standard: 覃茁荔，我带了波珠棋和飞行棋。
Chinese: 覃茁荔，我带了波珠棋和飞行棋。
TraditionalChinese: 覃茁荔，我帶了波珠棋和飛行棋。
English: Qin Zhuoli， I brought checkers and Aeroplane Chess.

Standard: 算上叔叔一共六个人，我们可以玩波珠棋。
Chinese: 算上叔叔一共六个人，我们可以玩波珠棋。
TraditionalChinese: 算上叔叔一共六個人，我們可以玩波珠棋。
English: With Uncle there's six of us， we can play checkers.
Checkers!?
Why don't we play checkers?
I don't want to， so childish.
What's “Childish”

Standard: 小娃仔才做的事，叫做幼稚的事。
Chinese: 小娃仔才做的事，叫做幼稚的事。
TraditionalChinese: 小娃仔才做的事，叫做幼稚的事。
English: Things children do.
So we aren't kids?
Call you Old Huang and you still don't want to admit it.
Hahahahaha.
We can play whatever.
I can watch y'all play.
Stop fighting， let's go play.
Daddy daddy!
What?

Standard: 我是不是应该去拿吃的给大家啊？
Chinese: 我是不是应该去拿吃的给大家啊？
TraditionalChinese: 我是不是應該去拿吃的給大家啊？
English: Should I bring snacks to everyone?
Got it， don't worry about it.
Dad will handle it.

Standard: 你们中午在这里吃饭，好不好？
Chinese: 你们中午在这里吃饭，好不好？
TraditionalChinese: 你們中午在這裏吃飯，好不好？
English: How about y'all just have lunch here?

Standard: 现在都十点几了，叔叔准备去买菜煮饭。
Chinese: 现在都十点几了，叔叔准备去买菜煮饭。
TraditionalChinese: 現在都十點幾了，叔叔準備去買菜煮飯。
English: It's ten something， I'll go buy stuff to make.

Standard: 你们有什么特别想吃的吗？
Chinese: 你们有什么特别想吃的吗？
TraditionalChinese: 你們有什麼特別想吃的嗎？
English: Do you have anything you want in particular?
I can buy it for you.
Anything?
Anything.
Wow- okay!
I want a shortcake!

Standard: 你怎么好意思叫叔叔买这么贵的东西！？
Chinese: 你怎么好意思叫叔叔买这么贵的东西！？
TraditionalChinese: 你怎麼好意思叫叔叔買這麼貴的東西！？
English: You don't feel shameful asking for that?!
Is it expensive?

Standard: 当然，我家只有生日的时候才吃的。
Chinese: 当然，我家只有生日的时候才吃的。
TraditionalChinese: 當然，我家只有生日的時候才吃的。
English: Of course， we only have it for birthdays at my house.

Standard: 可是叔叔自己说什么都可以的。
Chinese: 可是叔叔自己说什么都可以的。
TraditionalChinese: 可是叔叔自己說什麼都可以的。
English: But uncle said himself， anything.
They were just being polite!
Then I'm not gonna be polite!
Hahahaha.
Alright， I'll go buy it.
Do you want to sit a while?
No! I just sat there!
That rock is hot， burnt my bum!
Hahahaha.

Standard: 雪条的另一个名字，是什么？
Chinese: 雪条的另一个名字，是什么？
TraditionalChinese: 雪條的另一個名字，是什麼？
English: What's another name for Popsicle?
Ice bar?
No， something else!
What is it then?

Standard: 语文老师教过我们的！用普通话讲的！
Chinese: 语文老师教过我们的！用普通话讲的！
TraditionalChinese: 語文老師教過我們的！用普通話講的！
English: We learned it in class! In Standard Chinese!

Standard: 电视里也有播，可是我想不起来了……
Chinese: 电视里也有播，可是我想不起来了……
TraditionalChinese: 電視裏也有播，可是我想不起來了……
English: It's on TV too， but I don't remember.
Oh! I know!
I've seen that commercial!
“Kid Ice!”
“Frosty Kid Ice!”
Not Kiddo Ice Cream?
Ice cream， not kid ice.

Standard: 老师说，雪糕和雪条都可以叫冰激凌。
Chinese: 老师说，雪糕和雪条都可以叫冰激凌。
TraditionalChinese: 老師說，雪糕和雪條都可以叫冰激淩。
English: Teacher said， Popsicle， Ice bar， can all be called Ice cream.
Yeah， it's ice cream I remember now.
....Yeah， I was just thinking it's ice cream.
Old Huang， your'e really old.
You can mess up a few words.
...I didn't!
Hahahaha!
Frosty Kid Ice!
Uncle， do you want candy?
Nah， all yours.
Why do you have candy?

Standard: 刚才小卖部奶奶给的，是赠品。
Chinese: 刚才小卖部奶奶给的，是赠品。
TraditionalChinese: 剛才小賣部奶奶給的，是贈品。
English: Oh， the Granny at the small store gave it to me， said it was a giveaway.
What's a giveaway?
When you buy something you get something.
Buy ice cream， get candy.
Not a giveaway.

Standard: 桃子奶奶喜欢小朋友，特意送给你们吃的。
Chinese: 桃子奶奶喜欢小朋友，特意送给你们吃的。
TraditionalChinese: 桃子奶奶喜歡小朋友，特意送給你們吃的。
English: Granny Taozi likes kids， she sent it over just for you all.
Then how come you didn't give me any.

Standard: 我们是娃仔，应该先给叔叔选。
Chinese: 我们是娃仔，应该先给叔叔选。
TraditionalChinese: 我們是娃仔，應該先給叔叔選。
English: We're kids， we should let uncle pick first.
Konglong passes the pear， do you understand?
What Konglong?
Konglong passes the pear， the story.

Standard: 恐龙跟它哥哥吃梨子，总是把大的让给它哥。
Chinese: 恐龙跟它哥哥吃梨子，总是把大的让给它哥。
TraditionalChinese: 恐龍跟它哥哥吃梨子，總是把大的讓給它哥。
English: Konglong was eating pears with their brother， and always gave their brother the bigger one.
Respect your elders， got it?
You mean Kong Rong right?

Standard: 对啊，孔融是一个人，不是恐龙。
Chinese: 对啊，孔融是一个人，不是恐龙。
TraditionalChinese: 對啊，孔融是一個人，不是恐龍。
English: Yeah， Kong Rong is a person， not a dinosaur.
Hahahaha.
What are you doing?
Opening a daycare?

Standard: 地主妹的同学，来家里找她玩。
Chinese: 地主妹的同学，来家里找她玩。
TraditionalChinese: 地主妹的同學，來家裏找她玩。
English: Kid's classmates， came over to play.
Played all day.

Standard: 我带他们出来吃雪条，商量接下来要去哪里。
Chinese: 我带他们出来吃雪条，商量接下来要去哪里。
TraditionalChinese: 我帶他們出來吃雪條，商量接下來要去哪里。
English: I brought them out for ice cream， now we're discussing what to do next.

Standard: 我们玩捉迷藏吧！这么多人！
Chinese: 我们玩捉迷藏吧！这么多人！
TraditionalChinese: 我們玩捉迷藏吧！這麼多人！
English: Let's play hide and seek! So many people!
Ah but Qin Zhuoli can't run around.
She can't do lots of exercise.
Oh yeah， then what?
Don't worry， ya'll go ahead.
No， we play together.
Yeah.
If you can't play we won't play.
No...
What's so hard?

Standard: 荔荔不能跑，叫你老头背着你不就行了吗？
Chinese: 荔荔不能跑，叫你老头背着你不就行了吗？
TraditionalChinese: 荔荔不能跑，叫你老頭背著你不就行了嗎？
English: If Lili can't run around， get your old man to carry you， right?
Oh yeah!
Uncle you have to walk for Lili!
Then she doesn't have to run around!
Yea yeah!

Standard: 叔叔背着茁荔，带她到躲起来的地方。
Chinese: 叔叔背着茁荔，带她到躲起来的地方。
TraditionalChinese: 叔叔背著茁荔，帶她到躲起來的地方。
English: Uncle carries Zhuoli to where she wants to hide if she's not it.

Standard: 如果是茁荔做鬼，就带她去找我们。
Chinese: 如果是茁荔做鬼，就带她去找我们。
TraditionalChinese: 如果是茁荔做鬼，就帶她去找我們。
English: If she is it， then he'll carry her to find us.

Standard: 叔叔，那你按覃茁荔的指挥走就好啦！
Chinese: 叔叔，那你按覃茁荔的指挥走就好啦！
TraditionalChinese: 叔叔，那你按覃茁荔的指揮走就好啦！
English: Uncle， you just follow Qin Zhuoli's commands!
Dad...
Sure.
Where do we want to play?
Come to my factory.
Lots of places， hide wherever.
It's not dangerous with all the equipment?

Standard: 这段时间没订单，好久都没开机了。
Chinese: 这段时间没订单，好久都没开机了。
TraditionalChinese: 這段時間沒訂單，好久都沒開機了。
English: No one's made any orders lately， nothing's turned on.
Plus there's other workers， don't worry.
You want to play too?
Yeah I want to play!
I'm an expert!
Hahahaha.
Rock， paper， scissors!

Standard: 哈哈，茁荔第一把就要当鬼。
Chinese: 哈哈，茁荔第一把就要当鬼。
TraditionalChinese: 哈哈，茁荔第一把就要當鬼。
English: Haha， Zhuoli has to be it the first round.
Dad， what do we do?
Don't worry， it's easy to be it.
Watch me find all of them.
Uncle you can't sell us out.
Qin Zhuoli has to find us herself.
Old Huang， you're competitive.
Okay Uncle， we're off to hide.
You be careful.

Standard: 莫搞摸我的东西，弄坏了要你们父母赔。
Chinese: 莫搞摸我的东西，弄坏了要你们父母赔。
TraditionalChinese: 莫搞摸我的東西，弄壞了要你們父母賠。
English: Don't break my stuff， if you do I'll make your parents  pay for it.
Dad.

Standard: 这里地方好大，东西好多！
Chinese: 这里地方好大，东西好多！
TraditionalChinese: 這裏地方好大，東西好多！
English: This place is huge， so many things!
Don't worry， don't get nervous

Standard: 藏着人的地方，多多少少会有点古怪。
Chinese: 藏着人的地方，多多少少会有点古怪。
TraditionalChinese: 藏著人的地方，多多少少會有點古怪。
English: If it looks suspicious， someone is probably hiding there.

Standard: 只要你认真观察，就能发现他们藏在哪里。
Chinese: 只要你认真观察，就能发现他们藏在哪里。
TraditionalChinese: 只要你認真觀察，就能發現他們藏在哪里。
English: If you look closely you can find where they're hiding.
Yeah， I'll find them!
I want to keep playing.
We should go home for dinner.
If we go back too late mom and dad will get worried.

Standard: 我也是够背时了，玩了六局当了三局鬼。
Chinese: 我也是够背时了，玩了六局当了三局鬼。
TraditionalChinese: 我也是夠背時了，玩了六局當了三局鬼。
English: Man， I'm so unlucky， 3 out of 6 rounds I was it.
Haha， unlucky dog.
Hahahaha.
Let's find a different place to play next time.
We found all the hiding spots here.

Standard: 嗯，或者不玩捉迷藏，玩点别的。
Chinese: 嗯，或者不玩捉迷藏，玩点别的。
TraditionalChinese: 嗯，或者不玩捉迷藏，玩點別的。
English: Or we can play something else.
How about Cat and Mouse?
Cat and Mouse?

Standard: 上次你做猫，大半天都抓不到一个人。
Chinese: 上次你做猫，大半天都抓不到一个人。
TraditionalChinese: 上次你做貓，大半天都抓不到一個人。
English: The last time you were the Cat you couldn't catch anyone.
Then you got so upset you went hom.
...I didn't know how to play then.
It's not that you didn't know how to play， you are just slow.

Standard: 叔叔背着覃茁荔都跑得比你快。
Chinese: 叔叔背着覃茁荔都跑得比你快。
TraditionalChinese: 叔叔背著覃茁荔都跑得比你快。
English: Even if Uncle was carrying Qin Zhuoli he'd still run faster than you.
Hahahahaha.
Come invite Zhuoli to play often in the future.
I can play any game with you all.
Okay!
Zhuoli， what's that you're carrying?

Standard: 阿爸买的丫丫星，还有小白兔糖。
Chinese: 阿爸买的丫丫星，还有小白兔糖。
TraditionalChinese: 阿爸買的丫丫星，還有小白兔糖。
English: Lollipops my dad got， and white rabbit candy.
Let's have it together!
Wow! Lollipops!
Hey.
Hey， Ah Nan.
It's Gexi.
Oh， Bro Ah Xi， what's up?
Next Saturday there's a big event.
Dragon Boat?
Yeah， 2 in the afternoon.

Standard: 各个镇的龙舟队在江边集合，祭龙，起水。
Chinese: 各个镇的龙舟队在江边集合，祭龙，起水。
TraditionalChinese: 各個鎮的龍舟隊在江邊集合，祭龍，起水。
English: Everyone's Dragon Boat team will meet next to the river， do the Dragon Ritual， and start prepping the boats.

Standard: 然后开会，领导讲话，公布赛程安排。
Chinese: 然后开会，领导讲话，公布赛程安排。
TraditionalChinese: 然後開會，領導講話，公佈賽程安排。
English: Then we'll meet， the leaders will give a speech， and talk about the race.

Standard: 最后就是下水划龙舟，来回一次，讨个吉利。
Chinese: 最后就是下水划龙舟，来回一次，讨个吉利。
TraditionalChinese: 最後就是下水劃龍舟，來回一次，討個吉利。
English: After， we'll have the race， we'll do one lap， for posterity.

Standard: 然后就没了，等端午节正式比赛。
Chinese: 然后就没了，等端午节正式比赛。
TraditionalChinese: 然後就沒了，等端午節正式比賽。
English: Then that's it until the official race on Duan Wu.
Got it.

Standard: 没有什么做的，你可以带上荔荔。
Chinese: 没有什么做的，你可以带上荔荔。
TraditionalChinese: 沒有什麼做的，你可以帶上荔荔。
English: Nothing you have to do， you can bring Lili.
Just have a small vacation.
Alright， thank you.
Ye Dongxi!
Here!
Chen Dehua!
Here!
Get the boat! Get the boat!
What boat! We have to pray first!
Qin Munan， hold your had steady!
Be a man! What are you afraid of?
Are you a baby?
Shut up!
Ah!
Dad， run!
Should we sing first?
Yeah， we have to sing for the ritual.
I can't sing.

Standard: 前两天刘主任不是才刚培训过！
Chinese: 前两天刘主任不是才刚培训过！
TraditionalChinese: 前兩天劉主任不是才剛培訓過！
English: Didn't Director Liu do some training two days ago?

Standard: 就唱那几次，哪有这么快学会！
Chinese: 就唱那几次，哪有这么快学会！
TraditionalChinese: 就唱那幾次，哪有這麼快學會！
English: Just those few times， how can anyone learn it so fast?
What do we do now?
I don't know.

Standard: 地主妹，你记得哪样唱咩？
Chinese: 地主妹，你记得哪样唱咩？
TraditionalChinese: 地主妹，你記得哪樣唱咩？
English: Kid， do you remember how it goes?
I remember.
Then you start.

Standard: 不怕的，这些叔叔阿姨你都认识。
Chinese: 不怕的，这些叔叔阿姨你都认识。
TraditionalChinese: 不怕的，這些叔叔阿姨你都認識。
English: Don't worry， you know all these uncles and aunties.
Don't be shy.
Oh.

Standard: 果园那条路也没什么，我觉得不会是那里。
Chinese: 果园那条路也没什么，我觉得不会是那里。
TraditionalChinese: 果園那條路也沒什麼，我覺得不會是那裏。
English: There's nothing there on the road to the orchard， I don't think it's there.
That road next to the storage facility is pretty empty.

Standard: 如果钥匙掉在那附近，应该挺好发现的。
Chinese: 如果钥匙掉在那附近，应该挺好发现的。
TraditionalChinese: 如果鑰匙掉在那附近，應該挺好發現的。
English: If the key is there it should be easy to find.
The rail is most troublesome.

Standard: 草又多，路又烂，还有条铁轨。
Chinese: 草又多，路又烂，还有条铁轨。
TraditionalChinese: 草又多，路又爛，還有條鐵軌。
English: So many weeds， the road conditions are bad， and there's the rail.

Standard: 每个位置都有可能藏着那条钥匙。
Chinese: 每个位置都有可能藏着那条钥匙。
TraditionalChinese: 每個位置都有可能藏著那條鑰匙。
English: The key could be anywhere there.

Standard: 邮局是岔路口，也蛮有可能会掉在这段路。
Chinese: 邮局是岔路口，也蛮有可能会掉在这段路。
TraditionalChinese: 郵局是岔路口，也蠻有可能會掉在這段路。
English: There's the post office intersection， could be there.

Standard: 桥头那段路破破烂烂，得看得仔细点。
Chinese: 桥头那段路破破烂烂，得看得仔细点。
TraditionalChinese: 橋頭那段路破破爛爛，得看得仔細點。
English: The area near the bridge is has lots of junk， should search  there carefully.

Standard: 酒楼这条街，虽然也是岔路口。
Chinese: 酒楼这条街，虽然也是岔路口。
TraditionalChinese: 酒樓這條街，雖然也是岔路口。
English: The hotel street， even though it's an intersection.

Standard: 但是我有直觉她的钥匙不会落在这里。
Chinese: 但是我有直觉她的钥匙不会落在这里。
TraditionalChinese: 但是我有直覺她的鑰匙不會落在這裏。
English: But my gut tells me her key wouldn't be here.

Standard: 畜牧站靠近人家村口，丢在这里很难找了。
Chinese: 畜牧站靠近人家村口，丢在这里很难找了。
TraditionalChinese: 畜牧站靠近人家村口，丟在這裏很難找了。
English: The Agriculture Department is near the town entrance， it's gonna be hard to find there.

Standard: ……这娃仔还去桥底，这种地方最难搞啦。
Chinese: ……这娃仔还去桥底，这种地方最难搞啦。
TraditionalChinese: ……這娃仔還去橋底，這種地方最難搞啦。
English: ...This kid ran under the bridge， that's the hardest part to search.
How am I supposed to find a key in all those rocks.

Standard: 中学门口全是泥巴地，要考眼力咯。
Chinese: 中学门口全是泥巴地，要考眼力咯。
TraditionalChinese: 中學門口全是泥巴地，要考眼力咯。
English: The middle school entrance is all muddy， testing my eyesight.

Standard: 供销社和医院人也多，希望她钥匙没掉这里。
Chinese: 供销社和医院人也多，希望她钥匙没掉这里。
TraditionalChinese: 供銷社和醫院人也多，希望她鑰匙沒掉這裏。
English: The co op and hospital has lots of people moving through， hope she didn't lose it there.
Otherwise someone's gonna pick it up.

Standard: 派出所这条街人流倒是不太多。
Chinese: 派出所这条街人流倒是不太多。
TraditionalChinese: 派出所這條街人流倒是不太多。
English: Not many people near the police station.
The key would be easy to find here.

Standard: 礼堂门口人来人往的，旁边还有公交车站。
Chinese: 礼堂门口人来人往的，旁边还有公交车站。
TraditionalChinese: 禮堂門口人來人往的，旁邊還有公車站。
English: The Assembly hall has lots of people moving in and out， there's a bus station next to it as well.

Standard: 掉在这段路就麻烦咯，容易被踢到不知哪儿去。
Chinese: 掉在这段路就麻烦咯，容易被踢到不知哪儿去。
TraditionalChinese: 掉在這段路就麻煩咯，容易被踢到不知哪兒去。
English: If it's lost here then that'll be a problem， who knows who may have kicked it somewhere.

Standard: 今天来看电影的人明显比平时多。
Chinese: 今天来看电影的人明显比平时多。
TraditionalChinese: 今天來看電影的人明顯比平時多。
English: Looks like more people than usual coming to watch a movie.

Standard: 陈大哥的动作片还是很受欢迎的。
Chinese: 陈大哥的动作片还是很受欢迎的。
TraditionalChinese: 陳大哥的動作片還是很受歡迎的。
English: Brother Chen's action films are pretty popular.
He looks great in action， and it's fun.

Standard: 这个女主角唱歌好听，演戏也有模有样的。
Chinese: 这个女主角唱歌好听，演戏也有模有样的。
TraditionalChinese: 這個女主角唱歌好聽，演戲也有模有樣的。
English: The female lead is good at singing and acting too.

Standard: 里面街道追逐那一段，相当过瘾。
Chinese: 里面街道追逐那一段，相当过瘾。
TraditionalChinese: 裏面街道追逐那一段，相當過癮。
English: There's that alleyway chase scene that's super intense.

Standard: 还可以看到外国是什么样子的。
Chinese: 还可以看到外国是什么样子的。
TraditionalChinese: 還可以看到外國是什麼樣子的。
English: You can see what it's like in another country too.

Standard: 听讲拍这部电影，成本要一个亿。
Chinese: 听讲拍这部电影，成本要一个亿。
TraditionalChinese: 聽講拍這部電影，成本要一個億。
English: I heard it costs at least 100 Million to make this movie.

Standard: 决心要让陈大哥在国外打响名堂。
Chinese: 决心要让陈大哥在国外打响名堂。
TraditionalChinese: 決心要讓陳大哥在國外打響名堂。
English: They're definitely trying to make Brother Chen a big name abroad.

Standard: 而且它在国内的票房也不错。
Chinese: 而且它在国内的票房也不错。
TraditionalChinese: 而且它在國內的票房也不錯。
English: It's doing good here too.
Hey.

Standard: 快点去帮这个娃仔找钥匙啊。
Chinese: 快点去帮这个娃仔找钥匙啊。
TraditionalChinese: 快點去幫這個娃仔找鑰匙啊。
English: Hurry up and find the kid's key.
Otherwise she can't go anywhere.
Ah Nan!
Huh? Did you just come back?
Yeah， we took a long distance bus.

Standard: 直接到外头的公路口，再走路回来。
Chinese: 直接到外头的公路口，再走路回来。
TraditionalChinese: 直接到外頭的公路口，再走路回來。
English: Straight to the big street right at the edge of town， then we walked here.

Standard: 叫台三马不行吗？摩托也可以啊。
Chinese: 叫台三马不行吗？摩托也可以啊。
TraditionalChinese: 叫臺三馬不行嗎？摩托也可以啊。
English: Couldn't call for a horse pulled cart? A motorcycle would work too.
So many things.
Your old man can't bring himself to spend money.
What are you talking about， walking is exercise.

Standard: 我是无所谓的，就背了两套衣服。
Chinese: 我是无所谓的，就背了两套衣服。
TraditionalChinese: 我是無所謂的，就背了兩套衣服。
English: I'm fine， I just have some extra clothes.
He's carrying everything.
What's that? Booze?
No， just water.
You hauled water back from Guangdong?
Heh， I said that too.
It's mountain spring water， good for you!

Standard: 我特意去蓝天山最偏僻的那个山涧里取的！
Chinese: 我特意去蓝天山最偏僻的那个山涧里取的！
TraditionalChinese: 我特意去藍天山最偏僻的那個山澗裏取的！
English: I sent to Lantian Mountain's most secluded area to get the water.

Standard: 那种地方路都没一条，我连走带爬用了半天！
Chinese: 那种地方路都没一条，我连走带爬用了半天！
TraditionalChinese: 那種地方路都沒一條，我連走帶爬用了半天！
English: There's no trail there， it took me half a day to get there!
It'd be a waste to leave it.
Why didn't you finish it before leaving?
I tried! Couldn't make it in time.

Standard: 出门之前灌了快三升，喝不下了。
Chinese: 出门之前灌了快三升，喝不下了。
TraditionalChinese: 出門之前灌了快三升，喝不下了。
English: I drank almost three liters befroe leaving， couldn't drink anymore.

Standard: 等车的时候去了十几回厕所。
Chinese: 等车的时候去了十几回厕所。
TraditionalChinese: 等車的時候去了十幾回廁所。
English: Then when I was waiting I went to the bathroom dozens of times.
Then what's with the outfit.
It's something.
Ah， let's not talk about it.
Your old man loves to argue.

Standard: 我在家照顾小妹，他就天天出去逛街。
Chinese: 我在家照顾小妹，他就天天出去逛街。
TraditionalChinese: 我在家照顧小妹，他就天天出去逛街。
English: I'm taking care of your sister at home， he goes out everyday.

Standard: 你妹夫他弟不是当导游的吗？
Chinese: 你妹夫他弟不是当导游的吗？
TraditionalChinese: 你妹夫他弟不是當導遊的嗎？
English: Your sister in law's brother， he's a tour guide.

Standard: 给他弄了一套旅行团的服装。
Chinese: 给他弄了一套旅行团的服装。
TraditionalChinese: 給他弄了一套旅行團的服裝。
English: He got him some tour outfits.

Standard: 还送了他一个运动包，一个墨镜。
Chinese: 还送了他一个运动包，一个墨镜。
TraditionalChinese: 還送了他一個運動包，一個墨鏡。
English: Gifted him a duffle bag， sunglasses.

Standard: 他最喜欢这个墨镜啦，睡觉都戴着。
Chinese: 他最喜欢这个墨镜啦，睡觉都戴着。
TraditionalChinese: 他最喜歡這個墨鏡啦，睡覺都戴著。
English: He loves those sunglasses， wears them to sleep.
You got a lot of stuff then this trip.

Standard: 读万卷书，行万里路，懂咩？
Chinese: 读万卷书，行万里路，懂咩？
TraditionalChinese: 讀萬卷書，行萬裏路，懂咩？
English: Read ten thousand books， walk ten thousand miles， do you get it?

Standard: 不去接触新事物，哪样了解时代的发展？
Chinese: 不去接触新事物，哪样了解时代的发展？
TraditionalChinese: 不去接觸新事物，哪樣瞭解時代的發展？
English: If you don't experience new things how do you understand the changing times?
I'm too lazy to argue.
Where are you going now?
Oh， going to the credit union to make a deposit.
Then pick up the kid from school.

Standard: 我们一起去吧，好久没接过她了。
Chinese: 我们一起去吧，好久没接过她了。
TraditionalChinese: 我們一起去吧，好久沒接過她了。
English: Let's go together， it's been a while since we got to pick her up.
It's okay， I'll go myself.

Standard: 你穿成这样子，我怕她挨同学笑。
Chinese: 你穿成这样子，我怕她挨同学笑。
TraditionalChinese: 你穿成這樣子，我怕她挨同學笑。
English: I worry her classmates will make fun of her with the way you're dressed.

Standard: 你这种人，年纪轻轻，思想狭隘得很。
Chinese: 你这种人，年纪轻轻，思想狭隘得很。
TraditionalChinese: 你這種人，年紀輕輕，思想狹隘得很。
English: Not very open minded for a young man your age.
Hahaha.
Then I'll make sure food's ready when you get home.

Standard: 之前陪地主妹看过一个动画片，叫《机器狗》。
Chinese: 之前陪地主妹看过一个动画片，叫《机器狗》。
TraditionalChinese: 之前陪地主妹看過一個動畫片，叫《機器狗》。
English: Ah not long ago I went with the kid to watch a cartoon movie， “Robot Dog”.
They had a gadget that was a door.

Standard: 自己想好去哪里，打开门就是那个地方。
Chinese: 自己想好去哪里，打开门就是那个地方。
TraditionalChinese: 自己想好去哪里，打開門就是那個地方。
English: Once you thnk of where you want to go， you open the door and there you are.

Standard: 真有那玩意儿就好了，多方便啊。
Chinese: 真有那玩意儿就好了，多方便啊。
TraditionalChinese: 真有那玩意兒就好了，多方便啊。
English: It'd be so nice if that was real， how convenient.

Standard: 最好是能用来开车送货，绝对发大财。
Chinese: 最好是能用来开车送货，绝对发大财。
TraditionalChinese: 最好是能用來開車送貨，絕對發大財。
English: If you can use it to make deliveries， you'd make a lot of money.

Standard: 算了，别做梦了，一步一步自己走吧。
Chinese: 算了，别做梦了，一步一步自己走吧。
TraditionalChinese: 算了，別做夢了，一步一步自己走吧。
English: Bah， no time to daydream， better do it myself one step at a time.

Standard: 看地图看半天，还不如走起来。
Chinese: 看地图看半天，还不如走起来。
TraditionalChinese: 看地圖看半天，還不如走起來。
English: Instead of staring at the map， better to just start walking.

Standard: 芷滨发展得不错，该有的都有了。
Chinese: 芷滨发展得不错，该有的都有了。
TraditionalChinese: 芷濱發展得不錯，該有的都有了。
English: Zhibin's development is coming along， we have everything we're supposed to have.

Standard: 有些路好久没走过了，有的人也很久没来往。
Chinese: 有些路好久没走过了，有的人也很久没来往。
TraditionalChinese: 有些路好久沒走過了，有的人也很久沒來往。
English: Haven't walked down some streets， and haven't said hi to lots of people.

Standard: 闲逛一下也问题不大，可别忘了要做的事情。
Chinese: 闲逛一下也问题不大，可别忘了要做的事情。
TraditionalChinese: 閒逛一下也問題不大，可別忘了要做的事情。
English: Shouldn't be a big problem to wander around a bit， but still， gotta remember what I gotta do.
Oh， Grandma and Grandpa are back?
Then you don't need to be so tired.
Should be able to relax a bit.

Standard: 不过接下来我还是打算自己来接她。
Chinese: 不过接下来我还是打算自己来接她。
TraditionalChinese: 不過接下來我還是打算自己來接她。
English: But I still plan on coming to pick her up myself.

Standard: 她都习惯了，免得她又以为我丢下她。
Chinese: 她都习惯了，免得她又以为我丢下她。
TraditionalChinese: 她都習慣了，免得她又以為我丟下她。
English: She's used to it， otherwise she will think I abandoned her again.
That's the best.

Standard: 哪个娃仔不想父亲留在身边？
Chinese: 哪个娃仔不想父亲留在身边？
TraditionalChinese: 哪個娃仔不想父親留在身邊？
English: What kid doesn't want their dad?

Standard: 我们几姐弟小的时候，没有什么所谓的童年。
Chinese: 我们几姐弟小的时候，没有什么所谓的童年。
TraditionalChinese: 我們幾姐弟小的時候，沒有什麼所謂的童年。
English: When my sister and I were kids， there was no so called childhood.

Standard: 我出生那阵子我爸经常不在家。
Chinese: 我出生那阵子我爸经常不在家。
TraditionalChinese: 我出生那陣子我爸經常不在家。
English: When I was born， my dad wasn't home often.

Standard: 我姐只能休学照顾我，那时候她才八岁。
Chinese: 我姐只能休学照顾我，那时候她才八岁。
TraditionalChinese: 我姐只能休學照顧我，那時候她才八歲。
English: So my sister had to quit school to take care of me， she was only eight.

Standard: 我爸调回矿区前，我在好几个亲人家生活过。
Chinese: 我爸调回矿区前，我在好几个亲人家生活过。
TraditionalChinese: 我爸調回礦區前，我在好幾個親人家生活過。
English: Before my dad moved back to the mining district， I lived in so many relatives' houses.

Standard: 我妈、外婆、外公再婚的老婆，都带过我。
Chinese: 我妈、外婆、外公再婚的老婆，都带过我。
TraditionalChinese: 我媽、外婆、外公再婚的老婆，都帶過我。
English: My mom， grandma， grandpa's second wife， all raised me.

Standard: 不但没机会见到我爸，从小还要做各种活路。
Chinese: 不但没机会见到我爸，从小还要做各种活路。
TraditionalChinese: 不但沒機會見到我爸，從小還要做各種活路。
English: But I never saw my dad often， I had to take odd jobs too.
Thinking back on it， it was pretty rough.
I don't want Qin Zhuoli to be like that.

Standard: 我爸根本就从来没管过我们。
Chinese: 我爸根本就从来没管过我们。
TraditionalChinese: 我爸根本就從來沒管過我們。
English: My dad never really cared for us.

Standard: 我跟他，可以说是完全没有一点感情的。
Chinese: 我跟他，可以说是完全没有一点感情的。
TraditionalChinese: 我跟他，可以說是完全沒有一點感情的。
English: Me and him， we can say there's nothing there.

Standard: 上一代跟这一代，情况不毕竟太一样。
Chinese: 上一代跟这一代，情况不毕竟太一样。
TraditionalChinese: 上一代跟這一代，情況不畢竟太一樣。
English: Last generation and this generation， there's so much difference.
It's understandable.
No， it's not a matter of objectivity.
It's entirely on my dad.

Standard: 爱喝酒，脾气非常差，动不动就打人。
Chinese: 爱喝酒，脾气非常差，动不动就打人。
TraditionalChinese: 愛喝酒，脾氣非常差，動不動就打人。
English: He likes to drink， has a bad temper， likes to hit people for no reason.

Standard: 谁去劝他，就连劝架的也一起打了。
Chinese: 谁去劝他，就连劝架的也一起打了。
TraditionalChinese: 誰去勸他，就連勸架的也一起打了。
English: Whomever tries to talk him down， gets hit too.

Standard: 我妈怕我们会挨他打，就送我们去婆家。
Chinese: 我妈怕我们会挨他打，就送我们去婆家。
TraditionalChinese: 我媽怕我們會挨他打，就送我們去婆家。
English: My mom was afraid we'll get beat， so she sent us to back to her parents.

Standard: 她自己留下来跟他住，还要咬着牙伺候他。
Chinese: 她自己留下来跟他住，还要咬着牙伺候他。
TraditionalChinese: 她自己留下來跟他住，還要咬著牙伺候他。
English: She stayed back with him and had to deal with him.

Standard: 不过他压根就不在意，我们走了也没察觉。
Chinese: 不过他压根就不在意，我们走了也没察觉。
TraditionalChinese: 不過他壓根就不在意，我們走了也沒察覺。
English: But he never cared， and didn't even notice after we lelft.

Standard: 我们长大以后，都只想离开这个家。
Chinese: 我们长大以后，都只想离开这个家。
TraditionalChinese: 我們長大以後，都只想離開這個家。
English: When we grew up， we just wanted to leave.

Standard: 巴不得早点参加工作，早点搬出去住。
Chinese: 巴不得早点参加工作，早点搬出去住。
TraditionalChinese: 巴不得早點參加工作，早點搬出去住。
English: We wanted to get jobs soon so we can move out.

Standard: 我跟我对象调到芷滨，就把我妈接过来。
Chinese: 我跟我对象调到芷滨，就把我妈接过来。
TraditionalChinese: 我跟我對象調到芷濱，就把我媽接過來。
English: I moved to Zhibin with my spouse， and brought my mom over.

Standard: 我们家就像树上的鸟，能飞的全都飞走了。
Chinese: 我们家就像树上的鸟，能飞的全都飞走了。
TraditionalChinese: 我們家就像樹上的鳥，能飛的全都飛走了。
English: We're like birds in a tree， we flew away as soon as we could.

Standard: 只剩下光溜溜的树枝，和那一只叫父亲的鸟。
Chinese: 只剩下光溜溜的树枝，和那一只叫父亲的鸟。
TraditionalChinese: 只剩下光溜溜的樹枝，和那一只叫父親的鳥。
English: Just leaving that bald branch， and the bird named father.
Oh...then I'm luckier than you.
My relationship with my parents isn't bad.
Oh， sorry!

Standard: 抱怨起来没完没了的，讲了这么多没用的话。
Chinese: 抱怨起来没完没了的，讲了这么多没用的话。
TraditionalChinese: 抱怨起來沒完沒了的，講了這麼多沒用的話。
English: I started complaining and just kept going.
Mister Qin， please understand.
It's fine.
Just chatting， yeah?

Standard: 我是因为看到你和茁荔这样，突然有感而发。
Chinese: 我是因为看到你和茁荔这样，突然有感而发。
TraditionalChinese: 我是因為看到你和茁荔這樣，突然有感而發。
English: I just started to talk because of seeing you and Zhuoli.

Standard: 当了好几年老师，见过不少家长。
Chinese: 当了好几年老师，见过不少家长。
TraditionalChinese: 當了好幾年老師，見過不少家長。
English: I've been a techer for many years， seen lots of parents.

Standard: 不负责任的是极少数，大部分是关心娃仔的。
Chinese: 不负责任的是极少数，大部分是关心娃仔的。
TraditionalChinese: 不負責任的是極少數，大部分是關心娃仔的。
English: The irresponsible ones are few and far between， most care about the kids.

Standard: 但是有想法是一回事，具体去做又是一回事。
Chinese: 但是有想法是一回事，具体去做又是一回事。
TraditionalChinese: 但是有想法是一回事，具體去做又是一回事。
English: But thinking is one thing， doing is another.
The ones who can actually do it， not many.
Mister Qin.
You're doing great!

Standard: 有你这样的父亲，茁荔一定会越来越好的！
Chinese: 有你这样的父亲，茁荔一定会越来越好的！
TraditionalChinese: 有你這樣的父親，茁荔一定會越來越好的！
English: With a father like you， Zhuoli will get better and better!
You both have to work hard!
Yeah， I'll keep trying.
Thank you， Teacher Chen.
What is it?
Hardcover notebook.
School wants us to write a diary.

Standard: 我正好看到那个本子，就写在里面了。
Chinese: 我正好看到那个本子，就写在里面了。
TraditionalChinese: 我正好看到那個本子，就寫在裏面了。
English: I saw this book， so I wrote in it.
Where'd you put it?

Standard: 我昨晚写完，放在书桌抽屉里。
Chinese: 我昨晚写完，放在书桌抽屉里。
TraditionalChinese: 我昨晚寫完，放在書桌抽屜裏。
English: I put it in my drawer after I finished my assignments.
It's not an assignment， I don't have to turn it in.

Standard: 我都是写的时候才会拿出来的。
Chinese: 我都是写的时候才会拿出来的。
TraditionalChinese: 我都是寫的時候才會拿出來的。
English: I only take it out when I'm done with my assignments.
You still lost it?
Did a dog get it?

Standard: 可是它今天出不去啊，我锁着门的。
Chinese: 可是它今天出不去啊，我锁着门的。
TraditionalChinese: 可是它今天出不去啊，我鎖著門的。
English: But there's no way， I locked the door.
Anyone touch her things?
...I didn't.

Standard: 我都没进去过她房间，回来到现在。
Chinese: 我都没进去过她房间，回来到现在。
TraditionalChinese: 我都沒進去過她房間，回來到現在。
English: I haven't been to her room since we got back.
Strange.
(What's that sound?)
...Dad?
What did you do?
...Found it!
It was at the top of the closet!

Standard: 你看，就是红字那本！掉地上了！
Chinese: 你看，就是红字那本！掉地上了！
TraditionalChinese: 你看，就是紅字那本！掉地上了！
English: See， it's that red one! It's on the floor!
...Did you do it?
...Did she put it up there herself?
Why'd you put it away?
I didn't do it on purpose.

Standard: 今天你们没回到，你妈叫我打扫卫生。
Chinese: 今天你们没回到，你妈叫我打扫卫生。
TraditionalChinese: 今天你們沒回到，你媽叫我打掃衛生。
English: Your mom told me to clean up before you two came back.
So I thought I'd put things away.

Standard: 平时我也会放点资料和本子在她抽屉的。
Chinese: 平时我也会放点资料和本子在她抽屉的。
TraditionalChinese: 平時我也會放點資料和本子在她抽屜的。
English: Normally I would put some notebooks and stuff in her drawer.

Standard: 我哪想得到她会用来写日记咧？
Chinese: 我哪想得到她会用来写日记咧？
TraditionalChinese: 我哪想得到她會用來寫日記咧？
English: I didn't think she'd use this to write a diary.
So when i was cleaning I just grabbed everything.
Then how come you didn't admit when I asked?
It's embarrassing.
You wanted to put it back stealthily?
Yeah.
You are so shameless.
Lying to kids.
I didn't.
This is called playing by ear.
That's how it is.
Sorry， Lili.
Grandpa shouldn't have lied.

Standard: 不过你放心，我没偷看你写的日记。
Chinese: 不过你放心，我没偷看你写的日记。
TraditionalChinese: 不過你放心，我沒偷看你寫的日記。
English: Don't worry， I didn't read your diary.
It's okay.

Standard: 我也没有问你，就用了你的笔记本。
Chinese: 我也没有问你，就用了你的笔记本。
TraditionalChinese: 我也沒有問你，就用了你的筆記本。
English: I didn't ask you and used your notebook.

Standard: 我不知道那个是你工作时候的奖品。
Chinese: 我不知道那个是你工作时候的奖品。
TraditionalChinese: 我不知道那個是你工作時候的獎品。
English: I didn't know it was a reward from when you were working.
Sorry， Grandpa.
No worries， use it however you want!

Standard: 阿公以前是优秀职工，这种东西大把多。
Chinese: 阿公以前是优秀职工，这种东西大把多。
TraditionalChinese: 阿公以前是優秀職工，這種東西大把多。
English: I used to be a great worker， I have lots of these things.

Standard: 什么水杯啊，水壶啊，本子啊。
Chinese: 什么水杯啊，水壶啊，本子啊。
TraditionalChinese: 什麼水杯啊，水壺啊，本子啊。
English: Mugs， cups， kettles， books.
When you're finished， come tell me， there's more!
Thanks Grandpa!
No need to thank me.
Whatever else you need just tell me!

Standard: 荔荔情绪稳定了很多，性格也变开朗了。
Chinese: 荔荔情绪稳定了很多，性格也变开朗了。
TraditionalChinese: 荔荔情緒穩定了很多，性格也變開朗了。
English: Lili's more calm these days and is happier too.
I was worried she would start crying.
She's starting to pay attention in school too.

Standard: 放学回来主动问我怎么打算盘。
Chinese: 放学回来主动问我怎么打算盘。
TraditionalChinese: 放學回來主動問我怎麼打算盤。
English: When we came back she asked me how to use an abacus.

Standard: 而且态度非常的认真，很有耐性。
Chinese: 而且态度非常的认真，很有耐性。
TraditionalChinese: 而且態度非常的認真，很有耐性。
English: Very patient with learning and really attentive.
Did you do something different?
No， nothing out of the ordinary.
She was always a kid who got it.

Standard: 可能以前太孤独了吧，做什么都不积极。
Chinese: 可能以前太孤独了吧，做什么都不积极。
TraditionalChinese: 可能以前太孤獨了吧，做什麼都不積極。
English: Maybe she was lonely before， didn't have any drive.
It's good that someone is with her.

Standard: 看来这次让你留下来是对的。
Chinese: 看来这次让你留下来是对的。
TraditionalChinese: 看來這次讓你留下來是對的。
English: Looks like letting you stay is the right choice.

Standard: 这个娃仔成长了，你也成长了。
Chinese: 这个娃仔成长了，你也成长了。
TraditionalChinese: 這個娃仔成長了，你也成長了。
English: Kid's grown up， you're growing up too.
Mom， dad.

Standard: 我计划再做一段时间，攒够钱了换台车。
Chinese: 我计划再做一段时间，攒够钱了换台车。
TraditionalChinese: 我計畫再做一段時間，攢夠錢了換臺車。
English: I'm planning on doing this a bit longer， save up some money， get a new truck.
A new one， smaller one.

Standard: 以后就跑附近的短途，最远也不出省。
Chinese: 以后就跑附近的短途，最远也不出省。
TraditionalChinese: 以後就跑附近的短途，最遠也不出省。
English: I'll run shorter routes， the longest one won't even leave the county.
That way I can be at home more.
Sure， I support it!
If you need more money I can give you some.
Should have done this earlier.

Standard: 本来就想叫你这样做，只是觉得你听不进去。
Chinese: 本来就想叫你这样做，只是觉得你听不进去。
TraditionalChinese: 本來就想叫你這樣做，只是覺得你聽不進去。
English: I was going to say something but I was worried you wouldn't listen to me.

Standard: 我们这里又不是北方，又不是经济大省。
Chinese: 我们这里又不是北方，又不是经济大省。
TraditionalChinese: 我們這裏又不是北方，又不是經濟大省。
English: We're not like up north， not a rich area.

Standard: 工农业都不发达，物产在内部都消化完了。
Chinese: 工农业都不发达，物产在内部都消化完了。
TraditionalChinese: 工農業都不發達，物產在內部都消化完了。
English: Our agriculture isn't advanced， whatever we make we eat just about.

Standard: 你跑长途有啥能跑的？瞎折腾。
Chinese: 你跑长途有啥能跑的？瞎折腾。
TraditionalChinese: 你跑長途有啥能跑的？瞎折騰。
English: Long haul driving for what? Self torture I say.
You know a bit about shipping.
I know a lot.
Really.

Standard: 天上的懂一半，地下的全懂完。
Chinese: 天上的懂一半，地下的全懂完。
TraditionalChinese: 天上的懂一半，地下的全懂完。
English: You know about half the things up there， but you know everything down here.
You just talk， don't even care about if you know right or wrong.
Just love blowing hot air wherever you go.

Standard: 在广东还要教人家煮粤菜，都不嫌丢人。
Chinese: 在广东还要教人家煮粤菜，都不嫌丢人。
TraditionalChinese: 在廣東還要教人家煮粵菜，都不嫌丟人。
English: Go to Guangdong and want to teach people how to make Yue cuisine， shameless.
...I'm Hakka.

Standard: 客家菜本来就跟广东菜差不多。
Chinese: 客家菜本来就跟广东菜差不多。
TraditionalChinese: 客家菜本來就跟廣東菜差不多。
English: Hakka and Guangdong styles are about the same.
How many times do you use the wok every year.
Hakka dishes， Guangdong dishes， pshaw.
Hahahaha.
Don't cry， I'm here.
Don't cry.
Wahh-
Nightmare?
Yeah-
Don't worry， you're awake now.
Daddy...
I dreamt about Mommy...
She's all alone....

Standard: 我看到她……一个人在街上……
Chinese: 我看到她……一个人在街上……
TraditionalChinese: 我看到她……一個人在街上……
English: I saw her...alone in the street...
It's night time， it's snowing...

Standard: 其他人都进了店里……他们在喝茶吃饭……
Chinese: 其他人都进了店里……他们在喝茶吃饭……
TraditionalChinese: 其他人都進了店裏……他們在喝茶吃飯……
English: Everyone has gone into shops...they're eating and drinking...

Standard: 妈妈没有……她就站在那里……
Chinese: 妈妈没有……她就站在那里……
TraditionalChinese: 媽媽沒有……她就站在那裏……
English: But not Mommy...she's just standing there...
Letting snow fall on her...
I call her and she ignores me...

Standard: 我过去找她……她转身就走了……
Chinese: 我过去找她……她转身就走了……
TraditionalChinese: 我過去找她……她轉身就走了……
English: I run to her...she turns and walks away...
...It's okay.
It's all a dream.
Daddy...
I'm afraid that Mommy hates me...
How can she hate you?

Standard: 这就是个梦，不要胡思乱想。
Chinese: 这就是个梦，不要胡思乱想。
TraditionalChinese: 這就是個夢，不要胡思亂想。
English: It's just a dream， don't think about it.
It's because I'm awful-
I did things wrong-
...What'd you do wrong?
You're doing great.

Standard: 在家很听话，学校老师也表扬你。
Chinese: 在家很听话，学校老师也表扬你。
TraditionalChinese: 在家很聽話，學校老師也表揚你。
English: You listen at home， teachers are giving you praise.
I forgot her...
I forgot Mommy...
...What are you talking about?
How can you forget her?

Standard: 我有朋友……我跟他们去玩……
Chinese: 我有朋友……我跟他们去玩……
TraditionalChinese: 我有朋友……我跟他們去玩……
English: I have friends...I go play with friends....

Standard: 我会吃好吃的东西……我会看新的图画书……
Chinese: 我会吃好吃的东西……我会看新的图画书……
TraditionalChinese: 我會吃好吃的東西……我會看新的圖畫書……
English: I'll eat yummy things...read new storybooks...
I'm happy every day...
But poor Mom...

Standard: 那个世界没有阿爸……没有我……
Chinese: 那个世界没有阿爸……没有我……
TraditionalChinese: 那個世界沒有阿爸……沒有我……
English: There's no Daddy there...no me...

Standard: 也没有她认识的人……只有她自己……
Chinese: 也没有她认识的人……只有她自己……
TraditionalChinese: 也沒有她認識的人……只有她自己……
English: No one she knows...just herself...
I shouldn't be happy-
I forgot-
I didn't think about Mom-
Kid， it's not like that.
Sorry....
I'm sorry...Mom...
I'm sorry-

Standard: （估计是那次搅带直接把带子拉断了。）
Chinese: （估计是那次搅带直接把带子拉断了。）
TraditionalChinese: （估計是那次攪帶直接把帶子拉斷了。）
English: (I bet it's that one time that it got caught it broke the tape)

Standard: （现在里头卷成一团麻，都不晓得能不能修好。）
Chinese: （现在里头卷成一团麻，都不晓得能不能修好。）
TraditionalChinese: （現在裏頭卷成一團麻，都不曉得能不能修好。）
English: (Now it's a mess and all tangled， not sure if it's fixable.)
(Better go ask the shop.)
Mama!
Hi!
Mama!
Hi!
Ogh!
What's Ogh?
Ogh!
Hehe， hahahaha.
This kid love sto laugh.
Takes after you.
Papa!
Calling you， Dad.
Papa!
Hi!
How come she still can't say it right?
Take it easy， why the rush?
Took her a while to learn Mama.
Papa!
Hi!

Standard: 阿爸，我会讲话的时候有多大了？
Chinese: 阿爸，我会讲话的时候有多大了？
TraditionalChinese: 阿爸，我會講話的時候有多大了？
English: Dad， how old was I when I started talking?
Let me think.

Standard: 你是一岁零十五天开始会走路的。
Chinese: 你是一岁零十五天开始会走路的。
TraditionalChinese: 你是一歲零十五天開始會走路的。
English: You started walking at 1 year and 15 days.
You knew how to call for people before that.

Standard: 一岁半已经会讲蛮多的东西了。
Chinese: 一岁半已经会讲蛮多的东西了。
TraditionalChinese: 一歲半已經會講蠻多的東西了。
English: At 1 and a half you could talk a lot.
Oh.
On the other side now.

Standard: 录的是你再小点的时候。
Chinese: 录的是你再小点的时候。
TraditionalChinese: 錄的是你再小點的時候。
English: This is when you were even smaller.
Wahhh-
Lili Lili! I'm here I'm here.
Mama's here!
Wahhh-
Ahhh-
It's okay， you're okay!
I got you! Mom's got you!
This kid loves to laugh.
Shh， shh.
Mom's here， mom's here.
I'm holding you.
Lili be good， go to sleep.
Sob sob-
Little teapot ， blows a whistle.
Once it boils， hear it sing.

Standard: 小白兔，白又白，两只耳朵竖起来。
Chinese: 小白兔，白又白，两只耳朵竖起来。
TraditionalChinese: 小白兔，白又白，兩只耳朵豎起來。
English: Little white bunny， whitest whites， two little ears poking out.

Standard: 爱吃萝卜爱吃菜，蹦蹦跳跳真可爱。
Chinese: 爱吃萝卜爱吃菜，蹦蹦跳跳真可爱。
TraditionalChinese: 愛吃蘿蔔愛吃菜，蹦蹦跳跳真可愛。
English: Loves eating carrots loves eating lettuce， hop hop jump jump so very cute.
Sigh-
Li Yunfeng!
Li Yunfeng!
Sob....
WAHHHHH-
Why are you yelling!?
I finally got her to calm down!
Now she's crying again!
Did you want sweet potatoes?
NO!
It's okay Lili.
Don't cry， I'm here.
Mama sings for you.
Ahhh-
Sob...

Standard: 知道我为什么突然给你听这个磁带咩？
Chinese: 知道我为什么突然给你听这个磁带咩？
TraditionalChinese: 知道我為什麼突然給你聽這個磁帶咩？
English: Do you know why I played the tape for you?
No...
Kid.

Standard: 你还是个BB的时候，我们就怕你哭。
Chinese: 你还是个BB的时候，我们就怕你哭。
TraditionalChinese: 你還是個BB的時候，我們就怕你哭。
English: When you were a baby， we were so afraid of you crying.

Standard: 做父母的看见娃仔哭，心里面像挨刀割一样。
Chinese: 做父母的看见娃仔哭，心里面像挨刀割一样。
TraditionalChinese: 做父母的看見娃仔哭，心裏面像挨刀割一樣。
English: Everytime parents see their kids crying it's like cutting them inside.

Standard: 你又太小，不会讲话，表达不了哪里不舒服。
Chinese: 你又太小，不会讲话，表达不了哪里不舒服。
TraditionalChinese: 你又太小，不會講話，表達不了哪里不舒服。
English: You were so tiny， and couldn't talk， so you couldn't tell us what's wrong.

Standard: 所以每次我们都搞得很紧张，又手忙脚乱。
Chinese: 所以每次我们都搞得很紧张，又手忙脚乱。
TraditionalChinese: 所以每次我們都搞得很緊張，又手忙腳亂。
English: So everytime we were so nervous and anxious.

Standard: 妈妈操心你是最多的，比阿爸多得多。
Chinese: 妈妈操心你是最多的，比阿爸多得多。
TraditionalChinese: 媽媽操心你是最多的，比阿爸多得多。
English: Mom was most worried about you， even more than Dad.
Because she was raising you.

Standard: 你是个好孩子，做什么都会想起妈妈。
Chinese: 你是个好孩子，做什么都会想起妈妈。
TraditionalChinese: 你是個好孩子，做什麼都會想起媽媽。
English: You're a good kid， you think of mom all the time.

Standard: 妈妈也一样，她做什么也会先想到你。
Chinese: 妈妈也一样，她做什么也会先想到你。
TraditionalChinese: 媽媽也一樣，她做什麼也會先想到你。
English: Mom is the same， she thought of you first all the time.

Standard: 她最大的希望，就是你可以幸福快乐地成长。
Chinese: 她最大的希望，就是你可以幸福快乐地成长。
TraditionalChinese: 她最大的希望，就是你可以幸福快樂地成長。
English: Her biggest hope， was that you'd grow up happy.
You have to understand that.
Yeah...

Standard: 阿爸是司机，去过很多地方。
Chinese: 阿爸是司机，去过很多地方。
TraditionalChinese: 阿爸是司機，去過很多地方。
English: Dad's a driver， I've been a lot of places.

Standard: 但是妈妈为了照顾你，这些年都没出过远门。
Chinese: 但是妈妈为了照顾你，这些年都没出过远门。
TraditionalChinese: 但是媽媽為了照顧你，這些年都沒出過遠門。
English: But Mom didn't go places the past few years because of you.

Standard: 她去过最远的地方就是广东。
Chinese: 她去过最远的地方就是广东。
TraditionalChinese: 她去過最遠的地方就是廣東。
English: The furthest she's gone is Guangdong.
That's where the hospital is.
Sob....

Standard: 这样的事情还有很多，可能你也晓得。
Chinese: 这样的事情还有很多，可能你也晓得。
TraditionalChinese: 這樣的事情還有很多，可能你也曉得。
English: There's still lots of things like this， you know.
It's not that Mom doesn't want to be happy.

Standard: 只是她觉得你过得好，你自己开心更重要。
Chinese: 只是她觉得你过得好，你自己开心更重要。
TraditionalChinese: 只是她覺得你過得好，你自己開心更重要。
English: It's that she feels that as long as you are happy， as long as you are doing well， that's more important.
Wah--
Wahhhh-
Sob-

Standard: 你害怕妈妈悲伤，怕她会孤单。
Chinese: 你害怕妈妈悲伤，怕她会孤单。
TraditionalChinese: 你害怕媽媽悲傷，怕她會孤單。
English: You're afraid Mom will be sad， afraid she's alone.
Me too.

Standard: 那个世界是怎样的呢？哪个都不晓得。
Chinese: 那个世界是怎样的呢？哪个都不晓得。
TraditionalChinese: 那個世界是怎樣的呢？哪個都不曉得。
English: What's it like over there? Who knows.

Standard: 人不管在哪里，总会有难过的时候的。
Chinese: 人不管在哪里，总会有难过的时候的。
TraditionalChinese: 人不管在哪里，總會有難過的時候的。
English: No matter where people are， they're gonna be sad sometimes.

Standard: 不过，如果心里有挂念的人，那就有指望了。
Chinese: 不过，如果心里有挂念的人，那就有指望了。
TraditionalChinese: 不過，如果心裏有掛念的人，那就有指望了。
English: But， if you keep them in your heart， then there's hope.

Standard: 我相信，妈妈现在也在想你。
Chinese: 我相信，妈妈现在也在想你。
TraditionalChinese: 我相信，媽媽現在也在想你。
English: I believe， Mom misses you too right now.

Standard: 她不是孤零零一个的，她心里有我们。
Chinese: 她不是孤零零一个的，她心里有我们。
TraditionalChinese: 她不是孤零零一個的，她心裏有我們。
English: She's not alone. She has us in her heart.
No one wanted to part with Mom.

Standard: 但现实已经是这样了，改变不了。
Chinese: 但现实已经是这样了，改变不了。
TraditionalChinese: 但現實已經是這樣了，改變不了。
English: But this is the reality， can't change it.
She doesn't need you to do anything for her.
Just be strong， brave.
And live well.
She'll be happy.
Daddy...
I really miss Mommy...
Me too.
Lili.
Go to sleep， go to sleep.
Mom will sing you a song.
Twinkle， twinkle little star.
Little stars up above.
All up in the night sky.

Standard: 老莫的照相馆旁边有家音像店。
Chinese: 老莫的照相馆旁边有家音像店。
TraditionalChinese: 老莫的照相館旁邊有家音像店。
English: There's a tape shop next to the Old Mo's photography shop.

Standard: 去问问他们，我这盘磁带还能不能修。
Chinese: 去问问他们，我这盘磁带还能不能修。
TraditionalChinese: 去問問他們，我這盤磁帶還能不能修。
English: I'll go ask them， if this is fixable.

Standard: 桥头钟表店的老板会修磁带。
Chinese: 桥头钟表店的老板会修磁带。
TraditionalChinese: 橋頭鐘錶店的老闆會修磁帶。
English: The watch repair shop owner can fix tapes.
Mom!
Mom!
Mom!
Mom!
Dad! Dad!
Kid!
What's going on?
Dad!

Standard: 练习动作也要绑头巾，这么隆重？
Chinese: 练习动作也要绑头巾，这么隆重？
TraditionalChinese: 練習動作也要綁頭巾，這麼隆重？
English: Have to tie a bandana even for practice， so serious?

Standard: 红头巾代表鸿运当头，懂咩？
Chinese: 红头巾代表鸿运当头，懂咩？
TraditionalChinese: 紅頭巾代表鴻運當頭，懂咩？
English: The red bandana is for good luck， understand?

Standard: 等你做什么都特别旺，训练也更有效率。
Chinese: 等你做什么都特别旺，训练也更有效率。
TraditionalChinese: 等你做什麼都特別旺，訓練也更有效率。
English: You get extra energy for whatever you do， and you're more efficient in training.
Why not just get on the boat?
It's just a few rows right?

Standard: 就是因为划了几次了，发现你们动作不规范。
Chinese: 就是因为划了几次了，发现你们动作不规范。
TraditionalChinese: 就是因為劃了幾次了，發現你們動作不規範。
English: Because we've rowed a few times， I realize your movements aren't right.

Standard: 再不纠正就成习惯啦，以后都改不过来。
Chinese: 再不纠正就成习惯啦，以后都改不过来。
TraditionalChinese: 再不糾正就成習慣啦，以後都改不過來。
English: If we don't correct it now it'll be a habit， and we can't change it.

Standard: 每个人的体能就那点，动作对就能省点力气。
Chinese: 每个人的体能就那点，动作对就能省点力气。
TraditionalChinese: 每個人的體能就那點，動作對就能省點力氣。
English: Everyone's only got so much energy， if you do it right you can save a bit of it.
Then how come you just stare us down?

Standard: 你们最不听指挥，喜欢乱来。
Chinese: 你们最不听指挥，喜欢乱来。
TraditionalChinese: 你們最不聽指揮，喜歡亂來。
English: Because you two don't listen to commands and like to mess around.
You have the worst effect on the team!
Ah quit yapping.

Standard: 刚才我已经示范过了，你们一人做一遍。
Chinese: 刚才我已经示范过了，你们一人做一遍。
TraditionalChinese: 剛才我已經示範過了，你們一人做一遍。
English: I already showed you just now， each of you show me what I just did.

Standard: 我检查过关了，后面的训练才准上船。
Chinese: 我检查过关了，后面的训练才准上船。
TraditionalChinese: 我檢查過關了，後面的訓練才准上船。
English: I'll see if you pass， then you can practice on the boat.
Got it?
Yeah...
Yeah.
Louder! Didn't you eat?!
YES!
YES!
Not bad， Mo Zicheng.
Keep going!
Yes， Captain!
Qin Munan...
Not bad， don't get cocky!
Yes， Captain!
Not bad， Mo Zicheng.
Keep going!
Yes， Captain!
Qin Munan...
Slightly worse.
You gotta try harder.
Hahahaha.
Qin Munan!
Where's Qin Munan?
Here， what is it?
Lili fainted!
Hurry to the clinic!
Your mom and dad already went!
Well?
She's awake.
My parents are watching her.
What's going on?
Not sure.

Standard: 下午转去县医院，再做详细的检查。
Chinese: 下午转去县医院，再做详细的检查。
TraditionalChinese: 下午轉去縣醫院，再做詳細的檢查。
English: We're going to the county hospital this afternoon for more evaluation.
Just the county hospital?
not the regional one?
We'll see.

Standard: 那里有个老教授，之前一直找他看。
Chinese: 那里有个老教授，之前一直找他看。
TraditionalChinese: 那裏有個老教授，之前一直找他看。
English: There's an old doctor at the county that we used to go to all the time.

Standard: 也是他帮写的介绍信，推荐我们去广东。
Chinese: 也是他帮写的介绍信，推荐我们去广东。
TraditionalChinese: 也是他幫寫的介紹信，推薦我們去廣東。
English: He's the one that referred us to Guangdong.
Yeah.

Standard: 如果真有什么大问题，地区医院也不顶用。
Chinese: 如果真有什么大问题，地区医院也不顶用。
TraditionalChinese: 如果真有什麼大問題，地區醫院也不頂用。
English: If there's a big problem， the regional hospital probably can't handle it either.
Gotta go to Guangdong.
What are you talking about?
There won't be any big problems.
Oh!
There's no problem， no probem at all.
We'll go to the county hospital first.
Alright， Ya'll can head out.
The rain's really coming down.

Standard: 有什么需要帮忙的就跟我讲。
Chinese: 有什么需要帮忙的就跟我讲。
TraditionalChinese: 有什麼需要幫忙的就跟我講。
English: If you need something， let me know.
Anything， anytime.
Got it.

Standard: 这个娃仔的病情，突然恶化了。
Chinese: 这个娃仔的病情，突然恶化了。
TraditionalChinese: 這個娃仔的病情，突然惡化了。
English: The kids illness has taken a turn for the worse.
She didn't do anything though.

Standard: 我每天也有监督她按时吃药。
Chinese: 我每天也有监督她按时吃药。
TraditionalChinese: 我每天也有監督她按時吃藥。
English: I make sure she takes her medication everyday.
The human body is like a machine.

Standard: 它本来就有缺陷，时间久了总会到极限的。
Chinese: 它本来就有缺陷，时间久了总会到极限的。
TraditionalChinese: 它本來就有缺陷，時間久了總會到極限的。
English: There's already an issue， and after sometime there's always a limit.
Doesn't matter how well you maintain it.
The...what now?
We have to operate.
Didn't you say there's a big risk?
The medicine can't control it anymore.

Standard: 不做手术，她最多能再坚持半年。
Chinese: 不做手术，她最多能再坚持半年。
TraditionalChinese: 不做手術，她最多能再堅持半年。
English: Without operation， at most she'll have another six months.
Then...what if the operation isn't successful?
Have to see.

Standard: 病情加重，危及生命，都是有可能的。
Chinese: 病情加重，危及生命，都是有可能的。
TraditionalChinese: 病情加重，危及生命，都是有可能的。
English: It can get worse， it can risk her life， all possibilities.
Doctor...
Your recommendation is...
I recommend you operate.

Standard: 虽然很难抉择，但一丝希望，也是希望。
Chinese: 虽然很难抉择，但一丝希望，也是希望。
TraditionalChinese: 雖然很難抉擇，但一絲希望，也是希望。
English: It's a difficult decision， but one strand of hope， is still hope.

Standard: 如果决定做，那就去广东做。
Chinese: 如果决定做，那就去广东做。
TraditionalChinese: 如果決定做，那就去廣東做。
English: If you want to do it， go to Guangdong to do it.
Find Director Zhang.
With him as the Chief Surgeon， you'll have better chances.
Plums， plums!
Fresh plums!
Fresh plums just picked， plums!
Operation?
Yeah.
Will it hurt?
Maybe a bit.
Probably a few days.
Oh...
Scared?
Nope.
If Daddy takes me， I'm not scared.
I'll always be there.
Good.
It'll be quick， over soon.
Will I be better after it's over?

Standard: 就跟付毓莹他们一样，什么都能玩？
Chinese: 就跟付毓莹他们一样，什么都能玩？
TraditionalChinese: 就跟付毓瑩他們一樣，什麼都能玩？
English: Will I be like Fu Yuying and them， and can play however I want?
...Yeah， that's right.
Yay!
I dreamt in the hospital!
I knew it was like that!
What kind of dream?
I saw shooting stars!

Standard: 天上有很多很多流星！很漂亮的！
Chinese: 天上有很多很多流星！很漂亮的！
TraditionalChinese: 天上有很多很多流星！很漂亮的！
English: So many shooting stars! Very pretty!

Standard: 但是，那些流星，它们不是星星！
Chinese: 但是，那些流星，它们不是星星！
TraditionalChinese: 但是，那些流星，它們不是星星！
English: But those shooting stars， aren't stars!

Standard: 它们的样子，都是我吃过的药！
Chinese: 它们的样子，都是我吃过的药！
TraditionalChinese: 它們的樣子，都是我吃過的藥！
English: They look like the medicine I took!

Standard: 我吃了那么多药，都变成星星在天上飞了！
Chinese: 我吃了那么多药，都变成星星在天上飞了！
TraditionalChinese: 我吃了那麼多藥，都變成星星在天上飛了！
English: All the medicine I took， turned into stars and started to fly around in the sky!

Standard: 我就在想，是不是以后我不用吃药了。
Chinese: 我就在想，是不是以后我不用吃药了。
TraditionalChinese: 我就在想，是不是以後我不用吃藥了。
English: I was just thinking， maybe I don't have to take medicine in the future.
Hehe， so it was true.
...Is that it?
You're so smart.
I also saw Mommy.
Where the stars fell.

Standard: 她没有跟我说话，她也没有走开。
Chinese: 她没有跟我说话，她也没有走开。
TraditionalChinese: 她沒有跟我說話，她也沒有走開。
English: She didn't talk to me， she didn't walk away.

Standard: 我就牵着她的手，和她一起看星星。
Chinese: 我就牵着她的手，和她一起看星星。
TraditionalChinese: 我就牽著她的手，和她一起看星星。
English: She just held my hand and we watched the stars together.
...That's good.
Dad.
I didn't cry this time.
I didn't cry when I saw mom.
....Good girl.
Looks like you're feeling down.
Got it.

Standard: 刚才跟你说过了，没法百分百修复。
Chinese: 刚才跟你说过了，没法百分百修复。
TraditionalChinese: 剛才跟你說過了，沒法百分百修復。
English: I just told you， I can't fix it completely.
Normally I can flatten it if it's wrinkled.

Standard: 变形厉害的不能再用，要整段剪掉。
Chinese: 变形厉害的不能再用，要整段剪掉。
TraditionalChinese: 變形厲害的不能再用，要整段剪掉。
English: But if it's too warped I can't fix it， you have to cut it.
So you'll lose some stuff.
The rest should be fine.
Thank you， Master Yan.
Something important in there?
My wife's voice.
She's not around anymore.

Standard: 心情不好就是因为刚才跟人家吵架了。
Chinese: 心情不好就是因为刚才跟人家吵架了。
TraditionalChinese: 心情不好就是因為剛才跟人家吵架了。
English: I'm feeling pretty upset because I just had an argument with someone.
I lied.

Standard: 我和那个人讲，录下的东西是很有意义的。
Chinese: 我和那个人讲，录下的东西是很有意义的。
TraditionalChinese: 我和那個人講，錄下的東西是很有意義的。
English: I told that person， that recording had lots of meaning.

Standard: 其实我跟他一样，我害怕听见我老婆的声音。
Chinese: 其实我跟他一样，我害怕听见我老婆的声音。
TraditionalChinese: 其實我跟他一樣，我害怕聽見我老婆的聲音。
