English: But I'm like him， I'm afraid of hearing my wife's voice.

Standard: 所以这盒磁带坏了很久我一直没有修。
Chinese: 所以这盒磁带坏了很久我一直没有修。
TraditionalChinese: 所以這盒磁帶壞了很久我一直沒有修。
English: So even though this tape's been broken for a while I never fixed it.
Yeah， I get it.

Standard: 这个世界上有样东西叫时差，你知道吗？
Chinese: 这个世界上有样东西叫时差，你知道吗？
TraditionalChinese: 這個世界上有樣東西叫時差，你知道嗎？
English: You know there's something called time zones， right?
Yeah.

Standard: 一个人离开这个世界，也许没有消失。
Chinese: 一个人离开这个世界，也许没有消失。
TraditionalChinese: 一個人離開這個世界，也許沒有消失。
English: When someone leaves this world， maybe they don't disappear.

Standard: 可能她只是时间跟我们不一样。
Chinese: 可能她只是时间跟我们不一样。
TraditionalChinese: 可能她只是時間跟我們不一樣。
English: Maybe they're just in a different time zone.
She lives in her timezone.
Kid...
Don't be afraid...
Dad's here...
Uncle.
Are you here for the Wangyou Herb?
Yeah.
Me too!

Standard: 喝了用忘忧草熬的汤，就能心想事成！
Chinese: 喝了用忘忧草熬的汤，就能心想事成！
TraditionalChinese: 喝了用忘憂草熬的湯，就能心想事成！
English: Once you drink a soup brewed from the herb， your wishes will come true!

Standard: 我不要再上学了，我要当百万富翁！
Chinese: 我不要再上学了，我要当百万富翁！
TraditionalChinese: 我不要再上學了，我要當百萬富翁！
English: I don't want to go to school anymore， I want to be a billionaire!

Standard: 然后住别墅，开跑车，满世界去玩！
Chinese: 然后住别墅，开跑车，满世界去玩！
TraditionalChinese: 然後住別墅，開跑車，滿世界去玩！
English: And live in a mansion， drive a sports car， travel the world!
I just want to be able to cure my daughter.
But the door's closed， can't get in.

Standard: 里面的人也不会答应给我们的。
Chinese: 里面的人也不会答应给我们的。
TraditionalChinese: 裏面的人也不會答應給我們的。
English: The people inside won't let us have it either.

Standard: 他们真是可恶，凭什么把忘忧草全都霸占了！
Chinese: 他们真是可恶，凭什么把忘忧草全都霸占了！
TraditionalChinese: 他們真是可惡，憑什麼把忘憂草全都霸佔了！
English: They're awful， why do they keep it to themselves!?

Standard: 那条巷子的尽头，墙脚有个洞。
Chinese: 那条巷子的尽头，墙脚有个洞。
TraditionalChinese: 那條巷子的盡頭，牆腳有個洞。
English: There's a hole in the wall over there near the alley.
We can crawl in from there.
Really?!
I'll go with you!
Daddy!
I'm all better!
I can run!
I feel great， too!
Great， great.
Dad， let's go play!

Standard: 我想去动物园，我想看长颈鹿！
Chinese: 我想去动物园，我想看长颈鹿！
TraditionalChinese: 我想去動物園，我想看長頸鹿！
English: I want to go to the zoo， I want to see giraffes!
Okay， I'll take you.
Don't run too fast...
I can't keep up...
Anywhere is fine...

Standard: 你去桥头那家钟表店，跟老板说是我介绍的。
Chinese: 你去桥头那家钟表店，跟老板说是我介绍的。
TraditionalChinese: 你去橋頭那家鐘錶店，跟老闆說是我介紹的。
English: Go to the watch repair shop at the end of the bridge， tell the boss I sent you.

Standard: 他会帮你修的，钱你给他就得了。
Chinese: 他会帮你修的，钱你给他就得了。
TraditionalChinese: 他會幫你修的，錢你給他就得了。
English: He'll fix it for you， just pay him.
Why the watch repair shop?
You can't fix it?
I don't know how.

Standard: 我们店维修方面的业务是我搭档负责的。
Chinese: 我们店维修方面的业务是我搭档负责的。
TraditionalChinese: 我們店維修方面的業務是我搭檔負責的。
English: All the repairs are done by my partner.

Standard: 他去外地探亲了，最近都不在店里。
Chinese: 他去外地探亲了，最近都不在店里。
TraditionalChinese: 他去外地探親了，最近都不在店裏。
English: They went to visit relatives， not around these days.
If you're in a rush then the end of the bridge is the only place.
They reliable?
They're a tape lover.

Standard: 用香港人的话讲，叫做“发烧友”。
Chinese: 用香港人的话讲，叫做“发烧友”。
TraditionalChinese: 用香港人的話講，叫做“發燒友”。
English: If we use what Hong Kongers use， call them “Fever friend”

Standard: 你这种情况对他来说是小菜一碟。
Chinese: 你这种情况对他来说是小菜一碟。
TraditionalChinese: 你這種情況對他來說是小菜一碟。
English: These things to them are easy.
Hopefully they don't break it.
What's on there is important.
It's fine， they're a professional.

Standard: 而且作为一个修表佬，他的手绝对稳。
Chinese: 而且作为一个修表佬，他的手绝对稳。
TraditionalChinese: 而且作為一個修表佬，他的手絕對穩。
English: And plus， as a watch repair person， definitely have steady hands.
Alright， I believe you.
Discontinued songs?
So nervous.

Standard: 没有，就是家人讲话的录音。
Chinese: 没有，就是家人讲话的录音。
TraditionalChinese: 沒有，就是家人講話的錄音。
English: No， just a family member's voice.
Oh， I get it.

Standard: 确实也是珍贵的回忆，能保存下来当然最好。
Chinese: 确实也是珍贵的回忆，能保存下来当然最好。
TraditionalChinese: 確實也是珍貴的回憶，能保存下來當然最好。
English: It's a precious memory， to be able to record it is best.
Hmph.
Memories? Precious?
If I were you I'd never fix it.

Standard: 录的时候就觉得好玩，记录生活，是咩？
Chinese: 录的时候就觉得好玩，记录生活，是咩？
TraditionalChinese: 錄的時候就覺得好玩，記錄生活，是咩？
English: It's fun when recording， yeah?

Standard: 以后时不时拿出来听，觉得挺有意思。
Chinese: 以后时不时拿出来听，觉得挺有意思。
TraditionalChinese: 以後時不時拿出來聽，覺得挺有意思。
English: And then you bring it out every so often to hear it， it's interesting.
Have you thought of this problem though?

Standard: 万一录音的人不在了，听的人有多痛苦？
Chinese: 万一录音的人不在了，听的人有多痛苦？
TraditionalChinese: 萬一錄音的人不在了，聽的人有多痛苦？
English: What if the person who got recorded is gone， the listener would be in so much pain.

Standard: 老周啊，都是来关照我生意的。
Chinese: 老周啊，都是来关照我生意的。
TraditionalChinese: 老周啊，都是來關照我生意的。
English: Old Zhou， these are customers.
Don't be provoking customers.

Standard: 兄弟，我不是挑衅你，我只是讲事实。
Chinese: 兄弟，我不是挑衅你，我只是讲事实。
TraditionalChinese: 兄弟，我不是挑釁你，我只是講事實。
English: Brother， I'm not provoking you， I'm just telling you the truth.

Standard: 这类东西我都不喜欢，照片啊，录音啊。
Chinese: 这类东西我都不喜欢，照片啊，录音啊。
TraditionalChinese: 這類東西我都不喜歡，照片啊，錄音啊。
English: I don't like any of this stuff， pictures， recordings， and all that.

Standard: 纯属就是走了的人折磨还在的人。
Chinese: 纯属就是走了的人折磨还在的人。
TraditionalChinese: 純屬就是走了的人折磨還在的人。
English: It's all to tortue the ones who are left behind.
You're the exception， your situation is different.

Standard: 我爸中风，在床上瘫了三年。
Chinese: 我爸中风，在床上瘫了三年。
TraditionalChinese: 我爸中風，在床上癱了三年。
English: My dad had a stroke， laid on the bed for three years.

Standard: 天天看电视学唱山歌，学会一首他就唱一首。
Chinese: 天天看电视学唱山歌，学会一首他就唱一首。
TraditionalChinese: 天天看電視學唱山歌，學會一首他就唱一首。
English: Everyday he'd watch tv to learn how to sing folk songs， he'd learn one and sing one.

Standard: 然后我妈就用录音机，把他唱的录下来。
Chinese: 然后我妈就用录音机，把他唱的录下来。
TraditionalChinese: 然後我媽就用答錄機，把他唱的錄下來。
English: Then my mom would use the tape recorder and record it.

Standard: 原本以为是留个纪念，大家都支持。
Chinese: 原本以为是留个纪念，大家都支持。
TraditionalChinese: 原本以為是留個紀念，大家都支持。
English: Originally it was just for memories， everyone supported it.

Standard: 他走了以后，我们几个有多着力你懂咩？
Chinese: 他走了以后，我们几个有多着力你懂咩？
TraditionalChinese: 他走了以後，我們幾個有多著力你懂咩？
English: After he left， do you know how hard it was for all of us?
Once we heard the tape， we'd cry.

Standard: 又不舍得丢掉，特别是我妈，坚决不同意。
Chinese: 又不舍得丢掉，特别是我妈，坚决不同意。
TraditionalChinese: 又不舍得丟掉，特別是我媽，堅決不同意。
English: But we couldn't bring ourselves to toss it. Especially my mom， wouldn't budge on it.

Standard: 后来我还是趁她不注意才那堆东西处理了。
Chinese: 后来我还是趁她不注意才那堆东西处理了。
TraditionalChinese: 後來我還是趁她不注意才那堆東西處理了。
English: In the end I had to toss it when she wasn't paying attention.

Standard: 我妈还骂我！讲她不认我做仔！
Chinese: 我妈还骂我！讲她不认我做仔！
TraditionalChinese: 我媽還罵我！講她不認我做仔！
English: Then she yelled at me! Said I wasn't her son!

Standard: 怪我把我爸留下的这点东西都丢了。
Chinese: 怪我把我爸留下的这点东西都丢了。
TraditionalChinese: 怪我把我爸留下的這點東西都丟了。
English: Blaming me for throwing out what my dad left behind.
What memories? This is torture!
It's not for you.
I know， this is your family business.

Standard: 我就是怕你没有经验，提醒你一下。
Chinese: 我就是怕你没有经验，提醒你一下。
TraditionalChinese: 我就是怕你沒有經驗，提醒你一下。
English: I'm just worried you didn't experience it， wanted to share.

Standard: 这种破东西没有保留的必要，莫修了，丢掉。
Chinese: 这种破东西没有保留的必要，莫修了，丢掉。
TraditionalChinese: 這種破東西沒有保留的必要，莫修了，丟掉。
English: You don't need those things， don't fix it， throw it out.

Standard: 你爸又不是唱给你听，轮得到你管？
Chinese: 你爸又不是唱给你听，轮得到你管？
TraditionalChinese: 你爸又不是唱給你聽，輪得到你管？
English: Your dad wasn't singing it for you， what made you think it was yours to throw away?

Standard: 他都卧床了，总要找点什么事情做吧？
Chinese: 他都卧床了，总要找点什么事情做吧？
TraditionalChinese: 他都臥床了，總要找點什麼事情做吧？
English: He's bedridden， gotta find something to do right?
He was giving himself hope.
You could say that...
Say what? That's the truth.

Standard: 我这盘磁带，里头录的是我女儿成长的过程。
Chinese: 我这盘磁带，里头录的是我女儿成长的过程。
TraditionalChinese: 我這盤磁帶，裏頭錄的是我女兒成長的過程。
English: This tape recorded my daughter growing up.

Standard: 她一出世，医生就说她没有多长时间了。
Chinese: 她一出世，医生就说她没有多长时间了。
TraditionalChinese: 她一出世，醫生就說她沒有多長時間了。
English: As soon as she was born， the doctor said she wouldn't have lots of time.

Standard: 所以我跟我老婆决定，重要的日子就录下来。
Chinese: 所以我跟我老婆决定，重要的日子就录下来。
TraditionalChinese: 所以我跟我老婆決定，重要的日子就錄下來。
English: So my wife and I decided， to record important days.

Standard: 她十一个月零六天开始讲话。
Chinese: 她十一个月零六天开始讲话。
TraditionalChinese: 她十一個月零六天開始講話。
English: From 11 months and 6 days she started to talk.

Standard: 十一个月零二十天懂得喊爸妈。
Chinese: 十一个月零二十天懂得喊爸妈。
TraditionalChinese: 十一個月零二十天懂得喊爸媽。
English: 11 months and 20 days she knew how to say mmama and dada.
1 year and 15 days she could walk.
We recorded it all.
It's not to commemorate anything.

Standard: 是告诉自己，这个娃仔又活下来了。
Chinese: 是告诉自己，这个娃仔又活下来了。
TraditionalChinese: 是告訴自己，這個娃仔又活下來了。
English: It's to tell myself， the kid lived another day.

Standard: 就像你爸，学会一首歌就代表又活了一天。
Chinese: 就像你爸，学会一首歌就代表又活了一天。
TraditionalChinese: 就像你爸，學會一首歌就代表又活了一天。
English: Just like your dad， learning a new song meant he lived another day.
That's why he recorded himself.

Standard: 我们要这样鼓励自己，继续努力。
Chinese: 我们要这样鼓励自己，继续努力。
TraditionalChinese: 我們要這樣鼓勵自己，繼續努力。
English: To encourage ourselves， to keep trying.

Standard: 我开车的师傅教过我，走一里，算一里。
Chinese: 我开车的师傅教过我，走一里，算一里。
TraditionalChinese: 我開車的師傅教過我，走一裏，算一裏。
English: The teacher who taught me how to drive said once， “going a kilometer， counts as a kilometer.”

Standard: 活着就想死的事，那还活着做什么？
Chinese: 活着就想死的事，那还活着做什么？
TraditionalChinese: 活著就想死的事，那還活著做什麼？
English: Thinking about dying while you're living? Why live?

Standard: （桥头钟表店的老板会修磁带，去找找看吧。）
Chinese: （桥头钟表店的老板会修磁带，去找找看吧。）
TraditionalChinese: （橋頭鐘錶店的老闆會修磁帶，去找找看吧。）
English: (The watch repair shop at the end of the bridge can fix tapes， better go check it out.)

Standard: 今天放了一部动画片，讲森林里动物的。
Chinese: 今天放了一部动画片，讲森林里动物的。
TraditionalChinese: 今天放了一部動畫片，講森林裏動物的。
English: There's a new animated movie out today， it's about animals in the forest.

Standard: 其实我更加喜欢老虎，老虎是百兽之王。
Chinese: 其实我更加喜欢老虎，老虎是百兽之王。
TraditionalChinese: 其實我更加喜歡老虎，老虎是百獸之王。
English: I actually like tigers more， tigers are the king of animals.

Standard: 说是动物，其实跟人一样了。
Chinese: 说是动物，其实跟人一样了。
TraditionalChinese: 說是動物，其實跟人一樣了。
English: You say they're animals， but they're more like people.

Standard: 会讲话，有感情，还会动脑。
Chinese: 会讲话，有感情，还会动脑。
TraditionalChinese: 會講話，有感情，還會動腦。
English: They can talk， have feelings， and can think.

Standard: 讲的也是人类的故事，复仇和成长。
Chinese: 讲的也是人类的故事，复仇和成长。
TraditionalChinese: 講的也是人類的故事，復仇和成長。
English: They also talk about people stories， about revenge and growing up.

Standard: 国外连动画片都拍得很专业，跟电影没区别。
Chinese: 国外连动画片都拍得很专业，跟电影没区别。
TraditionalChinese: 國外連動畫片都拍得很專業，跟電影沒區別。
English: Animated movies abroad are professional， just like movies.

Standard: 剧情吸引人，而且讲的东西是有意义的。
Chinese: 剧情吸引人，而且讲的东西是有意义的。
TraditionalChinese: 劇情吸引人，而且講的東西是有意義的。
English: The story is very attractive， and the message has meaning.
Both adults and kids can both watch.

Standard: 我们国家自己的动画片也有比较优秀的。
Chinese: 我们国家自己的动画片也有比较优秀的。
TraditionalChinese: 我們國家自己的動畫片也有比較優秀的。
English: We have some pretty good animated films too..

Standard: 不过数量很少，篇幅也没有那么长。
Chinese: 不过数量很少，篇幅也没有那么长。
TraditionalChinese: 不過數量很少，篇幅也沒有那麼長。
English: But not as many and not as long.
Qin Zhuoli， do you want to go look at the flowers?
Ah?
What flowers?
The trees over at Shaling village started to bloom.

Standard: 听讲一条路全是紫色，好好看的。
Chinese: 听讲一条路全是紫色，好好看的。
TraditionalChinese: 聽講一條路全是紫色，好好看的。
English: I heard the whole street is purple， very pretty.

Standard: 黄乐飘他们已经去了，我们现在也去。
Chinese: 黄乐飘他们已经去了，我们现在也去。
TraditionalChinese: 黃樂飄他們已經去了，我們現在也去。
English: Huang Lepiao and them already went， wer'e going now too.
You coming?
Just leave her.
Otherwise she'll get uncomfortable on the way there.
We can get there slowly.
It's not like she can't walk.

Standard: 那去到都天黑了，还看什么？
Chinese: 那去到都天黑了，还看什么？
TraditionalChinese: 那去到都天黑了，還看什麼？
English: When we get there it'll be dark， what will we look at then?
......You all go.
I'll wait for my dad.
Okay， then we're heading out.
Bye.
Bye.
Kid.
Dad.
Sesame roll is here too.
Where's your backpack?
I don't need it， I finished my assignments.
That fast?

Standard: 数学作业提前布置了，下课时间我就在做。
Chinese: 数学作业提前布置了，下课时间我就在做。
TraditionalChinese: 數學作業提前佈置了，下課時間我就在做。
English: They gave the math assignments early， so I did them as soon as school was out.

Standard: 语文没有抄写，一下子就做完了。
Chinese: 语文没有抄写，一下子就做完了。
TraditionalChinese: 語文沒有抄寫，一下子就做完了。
English: No copying for language， so I was done real fast.
Is that so? That's pretty good.
Then we can relax at night.
Dad， I want to buy an abacus.
Teacher says tomorrow we're gonna learn it.
What year is it? Still teaching abacus?
Yeah， have to learn how to add and subtract.
Don't need to buy it， we have lots at home.
We do?
Yeah， your Grandpa's.

Standard: 他在矿区当了几十年的会计。
Chinese: 他在矿区当了几十年的会计。
TraditionalChinese: 他在礦區當了幾十年的會計。
English: He was an accountant for decades at the mining area.
He's faster than calculators.
What's a count ant?

Standard: 会计是专门算数的人，帮单位算账的。
Chinese: 会计是专门算数的人，帮单位算账的。
TraditionalChinese: 會計是專門算數的人，幫單位算賬的。
English: Accountant is someone who is good at math and helps their work count money.

Standard: 噢，怪不得阿公的数学那么好。
Chinese: 噢，怪不得阿公的数学那么好。
TraditionalChinese: 噢，怪不得阿公的數學那麼好。
English: Oh， no wonder Grandpa's math is good.

Standard: 我也学过啊，就是全部忘记了。
Chinese: 我也学过啊，就是全部忘记了。
TraditionalChinese: 我也學過啊，就是全部忘記了。
English: I learned it before too， but I forgot it all.
Haha.
Isn't that like never learning it?

Standard: 我从小不爱读书，估计你接得我了。
Chinese: 我从小不爱读书，估计你接得我了。
TraditionalChinese: 我從小不愛讀書，估計你接得我了。
English: I never liked studying as a child， I bet you got it after me.
“after” what?

Standard: 娃仔有些东西像父母，就是“接得”父母。
Chinese: 娃仔有些东西像父母，就是“接得”父母。
TraditionalChinese: 娃仔有些東西像父母，就是“接得”父母。
English: Kids are like their parents， so “after” your parents.
Oh-

Standard: 要不要去散散步，锻炼身体？
Chinese: 要不要去散散步，锻炼身体？
TraditionalChinese: 要不要去散散步，鍛煉身體？
English: Want to go for a walk， do some exercise?
You don't have many assignments anyways.
Where to?
Shaling for the flowers?

Standard: 走吧，个个都去，我们也凑个热闹。
Chinese: 走吧，个个都去，我们也凑个热闹。
TraditionalChinese: 走吧，個個都去，我們也湊個熱鬧。
English: Let's go， everyone's going， let's join.
Okay.
Daddy.
Let's not go， let's go home.
What's wrong?

Standard: 走过去要好久，我不想走了。
Chinese: 走过去要好久，我不想走了。
TraditionalChinese: 走過去要好久，我不想走了。
English: It takes so long to walk there. I don't want to walk anymore.
It's not too far.
We'll get there soon.

Standard: 我走得很慢，走几步就得休息一下。
Chinese: 我走得很慢，走几步就得休息一下。
TraditionalChinese: 我走得很慢，走幾步就得休息一下。
English: I'm slow， I have to rest every few steps.
You have to wait for me， and you have nothing to do.
You just walk， don't worry about me.
I don't like it like this.
Everyone has to wait for me.

Standard: ……以前，妈妈是不是带你去过红兰寺烧香？
Chinese: ……以前，妈妈是不是带你去过红兰寺烧香？
TraditionalChinese: ……以前，媽媽是不是帶你去過紅蘭寺燒香？
English: ...Before， didn't mom take you to Honglan Temple to pray?
Yes.

Standard: 那条百步天梯那么长，你们是怎么上去的？
Chinese: 那条百步天梯那么长，你们是怎么上去的？
TraditionalChinese: 那條百步天梯那麼長，你們是怎麼上去的？
English: That hundred step stair was so long， how'd you get up there?

Standard: 我记得妈妈说过，你们玩了个游戏？
Chinese: 我记得妈妈说过，你们玩了个游戏？
TraditionalChinese: 我記得媽媽說過，你們玩了個遊戲？
English: I remember Mom said， you played a game?
Rock， paper， scissors.
How'd you play?
Eh， let me think.
Just， play Rock Paper Scissors.

Standard: 赢的人就往上走，一次走五级台阶。
Chinese: 赢的人就往上走，一次走五级台阶。
TraditionalChinese: 贏的人就往上走，一次走五級臺階。
English: The winner gets to move forward 5 steps.

Standard: 输了的人不能动，站在原来的台阶。
Chinese: 输了的人不能动，站在原来的台阶。
TraditionalChinese: 輸了的人不能動，站在原來的臺階。
English: The loser can't move and has to stay there.
We can play too.
The winner walks 10 steps.
The loser stays still.

Standard: 然后继续剪刀石头布，直到走到沙岭为止。
Chinese: 然后继续剪刀石头布，直到走到沙岭为止。
TraditionalChinese: 然後繼續剪刀石頭布，直到走到沙嶺為止。
English: We'll play until we get there.
That way it won't be boring.
Oh...

Standard: 那就是把上楼梯换成了往前走。
Chinese: 那就是把上楼梯换成了往前走。
TraditionalChinese: 那就是把上樓梯換成了往前走。
English: So instead of walking ups stairs， we're walking forward.
Yep.
The first one there gets a prize.
What prize?

Standard: 如果我赢了，今晚你来洗碗。
Chinese: 如果我赢了，今晚你来洗碗。
TraditionalChinese: 如果我贏了，今晚你來洗碗。
English: If I win， you do dishes.
Ah...

Standard: 如果你赢了，我就给你买瓶可乐。
Chinese: 如果你赢了，我就给你买瓶可乐。
TraditionalChinese: 如果你贏了，我就給你買瓶可樂。
English: If you win， I buy you a coke.
Wow!
But...coke is expensive.

Standard: 妈妈说你赚钱不容易，不要乱花钱。
Chinese: 妈妈说你赚钱不容易，不要乱花钱。
TraditionalChinese: 媽媽說你賺錢不容易，不要亂花錢。
English: Mom said it's hard to make money， so we can't spend it willy nilly.
Not expensive， we don't drink it everyday.

Standard: 但是晚饭你要好好吃，不能光喝可乐。
Chinese: 但是晚饭你要好好吃，不能光喝可乐。
TraditionalChinese: 但是晚飯你要好好吃，不能光喝可樂。
English: But you have to eat dinner， can't just drink coke.
Okay?
Okay!
Then get ready.
What are you going to play?
Haha， I'm not telling.
Rock， paper， scissors.
Winner takes 10 steps!
Aiyah...
Then I'm going forward!
Stop! You can't move forward anymore!
You moved too far， that's against the rules!
It's not even 10 steps!
Your legs are longer than mine!

Standard: 走一步比我远得多，不公平！
Chinese: 走一步比我远得多，不公平！
TraditionalChinese: 走一步比我遠得多，不公平！
English: One step is further than mine， not fair!
Okay， I'll stop here.
Continue.
Rock， paper， scissors.
If you lose you can't move.
I win I win!
How'd you end up ahead of me?
I also only took ten steps.
No way! You cheated!
No I didn't!
I started ahead of you.
You stepped back yourself.
Oh， that's an explanation?
Yes， it's exactly likek that.
Okay okay， whatever you say.
Again， again!
Rock， paper， scissors.
We'll see who gets there first!
Yay， me again!
Huff...huff...
How are you feeling?
Huff...
Just...hard to breathe...
Dizzy?
A little....
Does your chest hurt?
No.
Don't worry.

Standard: 医生说了，你不可以做剧烈运动。
Chinese: 医生说了，你不可以做剧烈运动。
TraditionalChinese: 醫生說了，你不可以做劇烈運動。
English: Doctor said， you can't do strenuous exercise.
But I ate medicine.
Everyday I eat medicine.

Standard: 吃药只是让你的病不要变严重。
Chinese: 吃药只是让你的病不要变严重。
TraditionalChinese: 吃藥只是讓你的病不要變嚴重。
English: The medicine just stops it from getting worse.

Standard: 你没好完全，不能乱跑乱跳。
Chinese: 你没好完全，不能乱跑乱跳。
TraditionalChinese: 你沒好完全，不能亂跑亂跳。
English: You haven't healed completely， you can't run around.
If you feel sick just let me know.
Okay.
Dad， what are you doing?
Looking behind us.
For what?
See if Sesame Roll got lost.
No way， Sesame Roll is smart!
Dad， why are you turning around again?

Standard: 我总觉得有什么东西在跟着我们。
Chinese: 我总觉得有什么东西在跟着我们。
TraditionalChinese: 我總覺得有什麼東西在跟著我們。
English: I feel like something's following us.
What?
Don't know.
Monster?
A monster from “Mighty Heroine”.
They won't come to Zhibin!
It's too far!
Couldn't they fly?
Yes， but they are in space
They have to come by spaceship!

Standard: （不要回头了，后面什么都没有。）
Chinese: （不要回头了，后面什么都没有。）
TraditionalChinese: （不要回頭了，後面什麼都沒有。）
English: (Stop turning a round， there's nothing there.)
(Why do I keep turning around?)
Ah! It's Huanhuan!
Huanhuan!
Why are you here?
Oh， you're here to find Sesame Roll!

Standard: 哈哈哈，那你跟我们一起走吧！
Chinese: 哈哈哈，那你跟我们一起走吧！
TraditionalChinese: 哈哈哈，那你跟我們一起走吧！
English: Hahaha， then let's go together!
Director Liu?
Oh， Ah Nan?
Haven't seen you in a while!
Oh， isn't this Lili?
Still remember me?
Kid， say hi.
This is Granny Liu from the culture station.
....Hello， Granny Liu.
Hello， Lili.
Where are you headed to?

Standard: 这娃仔放学了，带她去沙岭看花。
Chinese: 这娃仔放学了，带她去沙岭看花。
TraditionalChinese: 這娃仔放學了，帶她去沙嶺看花。
English: This kid just got out of school， taking her to Shaling to look at flowers.
Oh， right.

Standard: 那边的树开了花，都成景点咯。
Chinese: 那边的树开了花，都成景点咯。
TraditionalChinese: 那邊的樹開了花，都成景點咯。
English: The flowers blooming over there have turned into a destination.
You?
How come you're here?
Look there.
....Dragon Boat?

Standard: 嗯，申请了这么多年，县里总算拨款了。
Chinese: 嗯，申请了这么多年，县里总算拨款了。
TraditionalChinese: 嗯，申請了這麼多年，縣裏總算撥款了。
English: Yeah， after many years of applying we finally got approved.

Standard: 我们芷滨镇终于有一条自己的龙舟啦。
Chinese: 我们芷滨镇终于有一条自己的龙舟啦。
TraditionalChinese: 我們芷濱鎮終於有一條自己的龍舟啦。
English: Zhibin finally has our own Dragon Boat.
A new one?

Standard: 去外面请木船厂做的，今天才做好，运回来。
Chinese: 去外面请木船厂做的，今天才做好，运回来。
TraditionalChinese: 去外面請木船廠做的，今天才做好，運回來。
English: We asked a outside factory to make it， they just finished and delivered today.

Standard: 我来跟村里借个房子先放着。
Chinese: 我来跟村里借个房子先放着。
TraditionalChinese: 我來跟村裏借個房子先放著。
English: I'm going to ask if we can borrow a storage space for it.

Standard: 顺便让师傅把阿凤做的龙头装上。
Chinese: 顺便让师傅把阿凤做的龙头装上。
TraditionalChinese: 順便讓師傅把阿鳳做的龍頭裝上。
English: Then we'll ask some people to put the Dragon Head that Ah Feng made on it.
Ah Feng， do you mean Mom?

Standard: 对，这个龙头是你妈妈做的。
Chinese: 对，这个龙头是你妈妈做的。
TraditionalChinese: 對，這個龍頭是你媽媽做的。
English: Yeah， this Dragon Head was made by your mom.
Probably two or three years ago.
Oh...
Have you seen a Dragon Boat?

Standard: 这种装着龙头的船就是龙舟啦。
Chinese: 这种装着龙头的船就是龙舟啦。
TraditionalChinese: 這種裝著龍頭的船就是龍舟啦。
English: The boats with the Dragon Heads are Dragon Boats.

Standard: 每年端午节，龙水县的各个镇会一起划龙舟。
Chinese: 每年端午节，龙水县的各个镇会一起划龙舟。
TraditionalChinese: 每年端午節，龍水縣的各個鎮會一起劃龍舟。
English: Every year during Duanwu， all the towns around Longshui County will come together and row Dragon Boats.
This is what we call a Dragon Tour.

Standard: 只是芷滨镇从不参加，你没什么机会看到。
Chinese: 只是芷滨镇从不参加，你没什么机会看到。
TraditionalChinese: 只是芷濱鎮從不參加，你沒什麼機會看到。
English: It's just that Zhibin never joined， so you never s aw it.
Why didn't they join?
We never had a Dragon Boat.

Standard: 旧的那条在几十年前就坏掉了。
Chinese: 旧的那条在几十年前就坏掉了。
TraditionalChinese: 舊的那條在幾十年前就壞掉了。
English: The old one broke decades ago.
Then we never got a new one.

Standard: 那妈妈为什么要做这个龙头啊？
Chinese: 那妈妈为什么要做这个龙头啊？
TraditionalChinese: 那媽媽為什麼要做這個龍頭啊？
English: Then why did mom make a Dragon Head?
We don't even have a Dragon Boat.
Because for Grandpa.
Grandpa?
Basket Grandpa.
Did Mom ever tell you?

Standard: 他在生产队织竹篮子，个个都叫他打篮公。
Chinese: 他在生产队织竹篮子，个个都叫他打篮公。
TraditionalChinese: 他在生產隊織竹籃子，個個都叫他打籃公。
English: He was in the factory that made baskets， so everyone called him Basket Grandpa.
Oh， I've heard the name before.

Standard: 他年轻时是镇上有名的木匠。
Chinese: 他年轻时是镇上有名的木匠。
TraditionalChinese: 他年輕時是鎮上有名的木匠。
English: When he was young there was a very famous carpenter in town.

Standard: 几十年前的老龙头就是他做的。
Chinese: 几十年前的老龙头就是他做的。
TraditionalChinese: 幾十年前的老龍頭就是他做的。
English: That person made the old Dragon Head.

Standard: 他很希望自己做的龙头可以再去一次游龙。
Chinese: 他很希望自己做的龙头可以再去一次游龙。
TraditionalChinese: 他很希望自己做的龍頭可以再去一次遊龍。
English: They always hoped their dragon Head can join the Dragon Tour.
But they never saw it again.

Standard: 你妈妈从小跟着外公学木工，和他感情很好。
Chinese: 你妈妈从小跟着外公学木工，和他感情很好。
TraditionalChinese: 你媽媽從小跟著外公學木工，和他感情很好。
English: Your mom learned carpentry from your grandpa， and was a really good friend of theirs.

Standard: 老龙头朽掉以后，她就做了个一模一样的。
Chinese: 老龙头朽掉以后，她就做了个一模一样的。
TraditionalChinese: 老龍頭朽掉以後，她就做了個一模一樣的。
English: So when the old Dragon Head rotted away， she made one just like it.

Standard: 想着将来有一天可以用在新龙舟上。
Chinese: 想着将来有一天可以用在新龙舟上。
TraditionalChinese: 想著將來有一天可以用在新龍舟上。
English: Thinking one day it will go on a new Dragon Boat.

Standard: 所以这是你妈妈外公的心愿，也是她的心愿。
Chinese: 所以这是你妈妈外公的心愿，也是她的心愿。
TraditionalChinese: 所以這是你媽媽外公的心願，也是她的心願。
English: So this is Grandpa's wish， and your mom's wish.
...Mom's wish.

Standard: 那现在我们有龙舟了，是不是可以去游龙了？
Chinese: 那现在我们有龙舟了，是不是可以去游龙了？
TraditionalChinese: 那現在我們有龍舟了，是不是可以去遊龍了？
English: Now that we have a Dragon Boat， we can go on the Dragon Tour?
Maybe not.
Why not?

Standard: 船不做好，我不敢叫人报名。
Chinese: 船不做好，我不敢叫人报名。
TraditionalChinese: 船不做好，我不敢叫人報名。
English: If we don't have anyone to row I don't want to sign up.

Standard: 现在一个划船的人都还没有。
Chinese: 现在一个划船的人都还没有。
TraditionalChinese: 現在一個划船的人都還沒有。
English: We don't even have one rower.

Standard: 可县里突然又通知说，这周之内要上交名单。
Chinese: 可县里突然又通知说，这周之内要上交名单。
TraditionalChinese: 可縣裏突然又通知說，這周之內要上交名單。
English: But now the County says we have to send in a name list within a week.
We have to have a full team to join.

Standard: 文化站很忙，我没办法专门去搞这件事。
Chinese: 文化站很忙，我没办法专门去搞这件事。
TraditionalChinese: 文化站很忙，我沒辦法專門去搞這件事。
English: The Cultural Station is very busy， I can't manage this.

Standard: 时间这么紧，可能来不及了。
Chinese: 时间这么紧，可能来不及了。
TraditionalChinese: 時間這麼緊，可能來不及了。
English: And the timeline is so tight， I don't think we can make it.
I'll sign up!
Haha， you can't.
It takes lots of strength to ow.
Then...My dad too!

Standard: 荔荔，你知道一艘龙舟有多少人吗？
Chinese: 荔荔，你知道一艘龙舟有多少人吗？
TraditionalChinese: 荔荔，你知道一艘龍舟有多少人嗎？
English: Lili， do you know how many people are needed for a team?
A drummer， cymbal player， and helmsperson， one each.
24 rowers.
A total of 27.

Standard: 就算你跟你爸都去了，也还差得远。
Chinese: 就算你跟你爸都去了，也还差得远。
TraditionalChinese: 就算你跟你爸都去了，也還差得遠。
English: Even you and your dad went， it's still very far away.
Then...then what?
I'll try my best to find people， okay?
If we can't， then next year.
Next year definitely.
Don't worry Lili.

Standard: 先折袖子，再折上面，再折下面。
Chinese: 先折袖子，再折上面，再折下面。
TraditionalChinese: 先折袖子，再折上面，再折下麵。
English: Fold the sleeves， fold the top， then the bottom.

Standard: 侧面折一半，再一半，搞定。
Chinese: 侧面折一半，再一半，搞定。
TraditionalChinese: 側面折一半，再一半，搞定。
English: Then fold half on each side， and done.
Easy， got it?

Standard: 你不要一下子就对折，对折它就不成形了。
Chinese: 你不要一下子就对折，对折它就不成形了。
TraditionalChinese: 你不要一下子就對折，對折它就不成形了。
English: Don't fold in half right away， otherwise it won't work.
Sob-
Why are you crying?
I'm not criticizing you.
I'm just telling you how it's done.
Mommy...taught me before....
I...I forgot...
So， you forgot.
Now you know again.
Sob-
Wah-
Don't cry.
I...I don't know...
I just...I just want to cry..
It's okay， it's okay.
I didn't do it right.
It's just folding clothes， no big deal.
You'll learn after a few times.
The things mom taught me...
I can't do well...
I can't help her...
Do what she wants to do...
What does she want you to help her with?
You don't need to help.
I want to help her...
Do the Dragon Boat...
I want Mommy to be happy...
Don't worry about it.
You take care of yourself.
If you're happy， she's happy.
It's okay.
Not gonna count the money?
Not afraid I'll short change you?
Nah.
If you shortchange me I'll just take the purses.
Haha.

Standard: 现在工厂要账的真的是这样。
Chinese: 现在工厂要账的真的是这样。
TraditionalChinese: 現在工廠要賬的真的是這樣。
English: That's really how it is sometimes though.

Standard: 拿不到钱就直接把对面老板的车子都开走。
Chinese: 拿不到钱就直接把对面老板的车子都开走。
TraditionalChinese: 拿不到錢就直接把對面老闆的車子都開走。
English: If they don't get paid they just drive the bosses' car away
Anyways， hope we can work together more in the future.
Yeah， definitely again.
Alright， see ya.
Yeah， thanks.
Bye.
Bye.
(Still early.)

Standard: （去问问老莫他们能不能帮忙划龙舟。）
Chinese: （去问问老莫他们能不能帮忙划龙舟。）
TraditionalChinese: （去問問老莫他們能不能幫忙劃龍舟。）
English: (Maybe go see if Old Mo and them want to row the Boat.)
(Then after pick up the kid from school.)

Standard: 老莫的照相馆在派出所那条街。
Chinese: 老莫的照相馆在派出所那条街。
TraditionalChinese: 老莫的照相館在派出所那條街。
English: Old Mo's Photo shop is near the police station.
Hong Ping is at their stand near the market.
Old Wei's over on old street.
Wu Ming's office is being renovated.

Standard: 临时借用了中学的旧校舍来办公。
Chinese: 临时借用了中学的旧校舍来办公。
TraditionalChinese: 臨時借用了中學的舊校舍來辦公。
English: They're using the old dorms as offices.

Standard: 之前陪地主妹看过一个动画片，叫《机器狗》。
Chinese: 之前陪地主妹看过一个动画片，叫《机器狗》。
TraditionalChinese: 之前陪地主妹看過一個動畫片，叫《機器狗》。
English: The kid to watched a cartoon movie， “Robot Dog”.
They had a gadget that was a door.

Standard: 自己想好去哪里，打开门就是那个地方。
Chinese: 自己想好去哪里，打开门就是那个地方。
TraditionalChinese: 自己想好去哪里，打開門就是那個地方。
English: Once you thnk of where you want to go， you open the door and there you are.

Standard: 真有那玩意儿就好了，多方便啊。
Chinese: 真有那玩意儿就好了，多方便啊。
TraditionalChinese: 真有那玩意兒就好了，多方便啊。
English: It'd be so nice if that was real， how convenient.

Standard: 最好是能用来开车送货，绝对发大财。
Chinese: 最好是能用来开车送货，绝对发大财。
TraditionalChinese: 最好是能用來開車送貨，絕對發大財。
English: If you can use it to make deliveries， you'd make a lot of money.

Standard: 算了，别做梦了，一步一步自己走吧。
Chinese: 算了，别做梦了，一步一步自己走吧。
TraditionalChinese: 算了，別做夢了，一步一步自己走吧。
English: Bah， no time to daydream， better do it myself one step at a time.

Standard: 看地图看半天，还不如走起来。
Chinese: 看地图看半天，还不如走起来。
TraditionalChinese: 看地圖看半天，還不如走起來。
English: Instead of staring at the map， better to just start walking.

Standard: 芷滨发展得不错，该有的都有了。
Chinese: 芷滨发展得不错，该有的都有了。
TraditionalChinese: 芷濱發展得不錯，該有的都有了。
English: Zhibin's development is coming along， we have everything we're supposed to have.

Standard: 有些路好久没走过了，有的人也很久没来往。
Chinese: 有些路好久没走过了，有的人也很久没来往。
TraditionalChinese: 有些路好久沒走過了，有的人也很久沒來往。
English: Haven't walked down some streets， and haven't said hi to lots of people.

Standard: 闲逛一下也问题不大，可别忘了要做的事情。
Chinese: 闲逛一下也问题不大，可别忘了要做的事情。
TraditionalChinese: 閒逛一下也問題不大，可別忘了要做的事情。
English: Shouldn't be a big problem to wander around a bit， but still， gotta remember what I gotta do.
Grandma， can you let go?
There's a customer here.
Mou jiu gwo kei! (Don't go there!)
Ngai m teng gong! (You're not listening)
Why can't I go there?!

Standard: 哎班拧，嘟系坏拧！（那些人都是坏人！）
Chinese: 哎班拧，嘟系坏拧！（那些人都是坏人！）
TraditionalChinese: 哎班擰，嘟系壞擰！（那些人都是壞人！）
English: Aai baan ling， dyut hai waai ling! (They're all bad people!)

Standard: 涯毋见过佢地。（我没见过她们。）
Chinese: 涯毋见过佢地。（我没见过她们。）
TraditionalChinese: 涯毋見過佢地。（我沒見過她們。）
English: Ngaai mou gin gwo keoi dei! (I've never seen them before)
You say you've never seen them before.
How do you know they're bad people?
Zau gaak zau gaak (Let's go let's go)
Faai dik zau jaa! (Hurry and go!)
Go where? I have to work
My shop is here!
Old Mo!
Old Qin?
What's going on?
Customers are still waiting in the store.
This auntie isn't letting me leave.
Why?
I don't know.

Standard: 阿奶，好耐毋见咯！（阿奶，好久不见！）
Chinese: 阿奶，好耐毋见咯！（阿奶，好久不见！）
TraditionalChinese: 阿奶，好耐毋見咯！（阿奶，好久不見！）
English: Aa Naai， Hou noi mou gin gaak! (Granny， it's been a while!)
Do you recognize him?
Qin Munan， the driver!
....Feibao!
Hai Feibou mat?! (Is it Feibao?!)
....Yeah! He's Feibao!
...Who's Feibao?
Doesn't matter just say it's you.

Standard: 真系飞宝啊？（真的是飞宝啊？）
Chinese: 真系飞宝啊？（真的是飞宝啊？）
TraditionalChinese: 真系飛寶啊？（真的是飛寶啊？）
English: Zan hai Feibou aa? (Is it really you Feibao?)

Standard: ……系哦，涯系飞宝哦。（是，我是飞宝。）
Chinese: ……系哦，涯系飞宝哦。（是，我是飞宝。）
TraditionalChinese: ……系哦，涯系飛寶哦。（是，我是飛寶。）
English: ...Hai ngo， Ngaa hai Feibou ngo. (Yeah， I'm Feibao.)

Standard: 飞宝哦！咹久至翻来啊？（这么久才回来？）
Chinese: 飞宝哦！咹久至翻来啊？（这么久才回来？）
TraditionalChinese: 飛寶哦！咹久至翻來啊？（這麼久才回來？）
English: Feibou ngo! Hon gau zi faan loi aa? (Feibao! Why'd it take you so long?)
Row the Dragon Boat? Sure!
When?
Hang on， let's not talk about this now.
Granny...
Yeah， she's not really clear minded.
Can't remember things， forgets people.
And you still let her go out?!

Standard: 不怕的，她听着收音机就不会跑。
Chinese: 不怕的，她听着收音机就不会跑。
TraditionalChinese: 不怕的，她聽著收音機就不會跑。
English: Don't worry，， if she's got her radio she won't walk away.
At least until the song is over.
She walked away before?
Yeah! Lots of times!

Standard: 刚不对劲那阵子，经常半夜自己跑出去。
Chinese: 刚不对劲那阵子，经常半夜自己跑出去。
TraditionalChinese: 剛不對勁那陣子，經常半夜自己跑出去。
English: When she first started showing signs， she would go out on her own in the middle of the night.

Standard: 一家人手忙脚乱的，满大街找遍都不见她。
Chinese: 一家人手忙脚乱的，满大街找遍都不见她。
TraditionalChinese: 一家人手忙腳亂的，滿大街找遍都不見她。
English: Everyone was scrambling and no one could find her.

Standard: 直到有人发现了，送到派出所。
Chinese: 直到有人发现了，送到派出所。
TraditionalChinese: 直到有人發現了，送到派出所。
English: Until someone found her and brought her to the police station.
Then we had to go bring her back.
Why not leave her at home?
Isn't it more difficult to watch her in the shop?
She thinks I'm her brother.

Standard: 一旦看不见我，她就闹脾气。
Chinese: 一旦看不见我，她就闹脾气。
TraditionalChinese: 一旦看不見我，她就鬧脾氣。
English: If she can't see me she throws a fit.
Luckily you showed up in time.
Otherwise I couldn't do business.
Thanks， Feibao!
Fuck off.
Who is Feibao anyways?
Her youngest brother.
I'm also her brother now?
She rambles on about home everyday.

Standard: 雨雪满天飞，五姐弟，她是大姐。
Chinese: 雨雪满天飞，五姐弟，她是大姐。
TraditionalChinese: 雨雪滿天飛，五姐弟，她是大姐。
English: There's a total of five of us， she's the oldest.
She thinks I'm the third brother， Ah Man.

Standard: 估计听见你讲麻介话，也把你当成阿飞了。
Chinese: 估计听见你讲麻介话，也把你当成阿飞了。
TraditionalChinese: 估計聽見你講麻介話，也把你當成阿飛了。
English: I guess she heard you speaking the local dialect and thought you were Ah Fei.
Where's Grandma from.
Somewhere around the border of Guangdong and Jiangxi I think.
I think you did mention it.
Is your mom Hakka?

Standard: 我妈本地的，我爸才是客家。
Chinese: 我妈本地的，我爸才是客家。
TraditionalChinese: 我媽本地的，我爸才是客家。
English: No my mom's local， my dad's Hakka.

Standard: 东南部那几个县，具体哪个他也不清楚。
Chinese: 东南部那几个县，具体哪个他也不清楚。
TraditionalChinese: 東南部那幾個縣，具體哪個他也不清楚。
English: Somewhere in the Southeast counties， not sure exactly where.

Standard: 他四五岁就跟他舅逃难过来了。
Chinese: 他四五岁就跟他舅逃难过来了。
TraditionalChinese: 他四五歲就跟他舅逃難過來了。
English: At four or five he and uncle escaped here.
A natural disaster year?
Yeah， mostly flooding.

Standard: 南部平原多，地肥，但是经常发大水。
Chinese: 南部平原多，地肥，但是经常发大水。
TraditionalChinese: 南部平原多，地肥，但是經常發大水。
English: Lots of flatland in the south， real rich soil， but floods often.

Standard: 北部虽然全是石头，好歹安宁些。
Chinese: 北部虽然全是石头，好歹安宁些。
TraditionalChinese: 北部雖然全是石頭，好歹安寧些。
English: Lotta rocks up north， but at least it's more calm.

Standard: 我奶那个年代，什么原因就不懂啦。
Chinese: 我奶那个年代，什么原因就不懂啦。
TraditionalChinese: 我奶那個年代，什麼原因就不懂啦。
English: My Grandma's time period? I don't know much about it.

Standard: 十来岁就跟家人失散，这辈子没再见过。
Chinese: 十来岁就跟家人失散，这辈子没再见过。
TraditionalChinese: 十來歲就跟家人失散，這輩子沒再見過。
English: She was separated from her family when she was in her teens， then never saw them again.

Standard: 结果现在她成这样了，喊的还是他们的名字。
Chinese: 结果现在她成这样了，喊的还是他们的名字。
TraditionalChinese: 結果現在她成這樣了，喊的還是他們的名字。
English: Now she's like this， still calling for them.
That's normal， she misses home.

Standard: 人家都讲，人老了，就变回娃仔了。
Chinese: 人家都讲，人老了，就变回娃仔了。
TraditionalChinese: 人家都講，人老了，就變回娃仔了。
English: Everyone says， you turn back to a kid when you get older.
Heh， that's funny.

Standard: 我小时候被她管着，不让出门。
Chinese: 我小时候被她管着，不让出门。
TraditionalChinese: 我小時候被她管著，不讓出門。
English: When I was a kid， she would always watch over me and not let me run around.

Standard: 她老了，我要看着她，还是不能出门。
Chinese: 她老了，我要看着她，还是不能出门。
TraditionalChinese: 她老了，我要看著她，還是不能出門。
English: Now that she's old， I've to watch over her， and I still can't run around.

Standard: 当年她把你带大，也该轮到你照顾她了。
Chinese: 当年她把你带大，也该轮到你照顾她了。
TraditionalChinese: 當年她把你帶大，也該輪到你照顧她了。
English: She raised you， so now it's your turn to take care of her.
Of course.
I will do my duty.
Then you can't go row the Dragon Boat.
Why not?
Who is taking care of Grandma if you're not home?

Standard: 我爸妈在家呀，两个姑偶尔也会来看看。
Chinese: 我爸妈在家呀，两个姑偶尔也会来看看。
TraditionalChinese: 我爸媽在家呀，兩個姑偶爾也會來看看。
English: My mom and dad， my two aunts will come by every so often too.
So you got it covered?
Yeah.

Standard: 没影响的，我又不是不回家。
Chinese: 没影响的，我又不是不回家。
TraditionalChinese: 沒影響的，我又不是不回家。
English: It won't be a big problem， it's not like I'm not coming home.
Don't have to force yourself.
It's fine.
We've been friends for so many years.

Standard: 加上我真的佩服阿凤的为人。
Chinese: 加上我真的佩服阿凤的为人。
TraditionalChinese: 加上我真的佩服阿鳳的為人。
English: Plus， I really look up to Ah Feng and how she carried herself.

Standard: 别的不说，光敬老爱老这方面就很了不起。
Chinese: 别的不说，光敬老爱老这方面就很了不起。
TraditionalChinese: 別的不說，光敬老愛老這方面就很了不起。
English: Not counting anything else， just the respesct she has for elders is already incredible.
Yeah， don't need to flatter.
Not flattering， I mean it.

Standard: 你岳父佬一家，早都到城里发财去了吧？
Chinese: 你岳父佬一家，早都到城里发财去了吧？
TraditionalChinese: 你岳父佬一家，早都到城裏發財去了吧？
English: Your in laws must be raking it in in the city right?
Renovations are quite the thing these days.
Maybe， I didn't ask.

Standard: 阿凤因为答应了外公，要继承这么手艺。
Chinese: 阿凤因为答应了外公，要继承这么手艺。
TraditionalChinese: 阿鳳因為答應了外公，要繼承這麼手藝。
English: Ah Feng stayed because she promised her dad that she will carry the torch for this art.

Standard: 硬是留在了这破乡下，一留就是十把年。
Chinese: 硬是留在了这破乡下，一留就是十把年。
TraditionalChinese: 硬是留在了這破鄉下，一留就是十把年。
English: And stubbornly stayed here， for decades.
She insisted on staying the course of her sculpting.

Standard: 到头来还是她给外公外婆养老送终的。
Chinese: 到头来还是她给外公外婆养老送终的。
TraditionalChinese: 到頭來還是她給外公外婆養老送終的。
English: She was the one who cared for her parents until the end.

Standard: 除了她，我没见过有谁能做到这份上。
Chinese: 除了她，我没见过有谁能做到这份上。
TraditionalChinese: 除了她，我沒見過有誰能做到這份上。
English: I've never seen anyone do as much as she has.

Standard: 所以这个忙我是一定会帮的，你放心吧。
Chinese: 所以这个忙我是一定会帮的，你放心吧。
TraditionalChinese: 所以這個忙我是一定會幫的，你放心吧。
English: So， I will definitely help you with the Dragon Boat， don't worry.
No problem， I'll sign up.
There's going to be training and such later.

Standard: 可能要占用一些你摆摊的时间。
Chinese: 可能要占用一些你摆摊的时间。
TraditionalChinese: 可能要佔用一些你擺攤的時間。
English: Might take up some of your time from selling.
Don't worry， my grandma's here.

Standard: 我平时也经常回作坊，或者去采购。
Chinese: 我平时也经常回作坊，或者去采购。
TraditionalChinese: 我平時也經常回作坊，或者去採購。
English: I'll also run errands normally too.

Standard: 她就守在这儿，帮我把东西卖掉。
Chinese: 她就守在这儿，帮我把东西卖掉。
TraditionalChinese: 她就守在這兒，幫我把東西賣掉。
English: She helps me manage the stand.
We're used to it.
I have to help her wrap up too!
Mhm， you do the hardest work.
Hard work? Not hard.
Hongping， sorry.
Affecting your business.
Brother Nan， don't say that.

Standard: 你们俩帮了我这么多，我帮回你们是应该的。
Chinese: 你们俩帮了我这么多，我帮回你们是应该的。
TraditionalChinese: 你們倆幫了我這麼多，我幫回你們是應該的。
English: You two helped me so much， I should repay you.

Standard: 要不是有你们，当初我都放弃做烧腊了。
Chinese: 要不是有你们，当初我都放弃做烧腊了。
TraditionalChinese: 要不是有你們，當初我都放棄做燒臘了。
English: If it weren't for you two， I would have given up making BBQ.
No way， it wasn't that much.

Standard: 我们就白吃白喝，顺便提了点意见。
Chinese: 我们就白吃白喝，顺便提了点意见。
TraditionalChinese: 我們就白吃白喝，順便提了點意見。
English: We just ate for free and gave our feedback.

Standard: 试吃很重要啊，不然我哪知道自己做成哪样？
Chinese: 试吃很重要啊，不然我哪知道自己做成哪样？
TraditionalChinese: 試吃很重要啊，不然我哪知道自己做成哪樣？
English: Taste testing is important， otherwise how else would I know how I'm doing?

Standard: 还有，我去广东打工，也是问你借的钱。
Chinese: 还有，我去广东打工，也是问你借的钱。
TraditionalChinese: 還有，我去廣東打工，也是問你借的錢。
English: Also， when I went to Guangdong for work， you were the one who lent me money.

Standard: 我就是在那个酒楼看到有师傅烧烧鹅。
Chinese: 我就是在那个酒楼看到有师傅烧烧鹅。
TraditionalChinese: 我就是在那個酒樓看到有師傅燒燒鵝。
English: That's when I saw the chef making roast goose.
And that's how I learned what to do.

Standard: 那是你有本事，跟我们没关系。
Chinese: 那是你有本事，跟我们没关系。
TraditionalChinese: 那是你有本事，跟我們沒關係。
English: That's because you have the ability， got nothing to do with us.
It was Yunfeng who always encouraged me.

Standard: 她说，没有正不正宗，只有好不好吃。
Chinese: 她说，没有正不正宗，只有好不好吃。
TraditionalChinese: 她說，沒有正不正宗，只有好不好吃。
English: She always said， “It's not about authenticity， it's about being delicious.”

Standard: 就像做木工一样，不是一成不变的。
Chinese: 就像做木工一样，不是一成不变的。
TraditionalChinese: 就像做木工一樣，不是一成不變的。
English: “Just like carpentry， it's not like it doesn't change.”

Standard: 要不断地学习和改良，才能越做越好。
Chinese: 要不断地学习和改良，才能越做越好。
TraditionalChinese: 要不斷地學習和改良，才能越做越好。
English: “You have to keep learning and improving， that's how you get better.”
I'll always remember those words.
Who are you talking about?
I was talking about Yunfeng， Li Yunfeng!
Ah Nan's wife!
Oh， that girl!
She's strong!
How could I not join?!?

Standard: 我跟阿凤是一条战线上的战友。
Chinese: 我跟阿凤是一条战线上的战友。
TraditionalChinese: 我跟阿鳳是一條戰線上的戰友。
English: I was her compatriot in battle!
I have to support her!
...what battle?
She's a woodworker， I'm a musician.

Standard: 我们都是继承传统技艺的人。
Chinese: 我们都是继承传统技艺的人。
TraditionalChinese: 我們都是繼承傳統技藝的人。
English: We're all carrying on traditional arts.

Standard: 都肩负着弘扬传统文化的光荣使命。
Chinese: 都肩负着弘扬传统文化的光荣使命。
TraditionalChinese: 都肩負著弘揚傳統文化的光榮使命。
English: We all carry the responsibility to pass down tradition!
Ain't that right?
Yep， you're right.
Hahahaha.
Remember the time we were studying?

Standard: 我们得空就去村里面，跟那帮老爹学拉二胡。
Chinese: 我们得空就去村里面，跟那帮老爹学拉二胡。
TraditionalChinese: 我們得空就去村裏面，跟那幫老爹學拉二胡。
English: We had to go to the town to learn erhu from those uncles.
Not just erhu.

Standard: 锣镲鼓、三弦、唢呐、小号、口琴、芦笙。
Chinese: 锣镲鼓、三弦、唢呐、小号、口琴、芦笙。
TraditionalChinese: 鑼鑔鼓、三弦、嗩呐、小號、口琴、蘆笙。
English: The gongs， sanxian， suona， trumpet， harmonica， lusheng.
And folksongs too.
Sigh.
A blink of an eye and it's been so long.
Twenty years now?
Not yet， 16 or 17.
How have you been， good?
Same old， same old.
You?
After Duanwu I'm going back to Guangdong.

Standard: 我在那边搞了个乐队，跟几个朋友。
Chinese: 我在那边搞了个乐队，跟几个朋友。
TraditionalChinese: 我在那邊搞了個樂隊，跟幾個朋友。
English: Started a band with some friends.

Standard: 平时在酒吧表演，弹弹吉他，唱唱歌。
Chinese: 平时在酒吧表演，弹弹吉他，唱唱歌。
TraditionalChinese: 平時在酒吧表演，彈彈吉他，唱唱歌。
English: Normally we just perform in a club， play some guitar， sing a few songs.

Standard: 运气好的时候，一晚上能赚几十块。
Chinese: 运气好的时候，一晚上能赚几十块。
TraditionalChinese: 運氣好的時候，一晚上能賺幾十塊。
English: When we're lucky we can make some money.
That's good.

Standard: 我有时也在想，要不就干脆放弃戏曲吧。
Chinese: 我有时也在想，要不就干脆放弃戏曲吧。
TraditionalChinese: 我有時也在想，要不就乾脆放棄戲曲吧。
English: Sometimes I would think I should just hang it up.

Standard: 演出机会本来就不多，我又不在地区剧团干。
Chinese: 演出机会本来就不多，我又不在地区剧团干。
TraditionalChinese: 演出機會本來就不多，我又不在地區劇團幹。
English: There's already not many chances to perform and I can't join the regional group.

Standard: 没有工资，没有职称，更不可能分到房子。
Chinese: 没有工资，没有职称，更不可能分到房子。
TraditionalChinese: 沒有工資，沒有職稱，更不可能分到房子。
English: No work， no professional title， definitely can't get a house.
But I don't want to give it up.

Standard: 我十一岁开始拉二胡，对民乐感情太深了。
Chinese: 我十一岁开始拉二胡，对民乐感情太深了。
TraditionalChinese: 我十一歲開始拉二胡，對民樂感情太深了。
English: I started playing the erhu at 11， I love folk music too much.

Standard: 祖宗留下的东西，断了还是蛮可惜的。
Chinese: 祖宗留下的东西，断了还是蛮可惜的。
TraditionalChinese: 祖宗留下的東西，斷了還是蠻可惜的。
English: It's passed down from our ancestors， losing it would be a shame.

Standard: 后来是因为一次经历，让我打消了这个念头。
Chinese: 后来是因为一次经历，让我打消了这个念头。
TraditionalChinese: 後來是因為一次經歷，讓我打消了這個念頭。
English: Something happened that changed my mind about quitting.
What was it?

Standard: 刚过完年，我去村里，帮人做了场白事。
Chinese: 刚过完年，我去村里，帮人做了场白事。
TraditionalChinese: 剛過完年，我去村裏，幫人做了場白事。
English: Just after new years， I went to town to do a funeral.
95 year old.

Standard: 那家人想要不太欢快，又不太悲伤的音乐。
Chinese: 那家人想要不太欢快，又不太悲伤的音乐。
TraditionalChinese: 那家人想要不太歡快，又不太悲傷的音樂。
English: The family didn't want something too happy or sad.

Standard: 换了几个曲子，他们都不满意。
Chinese: 换了几个曲子，他们都不满意。
TraditionalChinese: 換了幾個曲子，他們都不滿意。
English: I kept changing the song， and they still weren't happy.
That's rough..
I was getting upset.

Standard: 突然间，想起以前采风得来的一首歌。
Chinese: 突然间，想起以前采风得来的一首歌。
TraditionalChinese: 突然間，想起以前采風得來的一首歌。
English: Suddenly I remembered a song I learned from someone else.

Standard: 心想那就试试呗，不行就罢。
Chinese: 心想那就试试呗，不行就罢。
TraditionalChinese: 心想那就試試唄，不行就罷。
English: I was thinking I'll try that， if it doesn't work then whatever.

Standard: 哪晓得音乐还没结束，他们就大声哭起来。
Chinese: 哪晓得音乐还没结束，他们就大声哭起来。
TraditionalChinese: 哪曉得音樂還沒結束，他們就大聲哭起來。
English: Who knew， before the song ended， everyone started crying.
Why?

Standard: 原来老人生前，最喜欢哼的就是这个调调。
Chinese: 原来老人生前，最喜欢哼的就是这个调调。
TraditionalChinese: 原來老人生前，最喜歡哼的就是這個調調。
English: Because that happened to be the decedent's favorite song to hum.

Standard: 不过他就光会哼，不晓得歌曲的名字和意义。
Chinese: 不过他就光会哼，不晓得歌曲的名字和意义。
TraditionalChinese: 不過他就光會哼，不曉得歌曲的名字和意義。
English: But he only knew how to hum it， didn't know the name of the song or the meaning.

Standard: 那是他小时候当堤工，从河边渔家听来的。
Chinese: 那是他小时候当堤工，从河边渔家听来的。
TraditionalChinese: 那是他小時候當堤工，從河邊漁家聽來的。
English: He said he learned it from fishermen when he was working near the river.

Standard: 他一辈子都想知道这首是什么歌。
Chinese: 他一辈子都想知道这首是什么歌。
TraditionalChinese: 他一輩子都想知道這首是什麼歌。
English: He always wanted to know what the song was.

Standard: 直到那天，人不在了，才由我告诉他的家人。
Chinese: 直到那天，人不在了，才由我告诉他的家人。
TraditionalChinese: 直到那天，人不在了，才由我告訴他的家人。
English: It wasn't until the day he left， that the family was able to learn through me.
Isn't that strange?
What a coincidence.

Standard: 那一刻我就觉得，自己做的事是有意义的。
Chinese: 那一刻我就觉得，自己做的事是有意义的。
TraditionalChinese: 那一刻我就覺得，自己做的事是有意義的。
English: At that time I felt like what I do has meaning.

Standard: 包括阿凤做这个龙头，终归也是有意义的。
Chinese: 包括阿凤做这个龙头，终归也是有意义的。
TraditionalChinese: 包括阿鳳做這個龍頭，終歸也是有意義的。
English: Including Ah Feng's Dragon Head， there's a meaning.

Standard: 有点东西，可能跟不上潮流了。
Chinese: 有点东西，可能跟不上潮流了。
TraditionalChinese: 有點東西，可能跟不上潮流了。
English: Some things can't keep up with the times.
But they shouldn't disappear.
Comrade， come to learn?
What took you so long?
The talk is over.
No， not that， Director.
Is Wu Ming here?
Oh， looking for Little Wu， hang on.
Oh， sure thing， cousin.
I can go.
But I've never rowed a Dragon Boat before.
I...I don't want to be a burden.
Don't worry about it.

Standard: 游龙不是真比赛，没有那么计较成绩。
Chinese: 游龙不是真比赛，没有那么计较成绩。
TraditionalChinese: 遊龍不是真比賽，沒有那麼計較成績。
English: The Tour isn't a real race， no one's really caring about where you place.
Everyone's doing it for the sake of doing it.
So like a ceremony?
Yea， a ceremony.
It's for good luck.
Oh， okay.
Count me in.

Standard: 不止端午那天哦，平日也要训练的。
Chinese: 不止端午那天哦，平日也要训练的。
TraditionalChinese: 不止端午那天哦，平日也要訓練的。
English: It's not just Duanwu， there's training involved too.
Will it affect your work?
No， it won't.
Right now it's easy.

Standard: 插完秧，施过肥，不用怎么管了。
Chinese: 插完秧，施过肥，不用怎么管了。
TraditionalChinese: 插完秧，施過肥，不用怎麼管了。
English: After we planted the rice and added fertilizer we just wait.
Just afraid of a spring frost.
The weather is a bit weird.
Yeah， it's not usually like this.

Standard: 所以要指导乡亲们做好水肥管理，不能松懈。
Chinese: 所以要指导乡亲们做好水肥管理，不能松懈。
TraditionalChinese: 所以要指導鄉親們做好水肥管理，不能鬆懈。
English: So we have to work on telling people to manage their fields properly and don't get too relaxed.
They listen to you?
Didn't they not trust you?
No， int he past they just didn't understand.

Standard: 说农技站就是群骗子，说我们搞、搞鬼搞怪。
Chinese: 说农技站就是群骗子，说我们搞、搞鬼搞怪。
TraditionalChinese: 說農技站就是群騙子，說我們搞、搞鬼搞怪。
English: They said our agriculture technology station is full of frauds， and making stuff up.
You got through to them?

Standard: 他们看到试验田的收成不错，好像没那么多顾虑了。
Chinese: 他们看到试验田的收成不错，好像没那么多顾虑了。
TraditionalChinese: 他們看到試驗田的收成不錯，好像沒那麼多顧慮了。
English: They saw our testing fields did well， so they weren't so afraid anymore.
Testing fields?
Yeah， Ah Feng gave me that idea.

Standard: 当时我还打算挨家挨户做思想工作。
Chinese: 当时我还打算挨家挨户做思想工作。
TraditionalChinese: 當時我還打算挨家挨戶做思想工作。
English: At that time I was thinking about going door to door to ask.

Standard: 表姐说，你劝一百句，不如种出一亩地。
Chinese: 表姐说，你劝一百句，不如种出一亩地。
TraditionalChinese: 表姐說，你勸一百句，不如種出一畝地。
English: She said， “Instead of trying to say 100 words， just plant 1 field.”

Standard: 像样板一样，人家看到心里自然就有谱了。
Chinese: 像样板一样，人家看到心里自然就有谱了。
TraditionalChinese: 像樣板一樣，人家看到心裏自然就有譜了。
English: “Like an example， once everyone sees it they will know.”

Standard: 后、后来我跟领导说，领导也同意。
Chinese: 后、后来我跟领导说，领导也同意。
TraditionalChinese: 後、後來我跟領導說，領導也同意。
English: Then， then I asked the Director. The Director agreed.

Standard: 我就找了试验种植户，签了合同。
Chinese: 我就找了试验种植户，签了合同。
TraditionalChinese: 我就找了試驗種植戶，簽了合同。
English: So I found someone willing to let us run an experiment and signed an agreement.

Standard: 有了试验田，群众可以亲眼看到产量。
Chinese: 有了试验田，群众可以亲眼看到产量。
TraditionalChinese: 有了試驗田，群眾可以親眼看到產量。
English: Once we had the test field， everyone can see the results.

Standard: 新的技术行不行，他们自己心里有数。
Chinese: 新的技术行不行，他们自己心里有数。
TraditionalChinese: 新的技術行不行，他們自己心裏有數。
English: If the new technology is good， they will know.
Yeah， use reality to tell the truth.

Standard: 你开了个好头，后面就简单了。
Chinese: 你开了个好头，后面就简单了。
TraditionalChinese: 你開了個好頭，後面就簡單了。
English: Once you get a good start， the rest is easier.
C，Cousin.
7th day of the 7th month， are you busy?
7th day of the 7th month， not sure.
That's still a bit a ways away.
Why， what's up?
Xiao Yu and I are get， getting married.
Want to invite， invite everyone.
Oh， married? That's great!
Finally.
Dating for a while yeah?
Two years.
Did you get the license?
Got it， last week.
Your parents must be happy.
Finally married.
If you're free come， come join.
Of course， definitely.
Can I bring the kid?
Of course.
If Ah Feng was here too that'd be great.

Standard: 全靠她介绍，我才认识小宇。
Chinese: 全靠她介绍，我才认识小宇。
TraditionalChinese: 全靠她介紹，我才認識小宇。
English: All thanks to her， I met Xiao Yu.
So， so， sorry!
Sorry， Cousin!
I just， just rambled.
No， I feel the same.
It'd be great if she was here.

Standard: 我遇到事就会想起她，不管是好事还是坏事。
Chinese: 我遇到事就会想起她，不管是好事还是坏事。
TraditionalChinese: 我遇到事就會想起她，不管是好事還是壞事。
English: Whenever I run into a situation I think of her， good or bad.

Standard: 我都在想，要是她在，她会哪样。
Chinese: 我都在想，要是她在，她会哪样。
TraditionalChinese: 我都在想，要是她在，她會哪樣。
English: I always think what'd she do if she were here.

Standard: 要是她在，我们一起做这件事，又会怎样？
Chinese: 要是她在，我们一起做这件事，又会怎样？
TraditionalChinese: 要是她在，我們一起做這件事，又會怎樣？
English: If she was here， what'd we do together?
Time to go pick up Lili.
(It's almost 5.)
(Time to pick up Lili.)
Great!

Standard: 今天茁荔才刚跟我说了龙头和龙舟的事情。
Chinese: 今天茁荔才刚跟我说了龙头和龙舟的事情。
TraditionalChinese: 今天茁荔才剛跟我說了龍頭和龍舟的事情。
English: Today Zhuoli told me about the Dragon Boat and Dragon Head.
Didn't expect to have so much interest!
She'll be happy if she finds out.
I don't plan on telling her.
Why not?
It might not happen.

Standard: 这种东西，又没得钱，又费时间。
Chinese: 这种东西，又没得钱，又费时间。
TraditionalChinese: 這種東西，又沒得錢，又費時間。
English: This kind of thing， there's no money to be made， and it takes time.

Standard: 人家肯来，是看在过去的情分。
Chinese: 人家肯来，是看在过去的情分。
TraditionalChinese: 人家肯來，是看在過去的情分。
English: People are willing to come because of our connections in the past.

Standard: 我的朋友不多，其他人不可能跟我讲感情的。
Chinese: 我的朋友不多，其他人不可能跟我讲感情的。
TraditionalChinese: 我的朋友不多，其他人不可能跟我講感情的。
English: I don't have many friends， people probably won't be willing to come.

Standard: 万一最后没够人，她又要失望了。
Chinese: 万一最后没够人，她又要失望了。
TraditionalChinese: 萬一最後沒夠人，她又要失望了。
English: If there's not enough people in the end， she'll get disappointed.
Be optimistic， Mister Qin!
There's time still! There's still options!
Hopefully
Huh?
Can women join?
Yeah.
Then count me in!
...You?
I'm not an athlete.

Standard: 不过，只是充数的话，应该没问题吧？
Chinese: 不过，只是充数的话，应该没问题吧？
TraditionalChinese: 不過，只是充數的話，應該沒問題吧？
English: But if you just people that'll be fine right?
Haha， yeah， no problem.
Thank you， Teacher Chen.
You're too kind.

Standard: 我也好奇啊，长这么大还没划过龙舟呢。
Chinese: 我也好奇啊，长这么大还没划过龙舟呢。
TraditionalChinese: 我也好奇啊，長這麼大還沒劃過龍舟呢。
English: I'm also curious， I've never rowed a Dragon Boat before.
I've never really rowed one either.
Also， Mister Qin.

Standard: 我觉得，你没必要瞒着茁荔。
Chinese: 我觉得，你没必要瞒着茁荔。
TraditionalChinese: 我覺得，你沒必要瞞著茁荔。
English: I feel like you don't need to hide this from Zhuoli.

Standard: 反而应该带她一起去，这样更好。
Chinese: 反而应该带她一起去，这样更好。
TraditionalChinese: 反而應該帶她一起去，這樣更好。
English: I think if you take her with you it might be better.
You mean， take her with me to ask for people to join?
Yeah.

Standard: 对她来说，这是妈妈的事情，是很重要的。
Chinese: 对她来说，这是妈妈的事情，是很重要的。
TraditionalChinese: 對她來說，這是媽媽的事情，是很重要的。
English: To her， this is her mom's thing， it's important.

Standard: 她肯定也想帮忙，也想出点力吧？
Chinese: 她肯定也想帮忙，也想出点力吧？
TraditionalChinese: 她肯定也想幫忙，也想出點力吧？
English: She'll want to help and do something， right?

Standard: 而且这正好是个机会，让她接触到更多的人。
Chinese: 而且这正好是个机会，让她接触到更多的人。
TraditionalChinese: 而且這正好是個機會，讓她接觸到更多的人。
English: And also it's a good time for her to meet more people.
Get used to talking to people.

Standard: 你可以放学后带她去，或者礼拜六礼拜天。
Chinese: 你可以放学后带她去，或者礼拜六礼拜天。
TraditionalChinese: 你可以放學後帶她去，或者禮拜六禮拜天。
English: You can take her after school， or Saturday or Sunday.
Don't worry about her schoolwork.

Standard: 这几天上课都很认真，作业也能做完。
Chinese: 这几天上课都很认真，作业也能做完。
TraditionalChinese: 這幾天上課都很認真，作業也能做完。
English: She's been attentive and did her assignments.
Okay， I'll take her then.

Standard: 你都这样说了，我不参加都不行啦。
Chinese: 你都这样说了，我不参加都不行啦。
TraditionalChinese: 你都這樣說了，我不參加都不行啦。
English: If you say it that way， I can't not join.
Not like you do anything else.

Standard: 那我把鱼竿也带上吧，休息的时候能钓钓鱼。
Chinese: 那我把鱼竿也带上吧，休息的时候能钓钓鱼。
TraditionalChinese: 那我把魚竿也帶上吧，休息的時候能釣釣魚。
English: Then I'll bring my fishing pole， when we're resting I can fi sh.
Can you focus a bit?
Lili.
I'm going to go row the Dragon Boat.

Standard: 你跟你爸继续努力啊，再多拉点人入伙。
Chinese: 你跟你爸继续努力啊，再多拉点人入伙。
TraditionalChinese: 你跟你爸繼續努力啊，再多拉點人入夥。
English: You and your dad keep working at it， get more people to join.
Thank you Uncle Ducky.
...Uncle what?
Hahahaha.
Ah? Lili?
...Uncle Ducky.
Why is it Uncle Ducky?
Because you sound like a duck.
All the kids call you that.
Hahahaha.
You don't get it?
Even I heard it before.
How am I like a duck?
How are you not?

Standard: 你在鱼塘钓鱼的时候，我都分不清。
Chinese: 你在鱼塘钓鱼的时候，我都分不清。
TraditionalChinese: 你在魚塘釣魚的時候，我都分不清。
English: When you're fishing I can't even tell the difference.

Standard: 不晓得鸭子是在水里，还是在岸上。
Chinese: 不晓得鸭子是在水里，还是在岸上。
TraditionalChinese: 不曉得鴨子是在水裏，還是在岸上。
English: If the duck is in the water， or on the shore.
Hahahaha.
Uncle， don't smoke anymore.
Daddy says smoking is bad.
You'll cough and turn into a duck.
Don't listen to him.
My voice has always been like this since I was a kid.
Bullshit.
It's from smoking.
Hahahaha.
{wvo}On the bottom， it's a 1.{w=1}
{wvo}On the top， it's a 6.{w=1}
{wvo}Wrong!{w=1}
{wvo}The top is a 5!{w=1}
{wvo}A bottom and a top together is 6.{w=1}
{wvo}Oh， yeah， yeah 5.{w=1}
{wvo}Hahaha.{w=1}
{wvo}You say you know how to use an abacus!{w=1}
{wvo}Better wait for Grandpa.{w=1}
{wvo}Let him teach me.{w=1}
{wvo}You might teach me wrong.{w=1}
{wvo}Calm down!{w=1}
{wvo}Let me think!{w=1}
{wvo}one and one...two and two...{w=1}
Drawing the eyes?
Yeah.

Standard: 就是用笔在龙头的眼睛那里画两下。
Chinese: 就是用笔在龙头的眼睛那里画两下。
TraditionalChinese: 就是用筆在龍頭的眼睛那裏畫兩下。
English: Just using a brush to dot the eyes on the Dragon Head.
Why do we do that?

Standard: 人家讲，给龙头点睛有两个好处。
Chinese: 人家讲，给龙头点睛有两个好处。
TraditionalChinese: 人家講，給龍頭點睛有兩個好處。
English: Everyone says， drawing eyes on the Dragon Head does two good things.
First， it's good for the Boat.

Standard: 点了睛以后，这条龙就能看见路了。
Chinese: 点了睛以后，这条龙就能看见路了。
TraditionalChinese: 點了睛以後，這條龍就能看見路了。
English: After you dot their eyes， they can see!
So they move extra fast when you row.
Second， it's good for the person.

Standard: 谁给龙点睛，谁就是龙睁眼看到的第一个人。
Chinese: 谁给龙点睛，谁就是龙睁眼看到的第一个人。
TraditionalChinese: 誰給龍點睛，誰就是龍睜眼看到的第一個人。
English: The person who draws the eyes is the first person the Dragon sees.

Standard: 龙会保佑他顺风顺水，有福气。
Chinese: 龙会保佑他顺风顺水，有福气。
TraditionalChinese: 龍會保佑他順風順水，有福氣。
English: The Dragon will bless with with good fortune.

Standard: 其实你妈妈以前就想让你来点睛了。
Chinese: 其实你妈妈以前就想让你来点睛了。
TraditionalChinese: 其實你媽媽以前就想讓你來點睛了。
English: You mom wanted you to dot the eyes a long time ago.

Standard: 她希望你能平安健康，事事顺利。
Chinese: 她希望你能平安健康，事事顺利。
TraditionalChinese: 她希望你能平安健康，事事順利。
English: She wants you to be healthy and successful.

Standard: 不过那时候没有龙舟，龙头不下水不能点睛。
Chinese: 不过那时候没有龙舟，龙头不下水不能点睛。
TraditionalChinese: 不過那時候沒有龍舟，龍頭不下水不能點睛。
English: But we didn't have a Boat then， we can't dot the eyes if the Dragon Head isn't going to water.
So it didn't make sense to draw it then.
But now we can.

Standard: 我去问过刘主任，她说没问题，随便画。
Chinese: 我去问过刘主任，她说没问题，随便画。
TraditionalChinese: 我去問過劉主任，她說沒問題，隨便畫。
English: I asked Director Liu， she said no problem， go ahead.
Daddy.
Are there really Dragons in the world?
Don't know， maybe.
Maybe we can't see them.
They don't need to protect me then!
They just need to protect Mommy!

Standard: 阿爸你说过，妈妈生活在一个很好的地方。
Chinese: 阿爸你说过，妈妈生活在一个很好的地方。
TraditionalChinese: 阿爸你說過，媽媽生活在一個很好的地方。
English: Dad， you said Mom is living in a good place.

Standard: 所以我觉得，见不到她也没关系。
Chinese: 所以我觉得，见不到她也没关系。
TraditionalChinese: 所以我覺得，見不到她也沒關係。
English: So I think， it's okay if I can't see her.
She's happy there， right?

Standard: 可是，我又不知道她过得好不好。
Chinese: 可是，我又不知道她过得好不好。
TraditionalChinese: 可是，我又不知道她過得好不好。
English: But， I don't know if she's doing well.

Standard: 不能见面，不能写信，也不能打电话。
Chinese: 不能见面，不能写信，也不能打电话。
TraditionalChinese: 不能見面，不能寫信，也不能打電話。
English: Can't see her， can't write her， can't even call her.

Standard: 如果龙保佑她就好了！那我就不担心了！
Chinese: 如果龙保佑她就好了！那我就不担心了！
TraditionalChinese: 如果龍保佑她就好了！那我就不擔心了！
English: As long as the Dragon protects her I won't worry!

Standard: 不用保佑我！我会照顾自己的！
Chinese: 不用保佑我！我会照顾自己的！
TraditionalChinese: 不用保佑我！我會照顧自己的！
English: Don't need to watch over me! I can take care of myself.
Daddy， I miss Mommy.
I miss her too.
Dragon， God.
Bodhisattva， Buddah.

Standard: 只要荔荔能身体健康，我都去求，都去拜。
Chinese: 只要荔荔能身体健康，我都去求，都去拜。
TraditionalChinese: 只要荔荔能身體健康，我都去求，都去拜。
English: As long as Lili can be healthy I will go pray to them.
You don't need to be so anxious.
Doctor said we can control it.

Standard: 坚持吃药，多点休息，不要做剧烈运动。
Chinese: 坚持吃药，多点休息，不要做剧烈运动。
TraditionalChinese: 堅持吃藥，多點休息，不要做劇烈運動。
English: Just take medication， rest， and no strenuous exercise.
Shouldn't be a big problem.

Standard: 那医生也说不确定以后会哪样。
Chinese: 那医生也说不确定以后会哪样。
TraditionalChinese: 那醫生也說不確定以後會哪樣。
English: Doctor said they weren't sure of the future either.

Standard: 光吃药根治不了，手术风险又太大……
Chinese: 光吃药根治不了，手术风险又太大……
TraditionalChinese: 光吃藥根治不了，手術風險又太大……
English: Can't treat it with just meds， and surgery is a risk...
I'm afraid it will get worse...
It's going to get better.

Standard: 刚出生那会儿，卫生院还说她活不过五岁呢。
Chinese: 刚出生那会儿，卫生院还说她活不过五岁呢。
TraditionalChinese: 剛出生那會兒，衛生院還說她活不過五歲呢。
English: When she was born， they said she wouldn't make it past five.
Now she's just like all other kids in school.

Standard: 广东的医院，比这边的水平高，会有办法的。
Chinese: 广东的医院，比这边的水平高，会有办法的。
TraditionalChinese: 廣東的醫院，比這邊的水準高，會有辦法的。
English: The hospitals in Guangdong are better than the ones here， they will find a way.
It's all my fault.
I made it so she wasn't born healthy.
Nonsense， what's it got to do with you?
Maybe I wasn't careful enough when I was with her...

Standard: 可能是吃错了什么……或者什么做得不对……
Chinese: 可能是吃错了什么……或者什么做得不对……
TraditionalChinese: 可能是吃錯了什麼……或者什麼做得不對……
English: Maybe I ate something wrong...or did something wrong...
Nonsense.

Standard: 去过这么多回医院你还不清楚咯？
Chinese: 去过这么多回医院你还不清楚咯？
TraditionalChinese: 去過這麼多回醫院你還不清楚咯？
English: After so many trips the the hospital you're still on that?

Standard: 先天性疾病是看概率，看运气的。
Chinese: 先天性疾病是看概率，看运气的。
TraditionalChinese: 先天性疾病是看概率，看運氣的。
English: Preexisting conditions are probability， luck.
Even if it is just luck...
I feel like I let her down...
She has to suffer so much so early...
But she's happy.

Standard: 你没看见吗？她每天都笑哈哈的。
Chinese: 你没看见吗？她每天都笑哈哈的。
TraditionalChinese: 你沒看見嗎？她每天都笑哈哈的。
English: Don't you see? She's smiling everyday.

Standard: 因为她有个好妈妈，对她很好。
Chinese: 因为她有个好妈妈，对她很好。
TraditionalChinese: 因為她有個好媽媽，對她很好。
English: Because she has a good mom， who is good to her.
Aw， why are you crying suddenly?
...Because I feel sad!

Standard: 你晓得旗子上面写的字是什么意思咩？
Chinese: 你晓得旗子上面写的字是什么意思咩？
TraditionalChinese: 你曉得旗子上面寫的字是什麼意思咩？
English: Do you know the meaning of what we wrote on the flag?
What flag....
The Dragon Boat Flag.
The one next to me.
Real dragon of Lu， real hero of the world.
Hm.
Yeah I know.
Who in Longshui doesn't know.

Standard: 这是句老话，从古代就一直这样讲了。
Chinese: 这是句老话，从古代就一直这样讲了。
TraditionalChinese: 這是句老話，從古代就一直這樣講了。
English: It's an old saying， from ancient times we've always said it.
What's it mean?
You don't know?

Standard: 我们龙水县有座樚山，樚山下面就是银垣江。
Chinese: 我们龙水县有座樚山，樚山下面就是银垣江。
TraditionalChinese: 我們龍水縣有座樚山，樚山下面就是銀垣江。
English: In Longshui County there's a Mount Lu， at the foot of Mount Lu is Yinyuan River.

Standard: 每年端午各个镇的人在江里划龙舟。
Chinese: 每年端午各个镇的人在江里划龙舟。
TraditionalChinese: 每年端午各個鎮的人在江裏劃龍舟。
English: Every year in Duanwu all the towns go to to the river to row Dragon Boats.
The winner is the hero.
No， you misunderstand.
The first isn't the dragon.
Then what?

Standard: 小时候我公跟我讲过，龙是鱼变出来的。
Chinese: 小时候我公跟我讲过，龙是鱼变出来的。
TraditionalChinese: 小時候我公跟我講過，龍是魚變出來的。
English: When I was a kid， my grandpa told me， dragons come from fish.

Standard: 鱼都会游水，光游得快没有用。
Chinese: 鱼都会游水，光游得快没有用。
TraditionalChinese: 魚都會游水，光遊得快沒有用。
English: All fish can swim， it's not enough that they swim fast.

Standard: 不放弃，坚持到最后，才变得成龙。
Chinese: 不放弃，坚持到最后，才变得成龙。
TraditionalChinese: 不放棄，堅持到最後，才變得成龍。
English: Never giving up， making it to the end， that's how they turn into a dragon.

Standard: 英雄哪有这么不值钱？划个船就能当？
Chinese: 英雄哪有这么不值钱？划个船就能当？
TraditionalChinese: 英雄哪有這麼不值錢？劃個船就能當？
English: Heroes are worth more than that. You can't be one just by rowing.

Standard: 这句话其实就是想传达一种精神。
Chinese: 这句话其实就是想传达一种精神。
TraditionalChinese: 這句話其實就是想傳達一種精神。
English: This phrase is really just to pass on the spirit of something.

Standard: 人这辈子就像一条河，又长又看不到头。
Chinese: 人这辈子就像一条河，又长又看不到头。
TraditionalChinese: 人這輩子就像一條河，又長又看不到頭。
English: Life is like a river， it's long and you can't see the end.

Standard: 勇往直前，坚持不懈，才走得下去。
Chinese: 勇往直前，坚持不懈，才走得下去。
TraditionalChinese: 勇往直前，堅持不懈，才走得下去。
English: You have to be brave and persistent， so you can keep going.

Standard: 大家都是普通人，风浪少不了的。
Chinese: 大家都是普通人，风浪少不了的。
TraditionalChinese: 大家都是普通人，風浪少不了的。
English: We're all just people， there will be ups and downs.
Do your best to live each day， that's it.
Dragon Boat? I have experience.

Standard: 我爸是三岔镇的，往年我还去给他们当外援。
Chinese: 我爸是三岔镇的，往年我还去给他们当外援。
TraditionalChinese: 我爸是三岔鎮的，往年我還去給他們當外援。
English: My dad is from Sancha， in the past I went to help them.
Great， then we're counting on you.

Standard: 我们镇估计全是新手，桨都没摸过的。
Chinese: 我们镇估计全是新手，桨都没摸过的。
TraditionalChinese: 我們鎮估計全是新手，槳都沒摸過的。
English: We're all new， haven't even touched an oar before.

Standard: 哈哈，搞得这么正式，你要拿冠军啊？
Chinese: 哈哈，搞得这么正式，你要拿冠军啊？
TraditionalChinese: 哈哈，搞得這麼正式，你要拿冠軍啊？
English: Haha， so formal， you want to win first place?

Standard: 既然都参加了，不下点功夫嘛？
Chinese: 既然都参加了，不下点功夫嘛？
TraditionalChinese: 既然都參加了，不下點功夫嘛？
English: Might as well try since I've signed up.
Yeah， we can't lose too horribly.

Standard: 稍微练一下吧，关键是要有时间。
Chinese: 稍微练一下吧，关键是要有时间。
TraditionalChinese: 稍微練一下吧，關鍵是要有時間。
English: We'll do some practice， the key is how much time we have.
We'll schedule it once we find enough people.

Standard: 我老头老娘回来之前，我会一直留在芷滨。
Chinese: 我老头老娘回来之前，我会一直留在芷滨。
TraditionalChinese: 我老頭老娘回來之前，我會一直留在芷濱。
English: Before my mom and dad come back I'll stay in Zhibin.

Standard: 那这段时间都是你自己带娃仔？
Chinese: 那这段时间都是你自己带娃仔？
TraditionalChinese: 那這段時間都是你自己帶娃仔？
English: So you're taking care of the kid yourself these days?
Yeah.
Hard work?
Better now.
At first it was a bit challenging.

Standard: 只能骂，骂完又顶嘴，又接着骂。
Chinese: 只能骂，骂完又顶嘴，又接着骂。
TraditionalChinese: 只能罵，罵完又頂嘴，又接著罵。
English: Scold her， she talks back， scold her again.
Lili is that naughty?

Standard: 也不是说多淘气，就是不晓得她在想什么。
Chinese: 也不是说多淘气，就是不晓得她在想什么。
TraditionalChinese: 也不是說多淘氣，就是不曉得她在想什麼。
English: Not really naughty， I just don't really get what she's thinking.
That's how it is when men take care of kids.

Standard: 这段时间总算明白了，老头不容易当。
Chinese: 这段时间总算明白了，老头不容易当。
TraditionalChinese: 這段時間總算明白了，老頭不容易當。
English: I finally understand， being a dad is hard.
Right?

Standard: 我跟我老婆离婚七年，自己带了葛立荣六年。
Chinese: 我跟我老婆离婚七年，自己带了葛立荣六年。
TraditionalChinese: 我跟我老婆離婚七年，自己帶了葛立榮六年。
English: I've been divorced for seven years， raised Ge Lirong for six myself.

Standard: 很多东西都是磕磕碰碰才摸索出来的。
Chinese: 很多东西都是磕磕碰碰才摸索出来的。
TraditionalChinese: 很多東西都是磕磕碰碰才摸索出來的。
English: Lots of things I had to figure out along the way.

Standard: 做老头的没那么细心，发现不了娃仔的变化。
Chinese: 做老头的没那么细心，发现不了娃仔的变化。
TraditionalChinese: 做老頭的沒那麼細心，發現不了娃仔的變化。
English: Men don't pay attention to details as much， can't really see the changes.

Standard: 有些事情妈妈想得到，你想不到。
Chinese: 有些事情妈妈想得到，你想不到。
TraditionalChinese: 有些事情媽媽想得到，你想不到。
English: Some things moms can think about， you ca'nt.
In the end you've made a mistake.
Yeah...
Lili talk to you?
Yeah.
Then that's fine.
Kids can't hide things.

Standard: 如果真的讨厌你，根本就会不理你。
Chinese: 如果真的讨厌你，根本就会不理你。
TraditionalChinese: 如果真的討厭你，根本就會不理你。
English: If they really don't like you， they just ignore you.

Standard: 肯听你的，你慢慢教她就得了。
Chinese: 肯听你的，你慢慢教她就得了。
TraditionalChinese: 肯聽你的，你慢慢教她就得了。
English: If they listen to you， you can teach them patiently.
Sigh， I hope so.
You don't need to be so down.

Standard: 你以为娃仔不懂，其实他什么都懂。
Chinese: 你以为娃仔不懂，其实他什么都懂。
TraditionalChinese: 你以為娃仔不懂，其實他什麼都懂。
English: You think kids don't understand， but they really do get it.
Wanna know how bad my kid was?

Standard: 吃饭要追着喂，还钻到桌子底下躲起来。
Chinese: 吃饭要追着喂，还钻到桌子底下躲起来。
TraditionalChinese: 吃飯要追著喂，還鑽到桌子底下躲起來。
English: Had to chase him to feed him， he eve hid under the table.
Now he cooks and waits for me.
Tells me to go to the hospital if I'm sick.
He'll also scold me， tell me I can't drink.

Standard: 他还在读初中哦，已经知道照顾人了。
Chinese: 他还在读初中哦，已经知道照顾人了。
TraditionalChinese: 他還在讀初中哦，已經知道照顧人了。
English: He's still in middle school， and already knows how to take care of people.

Standard: 因为他知道这个家只有我和他。
Chinese: 因为他知道这个家只有我和他。
TraditionalChinese: 因為他知道這個家只有我和他。
English: Because he knows it's just me and him.
He knows I'm his family.

Standard: 我对他怎么样，他也对我怎么样。
Chinese: 我对他怎么样，他也对我怎么样。
TraditionalChinese: 我對他怎麼樣，他也對我怎麼樣。
English: How I treat him， is how he treats me.
Just like Lili.

Standard: 只要你尽到你的责任，早晚她会理解你的。
Chinese: 只要你尽到你的责任，早晚她会理解你的。
TraditionalChinese: 只要你盡到你的責任，早晚她會理解你的。
English: If you do your job， she'll understand.

Standard: 阿喜哥的店，就在果园旁边。
Chinese: 阿喜哥的店，就在果园旁边。
TraditionalChinese: 阿喜哥的店，就在果園旁邊。
English: Brother Ah Xi's shop is next to the orchard.

Standard: 今天这部电影的名字，是川剧里面一种特技。
Chinese: 今天这部电影的名字，是川剧里面一种特技。
TraditionalChinese: 今天這部電影的名字，是川劇裏面一種特技。
English: They name of the movie today is named after a skill in Sichuan Opera.

Standard: 讲的是这种传统东西的坚持和传承。
Chinese: 讲的是这种传统东西的坚持和传承。
TraditionalChinese: 講的是這種傳統東西的堅持和傳承。
English: It talks about passing down tradition and being persistent about it.

Standard: 我觉得这种祖宗留下来的就应该多宣传。
Chinese: 我觉得这种祖宗留下来的就应该多宣传。
TraditionalChinese: 我覺得這種祖宗留下來的就應該多宣傳。
English: I think these things left behind from our ancestors should be spread wide and far.

Standard: 本来蛮精彩的，不宣传就没人知道了。
Chinese: 本来蛮精彩的，不宣传就没人知道了。
TraditionalChinese: 本來蠻精彩的，不宣傳就沒人知道了。
English: It's exiciting， but if you don't tell people， they won't know.
Now it's just development.

Standard: 但是好多东西都在慢慢消失。
Chinese: 但是好多东西都在慢慢消失。
TraditionalChinese: 但是好多東西都在慢慢消失。
English: But lots of good things are disappearing slowly.
Especially the things that don't make money.

Standard: 不过喜欢的人，他永远都喜欢。
Chinese: 不过喜欢的人，他永远都喜欢。
TraditionalChinese: 不過喜歡的人，他永遠都喜歡。
English: But the ones who enjoy it， will always enjoy it.

Standard: 每次我去我大伯那里，电视机都在放戏剧。
Chinese: 每次我去我大伯那里，电视机都在放戏剧。
TraditionalChinese: 每次我去我大伯那裏，電視機都在放戲劇。
English: Last time I went to my uncle's， it's just opera on the TV.
It was either Beijing Opera or Sichuan Opera.
He doesn't even watch， just has it on in the background.
Brother Nan.

Standard: 我打包半只烧鸭，你拿回去加个菜？
Chinese: 我打包半只烧鸭，你拿回去加个菜？
TraditionalChinese: 我打包半只燒鴨，你拿回去加個菜？
English: Here， have half a duck， take it home for some extra food tonight.
No， thanks.
If I want it， I'll buy it.

Standard: 卖不完也是浪费，就当给荔荔加菜啦。
Chinese: 卖不完也是浪费，就当给荔荔加菜啦。
TraditionalChinese: 賣不完也是浪費，就當給荔荔加菜啦。
English: I can't sell it， just take it for Lili.
No no.
I'm the dummer...

Standard: 也是，我力气没有你们男的大，划船不够猛。
Chinese: 也是，我力气没有你们男的大，划船不够猛。
TraditionalChinese: 也是，我力氣沒有你們男的大，划船不夠猛。
English: Yeah， I'm not as strong as you men， can't row as hard.

Standard: 我就担心我没打过鼓，节奏控制得不好。
Chinese: 我就担心我没打过鼓，节奏控制得不好。
TraditionalChinese: 我就擔心我沒打過鼓，節奏控制得不好。
English: But I'm afraid I haven't drummed before， and can't keep the tempo.
Oh， the tradition here is pretty good.

Standard: 我见有点地方，女人是不给上龙舟的。
Chinese: 我见有点地方，女人是不给上龙舟的。
TraditionalChinese: 我見有點地方，女人是不給上龍舟的。
English: I've seen places where they don't let women on the Dragon Boat.

Standard: 凤姐有跟我讲过她喜欢龙舟。
Chinese: 凤姐有跟我讲过她喜欢龙舟。
TraditionalChinese: 鳳姐有跟我講過她喜歡龍舟。
English: Ah Feng told me she liked Dragon Boats.

Standard: 但我没想到她自己做了个龙头。
Chinese: 但我没想到她自己做了个龙头。
TraditionalChinese: 但我沒想到她自己做了個龍頭。
English: But I didn't think she'd make her own Dragon Head.
Amazing， she can do everything.
I'm researching BBQ these days.

Standard: 到时祭龙我带点过去，拜完神大家一起尝尝。
Chinese: 到时祭龙我带点过去，拜完神大家一起尝尝。
TraditionalChinese: 到時祭龍我帶點過去，拜完神大家一起嘗嘗。
English: During the ceremony I'll bring some over and we can try some afterwards.

Standard: 你们不用给钱我，提点建议让我改进就好了。
Chinese: 你们不用给钱我，提点建议让我改进就好了。
TraditionalChinese: 你們不用給錢我，提點建議讓我改進就好了。
English: It's free， just give me some feedback.

Standard: 煮饭这种东西，你多煮几次就熟练了。
Chinese: 煮饭这种东西，你多煮几次就熟练了。
TraditionalChinese: 煮飯這種東西，你多煮幾次就熟練了。
English: You just have to cook often to get better at it.

Standard: 我得空给你几个菜谱，你照着煮给荔荔吃吧。
Chinese: 我得空给你几个菜谱，你照着煮给荔荔吃吧。
TraditionalChinese: 我得空給你幾個菜譜，你照著煮給荔荔吃吧。
English: When I'm free I'll give you somer recipes. You can use it to cook for Lili.

Standard: 如果还是不喜欢，那再换几个试试。
Chinese: 如果还是不喜欢，那再换几个试试。
TraditionalChinese: 如果還是不喜歡，那再換幾個試試。
English: If she still doesn't like it， you can change a different one.
Why are you still here? You're not looking for them?

Standard: 等下我奶不让你走你就麻烦了。
Chinese: 等下我奶不让你走你就麻烦了。
TraditionalChinese: 等下我奶不讓你走你就麻煩了。
English: Once my Grandma doesn't let you go you'll be in trouble.

Standard: 阿凤的外公，打篮公，我在街日子还见过他。
Chinese: 阿凤的外公，打篮公，我在街日子还见过他。
TraditionalChinese: 阿鳳的外公，打籃公，我在街日子還見過他。
English: Ah Feng's Grandfather， Basket Grandpa， I saw him a few days ago.

Standard: 我拿着照相机在揽客，看见他在卖东西。
Chinese: 我拿着照相机在揽客，看见他在卖东西。
TraditionalChinese: 我拿著照相機在攬客，看見他在賣東西。
English: I had a camera with me and was helping get customers， he was selling things.

Standard: 十几个竹篮子，畚箕，抓松毛的竹耙。
Chinese: 十几个竹篮子，畚箕，抓松毛的竹耙。
TraditionalChinese: 十幾個竹籃子，畚箕，抓松毛的竹耙。
English: Dozens of baskets， dustbins， feather dusters.

Standard: 他还教人家哪样破蔑，很健谈的一个人。
Chinese: 他还教人家哪样破蔑，很健谈的一个人。
TraditionalChinese: 他還教人家哪樣破蔑，很健談的一個人。
English: He was quite the salesperson.

Standard: 阿凤她外公还做过那种手推车。
Chinese: 阿凤她外公还做过那种手推车。
TraditionalChinese: 阿鳳她外公還做過那種手推車。
English: Ah Feng's grandfather also made wheelbarrows too.

Standard: 木头的，两个轮，还是橡胶轮。
Chinese: 木头的，两个轮，还是橡胶轮。
TraditionalChinese: 木頭的，兩個輪，還是橡膠輪。
English: Wood with two tires， I think two tires.

Standard: 那时候我经常看见阿凤跟她姐，推着那台车。
Chinese: 那时候我经常看见阿凤跟她姐，推着那台车。
TraditionalChinese: 那時候我經常看見阿鳳跟她姐，推著那臺車。
English: I often saw Ah Feng and her Sister pushing that thing.
At least a hundred kilos of firewood.
Tens of kilometers， they'd leave early and return late.

Standard: 那时我们才不到十岁，阿凤不也一样？
Chinese: 那时我们才不到十岁，阿凤不也一样？
TraditionalChinese: 那時我們才不到十歲，阿鳳不也一樣？
English: We were just teens too， Ah Feng was too?

Standard: 阿凤跟她外公感情好，不是因为做木工。
Chinese: 阿凤跟她外公感情好，不是因为做木工。
TraditionalChinese: 阿鳳跟她外公感情好，不是因為做木工。
English: She was real close with her Grandfather， not because of Carpentry.
Her grandfather raised her.

Standard: 以前大人要工作，没有时间管这么多娃仔。
Chinese: 以前大人要工作，没有时间管这么多娃仔。
TraditionalChinese: 以前大人要工作，沒有時間管這麼多娃仔。
English: Back in those days adults had to work， didn't have time to  watch so many kids.

Standard: 只能丢出去，让乡下的老人帮忙带。
Chinese: 只能丢出去，让乡下的老人帮忙带。
TraditionalChinese: 只能丟出去，讓鄉下的老人幫忙帶。
English: They can only let them run wild a bit and ask the elders of the village to watch them.
Me and my grandma too.

Standard: 我跟她在村里挖莲藕，挖了整整一年。
Chinese: 我跟她在村里挖莲藕，挖了整整一年。
TraditionalChinese: 我跟她在村裏挖蓮藕，挖了整整一年。
English: I would go dig lotus roots with her， for an entire year.

Standard: 我奶跟家里失散，好像是因为出了什么事。
Chinese: 我奶跟家里失散，好像是因为出了什么事。
TraditionalChinese: 我奶跟家裏失散，好像是因為出了什麼事。
English: My grandma got separated with her family was because of some reason.

Standard: 可能比较痛苦吧，她也一直不愿仔细讲。
Chinese: 可能比较痛苦吧，她也一直不愿仔细讲。
TraditionalChinese: 可能比較痛苦吧，她也一直不願仔細講。
English: Maybe it was a painful time， she never wanted to talk about it.

Standard: 我只知道跟她弟有关，就是那个飞宝。
Chinese: 我只知道跟她弟有关，就是那个飞宝。
TraditionalChinese: 我只知道跟她弟有關，就是那個飛寶。
English: I just know it had something to do with her brother， the one called Feibao.

Standard: 你还记得我奶带我们去种田咩？
Chinese: 你还记得我奶带我们去种田咩？
TraditionalChinese: 你還記得我奶帶我們去種田咩？
English: Do you remember my grandmother taking us to work the fields?

Standard: 高的秧苗就让我们扯，矮的她就直接带泥铲。
Chinese: 高的秧苗就让我们扯，矮的她就直接带泥铲。
TraditionalChinese: 高的秧苗就讓我們扯，矮的她就直接帶泥鏟。
English: We would get to pull on the tall rice stalks， the shorter ones she would just dig.

Standard: 我们扯还没她铲得快，搞一天才得一个工分。
Chinese: 我们扯还没她铲得快，搞一天才得一个工分。
TraditionalChinese: 我們扯還沒她鏟得快，搞一天才得一個工分。
English: We weren't as fast as she was， we'd struggle all day to just get a bit of money.

Standard: 我奶只记得她小时候住在哪个县哪个镇。
Chinese: 我奶只记得她小时候住在哪个县哪个镇。
TraditionalChinese: 我奶只記得她小時候住在哪個縣哪個鎮。
English: My grandma only remembers generally what area she grew up in.
Exactly where she can't remember.

Standard: 那个镇肯定大变样了，她现在身体又不太好。
Chinese: 那个镇肯定大变样了，她现在身体又不太好。
TraditionalChinese: 那個鎮肯定大變樣了，她現在身體又不太好。
English: That town's definitely changed， and now she's not that healthy.
Otherwise I'd help her find her family.

Standard: 有时娃仔不是不想讲，是怕讲出来大人会骂。
Chinese: 有时娃仔不是不想讲，是怕讲出来大人会骂。
TraditionalChinese: 有時娃仔不是不想講，是怕講出來大人會罵。
English: Sometimes it's not that kids don't want to talk， i t's that they are afraid of being scolded.

Standard: 所以他宁愿瞒着，或者编点东西来骗人。
Chinese: 所以他宁愿瞒着，或者编点东西来骗人。
TraditionalChinese: 所以他寧願瞞著，或者編點東西來騙人。
English: So they'd just hide it， or lie and make up something.

Standard: 比方讲想买什么玩具，又不敢跟大人提。
Chinese: 比方讲想买什么玩具，又不敢跟大人提。
TraditionalChinese: 比方講想買什麼玩具，又不敢跟大人提。
English: Like what t oy they want， they don't dare mention it to the adults.

Standard: 那就只能骗大人钱咯，骗不到就偷咯。
Chinese: 那就只能骗大人钱咯，骗不到就偷咯。
TraditionalChinese: 那就只能騙大人錢咯，騙不到就偷咯。
English: So they make up something to get money， if they can't get it， they'll steal it.

Standard: 坏习惯就是这样子慢慢养成的。
Chinese: 坏习惯就是这样子慢慢养成的。
TraditionalChinese: 壞習慣就是這樣子慢慢養成的。
English: That's how bad habits are formed.

Standard: 有点娃仔还会演戏呢，样子可怜兮兮的。
Chinese: 有点娃仔还会演戏呢，样子可怜兮兮的。
TraditionalChinese: 有點娃仔還會演戲呢，樣子可憐兮兮的。
English: Some kids even know how to act， they'll try to get your pity.

Standard: 等你心疼他啦，他就跟你提要求啦。
Chinese: 等你心疼他啦，他就跟你提要求啦。
TraditionalChinese: 等你心疼他啦，他就跟你提要求啦。
English: Then when you start to dote on them， they bring up what they want.

Standard: 葛立荣有段时间也是很顽皮的。
Chinese: 葛立荣有段时间也是很顽皮的。
TraditionalChinese: 葛立榮有段時間也是很頑皮的。
English: Ge Lirong was really naughty for a while.
Because me and his mom divorced.

Standard: 在学校怕人家会讲他，总是独来独往。
Chinese: 在学校怕人家会讲他，总是独来独往。
TraditionalChinese: 在學校怕人家會講他，總是獨來獨往。
English: He was afraid of people talking bad about him at school， so he was a loner.
He'd get into fights too.

Standard: 女娃仔跟男娃仔不同，心思比较细腻。
Chinese: 女娃仔跟男娃仔不同，心思比较细腻。
TraditionalChinese: 女娃仔跟男娃仔不同，心思比較細膩。
English: Girls are different from boys， they think differently.

Standard: 你家荔荔又还这么小，自己克服不了问题。
Chinese: 你家荔荔又还这么小，自己克服不了问题。
TraditionalChinese: 你家荔荔又還這麼小，自己克服不了問題。
English: Lili is still young， can't solve everything on her own.

Standard: 你肯定要多花点时间，急是没有用的。
Chinese: 你肯定要多花点时间，急是没有用的。
TraditionalChinese: 你肯定要多花點時間，急是沒有用的。
English: You have to spend more time with her， rushing won't help.

Standard: 我们是第一年，其他镇可不是。
Chinese: 我们是第一年，其他镇可不是。
TraditionalChinese: 我們是第一年，其他鎮可不是。
English: This is our first year， but not other towns'.

Standard: 有些龙舟氛围重的镇，那帮人求胜心很强的。
Chinese: 有些龙舟氛围重的镇，那帮人求胜心很强的。
TraditionalChinese: 有些龍舟氛圍重的鎮，那幫人求勝心很強的。
English: Some towns are really into the Dragon Boats and they really are competitive.
When I'm free I'll give you some recipes. You can use it to cook for Lili.
It'll be hard to compete with them.

Standard: 龙舟是团体项目，只有几个人厉害没有用。
Chinese: 龙舟是团体项目，只有几个人厉害没有用。
TraditionalChinese: 龍舟是團體專案，只有幾個人厲害沒有用。
English: The Dragon Boat is a team sport， only a few good people won't be enough.

Standard: 关键还是要通力合作，配合好点。
Chinese: 关键还是要通力合作，配合好点。
TraditionalChinese: 關鍵還是要通力合作，配合好點。
English: The key is teamwork.

Standard: 划龙舟基本上就是五个动作。
Chinese: 划龙舟基本上就是五个动作。
TraditionalChinese: 劃龍舟基本上就是五個動作。
English: There's five basic movements to rowing.
Your seating position， raising the oar， putting the oar in water;
Rowing， then pulling the oar up.
Once you get familiar with that， you can row.

Standard: 要不我给把琴你，我们合奏一曲？
Chinese: 要不我给把琴你，我们合奏一曲？
TraditionalChinese: 要不我給把琴你，我們合奏一曲？
English: Why don't we do a duet?

Standard: 莫搞了，等下太难听吵到邻居。
Chinese: 莫搞了，等下太难听吵到邻居。
TraditionalChinese: 莫搞了，等下太難聽吵到鄰居。
English: Nah， I don't want to disturb the neighbors.
Ol' Qin.

Standard: 没有什么事的话，我要先练习练习。
Chinese: 没有什么事的话，我要先练习练习。
TraditionalChinese: 沒有什麼事的話，我要先練習練習。
English: If you got nothing else I'm gonna go practice.

Standard: 过两天那帮叔伯去村里表演，让我帮忙。
Chinese: 过两天那帮叔伯去村里表演，让我帮忙。
TraditionalChinese: 過兩天那幫叔伯去村裏表演，讓我幫忙。
English: I have to go perform in another town to help an uncle in a few days.
I haven't played in so long I'm rusty.
You want to go find them yourself?
Yeah.
That's a plan.

Standard: 那就靠你了，我实在是忙不过来了。
Chinese: 那就靠你了，我实在是忙不过来了。
TraditionalChinese: 那就靠你了，我實在是忙不過來了。
English: Then I'm counting on you， I really can't free up the time.
No problem.

Standard: 我先看看大概是怎么个情况，有没有希望。
Chinese: 我先看看大概是怎么个情况，有没有希望。
TraditionalChinese: 我先看看大概是怎麼個情況，有沒有希望。
English: Let me see what's going on and see if we have hope.
Thanks， Ah Nan.

Standard: 我还有别的事情要做，你也去忙你的吧。
Chinese: 我还有别的事情要做，你也去忙你的吧。
TraditionalChinese: 我還有別的事情要做，你也去忙你的吧。
English: I have other things to handle， you go do your things.
Support our shop.

Standard: 有各种新鲜出炉的传统糕点。
Chinese: 有各种新鲜出炉的传统糕点。
TraditionalChinese: 有各種新鮮出爐的傳統糕點。
English: All sorts of traditional pastries， fresh out of the oven.
Sesame rods， peanut puffs， orchid roots!
Sugar puffs， song gao， pressed pastries!

Standard: 西饼我们也有做，全是今天新烤的。
Chinese: 西饼我们也有做，全是今天新烤的。
TraditionalChinese: 西餅我們也有做，全是今天新烤的。
English: We also do western style pastries， everything is fresh!
Bread， cakes， cookies!
Shortcake， fruit cake.

Standard: 听说市场那边要开一家西饼店。
Chinese: 听说市场那边要开一家西饼店。
TraditionalChinese: 聽說市場那邊要開一家西餅店。
English: I hear on that side of the market they are opening a western bakery.
Competition will be tougher then.

Standard: 厂里的老师傅走的走，退的退。
Chinese: 厂里的老师傅走的走，退的退。
TraditionalChinese: 廠裏的老師傅走的走，退的退。
English: The chefs at the factory all left or retired.

Standard: 我们手艺又还没学好，真担心以后做不成。
Chinese: 我们手艺又还没学好，真担心以后做不成。
TraditionalChinese: 我們手藝又還沒學好，真擔心以後做不成。
English: We really didn't learn everything， so we're afraid we can't make it in the future.

Standard: 我们中秋月饼销量一直很不错。
Chinese: 我们中秋月饼销量一直很不错。
TraditionalChinese: 我們中秋月餅銷量一直很不錯。
English: Our Mid Autumn goods have always done well.
We can probably rank in the county.

Standard: 但是普通日子的情况就相当一般了。
Chinese: 但是普通日子的情况就相当一般了。
TraditionalChinese: 但是普通日子的情況就相當一般了。
English: But day to day it's pretty normal.

Standard: 尤其是传统糕点，越来越不好卖。
Chinese: 尤其是传统糕点，越来越不好卖。
TraditionalChinese: 尤其是傳統糕點，越來越不好賣。
English: Especially traditional pastries， they are harder and harder to sell.

Standard: 希望厂长能想点办法，帮糕点厂度过难关。
Chinese: 希望厂长能想点办法，帮糕点厂度过难关。
TraditionalChinese: 希望廠長能想點辦法，幫糕點廠度過難關。
English: Hopefully the owners can figure it out and get us through these hard times.

Standard: 隔壁乡有人误喝农药，差点就没抢救过来。
Chinese: 隔壁乡有人误喝农药，差点就没抢救过来。
TraditionalChinese: 隔壁鄉有人誤喝農藥，差點就沒搶救過來。
English: Someone in the other town accidentally drank pesticide， and almost died.
Lots of things like this these days.

Standard: 我得和来买的人多交代几句。
Chinese: 我得和来买的人多交代几句。
TraditionalChinese: 我得和來買的人多交代幾句。
English: I have to tell the buyers to be careful.
Have to store the unused ones properly.

Standard: 特别莫要放在娃仔摸得到的地方。
Chinese: 特别莫要放在娃仔摸得到的地方。
TraditionalChinese: 特別莫要放在娃仔摸得到的地方。
English: Don't put it where the kids can get to it.
These fertilizer books are so hard to memorize.

Standard: 品种又多，搭配又乱，要认全可费劲了！
Chinese: 品种又多，搭配又乱，要认全可费劲了！
TraditionalChinese: 品種又多，搭配又亂，要認全可費勁了！
English: All different kinds of types and combination， it takes so much effort to recognize everything!
And you have to memorize it.

Standard: 要教人家，不然买回去又不会用。
Chinese: 要教人家，不然买回去又不会用。
TraditionalChinese: 要教人家，不然買回去又不會用。
English: But you have to teach them otherwise they won't know how to use it properly.

Standard: 这周又要去参加农业局的培训。
Chinese: 这周又要去参加农业局的培训。
TraditionalChinese: 這周又要去參加農業局的培訓。
English: I have to go to training at the agricultural department again this week.

Standard: 今年春天冷，现在雨水又多。
Chinese: 今年春天冷，现在雨水又多。
TraditionalChinese: 今年春天冷，現在雨水又多。
English: It's a cold， wet Spring this year.
Hopefully it won't affect the harvests.

Standard: 我要努力再努力，尽快熟悉业务。
Chinese: 我要努力再努力，尽快熟悉业务。
TraditionalChinese: 我要努力再努力，儘快熟悉業務。
English: I have to work hard and learn more.
It's okay if I make some mistakes on the business side.

Standard: 最怕说错了，影响人家的收成。
Chinese: 最怕说错了，影响人家的收成。
TraditionalChinese: 最怕說錯了，影響人家的收成。
English: I'm afraid I'll affect someone's harvest.
What would you like?
Nothing， just looking at the time.
Ah， look here for the time now.
The other clocks are for times around the world?
No， I just made it up.
They're all the wrong time.
Why'd you do that?
A way to get business.
Like you now.

Standard: 如果一看就晓得几点，你就不会进来了。
Chinese: 如果一看就晓得几点，你就不会进来了。
TraditionalChinese: 如果一看就曉得幾點，你就不會進來了。
English: If you can tell the time by one glance you wouldn't have walked in.
Just look around.
Everything's here.

Standard: 喜欢哪个手表跟我讲，我可以拿出来给你看。
Chinese: 喜欢哪个手表跟我讲，我可以拿出来给你看。
TraditionalChinese: 喜歡哪個手錶跟我講，我可以拿出來給你看。
English: Whatever watch you like just let me know， I can bring it out for you.
I like it when it's cold.

Standard: 天气冷一点，水果贵，我有赚头。
Chinese: 天气冷一点，水果贵，我有赚头。
TraditionalChinese: 天氣冷一點，水果貴，我有賺頭。
English: When it's colder， fruit is more expensive， I can make more money.

Standard: 但是也不要太冷，水果都冻死了那就麻烦啦。
Chinese: 但是也不要太冷，水果都冻死了那就麻烦啦。
TraditionalChinese: 但是也不要太冷，水果都凍死了那就麻煩啦。
English: But not too cold， if it kills all the fruit that will be a problem.
I hate the heat.

Standard: 我每个傍晚都去游泳，不然太热受不了。
Chinese: 我每个傍晚都去游泳，不然太热受不了。
TraditionalChinese: 我每個傍晚都去游泳，不然太熱受不了。
English: Every afternoon I'll go swim， I can't take the heat.
The hottest day hasn't even arrived.
