Longshui County is one level above.
Longshui County manages Zhibin Town.
I don't get it.
Let me think about how to explain it to you...

Standard: 打个比方，你在学校是哪个班？
Chinese: 打个比方，你在学校是哪个班？
TraditionalChinese: 打個比方，你在學校是哪個班？
English: For example， what class are you in at school.
Class two one.
Second grade， class one?
Yeah.

Standard: 你把龙水县当二年级，芷滨镇就相当于一班。
Chinese: 你把龙水县当二年级，芷滨镇就相当于一班。
TraditionalChinese: 你把龍水縣當二年級，芷濱鎮就相當於一班。
English: So if Longshui County is second grade， then Zhibin Town is class one

Standard: 二年级不仅有一班，还有很多个班。
Chinese: 二年级不仅有一班，还有很多个班。
TraditionalChinese: 二年級不僅有一班，還有很多個班。
English: There's not just one class in second grade， there's lots of classes.

Standard: 龙水县不仅有芷滨，还有其他各个镇。
Chinese: 龙水县不仅有芷滨，还有其他各个镇。
TraditionalChinese: 龍水縣不僅有芷濱，還有其他各個鎮。
English: Longshui County doesn't just have Zhibin， it has lots of other towns too.
Oh! I get it now!
Why do you suddenly ask this?

Standard: 妈妈帮我画了一幅画，还没有名字。
Chinese: 妈妈帮我画了一幅画，还没有名字。
TraditionalChinese: 媽媽幫我畫了一幅畫，還沒有名字。
English: Mommy drew a picture for me， but there's no name.

Standard: 现在决定了，就叫——芷滨镇小地图！
Chinese: 现在决定了，就叫——芷滨镇小地图！
TraditionalChinese: 現在決定了，就叫——芷濱鎮小地圖！
English: Now I decided， I'm going to call it the Zhibin Town map!
What's it look like， let me see.
Oh， it's nicely drawn.

Standard: 图案是妈妈画的，颜色是我涂的。
Chinese: 图案是妈妈画的，颜色是我涂的。
TraditionalChinese: 圖案是媽媽畫的，顏色是我塗的。
English: Mommy drew the pictures， I colored it in.
This looks fun.

Standard: 你能看得出画的都是些什么吗？
Chinese: 你能看得出画的都是些什么吗？
TraditionalChinese: 你能看得出畫的都是些什麼嗎？
English: Can you tell what these are?
Yeah， it's obvious.
This is the post office.
This is the hospital.
Civil police? Dispatch.
Too easy.
Then I'm going to test you on some hard ones.
What's this?
Yeah! This is a BBQ skewer!
This is the BBQ shop at the bridge.
What's zao jia?
Zao jia tree.

Standard: 它的果就像这样子啦，一颗颗连成一串的。
Chinese: 它的果就像这样子啦，一颗颗连成一串的。
TraditionalChinese: 它的果就像這樣子啦，一顆顆連成一串的。
English: The fruit looks like this， it's like a round thing and another all linked together.
No! This is a BBQ skewer!
This is the BBQ shop at the bridge.
Yeah， this is a chimney!
This is the sugar factory.
What is a flagon?
It's where you put alcohol.
Don't they use those soda bottles?
That's your grandpa's habit.
Flagons look like this.
No， this is a chimney!
This is the sugar factory!
Correct answer!

Standard: 快到村里那条路，有个古代留下的城门。
Chinese: 快到村里那条路，有个古代留下的城门。
TraditionalChinese: 快到村裏那條路，有個古代留下的城門。
English: The town has a gate left over from old times.
We don't have a tower in our town!?
This is the gate!

Standard: 快到村里那条路，有个古代留下的城门。
Chinese: 快到村里那条路，有个古代留下的城门。
TraditionalChinese: 快到村裏那條路，有個古代留下的城門。
English: The gate left over from old times.
You've had BBQ there before?
Don't they only open at night?
They're open during the day too.
Grandpa likes to buy booze there.

Standard: 那个烧烤叔叔自己酿了一大缸酒。
Chinese: 那个烧烤叔叔自己酿了一大缸酒。
TraditionalChinese: 那個燒烤叔叔自己釀了一大缸酒。
English: The uncle there made a whole thing of their own.
Oh， no wonder.
This here， what's this?
Daddy.
Does the sugar factory make sugar?
What else would they make?
Oh.
Do they give candy if you work there?
Yeah.
Perks at work， you get some during the holiday.
Cool!
I want to go work at the sugar factory!

Standard: 人家生产的是白砂糖，不是你吃的那种糖果。
Chinese: 人家生产的是白砂糖，不是你吃的那种糖果。
TraditionalChinese: 人家生產的是白砂糖，不是你吃的那種糖果。
English: They make cane sugar， not the candy you eat.
Oh?
Then， then let me think!
Next question! This one!
Oh you know about that gate?
Mom told me about it yesterday!

Standard: 她说，还有人去那里拍电视剧呢！
Chinese: 她说，还有人去那里拍电视剧呢！
TraditionalChinese: 她說，還有人去那裏拍電視劇呢！
English: She told me it's been used in filming TV shows!

Standard: 是啊，那块地有蛮多文物古迹的。
Chinese: 是啊，那块地有蛮多文物古迹的。
TraditionalChinese: 是啊，那塊地有蠻多文物古跡的。
English: Yeah， that area has lots of old cultural stuff.
Gate， wall， old graveyard.

Standard: 还有一个大石头，刻了句古诗。
Chinese: 还有一个大石头，刻了句古诗。
TraditionalChinese: 還有一個大石頭，刻了句古詩。
English: A large stone with some old poetry.
Which one?

Standard: 什么水什么云，不记得了。
Chinese: 什么水什么云，不记得了。
TraditionalChinese: 什麼水什麼雲，不記得了。
English: Something water， something cloud， don't remember.

Standard: 好像是宋朝的一个诗人，被贬到了这里后写的。
Chinese: 好像是宋朝的一个诗人，被贬到了这里后写的。
TraditionalChinese: 好像是宋朝的一個詩人，被貶到了這裏後寫的。
English: I think it was a Song Dynasty poet， wrote it after they got pressed down here.
Pressed down?

Standard: 古代那些当官的人，做错事要挨皇帝罚。
Chinese: 古代那些当官的人，做错事要挨皇帝罚。
TraditionalChinese: 古代那些當官的人，做錯事要挨皇帝罰。
English: In the old days， when you were an official， if you did something wrong the Emperor would punish you.

Standard: 皇帝派他去偏远地区，这就叫贬。
Chinese: 皇帝派他去偏远地区，这就叫贬。
TraditionalChinese: 皇帝派他去偏遠地區，這就叫貶。
English: If the emperor sent you to the middle of nowhere， that would sometimes be called pressed down.
Oh， scared me.
I thought he got flattened.
No way， not that scary.

Standard: 好啦，接下来是最重要的一题！
Chinese: 好啦，接下来是最重要的一题！
TraditionalChinese: 好啦，接下來是最重要的一題！
English: Okay， the next one is the most important question!
Where is our house?
What else do you want to ask?
Nothing， the rest are easy.
Are you leaving?
Getting ready to， it's almost time.
Where are you going this time.
Shandong.
Is Shandong farther than Guangdong?
Much farther.
Take this map.
Why give it to me?
If you have it， then you won't get lost.
How would I get lost?
You said it last time.
The town is different everyday.
They build new houses， make new roads.

Standard: 你总是出去开车，我怕你会不认得路回家。
Chinese: 你总是出去开车，我怕你会不认得路回家。
TraditionalChinese: 你總是出去開車，我怕你會不認得路回家。
English: You keep driving everyday， I'm afraid you won't know your way home.
Haha， it's not that bad.

Standard: 我这辈子都住在这里，闭着眼睛都会走。
Chinese: 我这辈子都住在这里，闭着眼睛都会走。
TraditionalChinese: 我這輩子都住在這裏，閉著眼睛都會走。
English: I've lived here all my life， I can walk around with my eyes closed.
Oh...then it's not useful anymore.
It's fine， I'll take it.
It's like a protection charm.
Okay.
Thank you.
You're welcome!

Standard: 这是芷滨镇中心村的地图
Chinese: 这是芷滨镇中心村的地图
TraditionalChinese: 這是芷濱鎮中心村的地圖
English: This is a map of the town of Zhibin.
The blue tells you where you're at now.
The red tells you where you need to go.

Standard: 方向键可以切换不同地点
Chinese: 方向键可以切换不同地点
TraditionalChinese: 方向鍵可以切換不同地點
English: Arrow keys can swap between different locations.

Standard: 确认键可以获取该地点的信息
Chinese: 确认键可以获取该地点的信息
TraditionalChinese: 確認鍵可以獲取該地點的資訊
English: Confirm key gives you some information.

Standard: 去邮局门口找村里来的宁叔。
Chinese: 去邮局门口找村里来的宁叔。
TraditionalChinese: 去郵局門口找村裏來的寧叔。
English: Go to the post office to find Uncle Ning.
Go to the agriculture station to find Ah Shan.

Standard: 这时候回家还早，先去谈谈工作吧。
Chinese: 这时候回家还早，先去谈谈工作吧。
TraditionalChinese: 這時候回家還早，先去談談工作吧。
English: It's too early to go back， let's see if I can find some work.

Standard: 之前陪地主妹看过一个动画片，叫《机器狗》。
Chinese: 之前陪地主妹看过一个动画片，叫《机器狗》。
TraditionalChinese: 之前陪地主妹看過一個動畫片，叫《機器狗》。
English: Ah， not long ago I went with the kid to watch a cartoon movie， “Robot Dog”.
They had a gadget that was a door.

Standard: 自己想好去哪里，打开门就是那个地方。
Chinese: 自己想好去哪里，打开门就是那个地方。
TraditionalChinese: 自己想好去哪里，打開門就是那個地方。
English: Once you think of where you want to go， you open the door and there you are.

Standard: 真有那玩意儿就好了，多方便啊。
Chinese: 真有那玩意儿就好了，多方便啊。
TraditionalChinese: 真有那玩意兒就好了，多方便啊。
English: It'd be so nice if that was real， how convenient.

Standard: 最好是能用来开车送货，绝对发大财。
Chinese: 最好是能用来开车送货，绝对发大财。
TraditionalChinese: 最好是能用來開車送貨，絕對發大財。
English: If you can use it to make deliveries， you'd make a lot of money.

Standard: 算了，别做梦了，一步一步自己走吧。
Chinese: 算了，别做梦了，一步一步自己走吧。
TraditionalChinese: 算了，別做夢了，一步一步自己走吧。
English: Bah， no time to daydreaming， better do it myself one step at a time.

Standard: 看地图看半天，还不如走起来。
Chinese: 看地图看半天，还不如走起来。
TraditionalChinese: 看地圖看半天，還不如走起來。
English: Instead of staring at the map， maybe it's better to just start walking.

Standard: 芷滨发展得不错，该有的都有了。
Chinese: 芷滨发展得不错，该有的都有了。
TraditionalChinese: 芷濱發展得不錯，該有的都有了。
English: Zhibin's development is coming along， we have everything we need.

Standard: 有些路好久没走过了，有的人也很久没来往。
Chinese: 有些路好久没走过了，有的人也很久没来往。
TraditionalChinese: 有些路好久沒走過了，有的人也很久沒來往。
English: Haven't walked down some streets， and haven't said hi to lots of people.

Standard: 闲逛一下也问题不大，可别忘了要做的事情。
Chinese: 闲逛一下也问题不大，可别忘了要做的事情。
TraditionalChinese: 閒逛一下也問題不大，可別忘了要做的事情。
English: Shouldn't be a big problem to wander around a bit， but still， gotta remember what I gotta do.

Standard: 阿爸，我们家的房子，旧时就长这样吗？
Chinese: 阿爸，我们家的房子，旧时就长这样吗？
TraditionalChinese: 阿爸，我們家的房子，舊時就長這樣嗎？
English: Dad， was our house always like this?
Of course not.

Standard: 最初只是个泥砖瓦房，光有前面的堂屋。
Chinese: 最初只是个泥砖瓦房，光有前面的堂屋。
TraditionalChinese: 最初只是個泥磚瓦房，光有前面的堂屋。
English: At first， it was just a concrete and tile building with the front area.
We didn't even have a kitchen or bathroom.

Standard: 后来阿公阿奶攒了钱，才拆了重建。
Chinese: 后来阿公阿奶攒了钱，才拆了重建。
TraditionalChinese: 後來阿公阿奶攢了錢，才拆了重建。
English: Then when Grandma and Grandpa finally got some money， we rebuilt.

Standard: 等我跟你妈妈结了婚，又盖了二楼。
Chinese: 等我跟你妈妈结了婚，又盖了二楼。
TraditionalChinese: 等我跟你媽媽結了婚，又蓋了二樓。
English: Then when I married your mom， we built the second floor.
Wow， I want to build an extra floor in the future!
No， four!

Standard: 妈妈和阿爸一层，阿公和阿奶一层。
Chinese: 妈妈和阿爸一层，阿公和阿奶一层。
TraditionalChinese: 媽媽和阿爸一層，阿公和阿奶一層。
English: Mom and dad get one floor， Grandma Grandpa get one floor.
I get a floor.
Sesame gets a floor.
They need a place too!
Then you have to build an elevator.
I don't want to climb that many stairs.

Standard: 电梯是我们在广东饭店见到的那种吗？
Chinese: 电梯是我们在广东饭店见到的那种吗？
TraditionalChinese: 電梯是我們在廣東飯店見到的那種嗎？
English: Elevator like the ones we saw in Guangdong?
Yeah， you love those.
That's fun!

Standard: 每次它的门打开，外面的地方都不一样！
Chinese: 每次它的门打开，外面的地方都不一样！
TraditionalChinese: 每次它的門打開，外面的地方都不一樣！
English: Everytime the doors open， it's different out there.
Counting on you.

Standard: 电梯这么贵，我们是买不起了。
Chinese: 电梯这么贵，我们是买不起了。
TraditionalChinese: 電梯這麼貴，我們是買不起了。
English: Elevators are expensive， we can't afford it.
When you get older， we'll buy it.
Hehehehe.

Standard: 房子旁边这个小人仔，是你咩？
Chinese: 房子旁边这个小人仔，是你咩？
TraditionalChinese: 房子旁邊這個小人仔，是你咩？
English: This little person next to the house is you?
No.
Who is it then?
They are...family!
Whose family?
Family like...

Standard: 她代表我们家全部人！提醒你回家！
Chinese: 她代表我们家全部人！提醒你回家！
TraditionalChinese: 她代表我們家全部人！提醒你回家！
English: They represent all of us， to remind you to come home!
If you come home， you can see us.
Haha， got it.
No， our house is here.
Yeah， here.
No， our house is here.
Aren't you leaving?
Still exercising.
What exercise?
This is proper Taichi.

Standard: 太极生两仪，两仪分阴阳。
Chinese: 太极生两仪，两仪分阴阳。
TraditionalChinese: 太極生兩儀，兩儀分陰陽。
English: From Taichi， there are two of everything， like the Yin and Yang.

Standard: 白天要打一轮，夜晚再打一轮。
Chinese: 白天要打一轮，夜晚再打一轮。
TraditionalChinese: 白天要打一輪，夜晚再打一輪。
English: So I do this once in the morning， once in the evening.

Standard: 现在不打，上车以后就不方便打咯。
Chinese: 现在不打，上车以后就不方便打咯。
TraditionalChinese: 現在不打，上車以後就不方便打咯。
English: If I don't do it now， it'll be hard to do it on the road.
Spouting nonsense again.
When are you all heading out?
Not that fast.

Standard: 等你妈收拾一下铺头，再去买点菜留给你们。
Chinese: 等你妈收拾一下铺头，再去买点菜留给你们。
TraditionalChinese: 等你媽收拾一下鋪頭，再去買點菜留給你們。
English: Your mom has to go clean up， then buy stuff for you tonight.
Starting tomorrow， you're on your own.
Need me to take you to the train station?
Nah， you do your thing.
We'll take the bus.

Standard: 我们家的，小妹家的，电话号码记好。
Chinese: 我们家的，小妹家的，电话号码记好。
TraditionalChinese: 我們家的，小妹家的，電話號碼記好。
English: Remember our number and our little sister's number.
Area code too， got it?
Your mom wrote it down.
Be careful， keep your money safe.
Lots of cars in Guangdong， make sure you look both ways.
Yeah.
Lili， bye!
...Grandpa， bye.
Pay attention in school.
Say something， I'm talking to you.
Oh.

Standard: 中午要在学校吃，饭票莫搞丢了。
Chinese: 中午要在学校吃，饭票莫搞丢了。
TraditionalChinese: 中午要在學校吃，飯票莫搞丟了。
English: You have to eat lunch at school， don't lose your ticket.
I'll come pick you up in the afternoon.
Oh.
Then bye.
Bye.
Oh nice， Director Ye.
You found someone right away.
Cough， cough.
I have some friends here and there.
Shall I chat with them now?
Yeah， I just gave them the general gist.
The rest is up to you.
I'm going to go work now too.
The earlier I get done， the earlier I can go fishing.
(Uncle Ning from the village.)
(Ah Shan changed professions to be a butcher.)
(The team from the sugar factory...)

Standard: （既然老四说糖厂那个人要晚一点才有空。）
Chinese: （既然老四说糖厂那个人要晚一点才有空。）
TraditionalChinese: （既然老四說糖廠那個人要晚一點才有空。）
English: (Though Lao Si said that the sugar factory is going to be busy until later.)
(Maybe I should go find the other two first.)

Standard: 去邮局门口找村里来的宁叔。
Chinese: 去邮局门口找村里来的宁叔。
TraditionalChinese: 去郵局門口找村裏來的寧叔。
English: Go to the post office to find Uncle Ning.
Go to the agricultural center to find Ah Shan.
Everytime I see you， you get fatter.
Getting old， getting happy.

Standard: 你以为个个像你，总是这么好身材？
Chinese: 你以为个个像你，总是这么好身材？
TraditionalChinese: 你以為個個像你，總是這麼好身材？
English: You think everyone is like you， can be fit all the time?

Standard: 每回见你，你做的工作也不一样。
Chinese: 每回见你，你做的工作也不一样。
TraditionalChinese: 每回見你，你做的工作也不一樣。
English: Everytime I see you， your job is different.
Have to find a way to live， yeah?
Open your mind， see the situation!

Standard: 那这个猪贩子的形势，你认清没有？
Chinese: 那这个猪贩子的形势，你认清没有？
TraditionalChinese: 那這個豬販子的形勢，你認清沒有？
English: Then your situation as a butcher， do you see it?
What's the deal?
Very easy.

Standard: 我先到下面各个农村，收各家各户散养的猪。
Chinese: 我先到下面各个农村，收各家各户散养的猪。
TraditionalChinese: 我先到下麵各個農村，收各家各戶散養的豬。
English: We'll go to different farms， pick up their pigs.

Standard: 你再把它们运到县城，任务就完成啦。
Chinese: 你再把它们运到县城，任务就完成啦。
TraditionalChinese: 你再把它們運到縣城，任務就完成啦。
English: Then we deliver them to the county， and that's it.
To the market?
Straight to the slaughterhouse.

Standard: 城里卖猪肉的老板会在那里等的。
Chinese: 城里卖猪肉的老板会在那里等的。
TraditionalChinese: 城裏賣豬肉的老闆會在那裏等的。
English: The pork seller will be there waiting for us.

Standard: 我相当于是个中间人，赚个转手的差价。
Chinese: 我相当于是个中间人，赚个转手的差价。
TraditionalChinese: 我相當於是個中間人，賺個轉手的差價。
English: I'm basically the middleman， make some money off the difference.
Why doesn't the boss come get it themselves.

Standard: 他们对乡下不熟悉，又没有门路，收不到的。
Chinese: 他们对乡下不熟悉，又没有门路，收不到的。
TraditionalChinese: 他們對鄉下不熟悉，又沒有門路，收不到的。
English: They're not familiar with these areas， don't have connections， can't do it.

Standard: 哪家有猪，哪家要卖，都不知道。
Chinese: 哪家有猪，哪家要卖，都不知道。
TraditionalChinese: 哪家有豬，哪家要賣，都不知道。
English: Which house has pigs， which house is selling， they don't know any of it.
Can it fill a truck?
Yes， definitely!
Your 4.2 meter one is just perfect.

Standard: 我们这地方，大部分都是农用车和小货车。
Chinese: 我们这地方，大部分都是农用车和小货车。
TraditionalChinese: 我們這地方，大部分都是農用車和小貨車。
English: Most people here only have the smaller trucks.
Can't haul that much per car， not worth it.

Standard: 都是山路，又要进村，大车不方便嘛。
Chinese: 都是山路，又要进村，大车不方便嘛。
TraditionalChinese: 都是山路，又要進村，大車不方便嘛。
English: And it's all mountain roads， hard to get through.
But you do it easily.

Standard: 先说好，你自己装车，我不参与的。
Chinese: 先说好，你自己装车，我不参与的。
TraditionalChinese: 先說好，你自己裝車，我不參與的。
English: Telling you ahead of time， you load it yourself， I'm not helping.
I know the rules!
No problem， I can herd them.

Standard: 什么时候出发，要提前一天通知我。
Chinese: 什么时候出发，要提前一天通知我。
TraditionalChinese: 什麼時候出發，要提前一天通知我。
English: Let me know a day before you need to head out.

Standard: 我得把车厢整好，铺点禾秆草。
Chinese: 我得把车厢整好，铺点禾秆草。
TraditionalChinese: 我得把車廂整好，鋪點禾稈草。
English: I have to organize the truck， put some hay down ald all that.
So the pigs don't hurt their feet.
Alright! Almost!
Pork prices are going up soon!
Alright， then that settles it.
Oh， Ah Nan...
Something I need to tell you.
What?
Uh..it's like this.

Standard: 我有个妹，我叔家的，表妹吧应该叫。
Chinese: 我有个妹，我叔家的，表妹吧应该叫。
TraditionalChinese: 我有個妹，我叔家的，表妹吧應該叫。
English: I have a cousin， my uncle's cousin.
Okay， and?
So...

Standard: 年纪比我们小两岁吧，三十一二这样子。
Chinese: 年纪比我们小两岁吧，三十一二这样子。
TraditionalChinese: 年紀比我們小兩歲吧，三十一二這樣子。
English: Younger than us by a year or two， like 31， 32.

Standard: 她和你一样，老公也是刚走一段时间。
Chinese: 她和你一样，老公也是刚走一段时间。
TraditionalChinese: 她和你一樣，老公也是剛走一段時間。
English: She's like you， lost her husband a while back.

Standard: 然后她也带着个娃仔，年纪比荔荔还小点。
Chinese: 然后她也带着个娃仔，年纪比荔荔还小点。
TraditionalChinese: 然後她也帶著個娃仔，年紀比荔荔還小點。
English: She also has a kid， a bit younger than Lili.
I think you two might be suitable.
Suitable?

Standard: 她各方面条件都不错，长得漂亮，性格也好。
Chinese: 她各方面条件都不错，长得漂亮，性格也好。
TraditionalChinese: 她各方麵條件都不錯，長得漂亮，性格也好。
English: She's got good qualities， pretty， kind.

Standard: 我跟她提过你，她愿意见个面。
Chinese: 我跟她提过你，她愿意见个面。
TraditionalChinese: 我跟她提過你，她願意見個面。
English: I mentioned you to her， she said she's willing to meet.
Up to you if...
Nope.
Ah， but everyone...
End of discussion.

Standard: 开车就开车，其他事情不用喊我。
Chinese: 开车就开车，其他事情不用喊我。
TraditionalChinese: 開車就開車，其他事情不用喊我。
English: I only drive， don't call me for anything else.
Okay okay.
Forget it then.
Kiddo! Remember me?
We've met before?
Agh! I rode your car!
...Don't remember.

Standard: 大概七八年前，你还在矿区开车的时候！
Chinese: 大概七八年前，你还在矿区开车的时候！
TraditionalChinese: 大概七八年前，你還在礦區開車的時候！
English: 7 or 8 years ago， you were still driving for the mining area.
Don't remember.
That was the street market day.

Standard: 我和我老伴拿家里种的东西来镇上卖。
Chinese: 我和我老伴拿家里种的东西来镇上卖。
TraditionalChinese: 我和我老伴拿家裏種的東西來鎮上賣。
English: Me and my partner brought stuff here to sell.

Standard: 村里没有车坐，要挑担徒步走十几里路。
Chinese: 村里没有车坐，要挑担徒步走十几里路。
TraditionalChinese: 村裏沒有車坐，要挑擔徒步走十幾裏路。
English: Couldn't find a car to take， so we had to walk with all of our stuff for dozens of kilometers.

Standard: 碰巧你开车经过看到，就捎了我们一程。
Chinese: 碰巧你开车经过看到，就捎了我们一程。
TraditionalChinese: 碰巧你開車經過看到，就捎了我們一程。
English: And you saw us on the way in so you gave us a ride.

Standard: 你怕我们不好意思，还一直找话跟我们聊天！
Chinese: 你怕我们不好意思，还一直找话跟我们聊天！
TraditionalChinese: 你怕我們不好意思，還一直找話跟我們聊天！
English: You thought it would be awkward so you kept talking!

Standard: 你说你的娃仔刚出生，是个女儿！
Chinese: 你说你的娃仔刚出生，是个女儿！
TraditionalChinese: 你說你的娃仔剛出生，是個女兒！
English: You said you just had a kid， baby girl!

Standard: 又说你和我一样属虎，我比你大二十四岁。
Chinese: 又说你和我一样属虎，我比你大二十四岁。
TraditionalChinese: 又說你和我一樣屬虎，我比你大二十四歲。
English: You also said we were both born in the year of the tiger， I'm older than you by 24 years.
Oh， I remember!

Standard: 你差点拿了我的运单去卷烟！
Chinese: 你差点拿了我的运单去卷烟！
TraditionalChinese: 你差點拿了我的運單去捲煙！
English: You almost took my delivery slip to roll a smoke!
Yeah yeah! That's me!

Standard: 给你路费也不要，给你红薯芋头也不要。
Chinese: 给你路费也不要，给你红薯芋头也不要。
TraditionalChinese: 給你路費也不要，給你紅薯芋頭也不要。
English: Tried to pay you， you didn't want it. Wanted to give you some potatoes or taro you didn't' want it.
I really felt bad.
It was nothing.
Can't say it like that!
Not everyone can do what you did!

Standard: 师傅教过，出门在外，帮别人等于帮自己。
Chinese: 师傅教过，出门在外，帮别人等于帮自己。
TraditionalChinese: 師傅教過，出門在外，幫別人等於幫自己。
English: My teacher taught me when I go out， helping others is the same as helping yourself.

Standard: 后来不知道从哪天起，大家就没见过你了。
Chinese: 后来不知道从哪天起，大家就没见过你了。
TraditionalChinese: 後來不知道從哪天起，大家就沒見過你了。
English: But I don't know since when we stopped seeing you.

Standard: 但是我记着你的名字。覃牧南。
Chinese: 但是我记着你的名字。覃牧南。
TraditionalChinese: 但是我記著你的名字。覃牧南。
English: But I remember your name， Qin Munan.

Standard: 我买了车跑货运，不在矿区上班了。
Chinese: 我买了车跑货运，不在矿区上班了。
TraditionalChinese: 我買了車跑貨運，不在礦區上班了。
English: I bought a truck to do deliveries， I don't drive for the mine anymore.
I don't really come out this way either.
I came looking for a driver today.

Standard: 供销社那些人说，木材厂的那个什么叶老板。
Chinese: 供销社那些人说，木材厂的那个什么叶老板。
TraditionalChinese: 供銷社那些人說，木材廠的那個什麼葉老闆。
English: They told me that there was that Boss Ye from the lumberyard.

Standard: 有个熟人叫覃牧南，他的车子才够大。
Chinese: 有个熟人叫覃牧南，他的车子才够大。
TraditionalChinese: 有個熟人叫覃牧南，他的車子才夠大。
English: Knows someone named Qin Munan， he's got a big enough truck.

Standard: 我还在想会不会是听错，或者有人同名同姓。
Chinese: 我还在想会不会是听错，或者有人同名同姓。
TraditionalChinese: 我還在想會不會是聽錯，或者有人同名同姓。
English: I was just thinking， did I hear wrong? Or does someone just have the same name.
And it is you! What a coincidence!
Haha， yeah what a coincidence indeed!
What do you need delivered?

Standard: 我们村的农机，要送去县城维修点。
Chinese: 我们村的农机，要送去县城维修点。
TraditionalChinese: 我們村的農機，要送去縣城維修點。
English: Ah， this machine from our village farm， gotta take it in for repairs and maintenence.

Standard: 村长派我做代表，让我来处理。
Chinese: 村长派我做代表，让我来处理。
TraditionalChinese: 村長派我做代表，讓我來處理。
English: The village elder sent me to be the representative， told me to take care of it.
Sure， I'll deliver it.

Standard: 那太好了！有你在我就安心了！
Chinese: 那太好了！有你在我就安心了！
TraditionalChinese: 那太好了！有你在我就安心了！
English: Great! I can relax with you doing it.
Come over for a meal sometime!

Standard: 我家房子重新盖过了，有两层！
Chinese: 我家房子重新盖过了，有两层！
TraditionalChinese: 我家房子重新蓋過了，有兩層！
English: We rebuit our place， it's got two stories now!
Firebricks! Not mud bricks!
Hahaha.
Sure， I'll definitely go.
The sugar factory needs a driver too.

Standard: 他们车队的负责人叫我过去找他。
Chinese: 他们车队的负责人叫我过去找他。
TraditionalChinese: 他們車隊的負責人叫我過去找他。
English: The manager told me to go find him.

Standard: （时间差不多了，可以去糖厂了。）
Chinese: （时间差不多了，可以去糖厂了。）
TraditionalChinese: （時間差不多了，可以去糖廠了。）
English: (It's about time， I can head over to the sugar factory.)
Already harvested?

Standard: 三月底就收了，十二月再开榨。
Chinese: 三月底就收了，十二月再开榨。
TraditionalChinese: 三月底就收了，十二月再開榨。
English: Did that in March， gonna start processing in December.
Why do you need a truck for?
You're not delivering any cane.
Shipping the sugar.
There's that much?
We don't have a lot of trucks.
It's not efficient， we can't afford it.
We only have three large trucks.

Standard: 还有两台农用车和老板的伏尔加。
Chinese: 还有两台农用车和老板的伏尔加。
TraditionalChinese: 還有兩臺農用車和老闆的伏爾加。
English: Two of the farm ones， and the boss's car.

Standard: 有时出货量大，运力根本就不够。
Chinese: 有时出货量大，运力根本就不够。
TraditionalChinese: 有時出貨量大，運力根本就不夠。
English: Sometimes we have a lot to ship， we don't have enough capacity.
I thought you all were doing good.
We've been struggling.
How's your car?
Not bad.
Just did a second level maintenance start of the month.
Come with us in a bit.

Standard: 拉些糖到枣坪那边的一个中转仓库。
Chinese: 拉些糖到枣坪那边的一个中转仓库。
TraditionalChinese: 拉些糖到棗坪那邊的一個中轉倉庫。
English: Bring some sugar over to a transit warehouse in Zaoping.
Zaoping? Which way you plan on going?
From Jinxiu to Mengshan.
That much faith in me?
First run is a mountain road.
If we don't trust you then we wouldn't have called you.

Standard: 芷滨开车的就这点人，早都听说过你了。
Chinese: 芷滨开车的就这点人，早都听说过你了。
TraditionalChinese: 芷濱開車的就這點人，早都聽說過你了。
English: Only so many drivers in Zhibin， everyone knows you.

Standard: 难走的路开过不少吧？出过大事故没有？
Chinese: 难走的路开过不少吧？出过大事故没有？
TraditionalChinese: 難走的路開過不少吧？出過大事故沒有？
English: You've driven many difficult roads， right? Haven't had any accidents， right?
No accidents.
See.

Standard: 平安把车开到目的地，靠的是什么？
Chinese: 平安把车开到目的地，靠的是什么？
TraditionalChinese: 平安把車開到目的地，靠的是什麼？
English: What do you rely on to get to the destination safely?

Standard: 一个是技术要够扎实，另外就是心态要够稳。
Chinese: 一个是技术要够扎实，另外就是心态要够稳。
TraditionalChinese: 一個是技術要夠扎實，另外就是心態要夠穩。
English: Gotta have good skills， and a strong mind.
Huff....Huff....
Kid.
...Kid?
Teacher Chen， My dad is here.
Really? Great!
You can go him!
Master Qin?

Standard: 我姓陈，是茁荔的思想品德课和自然课老师。
Chinese: 我姓陈，是茁荔的思想品德课和自然课老师。
TraditionalChinese: 我姓陳，是茁荔的思想品德課和自然課老師。
English: My last name is Chen. I am Zhuoli's science and etiquette teacher.
Ah， Teacher Chen， hello!
Hello!
Just got done with work?
Yeah， I did a delivery this afternoon.
Got stuck in traffic on the way back.
Ah， no wonder.

Standard: 我问茁荔，为什么学校关门了还不走？
Chinese: 我问茁荔，为什么学校关门了还不走？
TraditionalChinese: 我問茁荔，為什麼學校關門了還不走？
English: I was asking Zhuoli， the school is closed why is she still here.

Standard: 她说，你今早说了要来接她。
Chinese: 她说，你今早说了要来接她。
TraditionalChinese: 她說，你今早說了要來接她。
English: She said you told her this morning you'd pick up her up.
And she doesn't have the keys at home.

Standard: 我不放心让她自己等，就在这儿陪她。
Chinese: 我不放心让她自己等，就在这儿陪她。
TraditionalChinese: 我不放心讓她自己等，就在這兒陪她。
English: I didn't feel safe with her waiting here alone， so I just stayed with her.
Sorry， Teacher Chen.
Made you wait.
Don't worry.
It's my turn to be on call today.

Standard: 我的责任是要确保没有学生留下。
Chinese: 我的责任是要确保没有学生留下。
TraditionalChinese: 我的責任是要確保沒有學生留下。
English: My duty is to make sure none of the students are staying behind.
Oh right， Master Qin.

Standard: 我听茁荔说，爷爷奶奶去了广东？
Chinese: 我听茁荔说，爷爷奶奶去了广东？
TraditionalChinese: 我聽茁荔說，爺爺奶奶去了廣東？
English: I hear Zhuoli say， her grandparents went to Guangdong?

Standard: 是的，我妹刚生娃仔，他们去看她。
Chinese: 是的，我妹刚生娃仔，他们去看她。
TraditionalChinese: 是的，我妹剛生娃仔，他們去看她。
English: Yeah， My sister just had a kid， they went to visit her.
Must be hard for you too.

Standard: 一个人，又要去工作，又要照顾茁荔。
Chinese: 一个人，又要去工作，又要照顾茁荔。
TraditionalChinese: 一個人，又要去工作，又要照顧茁荔。
English: You have to work and take care of Zhuoli by yourself.
Special situation， can't help it.
Being a parent is hard.

Standard: 有什么需要帮忙的尽管告诉我！
Chinese: 有什么需要帮忙的尽管告诉我！
TraditionalChinese: 有什麼需要幫忙的儘管告訴我！
English: If you need any help just let me know!
Okay， thank you!
Head on home!
Zhuoli is probably hungry.
Isn't that right， Zhuoli?
...Not yet.
Okay， let's go.
Goodbye.
Bye Teacher Chen.
Bye!
Want to buy a toy?
Kid?
No.
Go pick one， I'll buy you one.
I don't want toys.
I want the ones mom made.
Still unhappy?
No.
I told you， I got stuck in traffic.

Standard: 怕你等太久，我都尽量赶回来啦。
Chinese: 怕你等太久，我都尽量赶回来啦。
TraditionalChinese: 怕你等太久，我都儘量趕回來啦。
English: I was afraid you would wait long， I came as quickly as I could.
I waited for a long time.
All my classmates already went home.
Even the grandpa guard went home.
I didn't do it on purpose.

Standard: 总会有这种时候的啊，突然遇到点什么事。
Chinese: 总会有这种时候的啊，突然遇到点什么事。
TraditionalChinese: 總會有這種時候的啊，突然遇到點什麼事。
English: Sometimes， things just happen.
Mom was never late.
Grandma and Grandpa were late.
That's because I don't pick you up often.
It won't happen after I'm used to it.
Oh.
Only language and math homework?
Yeah.
Etiquette?
No.

Standard: 那你认真点，写完给我检查。
Chinese: 那你认真点，写完给我检查。
TraditionalChinese: 那你認真點，寫完給我檢查。
English: I'll check when you're done， better focus on it.
Pretending like you didn't hear me again?
Dad?
Do you know if it will rain tonight?
I don't know.
Don't try to change the subject.
You have to finish your homework.

Standard: 你刚才是不是偷偷把菜倒垃圾桶了？
Chinese: 你刚才是不是偷偷把菜倒垃圾桶了？
TraditionalChinese: 你剛才是不是偷偷把菜倒垃圾桶了？
English: Did you put the veggies in the trash just now?
No.
I saw it， don't deny.

Standard: 桶里面的是什么？难道是我自己丢的？
Chinese: 桶里面的是什么？难道是我自己丢的？
TraditionalChinese: 桶裏面的是什麼？難道是我自己丟的？
English: What's in the trash can then? Did I throw it myself?
Don't waste food.
You memorized that poem.
Every grain is hard earned， right?
I don't want to eat.
Do you want to eat something else?
I made everything you like.
It's gross.
I can't eat anymore.

Standard: 妈妈煮排骨是酸甜的，那些汁子可以送饭。
Chinese: 妈妈煮排骨是酸甜的，那些汁子可以送饭。
TraditionalChinese: 媽媽煮排骨是酸甜的，那些汁子可以送飯。
English: Mom's ribs are sweet and sour， it's good with rice.
You made it too salty， and it's dry.

Standard: 妈妈煮的芋头又软又有味道。
Chinese: 妈妈煮的芋头又软又有味道。
TraditionalChinese: 媽媽煮的芋頭又軟又有味道。
English: Mommy's taro is so soft and smells good.

Standard: 你煮的好像没熟，我都不敢吃……
Chinese: 你煮的好像没熟，我都不敢吃……
TraditionalChinese: 你煮的好像沒熟，我都不敢吃……
English: Yours isn't even cooked， I'm afraid to eat it....

Standard: 妈妈说生芋头不能吃，吃了会嘴巴痒的。
Chinese: 妈妈说生芋头不能吃，吃了会嘴巴痒的。
TraditionalChinese: 媽媽說生芋頭不能吃，吃了會嘴巴癢的。
English: Mommy said you can't eat taro raw， it will make your mouth itchy.
Okay okay okay.
I'll do it the way you want next time.
It's bed time， no more.
Time's not up yet.
What do you mean it's not up? It's 9:30.

Standard: 你不是说写完作业可以多看半个钟吗？
Chinese: 你不是说写完作业可以多看半个钟吗？
TraditionalChinese: 你不是說寫完作業可以多看半個鐘嗎？
English: You said I could watch an extra half hour if I did my homework.
Yeah， and you did.
It was originally 9:30.
An extra half hour means 10.
Don't try to trick me.

Standard: 我问过你阿公，你平时是九点休息的。
Chinese: 我问过你阿公，你平时是九点休息的。
TraditionalChinese: 我問過你阿公，你平時是九點休息的。
English: I asked Grandpa， he said you normally go to bed at 9.
I'm not lying! It's 9:30!

Standard: 你看到十点钟，睡觉的时间就不够了。
Chinese: 你看到十点钟，睡觉的时间就不够了。
TraditionalChinese: 你看到十點鐘，睡覺的時間就不夠了。
English: Once it's 10， you don't have enough time ito sleep.

Standard: 明早起不来，上课又没有精神。
Chinese: 明早起不来，上课又没有精神。
TraditionalChinese: 明早起不來，上課又沒有精神。
English: Can't get up in the morning， won't have energy to pay attention in class.
Go to bed.
Did you hear?
I don't wanna!
Turn off the tv， now!
I don't wanna!
I don't wanna! I don't wanna! I don't wanna!
You go back on what you said!

Standard: 说好可以多看半个钟，又不让我看！
Chinese: 说好可以多看半个钟，又不让我看！
TraditionalChinese: 說好可以多看半個鐘，又不讓我看！
English: You said I could watch an extra half hour and then you don't let me!
Why are you throwing a tantrum?!
Throwing a tantrum all the time!
Go rinse your mouth!
I'll count to three!
In the past it was also 9:30?

Standard: 对啊，她去睡觉了我就开始看电视剧。
Chinese: 对啊，她去睡觉了我就开始看电视剧。
TraditionalChinese: 對啊，她去睡覺了我就開始看電視劇。
English: Yeah， I start watching my dramas after she goes to bed.
Too late.

Standard: 娃仔又还没困，你逼她干什么？
Chinese: 娃仔又还没困，你逼她干什么？
TraditionalChinese: 娃仔又還沒困，你逼她幹什麼？
English: She's not tired， why do you force her?
You're spoiling her.
Now she won't listen.

Standard: 娃仔是这样的啦，总有淘气的时候。
Chinese: 娃仔是这样的啦，总有淘气的时候。
TraditionalChinese: 娃仔是這樣的啦，總有淘氣的時候。
English: Kids are like that， they'll misbehave occasionally.
You thought you were easy to raise?
You talk like you know what it's like.

Standard: 以前不都是我妈和大姐带的我。
Chinese: 以前不都是我妈和大姐带的我。
TraditionalChinese: 以前不都是我媽和大姐帶的我。
English: Mom and Big sis were the ones who took care of me.
Who taught you how to ride a bike?
Swimming? Rowing? What about those?

Standard: 你是想出去耍，才顺便带上我。
Chinese: 你是想出去耍，才顺便带上我。
TraditionalChinese: 你是想出去耍，才順便帶上我。
English: You wanted to go out， you just brought me along.
Nonsense.
When are you all coming back?
After your little sister gets better.
How is she?
Still on bedrest.
In lots of pain， the sedatives are gone.
She's too thin， not heathly enough.

Standard: 那天生完还要输血呢，医生怕她恢复不过来。
Chinese: 那天生完还要输血呢，医生怕她恢复不过来。
TraditionalChinese: 那天生完還要輸血呢，醫生怕她恢復不過來。
English: She had to get a blood transfusion after too， the doctor was afraid she wouldn't recover.
That's hard.
Take care of her.
Got it.
We take turns.
Yeah， don't let her move around.
If there's nothing else then hang up.
Long distance calls are expensive.
Yeah.
Driver Qin.
Teacher Zhang， hi!
I'm here to pick up Qin Zhuoli.
You'll have to wait.

Standard: 她挨罚留堂，得把布置的东西抄完才能走。
Chinese: 她挨罚留堂，得把布置的东西抄完才能走。
TraditionalChinese: 她挨罰留堂，得把佈置的東西抄完才能走。
English: She got punished to stay， so she has to finish copying her work first.
...Punished to stay?
What'd she do?

Standard: 你这个女儿呀，该说她胆子小还是胆子大呢？
Chinese: 你这个女儿呀，该说她胆子小还是胆子大呢？
TraditionalChinese: 你這個女兒呀，該說她膽子小還是膽子大呢？
English: Your daughter， should I say she's brave or cowardly?

Standard: 平时跟老师，跟同学，话都不敢多说两句。
Chinese: 平时跟老师，跟同学，话都不敢多说两句。
TraditionalChinese: 平時跟老師，跟同學，話都不敢多說兩句。
English: Normally， she doesn't talk much to her teachers or classmates.

Standard: 想不到她上课的时候，居然偷偷看图画书。
Chinese: 想不到她上课的时候，居然偷偷看图画书。
TraditionalChinese: 想不到她上課的時候，居然偷偷看圖畫書。
English: But during class， I saw her sneakily reading a storybook.

Standard: 被我逮到了，要没收，还想抢回来。
Chinese: 被我逮到了，要没收，还想抢回来。
TraditionalChinese: 被我逮到了，要沒收，還想搶回來。
English: I caught her， wanted to take it away， she fought back.

Standard: 不得了，要是学习也有这股劲就好咯。
Chinese: 不得了，要是学习也有这股劲就好咯。
TraditionalChinese: 不得了，要是學習也有這股勁就好咯。
English: Incredible， if only she had that much energy to study.
...Storybook from home?
Yeah， something Mighty Heroine.
She brought a lot of them to school.

Standard: 我问她，上课为什么看与学习无关的书？
Chinese: 我问她，上课为什么看与学习无关的书？
TraditionalChinese: 我問她，上課為什麼看與學習無關的書？
English: I asked her， why is she reading books not related to class?
You know how she answered me?
She said， “Because I want to.”
“I want to read it.”
Driver Qin， look.
Why is your daughter so hard to teach.
Back and forth it's just a few phrases.
Yes， no.
I want to， I don't want to.

Standard: 我根本都不晓得她到底在想点什么。
Chinese: 我根本都不晓得她到底在想点什么。
TraditionalChinese: 我根本都不曉得她到底在想點什麼。
English: I don't even know what she's thinking.
...Sorry， Teacher.

Standard: 这娃仔身体不是很好，你们情况也比较特殊。
Chinese: 这娃仔身体不是很好，你们情况也比较特殊。
TraditionalChinese: 這娃仔身體不是很好，你們情況也比較特殊。
English: She's not very healthy， and your situation is different.

Standard: 这些我都能理解，我也特别照顾她了。
Chinese: 这些我都能理解，我也特别照顾她了。
TraditionalChinese: 這些我都能理解，我也特別照顧她了。
English: I can understand， and I'm trying my best.

Standard: 但是过了这么久，一点长进都没有。
Chinese: 但是过了这么久，一点长进都没有。
TraditionalChinese: 但是過了這麼久，一點長進都沒有。
English: But after so long， there's still no improvement.

Standard: 家长是要采取行动了，不能都丢给学校。
Chinese: 家长是要采取行动了，不能都丢给学校。
TraditionalChinese: 家長是要採取行動了，不能都丟給學校。
English: Parents have to take some responsibility too， can't just throw it all to the school.

Standard: 她现在这么刁蛮，都是你们纵容的。
Chinese: 她现在这么刁蛮，都是你们纵容的。
TraditionalChinese: 她現在這麼刁蠻，都是你們縱容的。
English: She's so bossy now because you let her be.
Don't you think?
....Yeah.

Standard: 训娃仔就要恶，不然她不当回事。
Chinese: 训娃仔就要恶，不然她不当回事。
TraditionalChinese: 訓娃仔就要惡，不然她不當回事。
English: You have to be strict when your scolding them otherwise they don't care.
Let them know they are wrong.

Standard: 特别是女娃仔，听话是最要紧的。
Chinese: 特别是女娃仔，听话是最要紧的。
TraditionalChinese: 特別是女娃仔，聽話是最要緊的。
English: Especially girls， being obedient is most important.

Standard: 你看我家周筱钰，教的就挺好。
Chinese: 你看我家周筱钰，教的就挺好。
TraditionalChinese: 你看我家周筱鈺，教的就挺好。
English: Like my Zhou Xiaoyu， she is easy to teach.

Standard: 从小让她做什么，她就做什么，规规矩矩。
Chinese: 从小让她做什么，她就做什么，规规矩矩。
TraditionalChinese: 從小讓她做什麼，她就做什麼，規規矩矩。
English: Whatever I tell her to do， she'll do， follows instructions.
See， she made it to college.

Standard: 俗话说，严父出孝子，慈母多败儿。
Chinese: 俗话说，严父出孝子，慈母多败儿。
TraditionalChinese: 俗話說，嚴父出孝子，慈母多敗兒。
English: As the saying goes， a strict father teaches a filial child， a mother too kind fails the  child.

Standard: 讲什么爱，什么用心，全是胡说八道。
Chinese: 讲什么爱，什么用心，全是胡说八道。
TraditionalChinese: 講什麼愛，什麼用心，全是胡說八道。
English: All that love and care talk， a bunch of nonsense.
Just a kid， what do they know?!

Standard: 为什么要拿走我的玩具和书！？
Chinese: 为什么要拿走我的玩具和书！？
TraditionalChinese: 為什麼要拿走我的玩具和書！？
English: Why are you taking away my toys and books?!

Standard: 因为你不听话，在学校违反纪律。
Chinese: 因为你不听话，在学校违反纪律。
TraditionalChinese: 因為你不聽話，在學校違反紀律。
English: Because you aren't good in school and broke the rules.

Standard: 从今天起不准玩玩具，不准看电视看图画书。
Chinese: 从今天起不准玩玩具，不准看电视看图画书。
TraditionalChinese: 從今天起不准玩玩具，不准看電視看圖畫書。
English: From now on， you don't get toys，TV， or storybooks.
I'm putting away your toys and books.

Standard: 等老师说你表现好了，再还给你。
Chinese: 等老师说你表现好了，再还给你。
TraditionalChinese: 等老師說你表現好了，再還給你。
English: When the teacher says you're doing better， I'll give it back.
No! I don't wanna!
That's how it is， no arguing.
You can't take my toys!
Mommy made those for me!
She bought the books too!
Give it back! Give it back!
You always mention mom!

Standard: 那你答应妈妈的事情，你做到了没有？
Chinese: 那你答应妈妈的事情，你做到了没有？
TraditionalChinese: 那你答應媽媽的事情，你做到了沒有？
English: Did you do anything you told mom you'd do?

Standard: 你是不是跟我们说过，要做个好孩子？
Chinese: 你是不是跟我们说过，要做个好孩子？
TraditionalChinese: 你是不是跟我們說過，要做個好孩子？
English: Didn't you tell us， you'd be a good kid?

Standard: 说话不算话，妈妈知道会高兴吗？
Chinese: 说话不算话，妈妈知道会高兴吗？
TraditionalChinese: 說話不算話，媽媽知道會高興嗎？
English: You're not doing what you said you would， would mom be happy?
You two are the ones going back on what you said!

Standard: 妈妈答应过我，以后都会陪我写作业的！
Chinese: 妈妈答应过我，以后都会陪我写作业的！
TraditionalChinese: 媽媽答應過我，以後都會陪我寫作業的！
English: Mommy said she would do assignments with me!

Standard: 她答应我，考试考得好会给我奖励！
Chinese: 她答应我，考试考得好会给我奖励！
TraditionalChinese: 她答應我，考試考得好會給我獎勵！
English: She said if I do good on tests she will give me rewards!

Standard: 她说等我长大一点了，就带我去很多地方玩！
Chinese: 她说等我长大一点了，就带我去很多地方玩！
TraditionalChinese: 她說等我長大一點了，就帶我去很多地方玩！
English: She said when I'm older she'll take me places to go play!
You both said you would!

Standard: 说等你们回来，就一起去街上吃甜酒！
Chinese: 说等你们回来，就一起去街上吃甜酒！
TraditionalChinese: 說等你們回來，就一起去街上吃甜酒！
English: And said when you come back we'll go get snacks!
You both lied!
Only you came back!
Mommy didn't!
She threw me away， doesn't want me!
Wahh-
Mister Qin!
Teacher Chen?
Mister Qin， are you heading out?
No， just out for a walk.

Standard: 我听其他老师说，茁荔今天被罚留堂了。
Chinese: 我听其他老师说，茁荔今天被罚留堂了。
TraditionalChinese: 我聽其他老師說，茁荔今天被罰留堂了。
English: I heard from the other teachers， Zhuoli got punished to stay late today.
....Yeah， that's right.
I have to apologize to you.
Apologize?
I'm the one who let her read the storybooks.
...What do you mean?

Standard: 其实我早就发现她这样做了。
Chinese: 其实我早就发现她这样做了。
TraditionalChinese: 其實我早就發現她這樣做了。
English: I actually found out she was doing that a while ago.

Standard: 大概是几个礼拜前，在我的课上。
Chinese: 大概是几个礼拜前，在我的课上。
TraditionalChinese: 大概是幾個禮拜前，在我的課上。
English: Probably a few weeks ago， in my class.

Standard: 一开始我问她为什么，她不回答我。
Chinese: 一开始我问她为什么，她不回答我。
TraditionalChinese: 一開始我問她為什麼，她不回答我。
English: At first， I asked her why， she wouldn't tell me.

Standard: 后来我经常找她聊天，她慢慢就愿意说了。
Chinese: 后来我经常找她聊天，她慢慢就愿意说了。
TraditionalChinese: 後來我經常找她聊天，她慢慢就願意說了。
English: Afterwards， I would talk to her often， she slowly started to tell me.
She said， she misses her mom.

Standard: 过去妈妈会经常给她读图画书里的故事。
Chinese: 过去妈妈会经常给她读图画书里的故事。
TraditionalChinese: 過去媽媽會經常給她讀圖畫書裏的故事。
English: In the past her mom would read to her from these books often.

Standard: 所以每当她想妈妈了，她就看图画书。
Chinese: 所以每当她想妈妈了，她就看图画书。
TraditionalChinese: 所以每當她想媽媽了，她就看圖畫書。
English: So whenever she misses mom， she would read those books.

Standard: 虽然看书的时候，她会很难过。
Chinese: 虽然看书的时候，她会很难过。
TraditionalChinese: 雖然看書的時候，她會很難過。
English: Even though she would feel sad when she's reading.

Standard: 但是这样她就能回忆起妈妈说过的话。
Chinese: 但是这样她就能回忆起妈妈说过的话。
TraditionalChinese: 但是這樣她就能回憶起媽媽說過的話。
English: But at least this way she can remember what her mom told her.
She says she's afraid of forgetting her mom.

Standard: 她总想记住妈妈说过的话和做过的事。
Chinese: 她总想记住妈妈说过的话和做过的事。
TraditionalChinese: 她總想記住媽媽說過的話和做過的事。
English: She wants to remember everything her mom did and said.
So I told her， go ahead.
It's okay， you can read it in class too.

Standard: 结果她其他课也看了，还被罚留堂了。
Chinese: 结果她其他课也看了，还被罚留堂了。
TraditionalChinese: 結果她其他課也看了，還被罰留堂了。
English: So she read in other classes too， and got punished.
It's my fault.
...Sigh.
She didn't tell me.
Lots of things she keeps inside.
You have to try to talk to her more.
She wasn't like this before.

Standard: 我老婆……走了以后，她就不爱讲话了。
Chinese: 我老婆……走了以后，她就不爱讲话了。
TraditionalChinese: 我老婆……走了以後，她就不愛講話了。
English: After my wife....left. She didn't like to talk anymore.

Standard: 遇到这种变故，大人都痛苦，何况是她呢。
Chinese: 遇到这种变故，大人都痛苦，何况是她呢。
TraditionalChinese: 遇到這種變故，大人都痛苦，何況是她呢。
English: Having that happen， even adults feel pain， not to mention her.

Standard: 其实她很懂事的，绝对不是那种任性的娃仔。
Chinese: 其实她很懂事的，绝对不是那种任性的娃仔。
TraditionalChinese: 其實她很懂事的，絕對不是那種任性的娃仔。
English: She actually is very understanding， not a stubborn child.

Standard: 跟你说一件让我记忆深刻的事情吧。
Chinese: 跟你说一件让我记忆深刻的事情吧。
TraditionalChinese: 跟你說一件讓我記憶深刻的事情吧。
English: Let me tell you something that I will always remember.

Standard: 有一次午休时间，茁荔来办公室找我。
Chinese: 有一次午休时间，茁荔来办公室找我。
TraditionalChinese: 有一次午休時間，茁荔來辦公室找我。
English: One time during lunch break， Zhuoli came to my office.

Standard: 头天晚上我要赶材料，没睡觉，正趴着休息。
Chinese: 头天晚上我要赶材料，没睡觉，正趴着休息。
TraditionalChinese: 頭天晚上我要趕材料，沒睡覺，正趴著休息。
English: The night before I was working on getting materials ready so I didn't sleep. So I was napping at my desk.

Standard: 当时其他老师都不在，办公室里没有别人。
Chinese: 当时其他老师都不在，办公室里没有别人。
TraditionalChinese: 當時其他老師都不在，辦公室裏沒有別人。
English: None of the other teachers were there， no one else was in the office.

Standard: 她进来了也不吭声，就站在我座位旁边等着。
Chinese: 她进来了也不吭声，就站在我座位旁边等着。
TraditionalChinese: 她進來了也不吭聲，就站在我座位旁邊等著。
English: She didn't make anoise when she came in， just sat next to me.

Standard: 直到别的老师回来把我叫醒，我才知道她在。
Chinese: 直到别的老师回来把我叫醒，我才知道她在。
TraditionalChinese: 直到別的老師回來把我叫醒，我才知道她在。
English: I didn't realize she was there until another teacher came in and woke me up.

Standard: 我说，茁荔你怎么不喊我一下，或者拍拍我。
Chinese: 我说，茁荔你怎么不喊我一下，或者拍拍我。
TraditionalChinese: 我說，茁荔你怎麼不喊我一下，或者拍拍我。
English: I said， “Zhuoli， why didn't you call my name， or tap me.”

Standard: 她说她不好意思，不想影响我睡觉。
Chinese: 她说她不好意思，不想影响我睡觉。
TraditionalChinese: 她說她不好意思，不想影響我睡覺。
English: She said she didn't want to disturb me sleeping.
...She's very thoughtful， a bit shy.

Standard: 这不是忸怩，是为别人考虑。
Chinese: 这不是忸怩，是为别人考虑。
TraditionalChinese: 這不是忸怩，是為別人考慮。
English: That wasn't being shy， that was thinking about others.

Standard: 我还问过她，想不想让爸爸常回家陪她？
Chinese: 我还问过她，想不想让爸爸常回家陪她？
TraditionalChinese: 我還問過她，想不想讓爸爸常回家陪她？
English: I asked her， does she want dad to come home more often to be with her.

Standard: 她说想，可是爸爸要在外面赚钱，给她治病。
Chinese: 她说想，可是爸爸要在外面赚钱，给她治病。
TraditionalChinese: 她說想，可是爸爸要在外面賺錢，給她治病。
English: She said “Yes， but dad has to work to make money so she can get treatment.”

Standard: 她不希望你特意回来，那样会很辛苦很累。
Chinese: 她不希望你特意回来，那样会很辛苦很累。
TraditionalChinese: 她不希望你特意回來，那樣會很辛苦很累。
English: She doesn't want you to come back just for her， otherwise it will be tiring.
She's very kind and sensitive.

Standard: 你不要责备她，那样只会让她更难过的。
Chinese: 你不要责备她，那样只会让她更难过的。
TraditionalChinese: 你不要責備她，那樣只會讓她更難過的。
English: Don't scold her， it will only make her feel worse.

Standard: 多些交流，去了解她，才能解决问题。
Chinese: 多些交流，去了解她，才能解决问题。
TraditionalChinese: 多些交流，去瞭解她，才能解決問題。
English: Talk to her more， understand her more， that will help solve problems.
Why aren't you asleep yet.
I can't fall asleep.
Lay down and rest at least.
You have to go to school tomorrow.
Daddy， I'm sorry.
I'm the one who should apologize.
Daddy， are you leaving again?
Leaving? Where to?
To drive.
No， who said that.

Standard: 那天我听到，你跟阿公打电话。
Chinese: 那天我听到，你跟阿公打电话。
TraditionalChinese: 那天我聽到，你跟阿公打電話。
English: The other day I heard you and Grandpa talking.
You asked when he's coming back.

Standard: 你是不是要出去开车，不理我了？
Chinese: 你是不是要出去开车，不理我了？
TraditionalChinese: 你是不是要出去開車，不理我了？
English: Are you going to go driving again， and ignore me.
Nonsense， I was just asking.
Why would I ignore you?
I'm afraid you hate me.
Why would you think I hate you?
I， I always make you mad.
No.
Yes， you're mad.
No.

Standard: 你是阿爸的女儿，阿爸永远不会觉得你讨嫌。
Chinese: 你是阿爸的女儿，阿爸永远不会觉得你讨嫌。
TraditionalChinese: 你是阿爸的女兒，阿爸永遠不會覺得你討嫌。
English: You're my daugther， I'll never hate you.
Really?
Really.
Go to bed， it's late.
Dad.
Do you know how to play the harmonica?
A little， why?

Standard: 以前我睡不着，妈妈都会吹口琴给我听。
Chinese: 以前我睡不着，妈妈都会吹口琴给我听。
TraditionalChinese: 以前我睡不著，媽媽都會吹口琴給我聽。
English: When I couldn't sleep， Mom would always play it for me.
Hm..I'll try.

Standard: 但是我很久没吹过了，要复习一下。
Chinese: 但是我很久没吹过了，要复习一下。
TraditionalChinese: 但是我很久沒吹過了，要復習一下。
English: I haven't done it in a while， I have to practice a bit.

Standard: 今天放这部电影，说是武侠片，其实是喜剧。
Chinese: 今天放这部电影，说是武侠片，其实是喜剧。
TraditionalChinese: 今天放這部電影，說是武俠片，其實是喜劇。
English: The movie today， they say it's a Wuxia film， but really it's a comedy.

Standard: 一开始我以为是正经的武侠片，还蛮期待。
Chinese: 一开始我以为是正经的武侠片，还蛮期待。
TraditionalChinese: 一開始我以為是正經的武俠片，還蠻期待。
English: At first I thought it was a serious Wuxia film and was looking forward to it.
But it was a comedy， disappointing.

Standard: 有好多明星参演，全是大腕中的大腕。
Chinese: 有好多明星参演，全是大腕中的大腕。
TraditionalChinese: 有好多明星參演，全是大腕中的大腕。
English: Lots of big names too， the biggest of the big.

Standard: 里面的角色名字，用的是金大师小说里的人名。
Chinese: 里面的角色名字，用的是金大师小说里的人名。
TraditionalChinese: 裏面的角色名字，用的是金大師小說裏的人名。
English: All the characters are using names of Master Jin's characters.
But the story has nothing to do with it.

Standard: 如果单纯当喜剧来看，倒是挺好玩的。
Chinese: 如果单纯当喜剧来看，倒是挺好玩的。
TraditionalChinese: 如果單純當喜劇來看，倒是挺好玩的。
English: From a comedy viewpoint， it's pretty fun.
So many good parts， not awkward at all.
Hongping.
Ah? Bro' Nan， you're back!
Yeah， got back yesterday.
Granny!
Huh?
Isn't this Ah Nan?
How are you doing?
Good， very good.
You're here at the stand too?
Yeah.
Nothing to do at home.

Standard: 扫地拔草种菜，一早晨都做完了。
Chinese: 扫地拔草种菜，一早晨都做完了。
TraditionalChinese: 掃地拔草種菜，一早晨都做完了。
English: Swept the floors， pulled weeds， took care of my plants， did it all this morning.

Standard: 她是怕我太辛苦，硬要跟来帮忙。
Chinese: 她是怕我太辛苦，硬要跟来帮忙。
TraditionalChinese: 她是怕我太辛苦，硬要跟來幫忙。
English: She was afraid it's too much work for me so insisted on coming.
You still get up in the middle of the night?
Yeah， otherwise I don't have enough time.

Standard: 烧腊的工序就是必须要这么长时间。
Chinese: 烧腊的工序就是必须要这么长时间。
TraditionalChinese: 燒臘的工序就是必須要這麼長時間。
English: The work for BBQ takes that long.

Standard: 我六七点钟就要出摊，两点必须开始准备了。
Chinese: 我六七点钟就要出摊，两点必须开始准备了。
TraditionalChinese: 我六七點鐘就要出攤，兩點必須開始準備了。
English: If I want to get my stand ready at 6 or 7 I have to start work at 2.
That's a lot of effort.
What job doesn't take effort?

Standard: 我是心疼这个老太太，五点钟就要起床陪我。
Chinese: 我是心疼这个老太太，五点钟就要起床陪我。
TraditionalChinese: 我是心疼這個老太太，五點鐘就要起床陪我。
English: I feel bad for Granny， getting up at 5 just to be with me.

Standard: 她也心疼你啊，你是她最小的外孙。
Chinese: 她也心疼你啊，你是她最小的外孙。
TraditionalChinese: 她也心疼你啊，你是她最小的外孫。
English: She cares for you， you're her youngest grandchild.

Standard: 你过不好，她哪有心思享福？
Chinese: 你过不好，她哪有心思享福？
TraditionalChinese: 你過不好，她哪有心思享福？
English: If you're not doing well， how is she going to enjoy her life?
Yeah.
So I don't dare let her down.
I don't sleep a lot.
I can't sleep after sunrise.
I can't stay at home.

Standard: 我就喜欢街上，我喜欢市场，热闹。
Chinese: 我就喜欢街上，我喜欢市场，热闹。
TraditionalChinese: 我就喜歡街上，我喜歡市場，熱鬧。
English: I like being out here， I like the market， it's lively.

Standard: 做了这么久，生意还是不温不火。
Chinese: 做了这么久，生意还是不温不火。
TraditionalChinese: 做了這麼久，生意還是不溫不火。
English: Been doing this for so long， business is just so so.
Whether or not I'll sell well is all luck.

Standard: 毕竟烧腊不是家常菜，价格比较贵。
Chinese: 毕竟烧腊不是家常菜，价格比较贵。
TraditionalChinese: 畢竟燒臘不是家常菜，價格比較貴。
English: BBQ isn't stuff you normally make at home， so it's a bit pricier.

Standard: 逢年过节或者发工资，大家才舍得买来吃。
Chinese: 逢年过节或者发工资，大家才舍得买来吃。
TraditionalChinese: 逢年過節或者發工資，大家才捨得買來吃。
English: Only during holidays of paydays do people want to come by it.

Standard: 最近还算不错了，清明过完又是端午。
Chinese: 最近还算不错了，清明过完又是端午。
TraditionalChinese: 最近還算不錯了，清明過完又是端午。
English: Lately it's been pretty good， after Qingming it's Duanwu.

Standard: 好日子也多，各家各户不时有喜事。
Chinese: 好日子也多，各家各户不时有喜事。
TraditionalChinese: 好日子也多，各家各戶不時有喜事。
English: Lots of good days too， plenty of weddings.

Standard: 我自己卖或者给酒楼，销量都不错。
Chinese: 我自己卖或者给酒楼，销量都不错。
TraditionalChinese: 我自己賣或者給酒樓，銷量都不錯。
English: I can sell it myself or sell it to the restaraunts， doing pretty good.
Ol' Mo.
Ol' Qin? What?
Nothing， just coming to see you.
You aren't running north and south again?
Taking a break today.
Where's Granny?
Hospital.
What?
A bit of a cold， had to go get some shots.
What are you working on?

Standard: 没有东西要忙，在研究这台复印机哪样用。
Chinese: 没有东西要忙，在研究这台复印机哪样用。
TraditionalChinese: 沒有東西要忙，在研究這臺影印機哪樣用。
English: Nothing， just checking out how this printer works.
Oh， this is expensive.
17000 and some.
A bit more you can buy my truck.

Standard: 啧，你那台车本来就是人家工厂不要的。
Chinese: 啧，你那台车本来就是人家工厂不要的。
TraditionalChinese: 嘖，你那臺車本來就是人家工廠不要的。
English: Tsk， your truck was from a factory that didn't want it.
Gotta be third or fourth hand now.
Just about， but it's good.

Standard: 反正我是觉得划算的，开了几年也没啥问题。
Chinese: 反正我是觉得划算的，开了几年也没啥问题。
TraditionalChinese: 反正我是覺得划算的，開了幾年也沒啥問題。
English: At least I feel like it's worth it， no problem these years.

Standard: 不过这台复印机我也是托关系搞回来。
Chinese: 不过这台复印机我也是托关系搞回来。
TraditionalChinese: 不過這臺影印機我也是托關係搞回來。
English: But I also got this printer through some connections.

Standard: 钱还没给多少，相当于租的吧。
Chinese: 钱还没给多少，相当于租的吧。
TraditionalChinese: 錢還沒給多少，相當於租的吧。
English: I didn't pay too much， so it's kind of like renting it.
You want to expand this side of your business?
Going to try.
I'm going to go under if I just stick with photographs.

Standard: 冲晒照片，不是讲利润很高咯？
Chinese: 冲晒照片，不是讲利润很高咯？
TraditionalChinese: 沖曬照片，不是講利潤很高咯？
English: Aren't profits high for developing photos?

Standard: 我哪有彩扩机？二手的都买不起。
Chinese: 我哪有彩扩机？二手的都买不起。
TraditionalChinese: 我哪有彩擴機？二手的都買不起。
English: I don't have the machine for it. I can't even buy one used.

Standard: 整个龙水县也就一台，我就是去那里晒的。
Chinese: 整个龙水县也就一台，我就是去那里晒的。
TraditionalChinese: 整個龍水縣也就一臺，我就是去那裏曬的。
English: All of our county only has one， I go to the county one to use it.
That important?

Standard: 这几年省会街上，到处挂着“彩扩“的纸牌。
Chinese: 这几年省会街上，到处挂着“彩扩“的纸牌。
TraditionalChinese: 這幾年省會街上，到處掛著“彩擴“的紙牌。
English: I saw they were advertising “color prints” everywhere.
That thing?

Standard: 就是这种东西，十几万一台。
Chinese: 就是这种东西，十几万一台。
TraditionalChinese: 就是這種東西，十幾萬一臺。
English: That thing， it's tens of thousands just for one.
Then how can you afford it?
So I'm trying else.
So what you're saying that copy printing has a future?
I don't know either.
Just going to try my luck.

Standard: 现在这么多人往外跑，总要复印点材料吧？
Chinese: 现在这么多人往外跑，总要复印点材料吧？
TraditionalChinese: 現在這麼多人往外跑，總要複印點材料吧？
English: So many people headed out to do business， they'll need some copies right?

Standard: 你这么有空，先帮我看一会儿店呗。
Chinese: 你这么有空，先帮我看一会儿店呗。
TraditionalChinese: 你這麼有空，先幫我看一會兒店唄。
English: Since you're so free， help watch my store for a bit.
I'm bored， gonna go for a walk.

Standard: 你讲你去看阿奶，我还考虑一下。
Chinese: 你讲你去看阿奶，我还考虑一下。
TraditionalChinese: 你講你去看阿奶，我還考慮一下。
English: If you say you're going to see your grandma， I'd consider it.
I'm going to see my grandma.
Buzz off.

Standard: 不知不觉，我开这家店也有六年了。
Chinese: 不知不觉，我开这家店也有六年了。
TraditionalChinese: 不知不覺，我開這家店也有六年了。
English: Hard to believe I've ran this store for 6 years.

Standard: 当时也不懂得照相馆要哪样经营。
Chinese: 当时也不懂得照相馆要哪样经营。
TraditionalChinese: 當時也不懂得照相館要哪樣經營。
English: I didn't even know how to run a photo shop.

Standard: 有个亲戚和我讲，照相馆来钱快，我就开了。
Chinese: 有个亲戚和我讲，照相馆来钱快，我就开了。
TraditionalChinese: 有個親戚和我講，照相館來錢快，我就開了。
English: A relative told me， photo shops make money， so I started one.

Standard: 本来打算就是做几年，等有钱了就把店关掉。
Chinese: 本来打算就是做几年，等有钱了就把店关掉。
TraditionalChinese: 本來打算就是做幾年，等有錢了就把店關掉。
English: I was planning on running it a few years， when I make money， I'll close the store.
Then do something else.

Standard: 别的事是什么，我也没想过。
Chinese: 别的事是什么，我也没想过。
TraditionalChinese: 別的事是什麼，我也沒想過。
English: But I never thought of “something else”.
My dad keeps on me though.

Standard: 讲什么不要满足现状，要争取更大的发展。
Chinese: 讲什么不要满足现状，要争取更大的发展。
TraditionalChinese: 講什麼不要滿足現狀，要爭取更大的發展。
English: Something about don't be satisfied with just what you have， you have to expand your horizons.
Gotta make this a better photo shop.

Standard: 他这辈子也就那样子，不懂得为什么要逼我。
Chinese: 他这辈子也就那样子，不懂得为什么要逼我。
TraditionalChinese: 他這輩子也就那樣子，不懂得為什麼要逼我。
English: His whole life was just like that， I don't know why he's on me.
He wants me to be more successful than him?

Standard: 以前县城都没有彩扩，洗彩色照片要去省会。
Chinese: 以前县城都没有彩扩，洗彩色照片要去省会。
TraditionalChinese: 以前縣城都沒有彩擴，洗彩色照片要去省會。
English: There was no color printer in the county， you'd have to go to the capital.

Standard: 大清早我就去坐火车，洗完又要赶回来。
Chinese: 大清早我就去坐火车，洗完又要赶回来。
TraditionalChinese: 大清早我就去坐火車，洗完又要趕回來。
English: So I'd wake up bright and early to catch the train， then rush back.
To save money I'd even jump on the train.

Standard: 这个店一开始有狗屁的生意，我都不开门的。
Chinese: 这个店一开始有狗屁的生意，我都不开门的。
TraditionalChinese: 這個店一開始有狗屁的生意，我都不開門的。
English: I had no customers when I first opened， I didn't even open the doors to the store.

Standard: 背着个相机去外面浪，见人就问要不要照相。
Chinese: 背着个相机去外面浪，见人就问要不要照相。
TraditionalChinese: 背著個相機去外面浪，見人就問要不要照相。
English: I took my camera and walked everywhere， asking people if they wanted a photograph.

Standard: 特别是街日子的时候，人多多的，一个个问。
Chinese: 特别是街日子的时候，人多多的，一个个问。
TraditionalChinese: 特別是街日子的時候，人多多的，一個個問。
English: Especially during the street market days， lots of people， so I'd ask everyone.

Standard: 最后各个村都有人认识我了。
Chinese: 最后各个村都有人认识我了。
TraditionalChinese: 最後各個村都有人認識我了。
English: After a while people in every town knew about me.

Standard: 知道我在芷滨镇照相，叫我去村里给娃仔拍。
Chinese: 知道我在芷滨镇照相，叫我去村里给娃仔拍。
TraditionalChinese: 知道我在芷濱鎮照相，叫我去村裏給娃仔拍。
English: They know I have a photo shop here， would call me to ask me to take pictures of their kids.

Standard: 现在主要靠拍证件照，一寸两寸的。
Chinese: 现在主要靠拍证件照，一寸两寸的。
TraditionalChinese: 現在主要靠拍證件照，一寸兩寸的。
English: Now it's mostly for ID， the smaller ones.

Standard: 糖厂、制衣厂之类的，工人多，要工作证。
Chinese: 糖厂、制衣厂之类的，工人多，要工作证。
TraditionalChinese: 糖廠、制衣廠之類的，工人多，要工作證。
English: Sugar factory， clothing factory， lots of workers， they need photo ID.

Standard: 我就上门帮他们照相，一次几十个人。
Chinese: 我就上门帮他们照相，一次几十个人。
TraditionalChinese: 我就上門幫他們照相，一次幾十個人。
English: So I just go and take pictures for them， dozens of people at a time.

Standard: 艺术照也有人拍，那种用背景墙的。
Chinese: 艺术照也有人拍，那种用背景墙的。
TraditionalChinese: 藝術照也有人拍，那種用背景牆的。
English: Sometimes I'll do the artistic ones， the ones with the backdrops.
Military， weddings， kids.
I do fewer outside shoots.

Standard: 大城市的人喜欢山水，觉得这种风景很漂亮。
Chinese: 大城市的人喜欢山水，觉得这种风景很漂亮。
TraditionalChinese: 大城市的人喜歡山水，覺得這種風景很漂亮。
English: The people in the city like the nature shots， they think it's pretty.

Standard: 芷滨人是相反的，觉得很荒凉很落后。
Chinese: 芷滨人是相反的，觉得很荒凉很落后。
TraditionalChinese: 芷濱人是相反的，覺得很荒涼很落後。
English: Zhibin people are the opposite， they feel like it's rundown.

Standard: 他们不愿意浪费胶卷拍自己家附近。
Chinese: 他们不愿意浪费胶卷拍自己家附近。
TraditionalChinese: 他們不願意浪費膠捲拍自己家附近。
English: They don't want to waste film near their house.
I'll buy a color printer sooner or later.

Standard: 有彩扩机和没彩扩机，照相馆是两个档次。
Chinese: 有彩扩机和没彩扩机，照相馆是两个档次。
TraditionalChinese: 有彩擴機和沒彩擴機，照相館是兩個檔次。
English: It's a different level between the haves and the have nots.
There's definitely a difference.
Bro' Ah Xi.
Hey， delivery mogul.
What brings you here today?
Checking out what you're doing.
Why? Here to supervise?
Oh， no way.
Sigh， it's not easy.
A kid died， only 7 years old.
What happened?

Standard: 过马路不看，挨车创，那种运沙子的车。
Chinese: 过马路不看，挨车创，那种运沙子的车。
TraditionalChinese: 過馬路不看，挨車創，那種運沙子的車。
English: Didn't look both ways when crossing the street. Got hit by a large dump truck.

Standard: 抢救了一个下午，还是没救回来。
Chinese: 抢救了一个下午，还是没救回来。
TraditionalChinese: 搶救了一個下午，還是沒救回來。
English: They tried all afternoon， couldn't save'm.
Sigh...
It's tough to communicate with the family.

Standard: 不过都是有娃仔的人，我理解他们。
Chinese: 不过都是有娃仔的人，我理解他们。
TraditionalChinese: 不過都是有娃仔的人，我理解他們。
English: But since we all have children， I understand them.

Standard: 照理讲白头人不可以送黑头人吧？
Chinese: 照理讲白头人不可以送黑头人吧？
TraditionalChinese: 照理講白頭人不可以送黑頭人吧？
English: The elderly shouldn't have to send off the young， right?

Standard: 对啊，他们家风俗传统还要比这严格得多。
Chinese: 对啊，他们家风俗传统还要比这严格得多。
TraditionalChinese: 對啊，他們家風俗傳統還要比這嚴格得多。
English: Yeah， their family's tradition is even more strict.

Standard: 后事都不能亲自操办，只能叫亲戚代劳。
Chinese: 后事都不能亲自操办，只能叫亲戚代劳。
TraditionalChinese: 後事都不能親自操辦，只能叫親戚代勞。
English: They can't handle the funeral themselves， so their relatives have to do it.

Standard: 所以娃仔的父母情绪很激动。
Chinese: 所以娃仔的父母情绪很激动。
TraditionalChinese: 所以娃仔的父母情緒很激動。
English: So the kid's parents are very emotional.
They say their family elders don't have any heart.

Standard: 加上各种复杂的讲究，后面麻烦多着呢。
Chinese: 加上各种复杂的讲究，后面麻烦多着呢。
TraditionalChinese: 加上各種複雜的講究，後面麻煩多著呢。
English: Plus all these other traditions， it's going to be very complicated.

Standard: 我是觉得嘛，一些传统的东西可以尊重。
Chinese: 我是觉得嘛，一些传统的东西可以尊重。
TraditionalChinese: 我是覺得嘛，一些傳統的東西可以尊重。
English: I feel like some traditions can be respected.

Standard: 但是死亡这件事本身，没有什么好忌讳的。
Chinese: 但是死亡这件事本身，没有什么好忌讳的。
TraditionalChinese: 但是死亡這件事本身，沒有什麼好忌諱的。
English: But death? There's no need to be overly superstitious.

Standard: 不要搞个白事搞得活人也跟着受罪。
Chinese: 不要搞个白事搞得活人也跟着受罪。
TraditionalChinese: 不要搞個白事搞得活人也跟著受罪。
English: Don't let the funeral make the living suffer as well.

Standard: 生与死每天看得多了，心也静了。
Chinese: 生与死每天看得多了，心也静了。
TraditionalChinese: 生與死每天看得多了，心也靜了。
English: Seeing life and death every day， my heart has grown calm

Standard: 生就搞得开心点，死就走得体面点。
Chinese: 生就搞得开心点，死就走得体面点。
TraditionalChinese: 生就搞得開心點，死就走得體面點。
English: Be happy when you're living， and be more composed when you leave.
Cry when you should， laugh when you should.

Standard: 哭完笑完，该做的事情还是要做的。
Chinese: 哭完笑完，该做的事情还是要做的。
TraditionalChinese: 哭完笑完，該做的事情還是要做的。
English: After crying and laughing， you still have to do what you have to do.

Standard: 上回喊你帮娃仔迎魂，你又不听。
Chinese: 上回喊你帮娃仔迎魂，你又不听。
TraditionalChinese: 上回喊你幫娃仔迎魂，你又不聽。
English: Last time， I asked you to help with a kid's funeral， you didn't listen.

Standard: 准备一件干净的衣服，还有一些零钱就得了。
Chinese: 准备一件干净的衣服，还有一些零钱就得了。
TraditionalChinese: 準備一件乾淨的衣服，還有一些零錢就得了。
English: Just prepare a clean set of clothes and some loose change.

Standard: 唱完歌就穿衣服，钱就给娃仔。
Chinese: 唱完歌就穿衣服，钱就给娃仔。
TraditionalChinese: 唱完歌就穿衣服，錢就給娃仔。
English: After singing the song， dress the child and give them the money.

Standard: 十六岁之前都可以做，就是求个心安嘛。
Chinese: 十六岁之前都可以做，就是求个心安嘛。
TraditionalChinese: 十六歲之前都可以做，就是求個心安嘛。
English: You can do it anytime before they are 16， just for peace of mind.
I hope Lili grows up healthy and strong.
Now， it's more popular to celebrate birthdays.

Standard: 其实传统上到十八岁就不庆生了。
Chinese: 其实传统上到十八岁就不庆生了。
TraditionalChinese: 其實傳統上到十八歲就不慶生了。
English: In the past， after 18， birthday celebrations stop.

Standard: 等到八十岁后才开始又庆生。
Chinese: 等到八十岁后才开始又庆生。
TraditionalChinese: 等到八十歲後才開始又慶生。
English: Then you celebrate after 80.

Standard: 中间这几十年，一般是不庆生的。
Chinese: 中间这几十年，一般是不庆生的。
TraditionalChinese: 中間這幾十年，一般是不慶生的。
English: Everything in between normally isn't celebrated.
Director Liu.
Oh， Ah Nan.
Didn't go driving?
Not right now.
How's Lili?
Still the same， still taking medication.

Standard: 你们得空要煲点雪梨水给她喝。
Chinese: 你们得空要煲点雪梨水给她喝。
TraditionalChinese: 你們得空要煲點雪梨水給她喝。
English: Make sure you boil some pear water for her.
It's good for her lungs， helps with her qi.
Got it.
Remember to have her eat on time.
Yep.

Standard: 我在研究一些文化活动的提案。
Chinese: 我在研究一些文化活动的提案。
TraditionalChinese: 我在研究一些文化活動的提案。
English: I'm researching some cultural activities.
It's not that important， but I don't want to just cancel it.
A lot of them are like that.

Standard: 开展了这么多年的文化工作，成效是有的。
Chinese: 开展了这么多年的文化工作，成效是有的。
TraditionalChinese: 開展了這麼多年的文化工作，成效是有的。
English: After all these years， there are som results.

Standard: 赌博、迷信的风气得到了遏制。
Chinese: 赌博、迷信的风气得到了遏制。
TraditionalChinese: 賭博、迷信的風氣得到了遏制。
English: Gambling and superstitious beliefs have gone down.

Standard: 是时候再上一个台阶，丰富群众活动的种类。
Chinese: 是时候再上一个台阶，丰富群众活动的种类。
TraditionalChinese: 是時候再上一個臺階，豐富群眾活動的種類。
English: It's time to step it up， have more fulfilling events.

Standard: 有件事其实想跟你讲，跟你们有关的。
Chinese: 有件事其实想跟你讲，跟你们有关的。
TraditionalChinese: 有件事其實想跟你講，跟你們有關的。
English: Actually I have something I want to talk to you about， it has to do with ya'll.

Standard: 不过还没落实，到时候了再找你。
Chinese: 不过还没落实，到时候了再找你。
TraditionalChinese: 不過還沒落實，到時候了再找你。
English: But nothing's set yet， when the time comes I'll come find you.
Sorry， I'm a bit busy.
I have lots to take care of.

Standard: 我答应我爸，帮他开个培训班。
Chinese: 我答应我爸，帮他开个培训班。
TraditionalChinese: 我答應我爸，幫他開個培訓班。
English: I told my dad I'd open a class.

Standard: 想办法培养点年轻人，教他们民乐。
Chinese: 想办法培养点年轻人，教他们民乐。
TraditionalChinese: 想辦法培養點年輕人，教他們民樂。
English: Find ways to teach the younger generation traditional music instruments.
That's good.

Standard: 你们不是一直担心传承的问题吗？
Chinese: 你们不是一直担心传承的问题吗？
TraditionalChinese: 你們不是一直擔心傳承的問題嗎？
English: Weren't you both always worried about not being able to pass down the the tradition?
Now you've decided to do it?
Yeah.

Standard: 那天老头子喝了点酒，哭了。
Chinese: 那天老头子喝了点酒，哭了。
TraditionalChinese: 那天老頭子喝了點酒，哭了。
English: That day the old man drank a bit， cried.
And wanted everyone to play together.

Standard: 他讲，可能以后就没有这个机会了。
Chinese: 他讲，可能以后就没有这个机会了。
TraditionalChinese: 他講，可能以後就沒有這個機會了。
English: He said， in the future there probably won't be any more opportunities.
Can't be that serious?
Didn't know he'd be that emotional.
He's older， worried now.
His back is starting to arch.

Standard: 反正我既然答应了他，我就全力去做。
Chinese: 反正我既然答应了他，我就全力去做。
TraditionalChinese: 反正我既然答應了他，我就全力去做。
English: Since I said I would， I'm going to give it my all.

Standard: 只要是年轻人想来学，分文不收。
Chinese: 只要是年轻人想来学，分文不收。
TraditionalChinese: 只要是年輕人想來學，分文不收。
English: If they want to come learn， I'll teach for free.
I'll even let them borrow the instrument.

Standard: 我记得小时候有一次，我们去河边玩。
Chinese: 我记得小时候有一次，我们去河边玩。
TraditionalChinese: 我記得小時候有一次，我們去河邊玩。
English: I remember one time when I was a kid， we went to play next to the river.
We got all dirty.

Standard: 我们怕挨我老头子打，就用水冲，等风干。
Chinese: 我们怕挨我老头子打，就用水冲，等风干。
TraditionalChinese: 我們怕挨我老頭子打，就用水沖，等風乾。
English: We were worried we'd get beat， so we risned off and air dryed.

Standard: 结果回到家还是被老鬼吊起来打。
Chinese: 结果回到家还是被老鬼吊起来打。
TraditionalChinese: 結果回到家還是被老鬼吊起來打。
English: But when we got back we still got beat.
Because we forgot to wash our backs.
Worried about the front but forgot the back， hahaha.
The most hilarious moment was that year.

Standard: 有个百岁老人不在了，我们跟我爸去帮忙。
Chinese: 有个百岁老人不在了，我们跟我爸去帮忙。
TraditionalChinese: 有個百歲老人不在了，我們跟我爸去幫忙。
English: There was a centenarian who passed， we went to help my dad.

Standard: 那帮玩乐器的老头听说你唢呐吹得不错。
Chinese: 那帮玩乐器的老头听说你唢呐吹得不错。
TraditionalChinese: 那幫玩樂器的老頭聽說你嗩呐吹得不錯。
English: They told my dad， “Heard your suona was pretty good.”
Go give them a show.

Standard: 你还真的去了！一点都不客气，吹了三四首！
Chinese: 你还真的去了！一点都不客气，吹了三四首！
TraditionalChinese: 你還真的去了！一點都不客氣，吹了三四首！
English: He really went! He didn't hold back， and played 3， 4， songs!

Standard: 不过也是喜丧，没有人讲什么。
Chinese: 不过也是喜丧，没有人讲什么。
TraditionalChinese: 不過也是喜喪，沒有人講什麼。
English: But it was a happy funeral， so no one said anything.
And they still gave red envelopes.

Standard: 还有一次，也是想起都半夜笑醒。
Chinese: 还有一次，也是想起都半夜笑醒。
TraditionalChinese: 還有一次，也是想起都半夜笑醒。
English: Another time， I'd laugh myself awake thinking about it.

Standard: 那时我们还在读小学，一二年级吧。
Chinese: 那时我们还在读小学，一二年级吧。
TraditionalChinese: 那時我們還在讀小學，一二年級吧。
English: We were still in grade school， maybe first or second grade.

Standard: 生产队用炉子烤烟叶，烤完晾在旁边。
Chinese: 生产队用炉子烤烟叶，烤完晾在旁边。
TraditionalChinese: 生產隊用爐子烤煙葉，烤完晾在旁邊。
English: The production team was drying tobacco leafs， after they were done drying， they left it to the side.

Standard: 我跟你见大人都抽烟，以为是什么好东西。
Chinese: 我跟你见大人都抽烟，以为是什么好东西。
TraditionalChinese: 我跟你見大人都抽煙，以為是什麼好東西。
English: When we were kids we saw adults smoking， thinking it's something good.

Standard: 就去偷了两张，回家用油盐炒了吃。
Chinese: 就去偷了两张，回家用油盐炒了吃。
TraditionalChinese: 就去偷了兩張，回家用油鹽炒了吃。
English: We stole two leaves， took it back and cooked it with some salt and oil.

Standard: 哇，两个人吐了一天。哈哈哈哈哈哈哈。
Chinese: 哇，两个人吐了一天。哈哈哈哈哈哈哈。
TraditionalChinese: 哇，兩個人吐了一天。哈哈哈哈哈哈哈。
English: Wow， we puked for a whole day， hahahaha.

Standard: 所以我和你长大了都不喜欢抽烟。
Chinese: 所以我和你长大了都不喜欢抽烟。
TraditionalChinese: 所以我和你長大了都不喜歡抽煙。
English: So now we don't like smoking.
My dad still goes to perform.

Standard: 就是那个四个镇叫板的戏曲大对擂。
Chinese: 就是那个四个镇叫板的戏曲大对擂。
TraditionalChinese: 就是那個四個鎮叫板的戲曲大對擂。
English: They do that tournament with all the surrounding towns.

Standard: 要互相攀比哪个镇的戏唱最好，舞台最漂亮。
Chinese: 要互相攀比哪个镇的戏唱最好，舞台最漂亮。
TraditionalChinese: 要互相攀比哪個鎮的戲唱最好，舞臺最漂亮。
English: See who has the best stage， who does the best performance.
He plays the erhu for the singer.

Standard: 对于这帮乐师们来说，民乐比任何事都要紧。
Chinese: 对于这帮乐师们来说，民乐比任何事都要紧。
TraditionalChinese: 對於這幫樂師們來說，民樂比任何事都要緊。
English: To these musicians， folk music is the most important thing.

Standard: 逢年过节，酒可以少，演奏不可以缺。
Chinese: 逢年过节，酒可以少，演奏不可以缺。
TraditionalChinese: 逢年過節，酒可以少，演奏不可以缺。
English: During new years， you don't need booze， but you have to have a performance.

Standard: 只要有人学，我肯定会毫无保留地教。
Chinese: 只要有人学，我肯定会毫无保留地教。
TraditionalChinese: 只要有人學，我肯定會毫無保留地教。
English: As long as someone wants to teach， I'll teach them everything.

Standard: 代代相传的东西，不能断在我这一代。
Chinese: 代代相传的东西，不能断在我这一代。
TraditionalChinese: 代代相傳的東西，不能斷在我這一代。
English: I won't let it end with me.
Have we met before?
Eh， maybe?

Standard: 但是你要我讲，我又讲不出来。
Chinese: 但是你要我讲，我又讲不出来。
TraditionalChinese: 但是你要我講，我又講不出來。
English: But if you want me to say where， I couldn't tell.

Standard: 你以前在矿区开车的，是咩？
Chinese: 你以前在矿区开车的，是咩？
TraditionalChinese: 你以前在礦區開車的，是咩？
English: You were driving for the mines， right?
Yeah.
I was the youtiao seller， remember?
Oh， you!
I was just saying， you look so familiar.
You opened up shop here?
Yeah， a few months.

Standard: 当时整个矿区的油条都挨你垄断完了。
Chinese: 当时整个矿区的油条都挨你垄断完了。
TraditionalChinese: 當時整個礦區的油條都挨你壟斷完了。
English: Back then you had a monopoly.
We called you the youtiao king.

Standard: 哈哈，现在东西多了，不光有油条。
Chinese: 哈哈，现在东西多了，不光有油条。
TraditionalChinese: 哈哈，現在東西多了，不光有油條。
English: Haha， now I have lots more than just youtiao.

Standard: 肉包菜包小笼包，豆浆白粥小米粥。
Chinese: 肉包菜包小笼包，豆浆白粥小米粥。
TraditionalChinese: 肉包菜包小籠包，豆漿白粥小米粥。
English: Meat buns， veg buns， xiaolong bao， soy milk， congee.

Standard: 反正我专门做早餐的，有需要就来吃呗。
Chinese: 反正我专门做早餐的，有需要就来吃呗。
TraditionalChinese: 反正我專門做早餐的，有需要就來吃唄。
English: But I specialize in breakfast. If you want to， come by.
Sure.
I don't sell noodles.

Standard: 米粉店到处都是，竞争太大了。
Chinese: 米粉店到处都是，竞争太大了。
TraditionalChinese: 米粉店到處都是，競爭太大了。
English: Too many noodle shops， competition is tough.

Standard: 又不是特别赚钱，准备起来又麻烦。
Chinese: 又不是特别赚钱，准备起来又麻烦。
TraditionalChinese: 又不是特別賺錢，準備起來又麻煩。
English: And it's not very profitable， takes a lot of prep work.
Might as well not do it.

Standard: 想起在矿区卖油条那段日子也是蛮艰难的。
Chinese: 想起在矿区卖油条那段日子也是蛮艰难的。
TraditionalChinese: 想起在礦區賣油條那段日子也是蠻艱難的。
English: Come to think of it， the days of selling youtiao in the mines was pretty hard.

Standard: 天还没亮，就要起床炸油条。
Chinese: 天还没亮，就要起床炸油条。
TraditionalChinese: 天還沒亮，就要起床炸油條。
English: I had to get up before the sun was up to make it.

Standard: 炸好了，哪家订了的，还要骑单车送货上门。
Chinese: 炸好了，哪家订了的，还要骑单车送货上门。
TraditionalChinese: 炸好了，哪家訂了的，還要騎單車送貨上門。
English: After that， I had to deliver each one door to door on bicycle.

Standard: 送货回来还要上街卖掉剩下的。
Chinese: 送货回来还要上街卖掉剩下的。
TraditionalChinese: 送貨回來還要上街賣掉剩下的。
English: Then， when I got back I had to go sell what I had left over.

Standard: 就靠着这一样东西养活我一家的人。
Chinese: 就靠着这一样东西养活我一家的人。
TraditionalChinese: 就靠著這一樣東西養活我一家的人。
English: I fed my family with just that.

Standard: 有店面了，就可以自己磨豆浆卖啦。
Chinese: 有店面了，就可以自己磨豆浆卖啦。
TraditionalChinese: 有店面了，就可以自己磨豆漿賣啦。
English: After I got a store， I started to make my own soymilk.
Have to have soy milk with youtiao.

Standard: 其实这个店本来是打算开在矿区的。
Chinese: 其实这个店本来是打算开在矿区的。
TraditionalChinese: 其實這個店本來是打算開在礦區的。
English: Actually I wanted to open this near the mines.

Standard: 但是那边已经没落了，人越来越少。
Chinese: 但是那边已经没落了，人越来越少。
TraditionalChinese: 但是那邊已經沒落了，人越來越少。
English: But that place has gone downhill， fewer and fewer people.

Standard: 不像以前，大清早的，家家户户亮着灯。
Chinese: 不像以前，大清早的，家家户户亮着灯。
TraditionalChinese: 不像以前，大清早的，家家戶戶亮著燈。
English: Not like before， all the houses were litup in before dawn.
Everyone was getting ready to work.
Everything is set， Ah Nan.

Standard: 报名的人很多，基本上没问题了！
Chinese: 报名的人很多，基本上没问题了！
TraditionalChinese: 報名的人很多，基本上沒問題了！
English: Lots of people signed up， shouldn't have any problems!
We'll join the Dragon Tour this year!
That's good.
Lili will be happy.
Yeah， talks about it everyday.
Thanks for your hardwork Director Liu.

Standard: 你才辛苦，我什么都没有做。
Chinese: 你才辛苦，我什么都没有做。
TraditionalChinese: 你才辛苦，我什麼都沒有做。
English: You did all the work， I didn't do anything.

Standard: 我记得以前荔荔不愿意走路，小凤会鼓励她。
Chinese: 我记得以前荔荔不愿意走路，小凤会鼓励她。
TraditionalChinese: 我記得以前荔荔不願意走路，小鳳會鼓勵她。
English: I remember Lili doesn't like to walk， Xiao Feng would encourage her.

Standard: 转个弯就到了，转个弯就到了。
Chinese: 转个弯就到了，转个弯就到了。
TraditionalChinese: 轉個彎就到了，轉個彎就到了。
English: Another turn and we'll be there， another turn and we'll be there.
Always the same line.
Walked for half an hour.

Standard: 小凤真是心细啊，荔荔也很坚强。
Chinese: 小凤真是心细啊，荔荔也很坚强。
TraditionalChinese: 小鳳真是心細啊，荔荔也很堅強。
English: Xiao Feng was so caring， Lili was also very strong.
Good to have a daughter.

Standard: 前两年我做手术，只有我女儿陪我。
Chinese: 前两年我做手术，只有我女儿陪我。
TraditionalChinese: 前兩年我做手術，只有我女兒陪我。
English: Two years ago I had surgery， only my daugther was with me.

Standard: 我被推进手术室之前，躺在床上。
Chinese: 我被推进手术室之前，躺在床上。
TraditionalChinese: 我被推進手術室之前，躺在床上。
English: Before I went into operation， I was laying in the bed.
Then I saw her crying.

Standard: 第一次看到她哭得那么厉害。
Chinese: 第一次看到她哭得那么厉害。
TraditionalChinese: 第一次看到她哭得那麼厲害。
English: The first time I saw her crying.

Standard: 因为仰着头看，所以她的脸是反过来的。
Chinese: 因为仰着头看，所以她的脸是反过来的。
TraditionalChinese: 因為仰著頭看，所以她的臉是反過來的。
English: Because I was laying down， her face was upside down.
So her tears went upwards to me.
I was even more sad then.

Standard: 有一次跟小凤带荔荔去乡下看花。
Chinese: 有一次跟小凤带荔荔去乡下看花。
TraditionalChinese: 有一次跟小鳳帶荔荔去鄉下看花。
English: One time I went with Xiao Feng to Lili to look at flowers.

Standard: 那个汽车的烟味很重，荔荔坐不习惯。
Chinese: 那个汽车的烟味很重，荔荔坐不习惯。
TraditionalChinese: 那個汽車的煙味很重，荔荔坐不習慣。
English: The car had a heavy smoke smell， Lili didn't like it.

Standard: 一下车就在吐，吐完说她肚子饿了。
Chinese: 一下车就在吐，吐完说她肚子饿了。
TraditionalChinese: 一下車就在吐，吐完說她肚子餓了。
English: She started throwing up as soon as she got off， then after puking she said she was hungry.
Hahahaha.

Standard: 荔荔喜欢吃两毛钱一包的无花果丝。
Chinese: 荔荔喜欢吃两毛钱一包的无花果丝。
TraditionalChinese: 荔荔喜歡吃兩毛錢一包的無花果絲。
English: Lili likes to eat the dried fig strips.
So Xiao Feng would always buy them.

Standard: 它其实就不是无花果，是白萝卜做的。
Chinese: 它其实就不是无花果，是白萝卜做的。
TraditionalChinese: 它其實就不是無花果，是白蘿蔔做的。
English: But they weren't really figs， they were radishes.

Standard: 荔荔喜欢吃两毛钱一包的无花果丝。
Chinese: 荔荔喜欢吃两毛钱一包的无花果丝。
TraditionalChinese: 荔荔喜歡吃兩毛錢一包的無花果絲。
English: Lili likes to eat the dried fig strips.
So Xiao Feng would always buy them.

Standard: 它其实就不是无花果，是白萝卜做的。
Chinese: 它其实就不是无花果，是白萝卜做的。
TraditionalChinese: 它其實就不是無花果，是白蘿蔔做的。
English: But they weren't really figs， they were radishes.
I used to be very much into the boys were more important than girls thing.

Standard: 我给我仔用好的，我女用差的。
Chinese: 我给我仔用好的，我女用差的。
TraditionalChinese: 我給我仔用好的，我女用差的。
English: I gave my son the best， my daughter the leftovers.

Standard: 晚上一定要等我仔回来才开饭，不管几点。
Chinese: 晚上一定要等我仔回来才开饭，不管几点。
TraditionalChinese: 晚上一定要等我仔回來才開飯，不管幾點。
English: I would always wait until my son came home before serving dinner， no matter what time.

Standard: 我仔自己有一个房间，我女就睡杂物房。
Chinese: 我仔自己有一个房间，我女就睡杂物房。
TraditionalChinese: 我仔自己有一個房間，我女就睡雜物房。
English: My son had his own room， my daugther slept in the storage room.
Even when she washed her hair she would have to listen to me nag.

Standard: 小凤知道了，就骂了我一顿。
Chinese: 小凤知道了，就骂了我一顿。
TraditionalChinese: 小鳳知道了，就罵了我一頓。
English: Once Xiao Feng knew she laid into me.

Standard: 她说，你自己难道不是女的吗？
Chinese: 她说，你自己难道不是女的吗？
TraditionalChinese: 她說，你自己難道不是女的嗎？
English: She said， “Aren't you a daughter yourself?”

Standard: 你因为她是女的，就不喜欢她。
Chinese: 你因为她是女的，就不喜欢她。
TraditionalChinese: 你因為她是女的，就不喜歡她。
English: “You think because she's a girl， you don't like her.”
“Then might as well stop living.”

Standard: 后来我得了一场大病，全靠我女儿照顾我。
Chinese: 后来我得了一场大病，全靠我女儿照顾我。
TraditionalChinese: 後來我得了一場大病，全靠我女兒照顧我。
English: Then when I fell ill， only my daughter came to take care of me.
I learned I was wrong.
Boss Lin.
Oh， Ah Nan.
Come to play games?
Nah.
Not doing illegal stuff.
Illegal?

Standard: 这里全是正经游戏机！没有赌博机！
Chinese: 这里全是正经游戏机！没有赌博机！
TraditionalChinese: 這裏全是正經遊戲機！沒有賭博機！
English: These are games， not gambling!
I follow the law.
Still not gonna play.

Standard: 又不是娃仔了，打什么游戏。
Chinese: 又不是娃仔了，打什么游戏。
TraditionalChinese: 又不是娃仔了，打什麼遊戲。
English: I'm not a kid， why play games.
Heh， even adults come play.
See those people?

Standard: 我亲戚，也三十几啦，天天来打三国。
Chinese: 我亲戚，也三十几啦，天天来打三国。
TraditionalChinese: 我親戚，也三十幾啦，天天來打三國。
English: My relatives， 30 some， come everyday to play Three Kingdoms.
That one with the shirt and long pants?
Yeah.
Looks like a bear.

Standard: 一米八几高，一百七十几斤重。
Chinese: 一米八几高，一百七十几斤重。
TraditionalChinese: 一米八幾高，一百七十幾斤重。
English: 1.8 meters， 170 some kilos.
Blocks the light when they stand up.

Standard: 自从他成了这里常客，没有什么人来捣乱了。
Chinese: 自从他成了这里常客，没有什么人来捣乱了。
TraditionalChinese: 自從他成了這裏常客，沒有什麼人來搗亂了。
English: Ever since they became a regular， no one's caused trouble.

Standard: 所以我也不收他的钱，就当请个门神。
Chinese: 所以我也不收他的钱，就当请个门神。
TraditionalChinese: 所以我也不收他的錢，就當請個門神。
English: So I don't even take his money， I treat it like a Menshen.
Really Second Brother Guan.
Menshen isn't Second Brother Guan.
It's Qin Shubao and Yuchi Gong.
I know.

Standard: 你不是讲他爱玩三国，我就讲关二哥。
Chinese: 你不是讲他爱玩三国，我就讲关二哥。
TraditionalChinese: 你不是講他愛玩三國，我就講關二哥。
English: But didn't you say Three Kingdoms， so I said Second Brother Guan.
Buy ten get one.

Standard: 有的机子两个币一次，有的是一个币一次。
Chinese: 有的机子两个币一次，有的是一个币一次。
TraditionalChinese: 有的機子兩個幣一次，有的是一個幣一次。
English: Some machines are 2 tokens for play， some are 1 per play.
One is 1 token for two plays.

Standard: 我准备再进台新机子，三个币一次。
Chinese: 我准备再进台新机子，三个币一次。
TraditionalChinese: 我準備再進臺新機子，三個幣一次。
English: I want to bring in some new games， 3 tokens per play.
But I'm afraid no one will play it.

Standard: 最多人玩的是那一台，叫什么纯金弹头。
Chinese: 最多人玩的是那一台，叫什么纯金弹头。
TraditionalChinese: 最多人玩的是那一臺，叫什麼純金彈頭。
English: The one that lots of people play， golden bullets.
2 tokens per play.

Standard: 那个三国的游戏，有个吃包子的环节。
Chinese: 那个三国的游戏，有个吃包子的环节。
TraditionalChinese: 那個三國的遊戲，有個吃包子的環節。
English: The Three Kingdoms game has a baozi section.

Standard: 想赢就要拼命摇摇杆，拍按键。
Chinese: 想赢就要拼命摇摇杆，拍按键。
TraditionalChinese: 想贏就要拼命搖搖杆，拍按鍵。
English: If you want to win you have to shake the joystick and press the buttons.
I'm most worried about that one.

Standard: 特别有些人发牛劲的，机子都要被搞烂。
Chinese: 特别有些人发牛劲的，机子都要被搞烂。
TraditionalChinese: 特別有些人發牛勁的，機子都要被搞爛。
English: Some people get really into it， and almost break the machine.

Standard: 我还见过两个人合作，一个摇一个拍！
Chinese: 我还见过两个人合作，一个摇一个拍！
TraditionalChinese: 我還見過兩個人合作，一個搖一個拍！
English: I've seen people work together， one uses the joystick one mashes the buttons.

Standard: 那点硬币钱都不够我修摇杆。
Chinese: 那点硬币钱都不够我修摇杆。
TraditionalChinese: 那點硬幣錢都不夠我修搖杆。
English: The money from the tokens aren't going to be enough to fix the joystick.

Standard: 所以我这里写了，禁止吃包子。
Chinese: 所以我这里写了，禁止吃包子。
TraditionalChinese: 所以我這裏寫了，禁止吃包子。
English: So I wrote it here， no baozi eating.

Standard: 我这里，原则上不允许娃仔来。
Chinese: 我这里，原则上不允许娃仔来。
TraditionalChinese: 我這裏，原則上不允許娃仔來。
English: Here， as a matter of standard， I don't let kids play.

Standard: 但是大点的中学生我就不管啦。
Chinese: 但是大点的中学生我就不管啦。
TraditionalChinese: 但是大點的中學生我就不管啦。
English: But middle school and up， I don't care.

Standard: 两个人对打那个游戏好赚钱，叫什么拳霸。
Chinese: 两个人对打那个游戏好赚钱，叫什么拳霸。
TraditionalChinese: 兩個人對打那個遊戲好賺錢，叫什麼拳霸。
English: The two people fighting games are the ones that make the most， called like Punching King or something.

Standard: 一局一下子就打完了，想挑战又要投币。
Chinese: 一局一下子就打完了，想挑战又要投币。
TraditionalChinese: 一局一下子就打完了，想挑戰又要投幣。
English: The games finish fast， and if you want to challenge again you have to pay again.
If they take their tokens I'll fix it.
I'm not that bad.
Bro.
How about I gift you some tapes?
No， why?

Standard: 我见你一直没考虑好，以为你嫌贵……
Chinese: 我见你一直没考虑好，以为你嫌贵……
TraditionalChinese: 我見你一直沒考慮好，以為你嫌貴……
English: I see you haven't decided， I thought you felt it was expensive.
Nah， I just like wandering around.
Alright， wander as you will.
Gotta listen to music.
What can you tell by the cover?

Standard: 对哪张感兴趣，我可以播给你听。
Chinese: 对哪张感兴趣，我可以播给你听。
TraditionalChinese: 對哪張感興趣，我可以播給你聽。
English: Which one are you interested in， I can play it for you.
You can decide if you want it after you hear it.

Standard: 听歌这种东西很看个人口味的。
Chinese: 听歌这种东西很看个人口味的。
TraditionalChinese: 聽歌這種東西很看個人口味的。
English: Music is really subjective.

Standard: 不要管其他人听什么，就选你喜欢的。
Chinese: 不要管其他人听什么，就选你喜欢的。
TraditionalChinese: 不要管其他人聽什麼，就選你喜歡的。
English: No matter what other people like you just pick what you like.

Standard: 有些人喜欢深邃宁静，有的人就爱嘣嘣嘣嘣。
Chinese: 有些人喜欢深邃宁静，有的人就爱嘣嘣嘣嘣。
TraditionalChinese: 有些人喜歡深邃寧靜，有的人就愛嘣嘣嘣嘣。
English: Some people like the slow and quiet stuff， some people like the thud thud thud.
We also have CDs too.

Standard: 我个人觉得光碟的音质更好一些。
Chinese: 我个人觉得光碟的音质更好一些。
TraditionalChinese: 我個人覺得光碟的音質更好一些。
English: I think the quality of CDs more.

Standard: 有条件的话，可以买台CD机。
Chinese: 有条件的话，可以买台CD机。
TraditionalChinese: 有條件的話，可以買臺CD機。
English: If you can afford it， you can buy a CD player.

Standard: 听起来跟磁带机有不同的感受。
Chinese: 听起来跟磁带机有不同的感受。
TraditionalChinese: 聽起來跟磁帶機有不同的感受。
English: Has a different feel than tapes.

Standard: 我这个店的生意一般，进来看看的人都不多。
Chinese: 我这个店的生意一般，进来看看的人都不多。
TraditionalChinese: 我這個店的生意一般，進來看看的人都不多。
English: Business here is okay， not many people come walk around.

Standard: 主要是大家没有这方面的消费习惯。
Chinese: 主要是大家没有这方面的消费习惯。
TraditionalChinese: 主要是大家沒有這方面的消費習慣。
English: Mostly it's important to see if anyone has a spending habit.

Standard: 不过无所谓，我自己也喜欢音乐。
Chinese: 不过无所谓，我自己也喜欢音乐。
TraditionalChinese: 不過無所謂，我自己也喜歡音樂。
English: But it's okay， I like music myself.

Standard: 开这个店是希望有多点时间接触音乐。
Chinese: 开这个店是希望有多点时间接触音乐。
TraditionalChinese: 開這個店是希望有多點時間接觸音樂。
English: I opened this store to be in touch with more music.

Standard: 要是能顺便赚点小钱，那就更好了。
Chinese: 要是能顺便赚点小钱，那就更好了。
TraditionalChinese: 要是能順便賺點小錢，那就更好了。
English: If I can make some money， even better.

Standard: 电影我也蛮感兴趣的，它是关于时间的艺术。
Chinese: 电影我也蛮感兴趣的，它是关于时间的艺术。
TraditionalChinese: 電影我也蠻感興趣的，它是關於時間的藝術。
English: I like movies too， it's all related to art and time.

Standard: 才一两个钟头，很讲究表达的方法和内容。
Chinese: 才一两个钟头，很讲究表达的方法和内容。
TraditionalChinese: 才一兩個鐘頭，很講究表達的方法和內容。
English: You only get like 1 to 2 hours， it's particular about how to express and present what you want to say.

Standard: 看电影可以开眼界嘛，好比跟着镜头去旅游。
Chinese: 看电影可以开眼界嘛，好比跟着镜头去旅游。
TraditionalChinese: 看電影可以開眼界嘛，好比跟著鏡頭去旅遊。
English: You can broaden your horizons with movies.

Standard: 我以前经常去录像厅看外国电影。
Chinese: 我以前经常去录像厅看外国电影。
TraditionalChinese: 我以前經常去錄影廳看外國電影。
English: I used to go to the theater to watch foreign films.

Standard: 不过录像带应该很快竞争不过光碟了。
Chinese: 不过录像带应该很快竞争不过光碟了。
TraditionalChinese: 不過錄影帶應該很快競爭不過光碟了。
English: But I think tapes are going to fall behind CDs.
I think CDs are cheaper and more portable.
You have a kid?

Standard: 儿歌也要选点好听的，从小培养他的审美。
Chinese: 儿歌也要选点好听的，从小培养他的审美。
TraditionalChinese: 兒歌也要選點好聽的，從小培養他的審美。
English: You have to pick good songs when they are young so they know how to judge.

Standard: 墙上的“风流倜傥”，是我朋友帮我题的。
Chinese: 墙上的“风流倜傥”，是我朋友帮我题的。
TraditionalChinese: 牆上的“風流倜儻”，是我朋友幫我題的。
English: The “Elegant and Restrained” writing was written by my friend.

Standard: 他之前在景区帮游客写纪念品上的字。
Chinese: 他之前在景区帮游客写纪念品上的字。
TraditionalChinese: 他之前在景區幫遊客寫紀念品上的字。
English: He used to help the tourist areas with their writing.

Standard: 后来有人介绍他进工会做文化宣传工作。
Chinese: 后来有人介绍他进工会做文化宣传工作。
TraditionalChinese: 後來有人介紹他進工會做文化宣傳工作。
English: Later someone introduced him to work for cultural expansion.
Now he's a big calligrapher.
Bro' Zhong.
Ah Nan?
Looking for me to help do a delivery?
No.
Just saying hi.
Why are you still in Zhibin?
I thought you went to the worksite.
Nah.

Standard: 娃仔刚出世，不想离家这么远了。
Chinese: 娃仔刚出世，不想离家这么远了。
TraditionalChinese: 娃仔剛出世，不想離家這麼遠了。
English: Just had a kid， don't want to go that far.
Oh， is that so?
Congratulations!
Thanks.
Boy or girl?
Boy， hard to raise.

Standard: 他出世以后我和我老婆都没有睡过好觉。
Chinese: 他出世以后我和我老婆都没有睡过好觉。
TraditionalChinese: 他出世以後我和我老婆都沒有睡過好覺。
English: After we had him， my wife and I hardly sleep.
That's how it is.
Eat then sleep， sleep then eat.

Standard: 他这么小又不会讲话，全靠哭。
Chinese: 他这么小又不会讲话，全靠哭。
TraditionalChinese: 他這麼小又不會講話，全靠哭。
English: They're small and can't talk， they can only cry.

Standard: 肚饿了，屙瘪了，只会大声哭。
Chinese: 肚饿了，屙瘪了，只会大声哭。
TraditionalChinese: 肚餓了，屙癟了，只會大聲哭。
English: Hungry， poop， cry.

Standard: 你只能自己判断是什么原因。
Chinese: 你只能自己判断是什么原因。
TraditionalChinese: 你只能自己判斷是什麼原因。
English: You have to figure it out.

Standard: 搞得我白天都没有精神做活路。
Chinese: 搞得我白天都没有精神做活路。
TraditionalChinese: 搞得我白天都沒有精神做活路。
English: I've no energy at work during the day.
I'll get better when he gets older.

Standard: 去工地是得钱多，毕竟发达地区。
Chinese: 去工地是得钱多，毕竟发达地区。
TraditionalChinese: 去工地是得錢多，畢竟發達地區。
English: Lots more money in the worksite， it's a developing region.

Standard: 在这边辛辛苦苦，也就刚刚够吃饭。
Chinese: 在这边辛辛苦苦，也就刚刚够吃饭。
TraditionalChinese: 在這邊辛辛苦苦，也就剛剛夠吃飯。
English: It's harder work here， just enough to buy food.

Standard: 哪个朋友家盖房子的，可以找我。
Chinese: 哪个朋友家盖房子的，可以找我。
TraditionalChinese: 哪個朋友家蓋房子的，可以找我。
English: They can come find me if they need some housing construction.

Standard: 做了十几二十年泥水，砌砖刮墙我样样在行。
Chinese: 做了十几二十年泥水，砌砖刮墙我样样在行。
TraditionalChinese: 做了十幾二十年泥水，砌磚刮牆我樣樣在行。
English: I've done 20 plus years as as a laborer， I can do everything.

Standard: 有娃仔以后我戒烟了，抽不起啊。
Chinese: 有娃仔以后我戒烟了，抽不起啊。
TraditionalChinese: 有娃仔以後我戒煙了，抽不起啊。
English: I stopped smoking too， can't afford it.
Once I have money I want buy something for them.

Standard: 最近帮这家酒楼做事，买菜买米买油。
Chinese: 最近帮这家酒楼做事，买菜买米买油。
TraditionalChinese: 最近幫這家酒樓做事，買菜買米買油。
English: Been helping a restaraunt lately， buying their supplies.

Standard: 他们还蛮好讲的，不忙的时候让我在这里坐。
Chinese: 他们还蛮好讲的，不忙的时候让我在这里坐。
TraditionalChinese: 他們還蠻好講的，不忙的時候讓我在這裏坐。
English: They're easy to talk to， they let me sit there and rest when it's not busy.

Standard: 如果有人过来找零工，我还可以去做。
Chinese: 如果有人过来找零工，我还可以去做。
TraditionalChinese: 如果有人過來找零工，我還可以去做。
English: If they need some extra hands， I can go do it.

Standard: 那天有一家人讨老婆，在这里摆酒。
Chinese: 那天有一家人讨老婆，在这里摆酒。
TraditionalChinese: 那天有一家人討老婆，在這裏擺酒。
English: There was someone who was getting married the other day， had a ceremony.

Standard: 那个男的像竹竿似的，真够弱了。
Chinese: 那个男的像竹竿似的，真够弱了。
TraditionalChinese: 那個男的像竹竿似的，真夠弱了。
English: The man was like a bamboo pole， weak.

Standard: 抱着新娘没走几步路，直接两个人扑趴昂杠。
