Chinese: 抱着新娘没走几步路，直接两个人扑趴昂杠。
TraditionalChinese: 抱著新娘沒走幾步路，直接兩個人撲趴昂杠。
English: Carried her a few steps then both fell.

Standard: 现在的年轻人难搞哦，体质这么差。
Chinese: 现在的年轻人难搞哦，体质这么差。
TraditionalChinese: 現在的年輕人難搞哦，體質這麼差。
English: Young people these days， need more exercise.
Ah Feng.
Bro'Nan.
Not open yet?
Nah， too early， I open at night.
I haven't even bought the coals.
You're the busiest at night.
Bro'Nan， question.
Yeah?

Standard: 你女儿的名字，为什么叫“茁荔”？
Chinese: 你女儿的名字，为什么叫“茁荔”？
TraditionalChinese: 你女兒的名字，為什麼叫“茁荔”？
English: Why is your daughter's name “Zhuoli”?
My wife came up with it.

Standard: 怀孕的时候她去散步，刚好看见棵荔枝树。
Chinese: 怀孕的时候她去散步，刚好看见棵荔枝树。
TraditionalChinese: 懷孕的時候她去散步，剛好看見棵荔枝樹。
English: When she was pregnant she went for a walk， so a Lychee tree.

Standard: 她觉得假如是个女儿，叫“荔”也不错。
Chinese: 她觉得假如是个女儿，叫“荔”也不错。
TraditionalChinese: 她覺得假如是個女兒，叫“荔”也不錯。
English: She thought if she had a girl， just calling her “Li” would be nice.

Standard: 要像那棵树那么漂亮，茁壮成长。
Chinese: 要像那棵树那么漂亮，茁壮成长。
TraditionalChinese: 要像那棵樹那麼漂亮，茁壯成長。
English: But that tree was so pretty and thriving.
Oh-
That naming was pretty at-will.
At will?

Standard: 你是不晓得我的名字是哪样来的。
Chinese: 你是不晓得我的名字是哪样来的。
TraditionalChinese: 你是不曉得我的名字是哪樣來的。
English: You don't know how my name came to be?
How?
Qin Munan.

Standard: 牧字是族谱定的，我这一辈都叫这个。
Chinese: 牧字是族谱定的，我这一辈都叫这个。
TraditionalChinese: 牧字是族譜定的，我這一輩都叫這個。
English: Mu is from the family book， everyone in my generation has it.
Nan?
Nangua.
My dad really likes pumpkins.
Hahahaha!

Standard: 那个年代生活条件不是蛮艰苦的吗？
Chinese: 那个年代生活条件不是蛮艰苦的吗？
TraditionalChinese: 那個年代生活條件不是蠻艱苦的嗎？
English: So in his day it was hard to survive.
Pumpkins are easy to grow and store.

Standard: 粮食紧张的时候，它的作用很大。
Chinese: 粮食紧张的时候，它的作用很大。
TraditionalChinese: 糧食緊張的時候，它的作用很大。
English: When you don't have lots of food， it has lots of uses.

Standard: 我爸就觉得起名跟南瓜有关，绝对不会挨饿。
Chinese: 我爸就觉得起名跟南瓜有关，绝对不会挨饿。
TraditionalChinese: 我爸就覺得起名跟南瓜有關，絕對不會挨餓。
English: So my dad thought if I had a name regarding pumpkins， I would never get hungry.

Standard: 覃南瓜，覃牧瓜都不好听。
Chinese: 覃南瓜，覃牧瓜都不好听。
TraditionalChinese: 覃南瓜，覃牧瓜都不好聽。
English: Qin Nangua， Qin Mugua are all not very good sounding.
So I had to be Qin Munan.
Hahahaha!

Standard: 我懂得这件事的时候都长大了。
Chinese: 我懂得这件事的时候都长大了。
TraditionalChinese: 我懂得這件事的時候都長大了。
English: When I learned about it I was already grown.

Standard: 也无所谓了，反正我也爱吃南瓜。
Chinese: 也无所谓了，反正我也爱吃南瓜。
TraditionalChinese: 也無所謂了，反正我也愛吃南瓜。
English: It's fine， I like pumpkins.
Why? You want to change your kids name?
You have a kid?
For the future.

Standard: 本来我觉得我取的名字有点简单。
Chinese: 本来我觉得我取的名字有点简单。
TraditionalChinese: 本來我覺得我取的名字有點簡單。
English: I thought my naming was easy.

Standard: 听完你的故事，又感觉还过得去。
Chinese: 听完你的故事，又感觉还过得去。
TraditionalChinese: 聽完你的故事，又感覺還過得去。
English: But after your story， I think it's fine.
What?

Standard: 我对我的娃仔没有什么大的期望。
Chinese: 我对我的娃仔没有什么大的期望。
TraditionalChinese: 我對我的娃仔沒有什麼大的期望。
English: I don't have any big hopes for my kids.

Standard: 只希望他们踏实做人，不要做坏事。
Chinese: 只希望他们踏实做人，不要做坏事。
TraditionalChinese: 只希望他們踏實做人，不要做壞事。
English: I just want them to be a good person and don't do bad  things.

Standard: 所以我想好了，男的就叫正义，女的就叫善良。
Chinese: 所以我想好了，男的就叫正义，女的就叫善良。
TraditionalChinese: 所以我想好了，男的就叫正義，女的就叫善良。
English: So I decided， a boy would be named Zhengyi， a girl would be named Shanliang.
Not as good as Nangua.
Come early if you want some skewers.

Standard: 晚上人多，来迟了东西会卖完的。
Chinese: 晚上人多，来迟了东西会卖完的。
TraditionalChinese: 晚上人多，來遲了東西會賣完的。
English: Lots of people come at night， I'll sell out sooner or later.
I've a small shop.

Standard: 没有位置坐的时候只能先在旁边等等咯。
Chinese: 没有位置坐的时候只能先在旁边等等咯。
TraditionalChinese: 沒有位置坐的時候只能先在旁邊等等咯。
English: If there's no more seats you'll have to wait.
I've got this special BBQ Jam.
Pork， Beef， Wings.

Standard: 偏门点的就是田鼠咯，还有空心菜。
Chinese: 偏门点的就是田鼠咯，还有空心菜。
TraditionalChinese: 偏門點的就是田鼠咯，還有空心菜。
English: Adventerous eaters can try the field mouse， oh I have water spinach too.

Standard: 其他的什么炒菜炒粉，没有人吃，懒得做。
Chinese: 其他的什么炒菜炒粉，没有人吃，懒得做。
TraditionalChinese: 其他的什麼炒菜炒粉，沒有人吃，懶得做。
English: The other stuff like stirfry noodles and stuff， no one orders it， I'm also too lazy to make it.

Standard: 我在想，要不要买一台VCD机。
Chinese: 我在想，要不要买一台VCD机。
TraditionalChinese: 我在想，要不要買一臺VCD機。
English: I was thinking， maybe I should buy a VCD machine.

Standard: 客人可以一边吃烧烤，一边唱卡拉OK。
Chinese: 客人可以一边吃烧烤，一边唱卡拉OK。
TraditionalChinese: 客人可以一邊吃燒烤，一邊唱卡拉OK。
English: People can do karaoke while they eat skewers.

Standard: 花生拿过来给我们炒，或者你自己在家炒好。
Chinese: 花生拿过来给我们炒，或者你自己在家炒好。
TraditionalChinese: 花生拿過來給我們炒，或者你自己在家炒好。
English: You can give us peanuts to roast， or you can roast them at home.

Standard: 一般人都拿过来炒的，我们可以帮脱壳打碎。
Chinese: 一般人都拿过来炒的，我们可以帮脱壳打碎。
TraditionalChinese: 一般人都拿過來炒的，我們可以幫脫殼打碎。
English: Usually people bring it here， we deshell it for you.

Standard: 而且刚炒完的温度高，榨出来的油多，也香。
Chinese: 而且刚炒完的温度高，榨出来的油多，也香。
TraditionalChinese: 而且剛炒完的溫度高，榨出來的油多，也香。
English: Plus， it smells great right when it's done， lots of peanut oil.

Standard: 炒花生要不停地翻炒，还要加点水。
Chinese: 炒花生要不停地翻炒，还要加点水。
TraditionalChinese: 炒花生要不停地翻炒，還要加點水。
English: Just have to keep turning it and add some water.
You can't get it completely dry.

Standard: 花生炒到金黄色，那就差不多啦。
Chinese: 花生炒到金黄色，那就差不多啦。
TraditionalChinese: 花生炒到金黃色，那就差不多啦。
English: Once the peanuts are golden in color， then it's about finished.

Standard: 榨油的时候，房子里面好热的。
Chinese: 榨油的时候，房子里面好热的。
TraditionalChinese: 榨油的時候，房子裏面好熱的。
English: It's really hot though when extract the oil.
Usually I stand out here.

Standard: 花生壳我们是不会给回你们的啦。
Chinese: 花生壳我们是不会给回你们的啦。
TraditionalChinese: 花生殼我們是不會給回你們的啦。
English: We won't give you back the shells.

Standard: 榨完以后的花生麸倒是可以拿走。
Chinese: 榨完以后的花生麸倒是可以拿走。
TraditionalChinese: 榨完以後的花生麩倒是可以拿走。
English: You can take the pulp when we're done.

Standard: 喂鸡或者喂鱼，小时候我们自己都吃。
Chinese: 喂鸡或者喂鱼，小时候我们自己都吃。
TraditionalChinese: 喂雞或者喂魚，小時候我們自己都吃。
English: You can feed it to fish or chickens， we would eat it ourselves.

Standard: 你给我们也可以，折成榨油的钱。
Chinese: 你给我们也可以，折成榨油的钱。
TraditionalChinese: 你給我們也可以，折成榨油的錢。
English: You can give it to us too， we'll give you a discount on the oil.

Standard: 刚榨完不能马上用的，还要过滤。
Chinese: 刚榨完不能马上用的，还要过滤。
TraditionalChinese: 剛榨完不能馬上用的，還要過濾。
English: Can't use it right away after we extract the oil， you have to filter it.
Best to let it sit a few days.

Standard: 你要是没有带桶，我们这里有得卖。
Chinese: 你要是没有带桶，我们这里有得卖。
TraditionalChinese: 你要是沒有帶桶，我們這裏有得賣。
English: If you didn't bring a bucket， we sell them here.

Standard: 论天搞得我一头的油，不过梳起来蛮柔顺的。
Chinese: 论天搞得我一头的油，不过梳起来蛮柔顺的。
TraditionalChinese: 論天搞得我一頭的油，不過梳起來蠻柔順的。
English: I got so much oil in my hair， but it feels nice to comb.
Bro， I look good， yeah?
People say I look like a movie star.

Standard: 我在这里打工是为了先攒点钱。
Chinese: 我在这里打工是为了先攒点钱。
TraditionalChinese: 我在這裏打工是為了先攢點錢。
English: I'm working here to save some money.
Then I want to be an actor in the big city.
Have you read “The Peanut” by Xu Dishan?

Standard: 我要做一个又好看，又有用的人。
Chinese: 我要做一个又好看，又有用的人。
TraditionalChinese: 我要做一個又好看，又有用的人。
English: I'm gonna be a good looking， useful person.

Standard: 我们畜牧站的办公楼是新建的。
Chinese: 我们畜牧站的办公楼是新建的。
TraditionalChinese: 我們畜牧站的辦公樓是新建的。
English: The office building at the agriculture station is new.

Standard: 虽然地方比较小，但是已经很不错了。
Chinese: 虽然地方比较小，但是已经很不错了。
TraditionalChinese: 雖然地方比較小，但是已經很不錯了。
English: Even though it sa bit small， but it's pretty good.

Standard: 听老一辈讲，这里成立的时候，桌子都不够。
Chinese: 听老一辈讲，这里成立的时候，桌子都不够。
TraditionalChinese: 聽老一輩講，這裏成立的時候，桌子都不夠。
English: I heard the older generation say back when they first started they didn't have enough tables.

Standard: 过去没有固定的场地，只能租用居民的房子。
Chinese: 过去没有固定的场地，只能租用居民的房子。
TraditionalChinese: 過去沒有固定的場地，只能租用居民的房子。
English: No set place to go， they rented houses.

Standard: 职工上班都没有干劲，感觉单位不像一个家。
Chinese: 职工上班都没有干劲，感觉单位不像一个家。
TraditionalChinese: 職工上班都沒有幹勁，感覺單位不像一個家。
English: No one had any motivation， didn't feel like a unit.

Standard: 我们畜牧站还配了一台专用摩托车。
Chinese: 我们畜牧站还配了一台专用摩托车。
TraditionalChinese: 我們畜牧站還配了一臺專用摩托車。
English: We even had a station motorcycle.
I hope we can get a car later.

Standard: 以前检疫靠眼睛看的，看猪有没有精神。
Chinese: 以前检疫靠眼睛看的，看猪有没有精神。
TraditionalChinese: 以前檢疫靠眼睛看的，看豬有沒有精神。
English: In the past we just gave the pigs an eye test， see if they looked lively.
Not scientific at all.

Standard: 现在检疫都用机器了，效率提升很多。
Chinese: 现在检疫都用机器了，效率提升很多。
TraditionalChinese: 現在檢疫都用機器了，效率提升很多。
English: Now it's all with machines， way more efficient.
Bofeng.
Oh， Bro' Nan.
Buying Zongzi?
Not right now.

Standard: 我是想叫你端午之前，给我留二三十个。
Chinese: 我是想叫你端午之前，给我留二三十个。
TraditionalChinese: 我是想叫你端午之前，給我留二三十個。
English: I was just gonna ask you save like 20， 30 for me for Duanwu.

Standard: 我带去广东给我小妹，她刚生完娃仔。
Chinese: 我带去广东给我小妹，她刚生完娃仔。
TraditionalChinese: 我帶去廣東給我小妹，她剛生完娃仔。
English: I'm gonna bring it to Guangdong for my sister， she just had a baby.
Alright， no problem!
But why do you want to bring some there?

Standard: 广东不是什么都有吗？粽子到处都有得卖吧？
Chinese: 广东不是什么都有吗？粽子到处都有得卖吧？
TraditionalChinese: 廣東不是什麼都有嗎？粽子到處都有得賣吧？
English: Doesn't Guangdong have everything? You should be able to buy Zongzi everywhere.

Standard: 咸肉粽，碱水粽，还有豆沙粽，我都听讲过。
Chinese: 咸肉粽，碱水粽，还有豆沙粽，我都听讲过。
TraditionalChinese: 鹹肉粽，堿水粽，還有豆沙粽，我都聽講過。
English: Savory meat Zongzi， Jianshui Zhongzi， Sweet Bean Zongzi， I heard them talk about it.
The flavor from home， you can't get it.
Plus， she likes the Dong people's way of making Zongzi
Got it.

Standard: 我有些客人去外地之前也会特意过来买一堆。
Chinese: 我有些客人去外地之前也会特意过来买一堆。
TraditionalChinese: 我有些客人去外地之前也會特意過來買一堆。
English: Some customers who would also buy a bunch before going out of town.

Standard: 口味固定了，吃别种的他不习惯。
Chinese: 口味固定了，吃别种的他不习惯。
TraditionalChinese: 口味固定了，吃別種的他不習慣。
English: That's the taste they want， they aren't used to the other kinds.

Standard: 那得啦，今天先跟你讲一声。
Chinese: 那得啦，今天先跟你讲一声。
TraditionalChinese: 那得啦，今天先跟你講一聲。
English: Alright， I just wanted to tell you.

Standard: 差不多时候我来给钱，你帮我包好煮好。
Chinese: 差不多时候我来给钱，你帮我包好煮好。
TraditionalChinese: 差不多時候我來給錢，你幫我包好煮好。
English: When it's closer to the date I'll pay and you can wrap it up.
Sorry for being troublesome.
It's not.
I should thank you for coming instead.

Standard: 桌子后面的侗族木桶，还是以前那个吗？
Chinese: 桌子后面的侗族木桶，还是以前那个吗？
TraditionalChinese: 桌子後面的侗族木桶，還是以前那個嗎？
English: That barrel， the Dong style barrel， is that the same one?
Yeah， from Sis' Feng.
Oh...

Standard: 结实得很呢，起码可以再用三十年。
Chinese: 结实得很呢，起码可以再用三十年。
TraditionalChinese: 結實得很呢，起碼可以再用三十年。
English: It's solid， I can use it for at least another 30 years.
Yeah， that's good.

Standard: 教凤姐做木桶的木匠，前段时间我还见过他。
Chinese: 教凤姐做木桶的木匠，前段时间我还见过他。
TraditionalChinese: 教鳳姐做木桶的木匠，前段時間我還見過他。
English: The carpenter that taught Sis' Feng how to make it， I saw them earlier.

Standard: 走路都要撑着拐杖了，不过听讲手还很稳。
Chinese: 走路都要撑着拐杖了，不过听讲手还很稳。
TraditionalChinese: 走路都要撐著拐杖了，不過聽講手還很穩。
English: Needs a cane now， but hand's still steady.

Standard: 他总是说，要是凤姐是他正式的徒弟就好啦。
Chinese: 他总是说，要是凤姐是他正式的徒弟就好啦。
TraditionalChinese: 他總是說，要是鳳姐是他正式的徒弟就好啦。
English: They always said， if Sis' Feng was their official disciple that would have been great.
There'd have been someone to carry on their work.
...Not possible though.

Standard: 她很小的时候就拜过她外公为师了。
Chinese: 她很小的时候就拜过她外公为师了。
TraditionalChinese: 她很小的時候就拜過她外公為師了。
English: She was the student of her grandpa when she was  young.
She wouldn't be under another master.

Standard: 老木匠也知道，他就是羡慕嘛。
Chinese: 老木匠也知道，他就是羡慕嘛。
TraditionalChinese: 老木匠也知道，他就是羡慕嘛。
English: They know， they were just a bit envious.

Standard: 虽然凤姐不是侗族的，但是手很巧，又认真。
Chinese: 虽然凤姐不是侗族的，但是手很巧，又认真。
TraditionalChinese: 雖然鳳姐不是侗族的，但是手很巧，又認真。
English: Even though Sis' Feng isn't Dong， but she's very skilled and works very hard.

Standard: 还特别好学，一有机会就请教各种老把式。
Chinese: 还特别好学，一有机会就请教各种老把式。
TraditionalChinese: 還特別好學，一有機會就請教各種老把式。
English: She loved to learn too， every opportunity she'd want to learn something.

Standard: 他说，凤姐天生就是吃木工这碗饭的。
Chinese: 他说，凤姐天生就是吃木工这碗饭的。
TraditionalChinese: 他說，鳳姐天生就是吃木工這碗飯的。
English: They said， Sis' Feng was born to do woodwork.

Standard: 他还想教她做织布机和纺纱机。
Chinese: 他还想教她做织布机和纺纱机。
TraditionalChinese: 他還想教她做織布機和紡紗機。
English: They wanted to teach her how to make a Loom and Spinner too.
And fix the bridge...
You didn't tell them about it， right?
No， I wouldn't dare.
Yeah， let's not talk about it...

Standard: 贵州那边的侗族粽子，包法跟我们不一样。
Chinese: 贵州那边的侗族粽子，包法跟我们不一样。
TraditionalChinese: 貴州那邊的侗族粽子，包法跟我們不一樣。
English: The Dong people over in Guizhou wrap it differently than we do.

Standard: 我们是小个的三角型，他们是方的，比较扁。
Chinese: 我们是小个的三角型，他们是方的，比较扁。
TraditionalChinese: 我們是小個的三角型，他們是方的，比較扁。
English: We do a small triangluar shape， theirs are more square.

Standard: 虽然都是侗族，各地风俗还是会有点区别。
Chinese: 虽然都是侗族，各地风俗还是会有点区别。
TraditionalChinese: 雖然都是侗族，各地風俗還是會有點區別。
English: Even though we're all Dong people， our local traditions will be different.
Especially with food.
The Dong style wood barrel is useful.

Standard: 蒸糯米，腌酸食，还能装东西送礼。
Chinese: 蒸糯米，腌酸食，还能装东西送礼。
TraditionalChinese: 蒸糯米，醃酸食，還能裝東西送禮。
English: Steam sweet rice， pickling food， can even put gifts in them.

Standard: 我们做碱水烧的稻草，碱性没有烧柴火强。
Chinese: 我们做碱水烧的稻草，碱性没有烧柴火强。
TraditionalChinese: 我們做堿水燒的稻草，鹼性沒有燒柴火強。
English: The grass we use for Jianshui Zongzi has less alkaline than wood.

Standard: 烧的时候有讲究，人不可以蹲下来。
Chinese: 烧的时候有讲究，人不可以蹲下来。
TraditionalChinese: 燒的時候有講究，人不可以蹲下來。
English: You have to be particular about it， you can't squat down.
When that's done burning you make it into alkaline water.

Standard: 糯米放点山茶油，再用碱水泡一夜。
Chinese: 糯米放点山茶油，再用碱水泡一夜。
TraditionalChinese: 糯米放點山茶油，再用堿水泡一夜。
English: Put some tea seed oil in with the sweet rice， then soak it in the alkaline water over night.
When the rice turns yellow you're ready to wrap.

Standard: 我们这边的粽子，主要就有几个种类吧。
Chinese: 我们这边的粽子，主要就有几个种类吧。
TraditionalChinese: 我們這邊的粽子，主要就有幾個種類吧。
English: The Zongzi here we have a few different kinds.

Standard: 侗家粽，也有人叫三角粽。
Chinese: 侗家粽，也有人叫三角粽。
TraditionalChinese: 侗家粽，也有人叫三角粽。
English: The Dong style one， some people call it the Triangle Zongzi.

Standard: 中部的人吃枕头粽多，肉的，枣栗的。
Chinese: 中部的人吃枕头粽多，肉的，枣栗的。
TraditionalChinese: 中部的人吃枕頭粽多，肉的，棗栗的。
English: The middle regions people at the pillow shaped ones more， with meat and chestnuts.

Standard: 还有你爸那边，客家，灰水粽。
Chinese: 还有你爸那边，客家，灰水粽。
TraditionalChinese: 還有你爸那邊，客家，灰水粽。
English: Your dad's side， Hakka style.

Standard: 猪脚粽鸡爪粽什么的，见得就少啦。
Chinese: 猪脚粽鸡爪粽什么的，见得就少啦。
TraditionalChinese: 豬腳粽雞爪粽什麼的，見得就少啦。
English: Pork hock， chicken feet zongzi， you see that less.

Standard: 我现在除了粽子，还卖瑶家的狗舌粑。
Chinese: 我现在除了粽子，还卖瑶家的狗舌粑。
TraditionalChinese: 我現在除了粽子，還賣瑤家的狗舌粑。
English: Outside of Zongzi I also make Yao Family's dog tongue cake.
Kids love the sweet stuff.
Failed a few years ago in Hainan.

Standard: 先回来缓一缓吧，以后再想办法。
Chinese: 先回来缓一缓吧，以后再想办法。
TraditionalChinese: 先回來緩一緩吧，以後再想辦法。
English: Gonna catch my breath， I'll think about something in the future.

Standard: 我在海南有做过餐饮，也卖过服装。
Chinese: 我在海南有做过餐饮，也卖过服装。
TraditionalChinese: 我在海南有做過餐飲，也賣過服裝。
English: I did some food service in Hainan， and sold clothes.

Standard: 我觉得一个人的形象很重要。
Chinese: 我觉得一个人的形象很重要。
TraditionalChinese: 我覺得一個人的形象很重要。
English: I feel like image is important.

Standard: 虽然过程很痛苦，发型还是要做的。
Chinese: 虽然过程很痛苦，发型还是要做的。
TraditionalChinese: 雖然過程很痛苦，髮型還是要做的。
English: Even though it's painful， you still have to do your hair.

Standard: 你老妈的手艺真不错，下次还去你们那里弄。
Chinese: 你老妈的手艺真不错，下次还去你们那里弄。
TraditionalChinese: 你老媽的手藝真不錯，下次還去你們那裏弄。
English: Your mom is pretty good， I'm going to go back again next time.

Standard: 我是土生土长的芷滨人。
Chinese: 我是土生土长的芷滨人。
TraditionalChinese: 我是土生土長的芷濱人。
English: I was born and raised in Zhibin.

Standard: 只是年轻的时候想出去闯闯。
Chinese: 只是年轻的时候想出去闯闯。
TraditionalChinese: 只是年輕的時候想出去闖闖。
English: When I was younger I wanted to go out and explore.

Standard: 我在这家酒楼当部长，但只是暂时的。
Chinese: 我在这家酒楼当部长，但只是暂时的。
TraditionalChinese: 我在這家酒樓當部長，但只是暫時的。
English: My stay here as manager is just temporary.

Standard: 我一直在存钱，打算哪天再出去闯一闯。
Chinese: 我一直在存钱，打算哪天再出去闯一闯。
TraditionalChinese: 我一直在存錢，打算哪天再出去闖一闖。
English: I'm saving money to go out to try again.
